Name: The Central House Barcelona Gracia
Description:
TCH Barcelona Grácia is within 100 metres of Diagonal Metro Station and Passeig de Gràcia, next to Palau Robert Gardens.

Set in a 19th-century building, TCH Barcelona Grácia offers simple, modern décor and includes a communal lounge area and kitchen. Rooms and dorms have free Wi-Fi, bunk beds, heating and either a private or shared bathroom.

There is also a pretty terrace with sofas, plants and a pergola.

La Pedrera and the Egyptian Museum are within 5 minutes’ walk of the Rodamón. Cafés, bars and restaurants can be found in the Gràcia district, less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just 2 stops from Diagonal Metro Station.

Name: Sonder Paseo de Gracia
Description:
Well situated in Barcelona, Sonder Paseo de Gracia offers a buffet breakfast and free WiFi. This 5-star hotel offers a restaurant. The property is non-smoking and is set a few steps from Passeig de Gracia.

The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a coffee machine, a bath or shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a hairdryer, while certain units at the hotel also have a terrace.

Popular points of interest near Sonder Paseo de Gracia include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 900 metres from Port Olympic, ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell features private parking and free WiFi access. The hotel has an outdoor pool and children's playground, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar.

A TV is available.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

You can play table tennis at the hotel. The hotel also offers bike hire. Picasso Museum is 1.5 km from ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell.

Name: Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Airport
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 16 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Airport features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. The property is around 16 km from Palau Sant Jordi, 16 km from Camp Nou and 18 km from Sants Railway Station. Guests can grab a bite to eat in the restaurant or a drink at the bar and free WiFi is available.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms have a wardrobe.

Guests at Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Airport can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Montjuïc is 18 km from the accommodation, while Casa Batllo is 18 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 5 km away.

Name: Holiday Inn Express Barcelona City 22@, an IHG Hotel
Description:
Friendly Barcelona Hotel with free WiFi, free Continental Buffet Breakfast and easy access to the beach and city sights.

Holiday Inn Express® Barcelona City 22@ hotel is located in the hip 22@Barcelona business zone, formerly an industrial district of Poblenou. Llacuna Metro Station is four minutes walk from the hotel. The B-10, also known as Ronda Litoral, Coastal Ring Road is minutes away by car and on-site parking is available. It’s a 25-minute drive to Barcelona El Prat Airport (BCN). Unwind on Mar Bella Beach, a short stroll from the hotel. On the nearby Rambla del Poblenou, restaurants offering catalan and international food are popular.

Barcelona attractions, like Sagrada Familia and Park Guell, are within easy reach by public transportation. Westfield Glories Mall is only 10 minutes walking from our door and Diagonal Mar Mall less than 10 minutes away by taxi.

Bright, colourful guest rooms offer free WiFi to keep you connected.
Enjoy our family rooms with double bed and sofa bed available for a max. of 2 adults and 2 children.
Get set for the day with an Express Start Breakfast buffet free to all our guests.
In the evening, simply step outside the door to experience Barcelona's lively night out.

Name: Mihlton Barcelona Boutique B&B
Description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, Mihlton Barcelona Boutique B&B is a recently renovated accommodation, which offers allergy-free rooms. Boasting a lift, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The accommodation features luggage storage space, a housekeeping service and organising tours for guests.

All units feature air conditioning and a satellite flat-screen TV. Units are equipped with a private bathroom, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while certain rooms also offer a balcony and some have garden views. At the bed and breakfast, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with warm dishes, local specialities and champagne are available every morning. There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

Guests at the bed and breakfast will be able to enjoy activities in and around Barcelona, like walking tours. The bed and breakfast has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Popular points of interest near Mihlton Barcelona Boutique B&B include Passeig de Gracia, La Pedrera and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Hostalin Barcelona Gran Via
Description:
Centrally located, Hostalin Barcelona Gran Via boasts 24-hour reception, free luggage storage and soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi. Passeig de Gracia is 600 metres away and some rooms have a balcony.

Fitted with wooden flooring all the air-conditioned room features a flat-screen TV. Rooms comes with a private bathroom with shower, hairdryer and hair straightener. Bed linen and towels are also provided.

The property features a shared lounge area with sofas, computers with internet access, a TV and vending machines. A shared fridge is also available.

There is a plenty of bars, restaurants, shops and outlet open till late In the surrounding area. You can also find fresh produce at La Concepción Market, 500 metres away.

Set in the Eixample District, Hostalin Barcelona Gran Via is well served by public transports. There are 2 different metro stations, with different lines, 250 metres from the guest house. Barcelona North Bus Station connected to Girona Costa Brava Airport is 10 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Moxy Barcelona
Description:
Moxy Barcelona features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a restaurant and bar in Barcelona. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The accommodation provides a business centre, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower.

The breakfast offers buffet, continental or gluten-free options.

Sants Railway Station is 500 metres from Moxy Barcelona, while Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.3 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Hotel SB Icaria
Description:
Located 300 metres from Barcelona’s Nova Icaria Beach, Hotel SB Icaria offers a gym, sauna and outdoor pool with sun terrace and hot tub. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The Hotel SB Icaria’s stylish modern rooms feature wooden floors and adjustable lighting. Each room has a minibar, safe and private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel’s elegant restaurant serves Mediterranean market cuisine. There is also a bar and a garden terrace.

Hotel SB Icaria is located in the Olympic Port area, a 10-minute walk from Ciutadella Park and Barcelona Zoo. Ciutadella Metro Station is 800 metres away, and is just 2 stops from Barcelona Cathedral and the historic Gothic Quarter.

Name: HOSTAL BEDMATES
Description:
Attractively set in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, HOSTAL BEDMATES is situated 2.9 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 2.9 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.9 km from Barceloneta Beach. This 2-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are equipped with a terrace. The units will provide guests with a desk and a kettle.

Guests at HOSTAL BEDMATES can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Plaça Catalunya and Santa Maria del Mar. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Hotel SB Diagonal Zero 4 Sup
Description:
Hotel SB Diagonal Zero Barcelona is opposite Barcelona’s International Convention Centre and Barcelona's Forum Auditorium. It has a spa, a gym, a seasonal panoramic pool and a solarium on the hotel rooftop.

There is free access to the hotel gym. The spa is only for guests over 14, and includes a Turkish bath and Finnish sauna. Beauty and massage treatments are available at a surcharge.

All air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel SB Diagonal Zero Barcelona have flat-screen satellite TV, free WiFi and a laptop safe. The soundproofed rooms have facilities to connect iPods.

All rooms have ironing facilities, tea and coffee making facilities, and a kettle. There is a touch-screen control for lights and temperature. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer, and bathrobes and slippers can be provided upon request.

Name: Hotel BESTPRICE Diagonal
Description:
Located 5 minutes’ walk from Diagonal Park and 100 metres from Selva de Mar Metro Station, Hotel BESTPRICE Diagonal is a new hotel with modern décor. Free Wi-Fi is available in all areas.

Each room is air conditioned and offers a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The modern private bathroom offers a shower and free toiletries.

There are various bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the property. Barcelona’s Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre and the CCIB Convention Centre are both 200 metres away.

Breakfast is offered in the café beside the hotel, with discounted prices for guests.


Plaza Catalunya is 10 minutes away by metro and Mar Bella Beach can be reached in 10 minutes on foot.

BestPrice Diagonal has a tour desk and a ticket service. Bicycle and car rental are also available.

Name: Hostal Ramos
Description:
Hostal Ramos is in Barcelona's Raval district, just 50 metres from the famous Ramblas. It offers 24-hour reception and simple, air-conditioned rooms with a TV and private bathroom.

The Ramos has a computer with free internet access. There is also a luggage storage facility in reception.

The guesthouse is set near many of the city's attractions. It is next to the Boquería Market and the Liceu Opera House.

Plaça Catalunya is just 5 minutes’ walk away. Airport buses, trains and metro lines all stop here.

Name: Hotel Glòries
Description:
This modern hotel is located 200 metres from Barcelona’s Monumental Bull Ring and 12 minutes from the Sagrada Familia. The rooms all have air conditioning and heating, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Monumental Metro Station is just 3 minutes’ walk away from Hotel Glòries, and offers a direct service to Plaza Catalunya in around 5 minutes.

The hotel is well located for the 22@ high-tech area, as well as the Agbar Tower. The National Theatre of Catalunya and the Auditori Concert Hall are just 400 metres away.

The Hotel Glòries’s 24-hour front desk offers car and bike hire. They can also reserve tickets.

Name: Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou
Description:
This modern hotel has 250 spacious and fully equipped rooms, a Snack-Bar open 24 hours where clients can enjoy a buffet breakfast, as well as light meals for lunch and dinner. It also has vending machines and private paid parking. All its facilities are perfectly adapted and accessible for people with reduced mobility.
It is a hotel with free and unlimited high-speed Wi-Fi in the common areas. Wi-Fi internet is available in the rooms at an extra cost.
Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou is a pet-friendly hotel that will be happy to offer you and your pet the best experience.
It is located in the traditional Poblenou neighborhood, within streets full of restaurants, bars and shops. One of the most charming neighborhoods in the city, and 600 meters from the Bogatell beach. Barcelona city center can be reached in 10 minutes by metro and Barcelona’s Port Olímpic, with its vibrant night life, is just a 20-minute walk away.
This is considered the most innovative neighborhood in the city. It´s in the heart of the 22@ District and concentrates a multitude of technology and R+D companies. Therefore, thanks to its location and facilities, it is also a perfect accommodation for business trips.
Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou offers all you need to have the best experience in Barcelona city.

Name: Hostal Petit Príncep
Description:
Offering air-conditioned, modern rooms with free Wi-Fi, Hostal Petit Príncep is located on Diagonal Avenue in Barcelona, a 15-minute walk to Passeig De Gracia.

Each modern room offers heating and colourful décor, and some have city views. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The property has a fridge and microwave for communal use.

Hostal Petit Príncep is surrounded by a wide range of shops, lively bars and restaurants. There is a 24-hour supermarket nearby.

Hostal Petit Príncep is 15 minutes' walk from Gaudi’s Pedrera and Casa Batlló. Plaza Catalunya and the old town are within 3 km. Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia is 3 stops away by metro and Barcelona Airport is 15 km from the property

Name: Atica Apartments - by Weflating
Description:
Set within less than 1 km of Sagrada Familia and 2.8 km of Passeig de Gracia, Atica Apartments - by Weflating offers rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The aparthotel features family rooms.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine. At the aparthotel, the units come with bed linen and towels.

A minimarket is available at the aparthotel.

Sightseeing tours are available close by.

La Pedrera is 2.8 km from the aparthotel, while Casa Batllo is 3.3 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Hotel Lyon
Description:
Set in the traditional, fishing district of Barceloneta, next to the central city beach. This hotel provides value and practical accommodation, ideal for those travelling on a budget.

After a hearty breakfast, head out along the impressive Barcelona beachfront. Stop for a morning coffee or a bite to eat, next to the waterfront. Here you can spend the day strolling around this charming neighbourhood, or you can walk into the Gothic Quarter, or the popular Born neighbourhood – 5 minutes’ walk away.

This hotel has a small social lounge, where you can sit and read, or chat with friends or fellow guests.

Name: Hotel Peninsular
Description:
Just a minute’s walk from Las Ramblas, this charming hotel offers a free Wi-Fi zone and a bright central courtyard filled with plants. Liceu Metro Station is only 200 metres away.

Hotel Peninsular features functional, air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms. The hotel’s 24-hour reception offers luggage storage and information about Barcelona.

The Peninsular is located on the edge of the trendy Raval district, which is full of lively bars. The colourful street performers and pavement cafés of Las Ramblas are just around the corner.

The famous Boqueria Market is 250 metres from the hotel, while Barcelona Cathedral is 500 metres away. Airport buses and local trains stop in Plaça Catalunya, a 10-minute walk away.

Name: Hotel BESTPRICE Gracia
Description:
Located in Barcelona’s Gracia District, Hotel BESTPRICE Gracia is located 450 metres from Joanic Metro Station. It offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi.

All rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property where staff can help with tourist information and luggage storage.

You will find many restaurants, bars and shops in the surrounding area. You can also reach Parc Güell in a 20-minute walk from the property. Central Barcelona is a 20-minute metro ride away.

Name: NH Barcelona Diagonal Center
Description:
This design hotel is situated 15 minutes’ from the beach, in the 22@ business area of Barcelona’s Poble Nou district. Bogatell Metro Station, 350 metres away, connects with central Barcelona in 25 minutes.

The modern rooms at NH Barcelona Diagonal Center feature a flat-screen satellite TV, desk, minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast.

You will find cafés and restaurants on Poblenou Rambla, 10 minutes’ walk away. Glòries Shopping Centre is also within a 10-minute walk.

This NH hotel features a 24-hour reception desk and a business centre. Rooms and facilities are adapted for disabled guests. There is free Wi-Fi throughout.

Barcelona Airport is about 18 km away, while CCIB Convention Centre is 3km away. Car rental is available at the hotel and private parking is available at an additional cost.

Name: Citytrip Palau de la Música
Description:
Citytrip Palau de la Música offers studios and apartments located in the lively neighborhood of El Born, one of the most characteristic areas of the city with its typical narrow streets.

The location is very convenient as major tourist attractions such as Las Ramblas, Paseo de Grácia, Arc de Triomf, and Plaça Catalunya are within walking distance.

All accommodations feature attractive, contemporary decor and are carefully designed and equipped to provide all necessary amenities, facilitating an independent and worry-free living experience.

The apartments come equipped with appliances and various kitchen utensils. Free Wi-Fi connection allows you to stay always connected.

There is no reception in the building; the apartments are accessible via codes.

Access to the apartments is by stairs.

Name: Palau de la música 4
Description:
Palau de la música 4 in Barcelona features accommodation with free WiFi, 1.9 km from Somorrostro Beach, 2 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 500 metres from Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 700 metres from Santa Maria del Mar, 1.1 km from Plaça Reial and 400 metres from Picasso Museum. The property is 1.9 km from Barceloneta Beach, and within 600 metres of the city centre.

The 1-bedroom apartment features a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen and 1 bathroom. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Passeig de Gracia and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: ClassBedroom Barcelona Beach Apartments
Description:
These apartments without elevator access are located in the district of Barceloneta, surrounded by seafood restaurants and set beside the city’s sandy beaches.

ClassBedroom Barcelona Beach Apartments can accommodate 2 people per apartment.  They allow families and groups of friends to enjoy independent accommodation in the heart of The Catalan capital.

The apartment's location is near to train, metro and bus services, meaning that you can easily visit the many cultural sights of this inspiring city. Las Ramblas and the lively district of El Born are only a few minutes walk away.

This historic fishing district is also a short distance from the Olympic Port.

Name: Hostal Radio Barcelona
Description:
Hostal Radio Barcelona is in central Barcelona, just 3 minutes’ walk from the MACBA and CCCB Modern Art Museums. It offers a 24-hour reception and rooms with a flat-screen TV. Free WiFi is provided.

The rooms at the Radio feature heating and each one has a private bathroom.

Guests at Hostal Radio Barcelona are welcome to enjoy a free walking tour service, available on request.

Hostal Radio Barcelona offers coffee, capuccino, chocolate and cold drinks for sale at their waiting room. There are numerous bars, restaurants and shops within 2 minutes’ walk and both Universitat square and Catalunya square are just 5 minutes away.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya and paid parking near the hotel is offered to our guests.

Name: Catalonia Albeniz
Description:
Catalonia Albeniz offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and satellite TV. It is situated 150 metres from Clot Train Station, and a 15-minute walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia Church.

The property has a gym and an outdoor pool. You can also use the luggage storage facility on site at the Albeniz.

The varied buffet breakfast at the Catalonia Albeniz includes typical local dishes, such as potato omelette and bread with tomato.

The Albeniz offers bright, modern rooms with simple décor and wooden floors. Each room includes a minibar and a marble bathroom with a hair dryer, plus a safe. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

Catalonia Albeniz is just 700 metres from the shops and restaurants of Glòries Shopping Centre, while Encants Flea Market is a 5-minute walk away. Metro services and direct airport trains are available from nearby Clot Station.

Name: Hostal Barcelona
Description:
Located 15 minutes' walk from Las Ramblas and Plaça Espanya, Hostal Barcelona has rooms with air conditioning, TV and free Wi-Fi. Famous for its theatres, Parallel Avenue is 100 metres away.

Hostal Barcelona can provide tourist information, assist with ticket reservations including the Barcelona Tourist Bus, and help arrange car/bike rental. There is an internet terminal in reception. A luggage storage service is available and all rooms have a safe. Reception is available 24 hours.

A continental breakfast buffet is served from 07:30 to 10:30 It offers different kinds of bread, butter, jams, cornflakes, yogurt, cheese, ham, salami, croissants, chocolate croissants, muffins, biscuits, gaufres, Nutella, fruit, juice, coffee, milk and tea. Cold and hot drinks and pastries are available 24 hours a day. Guests also have access to a microwave. There is a supermarket in the same building, restaurants and bars in the surroundings.

Parallel Metro Station and many bus routes are 100 metres from Hostal Barcelona. The Fira Convention Centre is 12 minutes away by public transport. Montjuïc is a 5-minute walk from the guest house, and the Old Harbour can be reached in 20 minutes on foot.

Name: Green House Hotel
Description:
This modern hotel is located directly across from the Auditori and 50 metres from the National Theatre. It offers bright, air-conditioned rooms, 250 metres from Monumental Bull Ring.

Rooms at Green House Hotel Diagonal feature stylish, contemporary décor. Each includes a smart TV, safe box, desk and private bathroom with hairdryer.

Glories Shopping Centre is 500 metres away and Ciutadella Park and the Born district are 10 minutes’ walk away.

Other facilities include Airport Shuttle at an extra charge.

Green House Hotel is close to the Barcelona Encants Market and only 10 minutes’ walk from the iconic Sagrada Familia Basilica. Marina Metro Station is 400 metres away, 3 stops from Plaza Catalunya. Estacio del Nord Bus Station is 5 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Fisa Rentals Les Corts Apartments
Description:
These stylish modern apartments offer free Wi-Fi and well-equipped kitchens. Sants Train Station is just a 10-minute walk away, while Entença Metro Station is 450 metres away.

Offering minimalist décor, each bright, air-conditioned Fisa Rentals apartment has a living room with flat-screen cable TV. Kitchens include a washing machine, microwave and coffee maker. Some apartments have terraces with city views, available on request and subject to availability.

A range of bars and supermarkets can be found in the streets around the Fisa Rentals Les Corts Apartments. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is around 600 metres away.

Buses to the city centre stop within a 5-minute walk of the apartments. FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium can be reached in 20 minutes on foot, or in 5 minutes by bus or Metro.

Name: Hostal Balkonis
Description:
Located in central Barcelona, Hostal Balkonis guest house offers a terrace, free Wi-Fi throughout. Sant Antoni Metro Station is just 80 metres away.

This property offers functional and modern rooms with a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries each. They all feature heating, air conditioning, flat-screen TV and a radio. Some have a balcony with garden and city views.

You can hire bicycles on site, allowing you to explore more of the city.

You will find bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets and the closest supermarket is just 30 metres away.

A 12-minute walk will take you to Barcelona’s La Rambla and Barceloneta Beach is 3 km away. Plaza de España, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport is 20 minutes’ walk from Hostal Balkonis.

Name: SM Hotel Sant Antoni
Description:
Situated 5 minutes' walk from the Sagrada Familia, this stylish, modern hotel offers a 24-hour reception desk and free Wi-Fi access available throughout. Monumental Metro Station is 200 metres away.

Rooms at SM Hotel Sant Antoni feature parquet floors, a safe, work desk and flat-screen TV. Decorated in white, black and red tones, they have air conditioning and heating, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and toiletries.

The Sant Antoni offers a continental buffet breakfast, and drinks and snacks are available from the vending machines. A wide range of cafés and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk.

SM Hotel Sant Antoni is 900 metres from L’Auditori Concert Hall and the National Theatre. Glòries Shopping Centre and Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard can both be reached within a 20-minute walk. You can reach Plaza Catalunya in 10 minutes by bus or metro.

Name: Good-Home Paseo de Gracia
Description:
Good-Home Paseo de Gracia is located in Barcelona. Free WiFi access is available. Each room here will provide you with a TV, air conditioning and a balcony or terrace.

All air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV, safe, and seating area. The private bathroom includes a shower and hairdryer.

This bed and breakfast offers a simple self-service breakfast, including toasts, pastries, and cereals. Complete with a microwave, the dining area also has a refrigerator and an electric kettle. There is a coffee and tea machine, available from 8:00 to 12:00. Other facilities offered at the property include a tour desk.

The bed and breakfast is 200 metres from Diagonal, 200 metres from La Pedrera and 1 km from Passeig de Gracia Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Ibis Barcelona Plaza Glòries 22@
Description:
Ibis Barcelona Plaza Glòries 22@ is located in Barcelona’s Glòries district, 500 metres from Torre Agbar. It offers a fitness centre, 24-hour bar and soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen TV.

All rooms at the Ibis Plaza Glòries have air conditioning and heating. They also have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is offered throughout.

The Hotel Ibis Plaza Glòries has a restaurant which serves a buffet breakfast. Rates with breakfast included does not include breakfast for children. Children under 12 can enjoy breakfast for 4 euros per person

Llacuna and Glòries Metro Stations are within 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. From here you can reach Plaza Catalunya or Barceloneta Beach in under 10 minutes.

Name: Hotel Best Auto Hogar
Description:
Set on Parallel Avenue, Hotel Auto Hogar is just opposite Parallel Metro Station and 10 minutes’ walk from the Ramblas. It offers air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms.

All rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and vanity mirror.

Some of Barcelona’s most popular theatres can be found within 5 minutes’ walk, while Montjuïc hill is 15 minutes' walk from the hotel. The Fira Exhibition Centre is just over 1 km away.

The Auto Hogar Hotel’s restaurant serves Mediterranean dishes, and is open 7 days a week. The hotel also has a café.

The hotel reception offers free newspapers, and can arrange bicycle and car hire.

Name: Hostal Boutique Khronos
Description:
Hostal Boutique Khronos is 450 metres from Barcelona’s famous La Pedrera and Paseo de Gracia. It offers a roof terrace, and free Wi-Fi in all areas.

Rooms at the Khronos Boutique Guest House are simple and elegant, with flat-screen TV and city views. All rooms include air conditioning, a safe and a modern bathroom with hairdryer and amenities. 24-hour room service is also provided.

Beach towels, newspapers and umbrellas are available from reception. The Khronos also has a tour desk, offering information about the city.

Set in Barcelona’s Eixample district, Khronos is 600 metres from Diagonal Metro Station. Las Ramblas and Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia are both just 2 Metro stops away.

Name: Evenia Rocafort
Description:
The stylish Evenia Rocafort is located in central Barcelona, 200 metres from Poble Sec Metro Station. Air-conditioned, soundproofed rooms feature flat-screen TV and free internet access.

Rooms at the Evenia have a private bathroom, minibar and safe. There is also a work desk.

Evenia Rocafort serves a varied buffet breakfast.

There is a 24-hour front desk and an internet corner. The hotel can provide tourist information, and is within a short walk of the Fira Exhibition Centre, the Magic Fountain and Poble Espanyol.

Poble Sec Metro Station is just 2 stops away from the Ramblas. Sants Train and Bus Station is just 3 stops away.

Name: Hostal BESTPRICE Barcelona Stadium
Description:
Hostal BESTPRICE Barcelona Stadium is located next to Barcelona’s famous Camp Nou Football Stadium. It offers basic rooms with a sink and free WiFi. All rooms have shared bathroom facilities.

Rooms at the Conde Güell come with a fan and heating. They include a TV, and guests can use the communal microwave. All rooms and apartments include air conditioning.

The 24-hour reception allows guests flexibility during their stay. The tour desk can offer information on the surrounding area.

Collblanc Metro Station is 200 metres away and guests can reach the city centre in 3 stops. There are many bars, restaurants and shops on Diagonal Avenue, a 15-minute walk from the guest house.

Name: Catalonia Sagrada Familia
Description:
A 15-minute walk from Gaudí's Sagrada Família, Catalonia Sagrada Familia is just 300 metres from Clot Metro and Train Station. It features a restaurant, a seasonal outdoor pool and a gym.

The Catalonia Sagrada Familia features traditional, bright décor and its rooms are have a desk, a mini fridge with complimentary water and a safety deposit box. Free Wi-Fi access is available.
All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

The restaurant serves a range of Catalan and Mediterranean cuisine, as well as a buffet breakfast. The café-bar offers a selection of drinks and snacks throughout the day and there is also a bar.

Car hire is available on site, and staff at the Catalonia Sagrada Familia’s 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona and its many attractions. The hotel is 200 metres from the Torre Agbar Tower.

Clot Metro Station connects guests to the city centre in 4 stops and the airport train also stops here.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Est
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 2.3 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and 1 km from the centre, Stay U-nique Apartments Est provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a terrace. It is situated 2.3 km from Sant Miquel Beach and features a lift. The apartment features family rooms.

Each unit is equipped with a balcony, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Est.

Name: Hotel Via Augusta
Description:
Situated next to Gràcia FGC Train Station, Hotel Via Augusta has a rooftop terrace with views of Barcelona. It offers functional, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The Via Augusta is a historic building with a beautiful original foyer. Rooms have simple, modern décor and wooden floors. They include a work desk, a safe and a bathroom with a hairdryer.

A varied breakfast buffet is served in the hotel, and drinks are available from the vending machine. A wide range of bars and restaurants can be found in the popular Gràcia district, within a 5-minute walk.

Hotel Via Augusta is 400 metres from Fontana Metro Station, and Parc Güell is just 1 Metro stop away. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a 5-minute journey from nearby Gracia Station.

Name: BcnStop Sant Pau Suites
Description:
Situated within 3 km of Nova Icaria Beach and less than 1 km of Sagrada Familia, BcnStop Sant Pau Suites features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The aparthotel has family rooms.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a balcony. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. At the aparthotel, units have bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity of the property.

La Pedrera is 2.7 km from the aparthotel, while Casa Batllo is 2.9 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away.

Name: Catalonia Diagonal Centro
Description:
Catalonia Diagonal Centro is set in the heart of Barcelona’s Eixample district, 300 metres from Diagonal Metro Station. It features a seasonal outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.

At the Catalonia Diagonal Centro, you can enjoy modern, comfortable accommodation next to some of Barcelona’s most popular sights. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app

Only 300 metres away on Passeig de Gràcia is La Pedrera, one of Gaudi’s famous creations. Take a stroll past the Modernista buildings to reach Plaça Catalunya and the lively Ramblas area.

Back at the hotel, relax in your stylish bedroom with contemporary wooden furniture and marble en suite bathroom. Watch satellite television or take advantage of the free wireless internet connection.

A short stroll from the hotel takes you to trendy Gràcia, with its bohemian shops and leafy squares, and a huge selection of bars and restaurants. Nearby metro and bus lines make it easy to see the whole of this cosmopolitan city.

Name: Ramblas Hotel
Description:
Ramblas Hotel is situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, just 500 metres from Port Vell Harbour. It offers free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony or terrace.

Each bright room at the Hotel Ramblas includes satellite TV, a minibar and a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and toiletries. Some rooms have views over the Ramblas.

The Ramblas Hotel has a lobby bar and a charming café with original Modernista design and a pavement terrace. Breakfast is included in all room rates.

Located at the edge of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, the hotel is a 10-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral. Liceu Metro Station is just 250 metres away.

Name: Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Gran Via
Description:
This spacious and modern hotel is located in Eixample district, built in 2004, the Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Gran Via, features wide-open public spaces covered in marble.

Rooms include flat-screen TV, Wifi, safebox, desk, minibar, private bathrooms with toiletries.

A good location for tourism, you can easily walk to the Gothic Quarter and Ramblas, or up to the attractions of Montjuic. The city’s major business districts are also nearby.

Rooms include satellite TV, free Wi-Fi access, air conditioning and a bathroom with free toiletries.

Parking is available on site at an additional cost.

Name: Hotel del Mar
Description:
Hotel del Mar is set in a listed building just 800 metres from the seafront and Barceloneta Metro Station. It is a 5-minute walk from the trendy Born neighbourhood and Ciutadella Park.

The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel del Mar have flat-screen satellite TV. There is a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities, and some rooms have a private balcony. A safe is also available with a surcharge.

Hotel del Mar has a 24-hour front desk. Barcelona’s França Train Station is a 5-minute walk away, and you can walk to Barcelona Cathedral and Maremagnum Shopping Centre in 10 minutes. Parking is available 5 minutes' walk from the property.

Name: Casa Bella Gracia by Aspasios
Description:
Casa Bella Gracia by Aspasios is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gràcia and Diagonal Avenue. This boutique hotel features 11 attractive rooms.

Our accommodation has been completely renewed in December 2023. The modern furnishings of the rooms, designed by interior design experts, and every detail have been carefully selected to offer you a unique experience during your stay in Barcelona.

Each room at Casa Bella Gracia by Aspasios has contemporary décor finished in sand colours. All rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi, as well as a kettle, a coffee machine and a safety box, and there is a shared terrace available for all guests.


A range of cafés, bars and restaurants can be found in the surrounding Gràcia district. The charming squares at Plaza del Sol and Plaza de la Vila de Gràcia can be reached in 10 minutes by foot.

Diagonal Metro Station is just 400 metres away and is 3 stops from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Gaudí’s La Pedrera is less than 10 minutes’ walk from the Bella Gracia.

Name: Sweet BCN Sagrada Familia
Description:
Located within 2.7 km of Nova Icaria Beach and 3 km of Bogatell Beach, Sweet BCN Sagrada Familia provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. All rooms feature a kitchen and a private bathroom. Somorrostro Beach is 3 km away and Passeig de Gracia is 2.5 km from the apartment.

Featuring free WiFi, the units have a washing machine and a flat-screen TV.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Sweet BCN Sagrada Familia.

Name: Residència Erasmus Gracia
Description:
This student residence is located in Barcelona's lively Gràcia district. It offers affordable accommodation with free internet and a modern en-suite bathroom. Diagonal Avenue is 15 minutes’ walk away.

Residència Erasmus Gracia serves a buffet breakfast, including toast, cereals, cheese, jams and fruit juices. Residència Erasmus Gracia Gracia also has vending machines with snacks, and guests can find bars and restaurants within a short walk.

Residència Erasmus Gracia is located in a historical building and features a garden, lounge area with a TV and a dining area with a fridge and microwave for long stay guests. A luggage storage service is provided and laundry facilities and parking are available on request.

The residence is just 15 minutes’ walk from Gaudi’s famous Park Guell, with many interesting architectural elements. Lesseps Metro Station is just 200 metres away.

The residence is open to the university community, including students, professors, researchers and administrative staff all year round.

Please be aware that our rooms are not equipped with a hairdryer or minibar.

Name: Acta Antibes
Description:
The Acta Antibes is set in Barcelona’s Eixample District, 10 minutes’ walk from the Sagrada Familia. This hotel features a 24-hour reception, buffet breakfast and free Wi-Fi.

Each of the Acta Antibes’s rooms has simple, stylish décor and wooden flooring. All air-conditioned rooms have a TV and a desk.

Whilst visiting the city’s tourist attractions, guests at the Antibes can make use of its luggage storage. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request.

The hotel is ideally located for visiting sights such as Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera, which are around 20 minutes’ walk away.

Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just over one kilometre away. The nearest Metro station, Monumental, is just 200 metres from the hotel.

Name: Apartment Poble Nou
Description:
Located in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Nova Icaria Beach and a 14-minute walk from Mar Bella Beach, Apartment Poble Nou offers air conditioning. The apartment, set in a building dating from 1940, is 1.6 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.1 km from Barceloneta Beach. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Bogatell Beach is less than 1 km away.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and quiet street views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Port Olimpic is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Sagrada Familia is 2.8 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Casual Colours Barcelona
Description:
Casual Colours Barcelona is set approximately 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants Railway Station and 200 metres from Avinguda Diagonal. This functional hotel offers comfortable rooms and free Wi-Fi.

Casual Colors offers simple, attractive décor. Each of its air-conditioned rooms has a TV and minibar.

The property has easy access to Barcelona’s main attractions. Las Ramblas and the city’s old town can be reached in approximately 15 minutes from either Sants or Entença Metro Stations.

The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast. Staff at the 24-hour reception can arrange restaurant reservations and provide information on the city’s attractions.

Sants Metro Station connects guests to La Fira Exhibition Centre and Plaza de España in just 3 stops. The airport bus also stops here.

Name: Hotel Lloret Ramblas
Description:
Hotel Lloret Ramblas is situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, just outside Plaza Catalunya Square. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Each functional room at the Lloret Ramblas Hotel features a work desk and a private bathroom with amenities. Some rooms also have a private balcony.

Breakfast is served in Hotel Lloret Ramblas’s beautiful lounge-dining room, which dates from the early 20th century. The reception area has a free PC with internet and a free safe.

Barcelona Cathedral and the MACBA Modern Art Museum are both around 500 metres from Hotel Lloret. Catalunya Metro Station is a 1-minute walk away, and direct airport buses stop within 100 metres.

Name: H La Paloma Boutique
Description:
The H La Paloma Boutique is located in the Raval neighborhood, just 200 meters from the Sant Antoni market.
 The rooms at H La Paloma Boutique feature modern and elegant decoration.
They feature a king-size bed, free Wi-Fi, Smart TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. It also has private parking and 24-hour room service.
The H La Paloma Boutique has the ideal location to visit the major centers of interest on foot, being 600 meters from the MACBA Museum of Modern Art and just a 5-minute walk from Paseo de Gracia, Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas.
The Sant Antoni and Universidad metro stations are just a few meters away.

Name: Som Nit Port Vell
Description:
Ideally located in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Som Nit Port Vell is set 1.3 km from Barceloneta Beach, 2.9 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 3 km from Mar Bella Beach. Among the facilities at this property are full-day security and a housekeeping service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 1.2 km from Sant Miquel Beach, and within 1.2 km of the city centre.

The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At the guest house, all units are soundproof. At the guest house, units come with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach of the property. A bicycle rental service is available at the guest house.

Popular points of interest near Som Nit Port Vell include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Plaça Reial. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Hotel SB Glow 4 Sup
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.8 km from Bogatell Beach, Hotel SB Glow 4 Sup features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Featuring a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can use the sauna and the hammam, or enjoy city views.

All units at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. The rooms will provide guests with a desk and a coffee machine.

Guests at Hotel SB Glow 4 Sup can enjoy a buffet breakfast. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean and Grill BBQ cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at Hotel SB Glow 4 Sup.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area.

Nova Icaria Beach is 1.8 km from the hotel, while Mar Bella Beach is 2.1 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Golden Hotel Barcelona
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Sagrada Familia, Golden Hotel Barcelona provides a rooftop terrace with outdoor swimming pool, jacuzzi and bar. 1.5 km from Port Olympic, the property is also 1.7 km from Sagarda Familia and 1.9 km away from Picasso Museum. There is a gym, a restaurant and a shared lounge.
 All guests staying at the Golden Hotel Barcelona get 1 free entry for person and stay to the spa at Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpic@ Suites complex (subject to availability and with prior reservation), located 450 meters away.
A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property.
Speaking Spanish, Catalan, German and English at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock.
Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: H10 Raco del Pi
Description:
Featuring 3-star accommodation, H10 Raco del Pi is set in Barcelona, 2.2 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and 2.2 km from Somorrostro Beach. With a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 2.1 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Every room includes a safety deposit box, while certain rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. At H10 Raco del Pi rooms include bed linen and towels.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

There is an on-site snack bar and guests can also make use of the business area. Staff speak English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk.

Popular points of interest near H10 Raco del Pi include Plaça Catalunya, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

Name: Hostal Fernando
Description:
Hostal Fernando is set in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, 100 metres from Las Ramblas and the historic Plaça Sant Jaume. It offers air-conditioned rooms and dormitories with free Wi-Fi.

The basic rooms at the Hostal Fernando come with a TV, safe and a private bathroom.

Fernando guest house has a simple restaurant and bar. There are many bars and restaurants within a short walk.

The guest house has a tour desk, and bicycle and car rental are offered. Barcelona Cathedral, the Picasso Museum and the famous Boquería Market are all within a 10-minute walk.

Name: Catalonia Barcelona 505
Description:
Catalonia Barcelona 505 offers spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi and an outdoor swimming pool in Barcelona’s Sant Gervasi area. From El Putxet Train Station, 400 metres away, you can reach the centre in 15 minutes.

The hotel is close to important medical centres, such as the Teknon Clinic, Sant Jordi Clinic, Dexeus and Barraquer. It is also next to the Blue Tram, which takes you to the cable car for Tibidabo.

Air-conditioned rooms have a satellite TV, a safe and minibar. There is a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

The restaurant C50&5 offers international cuisine. There is a bar and room service is available.

You can hire a car from the 24-hour front desk. On-site parking is offered for an additional charge, and the hotel has easy access to the B20 Motorway.

Name: Decô Apartments Barcelona-Born St.
Description:
Located in a 19th-century building and set just off Passeig del Borne, Rec Studios Barcelona - Decimonónico are 200 metres from the Picasso Museum. Each of these stylish studios comes with free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned studios maintain charming original features such as beamed ceilings and exposed brick walls. All have a sofa, TV and a small kitchenette with a fridge, coffee machine and kettle.

The surrounding Borne district has a varied selection of cafés and restaurants. There are also shops within 100 metres of the Rec Studios Barcelona; and a bar on the ground floor of the building.

Jaume I Metro Station is a 5-minute walk from the studios, while Santa María del Mar Cathedral is just 100 metres away. The famous Las Ramblas and the beaches at Barceloneta are less than 2 km from the property.

Name: Pensión Casa Blanca
Description:
Pension Casa Blanca is centrally located beside Barcelona’s Jaume I Metro Station. Featuring basic décor, this guest house is 5 minutes’ walk from the Picasso Museum and the Cathedral.

Rooms offer flat-screen TV, air conditioning and private bathroom. Some of them have a seating area and a balcony. A paid private parking is available a few metres far from the property.

The central location means there are lots of restaurants, bars and shops nearby. The Ramblas is 5 minutes’ walk away. Barcelona Aquarium and Barceloneta Beach are 1km away and can be reached in 10 minutes by bus.

Name: Silken Sant Gervasi
Description:
Located in the quiet San Gervasi district of Barcelona, this elegant hotel offers modern rooms with free internet connection. The Silken is just 8 minutes by train from Plaza Catalunya.

The restaurant at Silken San Gervasi offers traditional cuisine with modern influences. A breakfast buffet is served in the cafeteria, and drinks and snacks are also available throughout the day.

Functional rooms include a free safe and central heating and air conditioning. The marble bathroom is complete with a hairdryer.

Silken St. Gervasi is a 15-minute walk from Park Guell, with impressive structures, mosaics and architecture by Antoni Gaudí. El Putxet Station can be found 50 metres from the hotel with direct access to the city centre.

Name: Occidental Barcelona 1929
Description:
Occidental Barcelona 1929 features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

Guests at Occidental Barcelona 1929 can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk.

Sants Railway Station is 1 km from the accommodation, while Palau Sant Jordi is 1.7 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km from the property.

Name: Catalonia Portal de l'Angel
Description:
Housed in a traditional 19th-century building, this hotel is located between Plaza de Catalunya and Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter. It offers free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool surrounded by painted murals.

The Catalonia Portal de l'Angel maintains much of its original design. It features comfortable rooms with air conditioning, satellite TV and coffee and tea facilities. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily from 07:30 to 11:00 at Catalonia Portal de l'Angel.

The famous Las Ramblas is less than 200 metres away, while Barcelona Cathedral is 100 metres from the hotel. The Portal de l'Angel is just a 5-minute walk from Catalunya Metro and Railway Station.

Name: H Regas Adults Only
Description:
Situated within 1 km of La Pedrera and 1.5 km of Casa Batllo, H Regas Adults Only features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Featuring free private parking, the 2-star guest house is 500 metres from Passeig de Gracia. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a lift and luggage storage for guests.

All units in the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a bath and slippers, units at the guest house also boast free WiFi. At the guest house, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.8 km from the guest house, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.3 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only
Description:
Situated 150 metres from Barcelona’s Nova Mar Bella Beach, Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only offers sauna and gym, and a free WiFi zone. Each air-conditioned room features international satellite TV.

The hotel features a terrace with sea views and a seasonal infinity pool with hydromassage beds and seats. You can rent Balinese beds and sun loungers. There is also a seasonal snack bar, which is open from June to September.

Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only offers bright, functional rooms, many with views of the city or sea. They include a minibar, a free safe and a private bathroom with amenities.

The hotel’s Canela restaurant serves à la carte Mediterranean meals, and a varied breakfast buffet is available each morning. There are also many bars and restaurants on the nearby seafront promenade.

Regular bus services to central Barcelona stop outside the Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only, while Poble Nou Metro Station is a 10-minute walk away. The CCIB Conference Centre and Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre are just 1 km from the hotel.

Name: SLS Barcelona
Description:
Facing the beachfront, SLS Barcelona offers 5-star accommodation in Barcelona and has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, shared lounge and terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property features a hammam, entertainment staff and a concierge service.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. SLS Barcelona features some rooms with sea views, and the rooms include a kettle.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast.

Guests can relax in the wellness area, including a fitness centre, a sauna and a hot tub, or in the garden equipped with a children's playground.

Forum Beach is a few steps from SLS Barcelona, while Platja del Litoral is 1.6 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 19 km away.

Name: Inside Barcelona Apartments Sants
Description:
Located in Sants neighborhood, close to Joan Miro Park and Arenas de Barcelona, are these one- to three-bedroom apartments. A perfect jumping-off point for exploring the city, a short walk from the metro and train station.

All guestrooms at Inside Barcelona Apartments Sants offer perks such as air conditioning and separate sitting areas, as well as amenities like free WiFi, set of towels, and safe. In the kitchen you will find a n`espresso machine.

Our priority is to adapt to the needs and requirements of our guests, whether travelling for work or leisure, alone or as a couple, with or without children.

Name: Catalonia Roma
Description:
Catalonia Roma is 600 metres from Sants AVE Train and Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, and you can reach Barcelona city centre in 10 minutes by Metro or bus.

There are direct train links to Barcelona Airport from Sants Station and the Airport Bus also stops outside it.

The modern, air-conditioned rooms have wooden floors, a mini fridge with complimentary water and satellite TV. There is a safe and minibar, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served at the hotel restaurant. Room service is available and there is also a bar.

Plaza Espanya, Montjuic’s Magic Fountain and the Fira Conference Centre are all within 15 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

The 24-hour front desk at Catalonia Roma boasts a large stained-glass skylight. You can rent a car and currency exchange is offered.

Pets: Only one dog or cat less than 20 kg is allowed per room (on request). Supplement of 22€ night/animal and deposit of 200€.

Name: Hostal Central Barcelona
Description:
This classically decorated guest house is set in the late 19th-century modernist district of Eixample, in the centre of Barcelona. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Refurbished in 2018, all air-conditioned rooms boast wooden floors, and includes a  smart TV and a free safe. They all have a private bathroom completed with a professional hairdryer.

From Hostal Central Barcelona you can walk into the city centre to explore Gaudi's Modernist monuments, including Casa Batllò, and La Pedrera.

Hostal Central Barcelona is a pleasant place to stay, providing an attractive and artistic interior decor.

Name: Catalonia Born
Description:
Set in a 19th-century building in Barcelona’s El Born district, Catalonia Born offers a rooftop pool, an attractive central courtyard and free Wi-Fi. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 250 metres away.

The classic rooms at Catalonia Born Hotel come with an elegant marble bathroom. They also include a satellite TV and centrally controlled heating or air conditioning, depending on the season.

A buffet breakfast is served, and the snack bar is open for lunch and dinner. There is also a bar in the lobby.

Located minutes from França Train Station, the hotel is well-connected to the rest of the city and its surroundings. Car rental is also available from the tour desk.

Name: Hostal Benidorm
Description:
Situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, Hostal Benidorm offers free Wi-Fi, 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. Liceu Metro Station is just 200 metres away.

Each room at the Benidorm Hostal features simple décor and tiled floors. All rooms have central heating and a private bathroom.

Drinks and snacks are available from vending machines in the Benidorm’s reception area. Staff at the front desk can provide information about the city and arrange car or bicycle rental.

Hostal Benidorm is located just outside the historic Gothic Quarter. Gaudi’s Palau Güell is 100 metres away, while the Boqueria Market is within 400 metres. Barceloneta Beach can be reached in 25 minutes’ walk or a 10-minute bus.

Name: Pretty Apartament
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 600 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 2 km from Sants Railway Station, Pretty Apartament offers air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. Boasting a garden, the apartment is close to several noted attractions, around 1.6 km from Palau Sant Jordi, 1.7 km from Boqueria Market and 1.8 km from Montjuïc. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.8 km from Plaça Catalunya.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Portal de l'Angel is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 3 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Charmsuites Paralel
Description:
Offering stylish, well-equipped apartments with free Wi-Fi, Charmsuites Paralel is set next to Parallel Metro Station and Victoria Theatre. It features air-conditioned accommodation with kitchen facilities.

These spacious, newly built apartments have attractive, modern décor. All have a spacious living room with a sofa bed and a flat-screen TV. Kitchens and kitchenettes come with an electric hob, oven, kettle and coffee maker.

Shops, cafés and bars can be found in the streets surrounding the apartments. There are many restaurants in the nearby Raval district and around Las Ramblas, a 10-minute walk away.

Barcelona’s Port Vell marina is just over 1 km from Charmsuites Paralel, and the Funicular Train to Montjuïc Hill leaves from Parallel Station. Barcelona's Fira Exhibition Centre is around 15 minutes' walk away.

Name: Aparthotel Bcn Montjuic
Description:
Set at the foot of Montjuic Hill, this design aparthotel is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Espanya Metro Station and the Airport Bus Stop. It offers free WiFi and a rooftop terrace with a solarium and a seasonal swimming pool.

The BCN Montjuic is a 5-minute walk from Las Arenas Shopping Centre and a short walk from the Olympic Stadium. Barcelona city centre can be reached in 15 minutes by bus or Metro.

All modern rooms at the Montjuic have air conditioning and heating. They include a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a kitchen with a fridge and microwave.

The apartments also include a living area with a sofa bed, a private bathroom and an equipped kitchen with a washing machine. Bed linen and towels are provided.

The Aparthotel Bcn Montjuic has a TV room, as well as a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk, where guests can arrange to visit local attractions. Laundry service is also available.

Name: Catalonia Avinyo
Description:
Situated 200 metres from Las Ramblas in central Barcelona, Catalonia Avinyo features a rooftop pool and gym. It offers chic, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms are decorated in a modern, minimalist style with large wall photos. They include a minibar, safe and telephone. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app. The modern bathrooms have a shower and a hairdryer.

Barceloneta Beach is a 15-minute walk from Hotel Catalonia Avinyo. The Liceu and Jaume I Metro Stations are just 300 metres away and Barcelona Cathedral is 4 minutes' walk away.

The Avinyo’s central location means there are many shops, bars and restaurants close to the hotel. Bicycle and car hire can be arranged at the tour desk.

Name: 08028 Apartments
Description:
08028 Apartments are situated next to Les Corts Metro Station and 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Camp Nou Football Stadium. The modern apartments share a rooftop pool with views of Barcelona.

Apartments and suites at the 08028 feature contemporary design and free Wi-Fi. Apartments include a balcony, lounge area and a fitted kitchen.

The Taberna Lizarran at the 08028 Apartments serves traditional Spanish cuisine, including tapas.

The 08028 Apartments are a 15-minute walk from Sants Train Station. Plaza Catalunya and the famous Las Ramblas can be reached in around 20 minutes, by Metro.

Name: Hotel Medicis
Description:
Hotel Medicis is 5 minutes’ walk from Sant Pau Metro Station, allowing you to reach central Barcelona in around 10 minutes. There is Wi-Fi access and a rooftop sun terrace.

The Medicis Hotel is chic and functional, and offers reasonably priced accommodation in a good location. All air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV and a safe. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer.

Just next to the hotel is one of Barcelona’s emblematic Art Nouveau buildings, the Sant Pau Hospital, designed by Domènech i Montaner. From here it is a 10-minute walk down Avinguda de Gaudí to The Sagrada Família. You can stop for a coffee, or a meal, in one of the many café-restaurants that line this avenue.

The hotel has a tour desk, and you can hire a bicycle or car. There is a 24-hour front desk.

Name: Exe Ramblas Boquería
Description:
Exe Ramblas Boquería is situated right on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, next to La Boquería Market. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms offer free WiFi, flat-screen satellite TV and a private balcony.

Exe Ramblas Boquería features elegant modern décor, with hardwood floors and designer furniture. The soundproofed rooms have views of Las Ramblas or the colourful Boqueria Market.

A varied buffet breakfast is served in the Exe Ramblas Boquería’s bright dining room. The Boquería is an ideal place to sample typical tapas and fresh fruit, while numerous restaurants and bars can be found nearby.

Barcelona Cathedral and Plaça Catalunya are both within 400 metres of the hotel. Liceu Metro Station is just 100 metres away.

Name: Exe Plaza Catalunya
Description:
In a prime location in Barcelona, Exe Plaza Catalunya provides air-conditioned rooms, a terrace and free WiFi. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.7 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk. All units include a safety deposit box.

Guests at Exe Plaza Catalunya can enjoy a buffet or a gluten-free breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: NH Barcelona Les Corts
Description:
Located 5 minutes’ walk from Les Corts Metro Station, this hotel offers modern accommodation in Barcelona. It has good access to the city's main attractions, such as the Nou Camp Football Stadium.

The air-conditioned rooms at the NH Barcelona Les Corts feature contemporary décor, free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a private balcony or terrace. The private bathroom has a hairdryer and toiletries.

The hotel operates a tour desk and a 24-hour reception. Helpful staff can organise bicycle and car rental, as well as provide information on Barcelona.

NH Les Corts is less than 10 minutes’ walk from Sants Train Station, providing access to Barcelona Airport. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is just 300 metres away. Barcelona Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Arya Stadium Hotel
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Camp Nou, Arya Stadium Hotel features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. With a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

At the hotel, the rooms have a desk. The rooms come with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms also feature a balcony and others also feature city views. All rooms in Arya Stadium Hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is available at the accommodation.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay.

Sants Railway Station is 1.8 km from Arya Stadium Hotel, while Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 3.3 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Ciutat Vella
Description:
This stylish boutique hotel offers colourful, modern rooms in the historic city centre, just 4 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya. There is a rooftop hot tub and terrace.

Guests at the Ciutat Vella enjoy free coffee. There is also a free internet terminal, and free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

The rooms in the Ciutat Vella have large windows and flat-screen TVs. The bathrooms are modern and have showers.

Ciutat Vella’s central location makes it ideal for exploring Barcelona’s historic heart. Many great bars, cafés and restaurants are less than 10 minutes’ walk away. Universitat Metro Station is just 3 minutes away.

Name: Catalonia Plaza Catalunya
Description:
Hotel Catalonia Plaza Cataluña offers an outdoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. It is housed in a building 50 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya. All hotel rooms have smart TVs equipped with Chromecast app.

The hotel serves a continental buffet breakfast with show cooking and it includes a wide variety of regional products and home-made cakes.

Catalonia Plaza Cataluña Hotel has a sun terrace with loungers, a gym and a pool. Guests can also enjoy the on-site spa and cabin for spa treatments and massages.

Hotel Catalonia Plaza is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the Palau de la Música Catalana. A regular bus service to the airport leaves from the other side of Plaza Catalunya, just 100 metres away.

Name: Sant Pau Terraces Apartments
Description:
These bright modern apartments each have a furnished terrace with excellent views over the sea or Barcelona’s Hospital de Sant Pau, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Sant Pau Terraces Apartments also come with free Wi-Fi.

Apartments have an integrated heating and cooling system. The living room includes a sofa, flat-screen TV and DVD player. There is a dining table and a kitchenette with a washing machine, fridge, microwave and coffee maker. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and shower.

You will find lots of shops and restaurants along Avenida Gaudi, which starts next to the apartments. You can stroll along this avenue to the Sagrada Familia in 10 minutes. From Sant Pau/Dos de Maig Metro Station, 2 minutes’ walk away, you can reach central Barcelona in 10 minutes.

Name: Sercotel Amister Art Hotel Barcelona
Description:
Offering a roof terrace with a swimming pool and bar, Sercotel Amister Art Hotel Barcelona is located just 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s fashionable Paseo de Gracia Boulevard. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

Each floor of the hotel is dedicated to a different artist and rooms feature contemporary art work. The stylish rooms come with a flat-screen TV, safe and air conditioning,

Located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Sercotel Amister Art Hotel Barcelona is approximately 400 metres from Entença and Hospital Clinic Metro Stations. It is also 15 minutes’ walk from Gaudís Casa Batllò, and La Pedrera.

Parking can be arranged at the hotel. Across the hotel there is a bus stop and taxi service.

Cots are available on request and are subject to availability. You can use the Special Requests box when booking or contact the property. Please note, when booking more booking 5 or more rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.﻿ Please note that guests must present the credit card used to make the reservation upon arrival. If you are not the owner of the credit card used to make the reservation, please contact the property in advance.

Name: Praktik Bakery
Description:
Featuring a quality bakery within the hotel, Praktik Bakery hotel is located in Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Diagonal Metro. Free Wi-Fi is available.

This modern hotel offers air-conditioned double/twin rooms including a flat-screen TV and private bathroom. Towels and bed linen are provided free.

Guests can enjoy breakfast in the hotel and try the breads and pastries from the hotel's traditional bakery. Other services include provision of beach towels, ticket service for tourist bus, laundry, and airport transfers.

Praktik Bakery hotel is within a short walk of many bars, restaurants and shops. Paseo De Gracia Avenue and Gaudi's La Pedrera are just 250 metres away, and La Sagrada Familia is a 15-minute walk away. Plaza Catalunya Sqaure and Las Ramblas Boulevard is 1.3 km from the hotel.

Name: Hotel Best Front Maritim
Description:
Set 100 metres from Barcelona’s Nova Mar Bella Beach, Front Maritim offers free WiFi and a gym with sauna. The Fòrum and CCIB Convention Centre are within a 15-minute walk.

All rooms at Hotel Front Maritim are modern and functional. There is a flat-screen TV and a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a shower and free toiletries.

The Front Maritim’s restaurant serves a wide range of modern Mediterranean cuisine.

Hotel Front Maritim is 700 metres from the shops and restaurants of Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre. Selva de Mar Metro Station is within a 10-minute walk, and nearby bus stops offer regular links to Barcelona City Centre.

Other services that can be requested and are subject to availability included early check-in, late check-out, breakfast bag (for early check out). and cribs. These services may have an additional cost.

Name: Atenea Rekord Suites
Description:
Located in Barcelona's Sarria District, Atenea Rekord Suites is a 10-minute train ride from Plaza Catalunya. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property

Spacious and comfortable rooms with modern décor come with satellite TV, a safe and Nespresso coffee machine. Each one has a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The Rekord Café offers a buffet breakfast.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

The surrounding area offers a selection of restaurants, shops and lounge bars. Muntaner Train Station is just 50 metres from the hotel.

Name: Acta Voraport
Description:
Set in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Bogatell Beach, Acta Voraport offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features an ATM, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk. All guest rooms in Acta Voraport are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the 24-hour front desk.

Popular points of interest near Acta Voraport include Mar Bella Beach, Nova Icaria Beach and Somorrostro Beach. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Arc La Rambla
Description:
The Arc La Rambla has an ideal location on Las Ramblas, 100 metres from Drassanes Metro Station. It offers rooms with free WiFi.

The hotel is a 5-minute walk from the city’s port. Plaça Catalunya and the Gothic Quarter are 10 minutes' walk of the hotel.

All air-conditioned rooms at the Arc la Rambla feature simple décor. Each has satellite TV and a private bathroom.

The Arc La Rambla also has a ticket service and bicycle and car rental are possible on site. Lockers are available to rent.

A daily continental breakfast is served in the Ramblas’ dining room. The hotel is within 10 minutes’ walk of a selection of cafés, bars and restaurants in Barcelona’s old town.

Name: Weflating Boutique Hostel
Description:
Situated within 2.8 km of Somorrostro Beach and 2.9 km of Sant Miquel Beach, Weflating Boutique Hostel features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana, and La Pedrera. The property is 2.8 km from Barceloneta Beach, and within 600 metres of the city centre.

Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also boast free WiFi, while certain rooms are fitted with a balcony.

Popular points of interest near Weflating Boutique Hostel include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Aparthotel Atenea Calabria
Description:
Aparthotel Atenea Calabria is situated 200 metres from Rocafort Metro Station, a 10-minute walk from Plaza España Square. This aparthotel features spacious studios with free Wi-Fi, a well-equipped kitchenette and a flat-screen TV.

The Atenea’s studios are spacious and brightly decorated. Each has a seating area with satellite TV and sofa bed. The kitchenette comes with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker.

The Calabria offers a daily buffet breakfast. There are also a range of supermarkets, cafés and restaurants within walking distance of the aparthotel.

The Atenea Calabria is around a 20-minute walk from Sants Train and Bus Station. Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas are 3 Metro stops away from nearby Rocafort Metro Station.

Name: Sallés Hotel Pere IV
Description:
Pere IV is situated in the Poble Nou District, 10 minutes’ walk from the lively Port Olimpic area and Barcelona's beaches. This hotel features a free spa, free Wi-Fi, a seasonal roof top terrace and 24-hour reception.

Each of the spacious rooms comes with a minibar, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The à la carte Garum Restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel serves a daily, buffet breakfast.

Guests enjoy free access to the Pere IV's spa, which includes a Finnish sauna, a hammam, indoor pool and sensation showers.

The Pere IV is a short walk from the beach and the new marina. Nearby Bogatell Metro Station offers easy access to the beach and the city centre, which can both be reached within 15 minutes.

Name: Suite Gracia Barcelona
Description:
Suite Gracia Barcelona features a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 800 metres of La Pedrera and 1.3 km of Casa Batllo. Featuring a terrace, the apartment is close to several noted attractions, around 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1.7 km from Tivoli Theatre and 1.4 km from Sagrada Familia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 600 metres away.

The apartment comes with 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.1 km from Suite Gracia Barcelona, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

Name: ApartEasy - Gracia Apartments
Description:
Featuring free Wi-Fi, Apart Easy Gracia is located in Barcelona’s Gracia District, within 400 metres of Passeig de Gracia and Gaudí’s La Pedrera building. The property offers modern apartments with air conditioning.
