Each apartment features wooden floors and has a living room with a sofa and TV. An oven, microwave and washing machine are included in the kitchenette. The bathroom comes with a shower.

Some apartments offer a private terrace with city views. A large variety of supermarkets, bars and restaurants can be found within 5 minutes’ walk of the apartments.

Plaça Catalunya and the famous Sagrada Familia can be reached in 20 minutes on foot. Diagonal Metro Station, with connection to the historic centre, is 400 metres away.

Name: Mosaic by Ona
Description:
Located in a historic building in the heart of Rambla Catalunya, Mosaic by Ona is situated in Barcelona, 10 minutes' walk from Plaça Catalunya and 5 minutes' walk from Casa Batllo and La Pedrera. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned, and features a flat-screen TV and modern décor. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. The rooms include a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. The hotel also offers car hire.

Due to its central location, several bars and restaurants can be found nearby.

The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Mosaic by Ona.

Name: Hotel Villa Emilia
Description:
This stylish design hotel is located 150 metres from Rocafort Metro Station in Barcelona. It offers a trendy rooftop bar and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and plasma satellite TV.

The soundproofed rooms at Hotel Villa Emilia feature parquet floors and modern décor. Each one has a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Hotel Villa Emilia Barcelona’s restaurant serves creative Catalan food, and there is a weekly barbecue. The Villa Emilia Bistrot offers live music.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. There are also car and bicycle rental services at the front desk.

Hotel Villa Emilia is just 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Espanya, where you can find the Fira Convention Centre. Sants Station is 15 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Hotel Suizo
Description:
This hotel, located in the Gothic heart of Barcelona near the Cathedral, enjoys an ideal location for visiting the sights of this exciting city.

Hotel Suizo has modern facilities and comfortable rooms with satellite television and air conditioning. Watch the world go by from the bedroom with a balcony overlooking the streets of Barcelona’s Gothic quarter, or relax in the Suizo’s lounge.

Wander in the labyrinth of narrow streets surrounding the impressive Barcelona Cathedral, just 200 metres from the hotel. A short walk takes you to the famous Ramblas, with its colourful street performers and pavement cafés.

Walk down to the old port or the beach, or take the metro to visit other areas of the city. A metro station next to the Hotel Suizo makes public transport connections easy.

Name: Hotel Sant Agustí
Description:
Open since 1840, Sant Agustí is set in a restored convent just 150 metres from Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas. It offers free Wi-Fi and functional air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV.

Each room at Hotel Sant Agustí has simple, modern design and wooden flooring. Rooms come with a safe and a bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a private balcony.

The Sant Agustí serves a daily continental buffet breakfast.

Downstairs there are computers which guests can use for free. Reception is also open 24 hours a day.

Set in a quiet square, the hotel is a 2-minute walk from Liceu Metro Station and La Boqueria Market. Plaza Catalunya is within 700 metres and offers various bus and train connections, including direct airport buses.

Name: Yeah Barcelona Hostel
Description:
Ideally located, 10 minutes’ walk from both Gaudi’s masterpieces La Pedrera and La Sagrada Familia, Yeah Barcelona Hostel offers free WiFi and 24-hour reception.

All rooms at Yeah Barcelona Hostel come with a private bathroom with shower and bed linen.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and a dinner including a set menu, is prepared at night at the on-site kitchen. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar.

Many supermarkets are in the surrounding streets; and trendy bars, restaurants and shops can be found on the many public squares in the Gracia District, 15 minutes’ walk away. The closest metro station is Verdaguer, 500 metres away.

Name: Catalonia Gracia
Description:
This hotel is located next to Avinguda Diagonal and Passeig de Gràcia, ideal for shopping. Guests can easily access Plaza Cataluña and the city’s historic gothic quarter. Free Wi-Fi is available.

Situated along the modernist route, Hotel Catalonia Gracia is surrounded by much of the interesting architecture that Barcelona is famous for, such as Gaudí and Domenech i Muntaner's key buildings, including La Pedrera.

A buffet breakfast is available at the on-site restaurant; room service is also available.

Guests can easily enjoy this cosmopolitan city as Hotel Catalonia Gracia is within walking distance of Barcelona’s many attractions. As well as the excellent public transport links providing swift access to the entire city and the surrounding area, the hotel offers great value for money. The hotel also includes meeting amenities and conference rooms available for business events and banquets.

Name: Grums Hotel & Spa
Description:
The modern Hotel Grums is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Barcelona’s port, ferry terminal and cruise terminal. The Ramblas are 600 metres away, and Parallel Metro Station 300 metres away.

Hotel Grums Barcelona offers elegant, bright and spacious rooms with themed design décor and panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.

All our rooms have free RITUALS Cosmetics amenities.

The Hotel Grums Barcelona features a wellness spa which is not included in the room rate and can be accessed for a small surcharge. Guests can relax in the hot tub, Finnish sauna or steam bath. A selection of massage and treatments are also available at an extra cost.

Name: The Hotel 592 - Adults Only
Description:
Just metres from Universitat Metro in Barcelona, the adults-only The Hotel 592 offers a restaurant and colourful modern rooms with a balcony. WiFi is free throughout.

All air conditioned, rooms here come with a flat-screen TV and parquet floors. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Plaça Catalunya is 500 metres from The Hotel 592. La Pedrera can be reached on foot in 15 minutes.

Name: Amra Barcelona Caspe
Description:
Centrally located in Barcelona, Hostal Amra is a modern guest house only 100 metres from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. It offers free WiFi throughout.

The Amra features a Minimalist design and has a tour desk with ticket service. There is a terrace and coffee is available for guests. Bike and car rental  and luggage storage are offered.

All rooms have air conditioning and come with high-end mattresses, a TV and a private bathroom with hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony with views of the garden and the city.

Passeig de Grácia is 5 minutes’ walk away and plenty of places of cultural interest like Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are within a short walk away. Parking is possible nearby for a surcharge.

Name: Hotel Santa Marta
Description:
Hotel Santa Marta is located just 100 metres from Barcelona’s fashionable Born area and França Railway Station. It offers simple, air-conditioned rooms with TV, tiled floors and private bathrooms.

Barceloneta Metro station is about 200 metres away, while the bars of Barceloneta can be reached in 5 minutes’ walk. The Gothic Quarter is also within 500 metres.

Hotel Santa Marta offers vending machines of drinks and snacks. There is a car park 5 minutes' walk from the property.

Name: Hotel Cortes Rambla
Description:
Attractively situated in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Hotel Cortes Rambla is situated 2.4 km from Somorrostro Beach, 2.6 km from Barceloneta Beach and 300 metres from Plaça Catalunya. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is 100 metres from the city centre and 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are fitted with a terrace.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Cortes Rambla include Portal de l'Angel, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Indigo Barcelona Plaza Espana, an IHG Hotel
Description:
Hotel Indigo Barcelona Plaza Espana, an IHG Hotel is a modern design hotel with a bright central courtyard. It offers free Wi-Fi and a convenient location, next to Barcelona’s Plaça Espanya.

The modern rooms at the Hotel Indigo Barcelona Plaza Espana, an IHG Hotel feature a private bathroom, and free mineral water for the first night. They are all soundproofed, with flat-screen TVs and air conditioning.

Hotel Indigo Barcelona Plaza Espana, an IHG Hotel is set next to the Fira Exhibition Centre, at the bottom of Montjuic. This hill is home to a castle, the National Art Museum and the Magic Fountain.

Espanya Metro Station is 150 metres from the hotel. The historic centre of Barcelona and the famous Ramblas are just a few stops away. A direct bus service to the airport stops in Plaça Espanya, near the hotel.

Breakfast is available at an additional cost.

Name: Acta BCN 40
Description:
Acta BCN 40 Hotel is centrally located 350 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Universitat, and a 5-minute walk from the Ramblas. It offers modern rooms with flat-screen satellite TVs.

Rooms at the Acta are air-conditioned in summer and heated in winter, and have a free safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities, and you can request an iron at reception.

Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast in the hotel’s stylish breakfast room. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request. There are many bars, shops and restaurants within a short walk of the hotel.

The Acta BCN 40 has a 24-hour front desk and offers luggage storage. Parking is available nearby for an extra charge.

Name: Hostal Nova Barcelona
Description:
Hostal Nova Barcelona offers accommodation in Barcelona. Sants Train Station is 1 km from the hostel. Bus stops V3 and 115 are just outside the accommodation.

All rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Each room has a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer.

A 24-hour front desk is available at the property.

The hostel also offers bike hire and car hire. Gran Vía 2 Shopping Centre is 1.1 km from Hostal Nova Barcelona, while Port of Barcelona Fuel De pot is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 9 km from the property; regular buses leave from a bus stop located just 200 metres away.

Name: Oriente Atiram
Description:
The Atiram Oriente is located on Las Ramblas, between the Liceu Theatre and the Columbus Monument. Set in a 19th-century building, this hotel features a restaurant, terrace and free Wi-Fi.

All rooms have satellite TV and an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer. Each has simple, contemporary décor with heating and air conditioning.

The hotel’s pretty restaurant serves buffet cuisine and a daily continental breakfast. There is a 24-hour reception and a tour desk. The Atiram Oriente Barcelona also has a café on the Ramblas, close to many shops and restaurants.

The famous Boquería Market and Gothic Quarter are just a few minutes’ walk from the Hotel Atiram Oriente. Barcelona’s Port Vell is less than 500 metres away and Liceu Metro Station is 1 minute walk from the hotel.

Name: Charmsuites Nou Rambla
Description:
Set just off Avinguda Paral.lel, Charmsuites Nou Rambla offers bright, stylish apartments with free Wi-Fi. Paral·lel Metro and Funicular Station is within 100 metres of the property.

Each spacious apartment at Charmsuites Nou Rambla has a living area with a flat-screen TV and a DVD player. There is a dining area, and a kitchen with an electric hob, oven, coffee maker and fridge.

Shops can be found in the streets surrounding the hotel. There are many cafés, bars and restaurants in the nearby Raval district and on Las Ramblas, a 10-minute walk away.

Barcelona’s Old Port is less than 1 km from the apartments. Plaza España Square, the Fira Exhibition Centre and Sants Railway Station can be reached in 10 minutes by Metro.

Name: Hostal Marenostrum
Description:
This guest house boasts an unbeatable location right on the iconic La Rambla, opposite the Liceu opera house, and includes free internet and a buffet breakfast.

The Marenostrum’s front desk can help you plan your day. On and around La Rambla, you will find many of the city’s highlights, including the lively Boquería market and the Cathedral.

Wander up the Rambla, past street performers and market stalls, to the city’s heart of Plaça Catalunya. Alternatively, stroll down to Barcelona’s beaches, a short walk away.

The Hostal Marenostrum’s en suite accommodation is functional and comfortable, including air conditioning, heating and soundproofing, for a restful stay. All bathrooms include a hairdryer. You can also make the most of 24-hour reception to explore the nightlife.

Name: BUHO Boutique Rooms
Description:
Set just 500 metres from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas,  BUHO Boutique Barcelona offers charming, air-conditioned rooms, individually decorated with antique furniture. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.

Rooms feature artwork and large windows, as well as a flat-screen TV, DVD player and DVDs. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have access to a pretty, shared terrace.

BUHO Boutique Barcelona also has a TV lounge. The guest house is surrounded by restaurants and bars.

Tourist information can be provided by staff, and both Barcelona Cathedral and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló are less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya and luggage storage is offered at the property.

Name: Ronda House
Description:
Ronda House is set just off Ronda Sant Antoni Avenue, 10 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas. This hotel has a restaurant and rooms with satellite TV.

The Ronda features bright, simple décor. Its air-conditioned rooms have fully equipped private bathrooms.

A daily buffet breakfast is served in the Ronda’s café which includes a variety of coffees and pastries. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant and the bar.

The MACBA Art Gallery is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Sant Antoni Metro Station is 200 metres from the hotel and connects guests to sights such as Gaudí’s Sagrada Familía and Casa Batlló in less than 15 minutes.

Name: Palau de la música 8
Description:
Palau de la música 8 in Barcelona features accommodation with free WiFi, 1.9 km from Somorrostro Beach, 2 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 500 metres from Cathedral of Barcelona. Popular points of interest nearby include Santa Maria del Mar, Plaça Reial and Picasso Museum. The property is 1.9 km from Barceloneta Beach, and within 600 metres of the city centre.

The 1-bedroom apartment features a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen and 1 bathroom. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Passeig de Gracia and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Hotel SERHS Del Port
Description:
Set on Paral-lel Avenue, this modern design hotel is just a 5-minute walk from the famous Las Ramblas and Barcelona Port. Its stylish, air-conditioned rooms feature free WiFi and a satellite TV.

Hotel SERHS Del Port´s modern rooms offer a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Montjuïc Hill is within a 10-minute walk of Hotel SERHS Del Port. A funicular train connects Montjuïc with Paral-lel Metro Station, located 500 metres from the hotel.

Direct Metro services also connect Paral-lel to Plaça Catalunya Square, Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Gaudí’s famous Parc Guëll. Hotel SERHS Del Port´s tour desk can provide information about the city.

Name: Hotel Viladomat
Description:
Conveniently located less than 10 minutes’ walk from Hospital Clinic Metro Station, Hotel Viladomat is located in Barcelona. This property features free WiFi and an on-site bar.

Each room at this property is air conditioned and has satellite TV, safe, desk, and minibar. The private bathroom includes a bath, shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries.

Hotel Viladomat has a 24-hour front desk and offers a ticket service. A shuttle to the airport is available for an extra charge, and there is luggage storage on site.

Plaza Catalunya and Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas are 20 minutes away by foot. The friendly staff are happy to provide information on the city and its main points of interest. Sants Station is 1 km away from Hotel Viladomat, with direct links to Barcelona Airport.

Name: Onix Fira
Description:
Onix Fira offers a small rooftop pool which is opened from April to October and is not heated and soundproofed rooms in Barcelona’s centre, overlooking Joan Miró Park. Lively Plaza Espanya is 200 metres away and offers a direct connection to Ramblas.

All of the spacious rooms in the Onix Fira come with free Wi-Fi, a modern décor and a private bathroom. They include a safe, minibar and telephone.

A number of restaurants and bars can be found within a 15-minute walk from the Onix Fira Hotel.

Montjuïc and the Magic Fountains are less than a 10 minutes’ walk away from Fira. The airport bus and Fira Exhibition Centre are 200 metres away.

Please, be aware that swimming pool is not heated and will be opened from April to October.

Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Fórum by Marriott
Description:
AC Hotel Barcelona Forum is located opposite Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre, at the end of Avenida Diagonal. It offers a rooftop pool and modern rooms with Mediterranean Sea views. Free WiFi is available in all areas.

All stylish rooms come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and minibar. The private bathrooms have a hairdryer.

The Suite Bar offers healthy Mediterranean food, including tapas and bluefin tuna. Room service is available 24 hours a day, and there is a safe in reception.

AC Hotel Barcelona Forum is 500 metres from Maresme Metro Station. From here you can reach Passeig de Gràcia in central Barcelona in 15 minutes. Barcelona Airport is 19 km away.

Name: Zenit Barcelona
Description:
Zenit Barcelona is 250 metres from Plaza Francesc Macià on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue. This modern hotel offers stylish air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms, with free Wi-Fi and a pillow menu.

The Zenit is a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, where Gaudí’s famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló can be found. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a further 15 minutes’ walk away.

Rooms at the Zenit Barcelona feature satellite TV and a safe and minibar. There is a work desk and a kettle with free tea and coffee set; the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

Zenit Hotel’s restaurant offers gourmet Spanish and international cuisine. A special gluten-free breakfast and children's menus are available, and packed lunches and room service can be requested.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. A laundry, dry cleaning and ironing service is offered. Parking is available 10 minutes' walk away, for an extra cost.

Name: Sunotel Central
Description:
Featuring a rooftop swimming pool and hot tub with views of Barcelona, Sunotel Central is set in the centre of Barcelona, just 10 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya.

Modern rooms at Sunotel Central include free high-speed WiFi, satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities.

Universitat Metro Station is just 200 metres from the hotel. The Ramblas, famous for its street performers, can be reached in 10 minutes by foot.

In the morning guests can enjoy a varied, fresh and healthy full buffet breakfast.

The hotel’s 24-hour reception offers a ticket booking service and luggage storage. There are computers in the lobby which guests can use for free. Meeting rooms are also available.

Name: Aparthotel Silver
Description:
Situated 100 metres from Fontana Metro Station in Barcelona's popular Gracia district, Aparthotel Silver offers a 24-hour reception, a bar and a garden terrace. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and a kitchenette.

Each air-conditioned room at Aparthotel Silver has simple, elegant décor. All rooms offer satellite TV, a laptop safe and a private bathroom with amenities. Kitchenettes include an electric oven, kettle and fridge.

You can enjoy a drink in the Silver’s bar, and room service is available on request. Staff at reception can also arrange car or bicycle rental and provide information about the city.

Silver Aparthotel is 200 metres from Casa Vicenç, a Gaudi building. Barcelona city centre is within a 10-minute Metro journey, while Parc Guell is just one Metro stop away.

Name: Aspasios Arc de Triomf Apartments
Description:
Situated conveniently in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Aspasios Arc de Triomf Apartments is set 2.2 km from Barceloneta Beach, 2.2 km from Nova Icaria Beach and less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.2 km from Somorrostro Beach. The accommodation offers a lift and private check-in and check-out for guests.

Each unit is fitted with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while selected rooms here will provide you with a terrace. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Aspasios Arc de Triomf Apartments.

Name: Unite Hostel Barcelona
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 400 metres from Nova Icaria, Unite Hostel Barcelona offers accommodation with a restaurant, private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hostel features family rooms.

At the hostel, all rooms are fitted with air conditioning and a private bathroom.

The accommodation offers a terrace.

Popular points of interest near Unite Hostel Barcelona include Somorrostro, Bogatell and Port Olimpic. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 18 km from the hostel.

Name: La França Travellers Adults Only
Description:
Offering free private parking and free WiFi, La França Travellers is located next to Montjiuic, 10-minute walk from Plaza de España and Fira de Barcelona. 24-hour reception is available.

This adults-only guesthouse boasts modern décor and air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen satellite TV. All have a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. All suites have a spa bath and some have a round bed.

Bars, restaurants and several dining options can be found in the surrounding streets.

Regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located just 500 metres away.

Name: Bonanova Park
Description:
This family-run hotel is located 700 metres from the Politècnica de Catalunya University and Palau Reial Gardens. Bonanova Park offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

Each room at the Bonanova Park has a simple, functional design. Rooms come with a CD player, minibar (drinks and snacks not included) and private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A varied buffet breakfast served in the Bonanova Park’s breakfast room. There are also numerous bars and restaurants in the charming Sarria neighbourhood, a 10-minute walk away.

Hotel Bonanova Park is around 1 km from L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre, and a 15-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium. Maria Cristina Metro Station is 500 metres away, and offers direct links to the city centre and to the Palau de Congressos Conference Centre, 2 stops away.

Private parking can be found near the hotel.

Name: Cien
Description:
Within walking distance from Las Ramblas, Plaza de Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia, Cien is set in a 19th-century building. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free Wi-Fi.

Cien's 8 rooms feature warm, minimalist décor, heating, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower.

There is a terrace where guests can have breakfast. Coffee and snacks are provided in the lounge area throughout the day.

The property is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Universitat, Catalunya or Passeig de Gràcia Metro stations. Centrally located, Cien is close to Barcelona’s main shopping area. Numerous bars and restaurants serving national and international food can be found nearby.

You can catch buses to Barcelona Airport from Plaza Catalunya, while trains to the airport and coastal town of Sitges leave from Passeig de Gracia Train Station, 250 metres away.

Name: Barcelona Central Apartments
Description:
Barcelona Central Apartments is set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1 km from Casa Batllo and 800 metres from Tivoli Theatre. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.8 km from Somorrostro Beach. The property is 2.7 km from Barceloneta Beach, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

Featuring a private bathroom, units at the apartment complex also have free WiFi, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and La Pedrera. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Barcelona Central Apartments.

Name: Super Balmes Guest House
Description:
Super Balmes Guest House is located in Barcelona city center, 2 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya Square. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

The Guest House offers private rooms in shared apartments located in different building of the same central area.

They all come with a flat-screen TV and have a shared or private bathroom. Bed linen and towels are included. All apartments have a fully equipped kitchen for guests’ use and a shared lounge with sofas.

There are plenty of bars and restaurants within walking distances. Regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located within 10-minute walk.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different rooms and apartments located in the Barcelona City Center area. Please select a date and click on the room type to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

Name: Mesón Castilla Atiram Hotels
Description:
Mesón Castilla is set just 100 metres from Las Ramblas and Plaça Catalunya Square in central Barcelona. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi and an attractive garden terrace where guests can enjoy breakfast.

Rooms at the Mesón Castilla include ornate beds, and some have a private balcony. They come with air conditioning and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel operates a 24-hour reception, allowing guests flexibility during their stay. The tour desk can organise excursions and car rental. There are safes available at the reception for an extra charge.

Barcelona’s Modern Art Museum is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. The historic Gothic Quarter, with its cathedral and many bars, can be reached in 10 minutes’ by foot.

Name: SERHS Carlit Boutique Hotel
Description:
SERHS Carlit Boutique Hotel is located in Barcelona, 900 metres from the iconic Sagrada Família Basilica and Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms, all with free WiFi and a flat-screen satellite TV.

The Serhs Carlit is a 10-minute walk from Arc de Triomf, with Ciutadella Park and the trendy Born district just beyond. You can walk to the Agbar Tower in 15 minutes.

Tetuan Metro Station is just 200 metres away, just 1 stop away from Passeig de Gràcia. Estació del Nord Bus Station is 750 metres away.

The hotel has a café-bar serving a daily buffet breakfast, as well as snacks and drinks throughout the day. Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona, as well as offering restaurant recommendations.

Name: Hotel Concordia Barcelona
Description:
Hotel Concordia Barcelona is situated 800 metres from Plaza España and the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre. It features a sun terrace with an outdoor swimming pool, cocktail bar in the summer and solarium.

The Hotel Concordia Barcelona’s bright, spacious rooms feature contemporary décor and air conditioning.  Each room includes free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom with a range of amenities.

The Concordia Barcelona’s modern, elegant  Bistro Triple Sec Restaurant serves typical Mediterranean cuisine. The varied breakfast buffet includes healthy options. There is also a café and cocktail bar open daily. Private parking is available on site for an extra cost and electrical cars charging station is available.

Located next to Poble Sec Station, the hotel is a 5-minute Metro journey from Barcelona Port and La Rambla. You can also walk to the Rambla in 15 minutes. Direct airport buses stop in Plaza España, a 15-minute walk away.

Private parking is available on site for an extra cost.

Name: Paral·lel
Description:
Situated just 10 minutes walk from the stunning centre of Barcelona, this smart and practical hotel is set in the charming neighbourhood of Poble Sec, at the foot of Montjüic, where you can visit the Olympic site.

Start your day with breakfast in Paral.lel, before heading out for a stroll up Montjüic, where you can spend the day relaxing in a natural setting, and also visit museums such as Fundació Joan Mirò and the national gallery, MNAC.

Each of the bedrooms in Paral.lel comes with air conditioning, so you can enjoy tranquillity and rest in the warm summer months. Browse the internet using the free Wi-Fi connection available in this hotel.

Paral.lel is located just a short stroll from the port and beach area of the city, and you can get to top sights such as Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter with its stunning cathedral.

Name: Catalonia La Boquería
Description:
Catalonia La Boqueria hotel is set in the centre of Barcelona’s old town, a few metres from Las Ramblas. This stylish hotel offers free WiFi and rooms with satellite TV.

Catalonia La Boqueria hotel features contemporary design and modern rooms decorated elegantly. Each room has air conditioning, a minibar and a desk.

Catalonia La Boqueria hotel is ideally situated for visiting Barcelona’s main attractions. There are several restaurants, bars and cafés in the nearby Gothic Quarter and the famous Boquería Market is less than 100 metres away.

Barcelona Port is a 10-minute walk from the hotel and the city’s cathedral is one kilometre away. Liceu Metro Station and Liceu Theatre are a 1-minute walk from the Catalonia La Boqueria hotel.

Name: Hotel Sagrada Familia
Description:
Located just 2 blocks from the Sagrada Familia, this hotel has a rooftop terrace overlooking Gaudí’s world-famous temple. It offers 24-hour reception and rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Sagrada Familia feature parquet floors and modern furniture. They are equipped with a minibar and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

Glòries Shopping Centre and Arc de Triomf are under 20 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Sagrada Familia Metro Station, located a 3-minute walk away, connects you with the city centre in 5 minutes.

Name: Borrell · Near ramblas
Description:
Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Borrell · Near ramblas is situated in Barcelona. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Passeig de Gracia, Boqueria Market, and Magic Fountain of Montjuic. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya.

With free WiFi, this apartment features a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Novotel Barcelona City
Description:
Novotel Barcelona City is situated in the avant-garde area of the city just 15 minutes from central Barcelona, next to the Agbar Tower, designed by Jean Nouvel.

Moreover, the unique Sagrada Familia and Bogatell Beach are just a few minutes away, walking from the hotel.

The air-conditioned rooms at Novotel Barcelona City have simple, modern décor. Up to 2 children under 16 stay for free when sharing with parents. The rooms include free Wi fi and flat screen satellite TV.

The hotel’s restaurant offers typical Mediterranean food and the typical paella.

On the rooftop there is an outdoor swimming pool and a gourmet bar where guests can enjoy tapas, wines and cocktails enjoying panoramic city views.

This hotel offers a free gym and a roof terrace with a seasonal outdoor pool and panoramic views of Barcelona.

Tram and bus services to the city center stop outside the hotel. Glòries Metro Station is just 300 metres away.

The reception staff will be more than happy to provide you with all the tips and tricks to make your stay in Barcelona unforgettable! Don't hesitate to stop by for recommendations on must-see attractions, restaurants, and so much more.

Business travellers particularly like the location.

Name: Musik Boutique Hotel
Description:
This modern hotel is centrally located 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Urquinaona Metro Station and 400 metres from the Palau de la Musica. It offers 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned rooms at Musik Boutique Hotel feature an iPod docking station, flat-screen satellite TV and a safe. They are sound-proofed and have a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a balcony.

Breakfast is available and you will find many shops, bars and restaurants within a short walk. The Ramblas is a 10-minute walk away and you can reach Barceloneta Beach in 10 minutes by bus or metro.

Name: Plaza Goya Rooms
Description:
Plaza Goya Rooms is located in the centre of Barcelona and a few minutes’ walk from the Las Ramblas. It features free WiFi and free luggage storage.

Rooms at Plaza Goya Rooms are air conditioned and include a flat-screen TV and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a balcony.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and a grocery shop within a 5-minute walk of Plaza Goya Rooms. Universitat Metro Station is 50 metres away, and Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia is 4 metro stops away. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 700 metres from the property.

Name: Pestana Arena Barcelona
Description:
Pestana Arena Barcelona is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Espanya and Fira Exhibition Centre. It offers a gym, sauna and modern, air-conditioned rooms with free wired internet access.

Some rooms offers free use of the Maritimo Meeting Room, up to 12 people, for private meetings.

Pestana Arena Barcelona is just 3 minutes’ walk from Las Arenas Shopping Centre and you can walk to Sants Station in 8 minutes. You can get to the Rambla in 5 minutes from Plaza Espanya Metro.

Rooms feature parquet floors and stylish décor. Each one has work desk, a pillow menu and an LCD TV with satellite channels.

The hotel’s restaurant serves Mediterranean food and has a terrace. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs.

Until further notice, the use of jacuzzi is prohibited due to the existing drought in Catalonia.

Name: Catalonia Passeig de Gràcia 4* Sup
Description:
Located next to Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, Catalonia Passeig de Gràcia 4* Sup offers an outdoor pool, a free gym, a terrace, free Wi-Fi and paid private parking.

All the rooms at Catalonia Passeig de Gràcia 4* Sup has a smart TV with Chromecast app.

The restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine with a selection of dishes from the "Gourmet Corner" menu. Gluten-free menus are available on request.

There is also a gastrobar and a bar with a cocktail menu. An electric vehicle charging station is available.

The property is 500 metres from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, 200 metres from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station, 13-minute walk from La Pedrera and 7-minute walk from Palau de la Música Catalana. Airport buses can be reached within 350 metres.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located 350 metres away.

Name: Catalonia Eixample 1864
Description:
Located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, this 19th-century building offers stylish modern interiors and free WiFi. It is just 300 metres from the designer shops and Gaudí buildings of Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard.

The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is housed in one of the Eixample’s oldest buildings, and its painted façade gives it the Speciality Monument status.

All soundproofed en-suite rooms sleek wooden floors and furniture, air conditioning and all rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.. Some rooms have a private terrace and pool.

A buffet breakfast with show cooking is offered every morning at the Sala Minerva; while the hotel's Les Finestres de Llúria restaurant serves traditional Catalan food with a creative twist. Room service is also available.

Catalonia Eixample 1864 boasts a rooftop swimming pool, sundeck and bar; as well as a gym.

The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is ideally located just a 5-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Station. Plaza Catalunya Square is a 10-minute walk away.

The hotel offers private parking on-site for an extra cost and an electric vehicle charging station.

Name: Allegro Barcelona
Description:
Allegro Barcelona is a futuristic design hotel, situated 100 metres from Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station. Its stylish rooms include free Wi-Fi, digital radio and LCD TV with satellite channels.

Each room at Allegro Barcelona features elegant white décor with colourful touches. Rooms are air-conditioned and come with an electronic safe. Bathrooms include a hairdryer and toiletries.

A continental breakfast buffet is served until 10:30 each day at Allegro Barcelona. Numerous tapas bars and pavement cafés can be found on Rambla de Catalunya, a 5-minute walk away.

Other facilities include portable WiFi for no charge.

The famous Gaudi buildings and designer shops of Passeig de Gracia are just 500 metres from the hotel, while Plaza Catalunya is a 15-minute walk away. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about Barcelona, recommend excursions and arrange airport transfers.

Name: Eurohotel Diagonal Port
Description:
Just 350 metres from Mar Bella Beach, Eurohotel Diagonal Port offers Mediterranean Sea views from its setting in Barcelona’s Poble Nou district.

Rooms at this hotel are spacious and feature contemporary design. All come with air conditioning, satellite TV. Free wired internet access is also available.

Facilities at Eurohotel Diagonal Port include a continental breakfast.

Eurohotel Diagonal Port is located 7 minutes’ walk from Poblenou Metro Station, which is just 5 stops from central Barcelona. The hotel is just over 2 km from Ciutadella Park and the Forum venue is a 20-minute walk away.

The hotel offers easy access to the 22@ financial district, close to Barcelona International Convention Centre and shops. There is a Metro station and buses stop within 5 minutes' walk of the hotel.

Name: Catalonia Rigoletto
Description:
The stylish Catalonia Rigoletto is set 500 metres from FC Barça’s Camp Nou stadium and 5 minutes’ walk from Maria Cristina Metro Station. It offers an outdoor pool and rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen TVs.

The Rigoletto’s spacious rooms are air conditioned and decorated with dark woods and luxurious fabrics. All rooms have satellite TV, free smartphone, a minibar and safety deposit box.

A buffet breakfast is on offer in the dining room and Mediterranean cuisine is served in the stylish La Traviata restaurant. There is also a bar in the hotel featuring attractive art work.

Sights including Las Ramblas and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló can be reached in 15 minutes, by Metro. Sants Railway Station, where there is an airport train connection, is just 1.5 km from the Rigoletto.

Name: Hostel Friends Barcelona
Description:
Hostel Friends Barcelona is located on the well-known Gran Vía Avenue in Barcelona, 500 metres from Plaza Espanya Square. Free WiFi access is available and 24-hour reception is featured.

This guest house offers free services like luggage storage and safe box.

Rooms at Friends Barcelona have heating, a fan and a small fridge, as well as a hairdryer. Some rooms have a private bathroom, a balcony and a flat-screen TV, while others have a shared bathroom and a TV. Bed linen and towels are included.

The area has very good public transport links. Rocafort metro station is only a minute on foot. Sagrada Familia Temple is 20 minutes by metro.

Name: Sant Antoni 3 - Downtown Barcelona. Modern
Description:
Located in the centre of Barcelona, 1.3 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.3 km from Portal de l'Angel, Sant Antoni 3 - Downtown Barcelona. Modern offers free WiFi and air conditioning. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Praktik Rambla
Description:
Situated on the central, tree-lined Rambla Catalunya, this boutique hotel is set in a stunning 19th-century palace. It maintains authentic features such as Baroque-style columns and colourful ceramic floors.

The chic rooms at the Praktik Rambla feature a minimalist design and come with air conditioning. They also include free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom, decorated with striking green tiles.

The hotel offers a terrace with comfortable sofas where guests can relax. From June to September, free fruit juice is served on the terrace from 16:00 to 20:00 every day.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 200 metres away from the Praktik Rambla. Barcelona’s famous Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a 5-minute walk away. The hotel is surrounded by restaurants, bars and shops.

Name: Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.9 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach, Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers a business centre, a concierge service and free WiFi. Guests can make use of a bar.

At the hotel every room includes air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel provides certain units with city views, and all rooms come with a coffee machine. The units will provide guests with a desk and a kettle.

A buffet, à la carte or continental breakfast is available at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Middle Eastern and international cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

Speaking German, English, Spanish and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the reception.

Llevant is 2.1 km from Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel, while Mar Bella Beach is 2.1 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 17 km from the property.

Name: Casa Felipa Plaza España
Description:
Situated within 800 metres of Magic Fountain of Montjuic and less than 1 km of Sants Railway Station, Casa Felipa Plaza España features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. Units have a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while some rooms also boast a terrace and some have mountain views. At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site. Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity of the property.

Palau Sant Jordi is 1.8 km from Casa Felipa Plaza España, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.7 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km away.

Name: Hotel Pelayo
Description:
This value-for-money hotel offers practical en suite accommodation a 2-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya and the world-famous La Rambla.

Enjoy wandering around Barcelona’s vibrant city centre – the Pelayo’s tour desk can provide you with helpful sightseeing information.

La Rambla and the exclusive Passeig de Gràcia, famous for Gaudí's La Pedrera and Casa Batlló, are within easy walking distance.

The Pelayo is surrounded by excellent transport links, including the metro, bus and sightseeing bus. Take the short journey down to the popular beaches.

The hotel has vending machines selling refreshments, snacks and coffee. At night, eat out at one of the many great restaurants around the hotel, including the Hard Rock Cafe in Plaça Catalunya.

You can also make the most of the 24-hour reception desk to book a last minute flight or to explore the city’s nightlife.

Name: NH Barcelona Stadium
Description:
Overlooking Camp Nou Stadium and Diagonal Avenue, the modern NH Barcelona Stadium offers free WiFi, a gym and seasonal rooftop pool. The air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen satellite TV, minibar and a pillow menu.

NH Barcelona Stadium Hotel’s seasonal sun terrace offers wonderful views across Barcelona to Montjuic. It also has sun loungers.

The hotel’s restaurant, Acanto, offers a varied buffet breakfast, as well as an á la carte lunch menu. The lobby café is open until midnight every day. The restaurant is closed during summer months.

Les Corts Metro Station is just 5 minutes’ walk away and offers a direct link to Barcelona’s historic centre. Diagonal Avenue can be reached in 10 minutes on foot, and Sants Station is 1.5 km away.

Barcelona's Fira Congress Centre is a 10-minute drive from the hotel. Barcelona El Prat Airport can also be reached in 10 minutes by car.

Name: Inside Barcelona Apartments Salva
Description:
These modern, fully-equipped apartments with free Wi-Fi are located in a quiet neighbourhood near Montjuïc Hill and the lively Poble Sec neighbourhood. Barcelona’s ferry terminal is just 5 minutes’ drive away.

There are several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk of the apartments. Mercat Sant Antoni Food Market is about 10 minute’s walk away.

The apartments are about 15 minutes’ walk from the city’s famous Ramblas. Parallel Metro Station is about 5 minutes’ walk away and services line 3, which will take visitors to Plaza Catalunya and Plaza Espanya.

Name: Hotel Acta Laumon
Description:
Situated just 200 metres from Sagrera Metro Station in Sant Andreu, the modern Hotel Acta Laumon is 25 minutes from the centre of Barcelona by metro.

It features stylish rooms with air conditioning, a plasma TV and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is offered. Hotel Acta Laumon also offers apartments, located in front of the hotel. Guests have access to the hotel facilities.

The hotel have a spacious lounge to rest, work or have a coffee.
There are also 24-hour vending machines for snacks and drinks.

The hotel offers tourist information and ticket services.

Name: Hotel Turin Barcelona
Description:
Hotel Turin Barcelona is located just 50 meters from the famous Ramblas in Barcelona. It offers free Wi-Fi, 24-hour reception, free luggage storage and a lovely sun terrace. There is free water, coffee and tea in the lobby lounge.

It features stylish rooms with wooden floors and furnishings. They are equipped with a private bathroom, hairdryer, safe, Smart TV and minibar.

The Turin Hotel is located just 150 meters from the Gothic District, 3 minutes from the Liceu metro and a 20-minute walk from the beach. In the area there are several restaurants, shops and supermarkets open until late.

The hotel offers a fabulous breakfast buffet. Most of the food items come from La Boquería Market, located 2 minutes' walk away.

Name: Port VII Apt centrico acogedor w balcon 23
Description:
Port VII Apt centrico acogedor w balcon 23 has a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.6 km of Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.8 km of Plaça Catalunya. It is located 2 km from Santa Maria del Mar and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sant Miquel Beach is 3 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Boqueria Market and Cathedral of Barcelona. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Catalonia Port
Description:
Situated in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, Hotel Catalonia Port has a modern gym and a sun terrace with a small seasonal outdoor pool. Each air-conditioned room has free WiFi, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The hotel’s contemporary El Racó del Port restaurant opens from Monday to Saturday, serving seasonal Mediterranean cuisine. A varied buffet breakfast is offered in the dining room, and there is also a lobby bar.

The Catalonia Port Hotel offers stylish rooms with hardwood floors. They all include a safe, a minibar and a private bathroom.

Catalonia Port is just 250 metres from the bottom of the famous Las Ramblas, and Port Vell Harbour is 400 metres away. Drassanes Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away.

Name: Apartamentos DV
Description:
Featuring free Wi-Fi and air conditioning, Apartamentos DV is located in Barcelona, 800 metres from Camp Nou. Palau Sant Jordi is 2.8 km from the property. Private parking is available for a fee.

Offering views over a patio, each apartment comes with a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen including a microwave, kettle and kitchenware. Apartments come with a bathroom with a double ended bath and hairdryer is available on prior request. Apartments are cleaned every day and bed linen and towels are provided. Superior apartments have a spa bath.

Plenty of restaurants, bars and shops are within 5 minutes' walk.

Montjuïc is 2.9 km from Apartamentos DV, while Casa Batllo is 3.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 9 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Jazz
Description:
The stylish Hotel Jazz is located 2 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya in the centre of Barcelona. It features a rooftop pool and terrace with views over the city.

The contemporary rooms include free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The modern bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

A breakfast buffet is served in the modern bar-café area of Hotel Jazz. This includes fresh fruit, pastries, and baked goods.

Universitat Metro Station is less than 100 metres from the hotel. The MACBA and CCCB galleries are within a 5-minute walk while the Gothic Quarter is 10 minutes away.

Name: Catalonia Park Güell
Description:
Free Wi-Fi and a rooftop swimming pool are offered at Catalonia Park Güell. It is set in a residential area just outside Barcelona’s historic centre, 600 metres from Parc Güell.

Rooms at the hotel are simple and comfortable, with air conditioning or heated and satellite TV. There is also a restaurant, bar.

The Catalonia Park Güell is just 300 metres from Vallcarca Metro Station. This gives access to the city centre within 10 minutes. Stops for buses V19 and 22 are nearby. The sun terrace offers views over the city.

The hotel is close to some of Barcelona’s most famous medical centres. These include the Delfos and Quiron Clinics.

There are many sports clubs and parks around the hotel. The popular Gràcia district is also a short walk away. It has lively squares with bars and restaurants.

Name: Hotel Acta Azul Barcelona
Description:
Set just off Plaça d’Espanya and at the foot of Montjuïc, Hotel Acta Azul Barcelona offers stylish accommodation in central Barcelona. It features a roof terrace, 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi.

Las Ramblas and the city’s Gothic Quarter can be reached in less than 10 minutes, by Metro and here you will find where a selection of bars and restaurants.

Each of the Azul’s spacious rooms has bright décor and wooden flooring. All rooms have air conditioning, satellite TV and a desk.

The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Fira Conference Centre and Plaça d’Espanya’s Magic Fountains. Montjuïc Park and the MNAC Gallery are within 1 km of the hotel. The bullring-turned-shopping centre of Las Arenas is next door.

Name: Sunotel Aston
Description:
Featuring a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool and hot tub, as well as panoramic views of Barcelona, Sunotel Aston is a 3-minute walk from Hospital Clinic Metro Station.

Air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV, soundproofed windows and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free, high-speed WiFi is available.

An extensive buffet breakfast is served at the hotel. The hotel’s Pa'l Caldero Restaurant offers a wide selection of dishes from around the world. There are also many eating options in the area.

Sunotel Aston has a 24-hour reception and offers services such as luggage storage, free pool towels and free bikes.

Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas can be reached in around 15 minutes by public transport; while Barcelona’s famous Sagrada Familia Cathedral is around 10 minutes away.

Name: Aparthotel Augusta
Description:
Aparthotel Augusta offers good-value accommodation with free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception. It is set in Barcelona’s Sant Gervasi district and just 100 metres from Plaza Molina FGC Railway Station.

Rooms at the Aparthotel Augusta are simple and comfortable. They have a kitchenette with an oven, hob and a fridge. There is also a living area with a TV.

There are shops and supermarkets nearby. The Libertad Market also sells fresh, local food and is just 500 metres from the hotel.

The popular Gràcia district, which features a range of cafés, bars and restaurants, is just 10 minutes’ walk away.

Plaza de Catalunya can be reached in less than 15 minutes from Plaza Molina FGC Station, or from Fontana Metro, which is approximately 300 metres from the Augusta.

Name: Gaudi Hotel
Description:
Just 50 metres from Barcelona's famous Las Ramblas, Gaudi Hotel features a Rooftop Terrace with views of Palau Güell and the city. Free WiFi is available.

This hotel is 300 metres from Liceu Metro Station, and many of the city's attractions can be reached on foot. Boqueria Market is 450 metres away, while the Port and Gothic Quartier are a 10-minute walk away.

All rooms at Gaudi Hotel have free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, a private bathroom and a TV. They also have wooden floor and some have excellent views of the city or Palau Güell.

The Gaudi Hotel's restaurant serves American Buffet breakfast. There is also a Bar on site.

This hotel has a 24-hour Reception and Parking is available next to the hotel.

Name: htop BCN City #htopEnjoy
Description:
htop BCN City is located next to the impressive Hospital Sant Pau and 10 minutes’ walk from the Sagrada Familia. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a TV.

The rooms at htop BCN City feature simple décor and a work desk. Each one has a private bathroom, and many offer views of the Hospital de Sant Pau.

The htop BCN City has a 24-hour reception, allowing you greater flexibility during your stay. Free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.

The hotel has vending machines for snacks and drinks. There is a variety of restaurants and bars within 10 minutes’ walk.

Sant Pau-Dos de Maig Metro Station is just 200 metres away from the htop BCN City, connecting you with the rest of the city with ease.

Name: Hostal Centric
Description:
Centrally located, Hostal Cèntric offers free Wi-Fi, 24-hour reception, free luggage storage and free safe. The guest house is 400 metres from Barcelona's Plaza Universitat and the Rambla is 10 minutes’ walk away.

Air-conditioned rooms at Hostal Cèntric have a private bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer. They all feature a flat-screen TV and a laptop safe. Some rooms have a balcony and there is a shared terrace with table and chairs. Bed linen and towels are also provided.

There are plenty of restaurants, shops and supermarkets open until late in the surrounding area. You can also find some of the trendiest bars in Raval District and around Sant Antoni Metro Station, 400 metres away.

Hostal Cèntric is 400 metres from Universitat Metro Station and the famous MACBA Museum is 6 minutes’ walk away. Regular airport buses leave from Sepulveda Bus Stop located just 400 metres away. Discounted public parking is available nearby.

Name: Blanc Guest House
Description:
Blanc Guest House is 8 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s famous Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers an attractive terrace and smart rooms with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV.

The rooms at Blanc Guest House are decorated in white, with parquet floors and white furniture. Each one comes with air conditioning, heating and a fan, and some have a private bathroom.

Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. Car rental is also available from the front desk.

The Blanc is 8 minutes’ walk from Diagonal Metro Station, connecting you with the rest of the city with ease. Plaza Catalunya is just 2 stops away.

Name: NH Sants Barcelona
Description:
Located 400 metres from Sants Station in Barcelona, NH Sants Barcelona offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, flat-screen TV and private bathroom.

The hotel has a restaurant, serving fresh Mediterranean cuisine. There is also a relaxing café-bar. It also offers a healthy breakfast. The restaurant is closed during summer months.

The NH Sants Barcelona is set in a quiet area of Barcelona's Les Corts Financial District, but Barcelona city centre is within 15 minutes by Metro. Guests can reach FC Barcelona Football Stadium from Sants Metro Station, which is 300 metres away.

Name: Hotel Alguer Camp Nou
Description:
Hotel L’Alguer Nou is situated just 500 metres from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium and 220 metres from Collblanc Metro Station. This family-run hotel offers a bar, lounge and 24-hour reception.

Rooms at the L’Alguer Nou Hotel are simple and functional, with tiled floors. Each room comes with a TV and a private bathroom. The rooms have air conditioning in summer and central heating in winter.

Hotel L’Alguer Nou serves a daily breakfast consisting of a buffet of cold and hot dishes.

Collblanc Metro Station takes you to Barcelona Aiport in 30 minutes. L'Alguer Nou is a 20-minute walk from the campus of Barcelona University. Sants Train Station is a 10-minute bus ride away, and regular bus services stop within 200 metres of the hotel.

Name: Catalonia Ramblas 4* Sup
Description:
Set just off Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, 3 minutes’ walk from central Plaza Catalunya, Catalonia Ramblas 4* Sup  features a seasonal outdoor pool with a south-facing terrace, a poolside snack bar and a chill-out area.

Housed in a modernist building, all bright and spacious rooms come with a flat-screen satellite smart TV equipped with Chromecast App, free WiFi and tea and coffee facilities. Some have a private terrace with a private pool. Room service is available.

The spa at Catalonia Ramblas 4* Sup features a relaxation area. It includes a sauna, a steam bath and a hot tub. Massage and beauty treatments are also available.

The hotel’s restaurant, Pelai Restaurant, offers Catalan market cuisine. Dishes cooked on a coal stove are available at the Pelai terrace, a rooftop terrace with a chill-out area with panoramic city views. A buffet breakfast is offered every morning and, on weekends, it is available until 11:00.

In the summer months, the terrace is open until 00:00 and has a summer menu, as well as cocktails and milkshakes.

Name: Hotel Raval House
Description:
Well set in Barcelona, Hotel Raval House provides air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a garden. 2.5 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and 2.5 km from Sant Miquel Beach, the property offers a terrace and a bar. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.7 km from Barceloneta Beach.

At the hotel, every room comes with a wardrobe. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, certain units at Hotel Raval House also provide guests with a city view. All units at the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Raval House include Boqueria Market, Plaça Catalunya and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

Name: Citadines Ramblas Barcelona
Description:
Centrally located on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas Boulevard, this aparthotel offers 24-hour reception and is surrounded by many restaurants, bars and shops. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All air-conditioned studios and apartments at Citadines Ramblas Barcelona feature a kitchen with a microwave, fridge and dishwasher. Bathrooms are equipped with hairdryers and all rooms have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All Classic Rooms are equipped with fridge and kettle.


Linen and towels are provided. The apartment is cleaned and linen and towels are changed for free once a week. An additional housecleaning service is available upon request and is charged according to your needs.

Bicycle and car rental can be arranged for guests at Citadines. Luggage storage is also available and the aparthotel operates a ticket service for attractions in Barcelona.

Plaza Catalunya Metro Station is just 100 metres away, and airport buses leave from the square. The impressive Boqueria Market is 2 minutes’ walk from Citadines Ramblas.

Name: Som Nit Triomf
Description:
Centrally located, Som Nit Triomf features rooms with free WiFi and private bathroom. It is 800 metres from Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya as well as from Barcelona North Bus Station.

Rooms are fitted with traditional Catalan Modernist tiles and they all have a wardrobe. Some rooms have a balcony with city views. A kettle and ironing facilities are available on prior request at reception.

There is a plenty of restaurants, shops and trendy bars in the surrounding area and a 24-hour supermarket can be found 200 metres away.

Som Nit Triomf is located between the Eixample and Borne District, 450 metres from Arc de Triomf and Urquinaona Metro Stations.  You can walk to fashionable Passeig de Gracia in 10 minutes and the tree-lined Passeig de Companys connected to Ciutadella Park is just 150 metres away.

Name: Hotel Alimara
Description:
Hotel Alimara is a modern hotel located in Barcelona’s Horta district. It has a central garden, several meeting rooms, rooms with flat-screen TVs, and a fitness centre.

All rooms at the Alimara Hotel have both air conditioning and heating. They all have a private bathroom with hairdryer.

The Alimara’s restaurant serves Mediterranean food with a modern twist and there are children’s menus available. The hotel bar, SUMMUM, features a terrace and serves food, drinks and snacks.

The hotel is located 1 minutes' walk from Mundet Metro Station, and it is a 12-minute journey into central Barcelona. Gaudí’s iconic Parc Güell is 4 Metro stops away from Mundet.

Name: Ola Living Vidreria
Description:
These apartments can be found in Barcelona's Born area, close to the Picasso Museum. They have free Wi-Fi.

The apartments have heating and air conditioning.

Bedrooms have an en-suite bathroom with a shower. The kitchen has a fridge, microwave and hob.

Bicycle rental is available.

Staff at reception can organise your trip to Barcelona. Barceloneta with its seafront bars and restaurants is just a 10-minute away from the property. The Ramblas is also nearby.

Name: Acta Atrium Palace
Description:
This elegant hotel is 250 metres from Paseo de Gracia Metro Station and Boulevard. Plaza Catalunya is a 5-minute walk away. It offers free Wi-Fi.

Set in an attractive building, dating from 1888, rooms at the Acta Atrium Palace are modern and chic, with air conditioning and satellite TV. The private bathrooms offer free toiletries and a bathrobe.

The hotel has 24-hour room service.

Gaudí's famous Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are 10 minutes' walk away. There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car at the hotel tour desk. Public parking is available nearby.

Name: Inside Barcelona Apartments Princep
Description:
Inside Barcelona Apartments Princep offers modern and good value for money accommodation. The apartments are located in a quiet street, close to Plaza España.

It offers well-appointed apartments with full kitchens and air conditioning. There is free WiFi, Smart TV, washing machine, dishwasher and n´espresso machine. The building has been completely renovated in September 2021.

The accommodations are spacious and have a kitchen, bathroom and living-dining area. Here you can relax after a long day of sightseeing and prepare your own meals.

The apartments are located in a well-connected area of ​​the city, Plaza España and the Fira fairgrounds are between 2 and 10 minutes' walk away. A little further afield, you can find the Montjuïc mountain, which houses the National Art Museum of Catalonia and the Miró Foundation.

Our clients say that this part of Barcelona is their favorite, based on independent reviews.

Inside Barcelona Apartments Princep has been receiving Booking.com clients since 14 Oct 2008.

Name: Hostal Operaramblas
Description:
Hostal Operaramblas is situated less than 100 metres from Las Ramblas and Liceu Metro Station. This guest house features rooms with private bathrooms, a 24-hour front desk and free Wi-Fi.

The Operaramblas’ rooms offers simple décor with tiled floors. Each room has heating (in winter), air conditioning (in summer) and a telephone.

The guest house has an ideal location in the centre of Barcelona. It is 5 minutes’ walk from the Gothic Quarter, where there are a range of cafés, bars and restaurants. The city’s cathedral is 500 metres from the Opera and the Old Port is less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

Name: BBarcelona Gaudí Flats
Description:
Located 300 metres from famous Sagrada Familia, BBarcelona Gaudí Flats offers bright apartments with free Wi-Fi. Apartments have a balcony with city views.

All apartments have a spacious living-dining room with a sofa and a flat-screen TV; and a fully equipped kitchen including a dishwasher, a microwave, and kitchenware. There is a washing machine, and ironing facilities are also provided.

Numerous bars, restaurants, as well as supermarkets and shops open till late are in the surroundings.

BBarcelona Gaudí Flats is well connected to the city centre. You can reach both Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas in 15 minutes by public transports. The closest metro station is Sagrada Familia, just a 2-minute walk from apartments.

Name: Catalonia Square 4* Sup
Description:
Featuring an outdoor pool and a fitness centre, Catalonia Square is located in Barcelona’s historic centre. The 4-star hotel is only 100 metres from Plaça Catalunya and offers free Wi-Fi

Each air-conditioned room has wooden floors and modern décor and comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, minibar and a battery charger for iPhone/iPad. Featuring a hairdryer, private bathrooms also include free toiletries and towels. Private pool and terrace are available in some rooms. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

Guests can enjoy drinks, snacks and traditional tapas at Catalonia Square Bar. The breakfast is served until 12:00. Room service is also available.

La Rambla and the Gothic District are only 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Within 300 metres, guests can find the metro stations of Passeig de Gracia, Plaça Catalunya and Urquinaona, offering connection to most parts of Barcelona.

Name: BcnStop Sagrada Familia
Description:
Less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia, BcnStop Sagrada Familia is a recently renovated property set in Barcelona and offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and private parking. There is a private entrance at the aparthotel for the convenience of those who stay. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine. At the aparthotel, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available close by. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the aparthotel.

La Pedrera is 2.8 km from BcnStop Sagrada Familia, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.1 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Hotel Vilamarí
Description:
Hotel Vilamarí is set 250 metres from Plaza de Espanya Metro Station and the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre. This hotel features a terrace and a small gym with Turkish Bath.

The Vilamarí’s rooms have simple, elegant décor and dark wood furniture. Each room includes flat-screen satellite TV. The stylish bathrooms come with amenities and a hairdryer. The hotel features centrally controlled air conditioned or heating depending on the season.

Barcelona’s MNAC Art Museum and the Magic Fountains are within a 10-minute walk of the hotel. Las Arenas Shopping Centre is just 200 metres away. Barcelona Port is a 15-minute metro ride away and Barcelona Beach can be reached in 35 minutes.

Name: Sixties Ramblas
Description:
Offering a 1960’s vibe and rooms with vintage décor, this hotel is set in the heart of Barcelona, only 2 minutes’ walk from the famous Ramblas.  Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.

Each air-conditioned room at Sixties Ramblas features a TV and a private bathroom. Most rooms have a balcony.

Sixties Ramblas has a bar and a restaurant. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide tourist information about the area. Bike rental services are also available, and there is also a stylish white billiards table.

The nearest Metro Station is Drassanes, only 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel. You can also walk to the harbour or Plaza Catalunya Square in less than 10 minutes.

Sixties Ramblas is close to the Born district, with numerous trendy bars and restaurants serving local and international food.

Name: Som Nit Born
Description:
Featuring free Wi-Fi and air conditioning, Som Nit Born is located in the Born district of Barcelona. Just 10 minutes’ walk from Barceloneta Beach, the guest house is also 500 metres away from the Picasso Museum.

The soundproofed rooms at Som Nit Born come with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom including a shower. There is a free luggage storage service and a safety deposit box is also available.

A wide range of bars and restaurants can be found in a 1-minute walk through the Born district.

This 19th-century Neoclassical building was chosen to feature in the first ever photograph taken in Spain. Picasso also lived here.

La Rambla Street, Port Vell Harbor and Barrio Gotico District can be reached within 10 minutes’ walk as Som Nit is located in the heart of Barcelona. You can catch the Sightseeing Bus 200 metres from the guest house and Barceloneta Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk away.

Name: BCN Urbaness Hotels Del Comte
Description:
Hotel Del Comte is 100 metres from Barcelona's Urgell Metro Station and 15 minutes walk from the Rambla and Plaza Espanya. It offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The air-conditioned rooms at Del Comte feature parquet floors and smart design. Each one comes with a work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Staff at the Del Comte Hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

There is a bus stop just 3 minutes’ walk from the Del Comte which provides transport connections to Barcelona El Prat Airport. It is only 2 stops on the Metro to Plaza Catalunya, Barcelona’s main square.

Name: Decô Apartments Barcelona-Sants
Description:
Located 500 metres from the Airport Bus Stop at Plaza Espanya, Deco-Sants Fira Apartments offers stylish modern apartments with free high-speed WiFi and a laptop safe. The penthouse apartment has a private terrace.

All apartments are air conditioned and come with 2 or 3 bedrooms. Each has a living room with a flat-screen satellite TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Large, well-equipped kitchens include a dishwasher and washing machine. Towels and bed linen are provided.

Car and bicycle rental is offered and an airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge. Fira de Barcelona Convention Centre is within a 10-minute walk from the apartments.

Apartments are located on a building with a small lift, up to 1 person.

Name: Àmfores Boutique Guest House
Description:
Set within 1.2 km of Santa Maria del Mar and 1.1 km of Picasso Museum, Àmfores Boutique Guest House provides rooms in Barcelona. Located around 850 m from Tivoli Theatre, the guest house with free WiFi is also 750 m away from La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is situated in the Ciutat Vella district.

All guest rooms in the guest house are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Each room comes with a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.

Àmfores Boutique Guest House is set in a building of medieval origin, located next to the Palau de la Música and the city centre.

The accommodation offers a terrace.

Speaking Catalan and English, staff are ready to help at the reception.

Plaça Catalunya is 800 m from Àmfores Boutique Guest House. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 18 km from the guest house.

The accommodation offers a terrace with a small swimming pool (from may till october).

Name: Hotel Ciutadella Barcelona
Description:
Offering beautiful, stylish rooms Hotel Ciutadella Barcelona has an ideal central setting within 300 metres of Santa María del Mar Church, Ciutadella Park and Barceloneta Metro Station. It offers easy access to the historic Born and Gothic districts.

Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Ciutadella Barcelona has contemporary décor. All rooms have a TV and a private bathroom.

Bars and cafés can be found along Passeig del Born, 200 metres away. There are several seafood restaurants along the seaside Passeig de Joan de Borbó, a 5-minute walk from the Hotel Ciutadella.

The nearest beaches can be reached in 15 minutes by foot. Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are within 2 km of the hotel.

Name: Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Palau Sant Jordi, Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira features air-conditioned accommodation and a bar. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and an outdoor pool. Camp Nou is 2.9 km away and Boqueria Market is 4 km from the hotel.

At Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira offers a terrace.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 2 km from the hotel, while Montjuïc is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 8 km from Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira.

Name: HCC St. Moritz
Description:
Set in a listed 19th-century building and 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, the St. Moritz offers stylish accommodation. It features modern, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and LCD satellite TV.

The Hotel HCC St. Moritz maintains its original central staircase and marble reception. Its rooms offer simple, classic décor with a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer, slippers and toiletries.

A varied buffet breakfast is served daily, and you can enjoy a range of Mediterranean dishes for dinner in the St Gallen Restaurant, where menus use fresh, seasonal produce.

Passeig de Gràcia and its Metro Station are just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, and Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are one stop away. Barcelona Port is just over 1 km from the St. Moritz.

Name: Sercotel Caspe
Description:
This design hotel is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Arc de Triomf Metro Station and Estació del Nord Bus Station.  It has a gym, and offers free Wi-Fi and free bottled water.

Rooms at the Sercotel Caspe are air-conditioned and soundproofed. They feature satellite TV, a minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

The Sercotel Caspe has an outdoor terrace, an attractive restaurant and a café-bar. Room service is also available.

The hotel is a short walk from Gaudí's buildings on Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. Plaza Catalunya is approximately 20 minutes' walk away.

There is a tour desk and 24-hour reception. Car hire is available and there is on-site parking for an extra charge.

Name: Andante Hotel
Description:
With a small rooftop pool offering great views over Barcelona, Andante Hotel is centrally located 350 metres from Drassanes Metro Station and La Rambla. It offers free Wi-Fi and a gym.

Modern air-conditioned rooms feature parquet floors, a laptop safe and flat-screen satellite TV. The bathroom comes with a full-length mirror and a high-powered hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast with show cooking is available. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request. There is a self-service area with a microwave and vending machines for drinks, sandwiches and snacks, as well as a large terrace.

You can hire a car from the tour desk and a private shuttle from and to Barcelona El Prat Airport is available on prior request at an extra cost. There is a luggage storage room and a laundry and ironing service are offered.

The rooftop terrace will be closed for maintenance from January 15, 2024, to January 25, 2024.

Name: Inside Barcelona Apartments Esparteria
Description:
These stylish apartments are located in Barcelona’s El Born district, 3 minutes' walk from the Picasso Museum. Each apartment offers free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

Inside Barcelona Apartments Espartería are bright and air-conditioned. They all have a spacious seating area and a modern kitchenette with an oven, hob, fridge and n´espresso machine

Inside Barcelona Apartments Esparteria has a communal terrace (open during office hours), where guests can enjoy views of nearby Santa María del Mar Church.
