Staff at reception can help organise your trip to Barcelona.

The Esparteria is within 100 metres of the popular Passeig del Born. Barceloneta Beach is a 15-minute walk away, and Ciutadella Park is 400 metres away. There are various restaurants, bars and supermarkets within a short walk.

Name: Catalonia Magdalenes
Description:
Catalonia Magdalenes Hotel is set in  Barcelona, 200 metres from the Cathedral of Barcelona and offers a terrace with an outdoor pool with views of the Cathedral and a spa. Portal de l'Angel is 200 metres away.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned, soundproofed and features a flat-screen TV and a Nespresso Coffee Machine. The bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property, There is also a spa with a hot tub and a gym. The hotel offers show-cooking during breakfast.

Plaça Catalunya is 400 metres from Catalonia Magdalenes Hotel, while Picasso Museum is 600 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Ronda Lesseps
Description:
The Hotel Ronda Lesseps is a quiet and familiar establishment, with two beautiful interior terraces full of plants that allow our guests to relax during their stay in our city.

The Hotel is located in the metropolitan heart of Barcelona, with very good communication by public transport, very close to the historic district of Gràcia and just at a ten minutes’ walk from Antoni Gaudí's Park Güell.

License number: HB-004338

Name: The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Llevant, The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities at this property are a shared lounge and a business centre, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has a terrace and city views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Rooms have a kettle, while certain rooms are fitted with a kitchenette with a minibar. The rooms have a wardrobe.

Guests at The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast.

You can play table tennis at the accommodation, and bike hire is available.

Staff speak Catalan, Czech, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk.

Nova Mar Bella Beach is 1.6 km from The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou, while Mar Bella Beach is 1.7 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 17 km away.

Name: Sagrada Familia Comfy apartment
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 500 metres from Sagrada Familia and 1.9 km from La Pedrera, Sagrada Familia Comfy apartment offers air conditioning. The property is situated 2 km from Passeig de Gracia, 2.4 km from Casa Batllo and 2.9 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a patio with inner courtyard views. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Tivoli Theatre is 3 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3.2 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Dalia Ramblas
Description:
Set 50 metres from the Ramblas, in the Raval district, Dalia Ramblas features air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. Well served by public transport, it offers 24-hour reception and free luggage storage.

Featuring a modern and functional décor, rooms come with a flat-screen TV, wardrobe and a desk. All have a private bathroom with bath or shower. Free toiletries and hairdryer are provided.

Dalia Ramblas is set in the lively city centre. There are plenty of bars and restaurants in the surrounding area.

Next to the Gothic Quarter, Dalia Ramblas is 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and from Barcelona Cathedral. You can also reach the bustling Plaza Reial Square in a 5-minute walk.

Barcelona Airport is 12 km away from the hotel. Regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located just 800 metres away.

Name: Serennia Cest Apartamentos Arc de Triomf
Description:
These modern apartments are located 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Arc de Triomf. Each air-conditioned apartment includes a flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

The apartments at Arc de Triomf Apartments feature parquet floors and light wood furniture. The modern kitchen has an oven, hob, washing machine and dishwasher.

There are plenty of bars, restaurants and supermarkets within a 2-minute walk of the apartments.

Arc de Triomf Apartments are just 200 metres from Estació del Nord Bus Station, and you can walk to Plaza Catalunya in 15 minutes. Ciutadela Park is a 10-minute walk away.

Name: Capri by Fraser Barcelona
Description:
This motorcycle-friendly hotel is 3 Metro stops from Plaza Catalunya and 15 minutes’ walk from the Barcelona’s beaches. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Capri by Fraser Barcelona offers chic air-conditioned and spacious suites and apartments with a flat-screen cable TV and a seating area. There is a fully-equipped kitchenette, a work desk and a safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

The property has a free self-service laundry room open 24 hours a day and a gym.

For guests coming by motorcycle, Capri by Fraser offers free indoor parking with direct elevator to the rooms and a “pit stop” service including complete toolkit for small repairs and chain lubricant, free suede, helmet visor cleaner, battery charger and compressor to check the pressure level of tyres.

Capri by Fraser Barcelona offers a buffet breakfast every day and a set menu at lunch time during week days. Room service is also available.

The hotel has a 24-hour front desk.

Name: Weflating Sant Antoni Market
Description:
Offering quiet street views, Weflating Sant Antoni Market is an accommodation situated in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.5 km from Portal de l'Angel. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment has family rooms.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom, while some feature a terrace or a balcony. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: AMISTAT City Hostel Barcelona
Description:
AMISTAT City Hostel Barcelona features a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Barcelona. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a shared kitchen.

Guest rooms at the hostel include air conditioning and a wardrobe.

The breakfast offers à la carte, continental or vegetarian options.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area.

Sagrada Familia is 3.1 km from AMISTAT City Hostel Barcelona, while La Pedrera is 4.6 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 17 km from the property.

Name: Express by Gaiarooms
Description:
Set in a renovated classical building, Express by Gaiarooms is centrally located in Barcelona’s Gracia district. It is 5 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia Boulevard and offers free Wi-Fi throughout.

Featuring minimalist, elegant design, rooms at the Express by Gaiarooms have central air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. They are also heated and have a safe. Most feature a private bathroom and some have shared bathroom facilities.

Many bars and restaurants in the trendy Gracia district are within a 5-minute walk of the Express guest house.

Express by Gaiarooms is just 150 metres from Gracia FGC Train Station, while Fontana Metro Station is 500 metres away. You can reach La Rambla in 5 minutes by train.

Name: Ola Living MACBA
Description:
Centrally located in Barcelona’s Raval District, just 300 metres from Universitat Metro Station, Ola Living MACBA offers modern accommodation with free WiFi and a balcony. Plaza Catalunya is 8 minutes’ walk away.

These apartments feature exposed brick walls and some come with vaulted ceilings or exposed wooden beams. They come with a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher, oven and coffee machine. Their living areas include a flat-screen TV with cable channels, DVD player and sofa.

You will find bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets.

Sant Antoni is a 5-minute walk away and Barceloneta Beach is 2.5 km from the property. Sagrada Familia is 10 minutes’ metro ride from Ola Living MACBA and Barcelona Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Onix Liceo
Description:
Onix Liceo is next to Gaudi’s Palau Guell, 300 metres from Liceo Metro Station on Barcelona’s Ramblas. This stylish hotel offers a sun terrace and free Wi-Fi access.

The Onix is a design hotel with modern art in its public spaces. There is also a lounge and a business centre.

Free water, coffe and tea are available 24 hours a day.

All air-conditioned rooms at the Onix are spacious and elegant. They have a minibar and LCD satellite TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer.

You can hire a car or bicycle from the hotel tour desk. There is a 24-hour reception and a laundry service.

Please, be aware that swimming pool is not heated and will be opened from April to October.

Name: Hostel New York
Description:
Hostel New York is a youth hostel located in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, 5 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas. It offers 24-hour reception and free WiFi, 500 metres from Jaume and Drassanes Metro Stations.

The hostel’s simple dormitory rooms feature modest décor, bunk beds and individual lockers. They include access to a shared bathroom; and free bed linen are provided.

There is a kitchen available for guests in the evenings and a TV lounge with vending machines selling drinks and snacks. There are also 2 computers.

New York is ideally located for visiting many of Barcelona’s sights by foot. Ciutadella Park is a 10-minute walk away and Barceloneta Beach is 15 minutes's walk away.

The ferry port bus is a 10-minute walk from the hostel and you can catch a bus to the airport from Plaza Catalunya Square, 20 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Onix Rambla
Description:
This central Barcelona hotel is surrounded by the boutiques and cafes of the elegant Rambla de Catalunya. It offers free internet access and an outdoor pool, not heated and is open from April to October.

Onix Rambla has a fitness centre and a business centre with free internet access. There is also a nice terrace.

All air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen satellite TV. Rooms are also heated and come with a minibar and free safe. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and amenities.

The hotel is housed in a building with typical Modernist architecture. The surrounding area of the Eixample neighbourhood is famous for its beautiful buildings.

There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car at the hotel tour desk.

Please, be aware that swimming pool is not heated and will be opened from April to October.

Name: H10 Marina Barcelona
Description:
H10 Marina Hotel Barcelona is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Olympic Port. It offers a gym, spa and free Wi-Fi. The rooftop pool and sun terrace offer fantastic city and sea views.

The bright, air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel H10 Marina Barcelona feature parquet floors and satellite TV. They have a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel’s Dionissos restaurant serves à la carte and tapas meals, and room service is available. Bar La Llum offers an extensive wine list.

Access to the H10 Marina’s spa is available for an extra cost. It features a sauna, steam baths and an indoor pool. Massage and beauty services are also available.

Bogatell Beach, where you can find many beach bars and restaurants, is 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. It is 200 metres to Bogatell Metro, which connects you with central Barcelona in 10 minutes.

There is a tour desk and you can hire a car or bicycle. Laundry, dry cleaning and ironing services are offered.

Name: Penthouse Camp Nou
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.6 km from Sants Railway Station and 3.3 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Penthouse Camp Nou offers air conditioning. It is located 4.4 km from Passeig de Gracia and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Camp Nou is 1.3 km away.

The apartment with a terrace and mountain views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

La Pedrera is 4.6 km from Penthouse Camp Nou, while Casa Batllo is 4.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 11 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpica Suites
Description:
This minimalist hotel is situated in the Poble Nou district of Barcelona, 15 minutes’ by foot from Bogatell Beach. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool surrounded by wooden decking and loungers.

The suites at Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpica Suites feature monochrome decoration and a flat-screen TV. They also include air conditioning and a modern bathroom.

The Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpica Suites complex offers a stylish café-bar and restaurant. Guests can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine from the á la carte and daily menus. In summer meals can be enjoyed on the terrace by the pool.

Guests have access to the hotel's large spa for an additional cost. It includes an indoor treatment pool, Finnish sauna, Turkish baths, jacuzzis, hot tubs, several types of shower and an ice fountain. There is also a gym.

Barcelona Port is 15 minutes' walk away and Bogatell Metro Station is 100 metres from the hotel. Guests can walk to the lively Villa Olimpica area in 5 minutes.

All rooms include 1 complimentary access per person per stay to the hotel spa (subject to availability and upon reservation).

Name: Generator Barcelona
Description:
Generator Barcelona is located 500 metres from the fashionable Passeig de Gracia Avenue. The hostel offers a 24-hour reception, free private lockers in shared dormitories and free Wi-Fi in public areas.

Diagonal and Verdaguer metro stations are within 5 minutes’ walk from Generator Barcelona. The Gràcia district, which has plenty of boutique shops and bars, is only 200 metres away.

Both private rooms and dormitories have air conditioning and heating, as well as individual power sockets and reading lamps for each bed. Female-only dormitories include hairdryers and other amenities.

They also feature an en suite bathroom, a sink and a mirror. Bed linen is included, while towels can be rented at the reception. Dormitories are available for guests over 18 years old.

Guests can have a daily breakfast for an extra cost. Generator Barcelona also has a communal lounge and a luggage storage service.

Name: Classbedroom Born Apartments
Description:
These stylish, modern apartments are located in El Born. Ideal for two guests, these apartments  provide a clean, bright, and airy atmosphere.
With convenient public transport links, including local metro stations, exploring the city’s attractions is a breeze. Plus, you’ll be within walking distance of trendy shops, cozy cafes, and vibrant nightlife.

Name: Yomo Hostal BCN Port
Description:
This guest house offers free Wi-Fi in a location by Barcelona Port. Yomo Hostal BCN Port is just 100 metres from Las Ramblas and 400 metres from the Gothic Quarter.

Paral•lel Metro is a short walk away. This offers direct access to Plaça Catalunya, Plaça Espanya and the Sagrada Familia. The funicular to Montjuic also leaves from here.

The guest house is set opposite the Cruise Terminals, 10 minutes from Barcelona Beach. There are many buses and bicycle lanes nearby.

All rooms at the Yomo Hostal BCN Port have a TV, heating and air conditioning. Standard rooms are en suite and economy rooms have a shared bathroom.

Family rooms and rooms for disabled guests are available. Daily cleaning is provided.

Name: Sunotel Junior
Description:
Offering panoramic views from its rooftop terrace, which has a seasonal hot tub and swimming pool, Sunotel Junior is set 300 metres from Francesc Macià Square. It offers free, high-speed WiFi.

All rooms at Sunotel Junior have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, soundproofed windows and a fully equipped bathroom.

Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast each morning. The hotel’s restaurant, Pa'l Caldero, offers a selection of dishes from around the world. There is also a range of cafés and restaurants nearby.

You will find a 24-hour reception that offers a luggage storage service and free pool towels. There are also several meeting rooms available.

The Sunotel is a 5-minute walk from Hospital Clinic Metro Station, and Sants Railway Station is just 2 metro stops away.

FC Barcelona’s famous Camp Nou Stadium can be reached in 15 minutes by public transport, and Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are also around 15 minutes away.

Name: NH Barcelona Entenza
Description:
NH Barcelona Entenza is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants Station and high-speed AVE Station. La Fira Exhibition Centre is 1.5 km away. All air-conditioned rooms are spacious, soundproofed and offer free Wi-Fi.

Rooms in the NH Barcelona Entenza Hotel are bright and modern with wooden floors. They feature satellite TV, minibar and a fully equipped bathroom with hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel and breakfast in the room is available. One of Barcelona’s main streets, Diagonal Avenue, is a 10-minute walk from the hotel, with many restaurants and shops.

The NH Barcelona Entenza is in a quiet area but is well-connected to the city centre by Metro. Entença Metro Station is 200 metres away. FC Barcelona's Camp Nou Stadium is 3 stops away by Metro.

Name: Exe Mitre
Description:
Exe Mitre enjoys a peaceful location in the San Gervasi district of Barcelona, 200 metres from Putxet Park. It offers spacious rooms with and free WiFi.

An extensive buffet breakfast is served, with hot and cold options. The friendly staff are happy to recommend restaurants and bars nearby.

The elegant rooms at Exe Mitre feature classic décor and come with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms also have a terrace with views over Mount Tibidabo.

Exe Mitre is just 15 minutes’ walk from Gaudi’s famous Park Guell. Putxet Metro Station is 200 metres away and connects with Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in just 6 minutes. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are an 8-minute metro ride away.

Name: Praktik Garden
Description:
Featuring a charming garden terrace, Praktik Garden is located 400 metres from Barcelona’s fashionable Passeig de Gracia Boulevard. Fully reburbished in 2015, its chic rooms feature colourful mosaic floors, a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.

Girona Metro Station is just around the corner from the hotel. From there guests can reach the city’s Barceloneta Beach in 15 minutes. Plaça Catalunya is 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

All rooms at the Praktik Garden are equipped with air conditioning and some rooms have balconies. The modern bathroom includes a shower.

Guests can relax in the hotel lounge or on the furnished garden terrace. The hotel provides vending machines for drinks 24-hours a day.

Name: AG Apartments
Description:
Set in a restored building from 1893, AG Apartments is located in the Poble Sec area of Barcelona. Free Wi-Fi access is available. Plaza Espanya Square is 1.2 km away.

The reception area at the AG Apartments features a photography gallery. All apartments are decorated with photographs from the artist Enrique Rottenberg and feature a blend of rustic and industrial styles, preserving the original brick walls, arches and exposed beams, as well as the wooden doors and ceramic floors.

Each apartment has air conditioning and heating. There is a living room with a 42-inch Smart TV, a fully equipped open-plan kitchen and a modern bathroom. Some apartments have a balcony. Bed linen and towels are included. The building has a lift.

The nearest metro station is Poble Sec, 400 metres away. From there, you can reach Plaza Catalunya in 4 metro stops.  El Prat Airport is 20 minutes' drive away and buses leave from Plaza Espanya.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different apartments located in the Poble Sec area. Please select a date and click on the apartments to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

Name: Eurostars Monumental
Description:
This design hotel offers free WiFi and is just 400 metres from Sagrada Família Church. Decorated in elegant neutral tones, rooms include a plasma screen TV with satellite channels.

Rooms at the Eurostars Monumental have wooden floors and modern lighting. Toiletries and a hairdryer are included in the stylish marble bathrooms.

A breakfast buffet is served in the hotel’s restaurant. You can also find various restaurants and cafés within a 5-minute walk, in the area around the Sagrada Familia.

Eurostars Monumental is 100 metres from Monumental Metro Station, which provides direct trains to Passeig de Gracia Station. Estació del Nord Bus Station is just 850 metres away. The property offers a parking space for luggage drop off in front of the hotel.

Name: Stylish apartment in Plaça Espanya
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and a 14-minute walk from Sants Railway Station, Stylish apartment in Plaça Espanya features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is around 1.7 km from Palau Sant Jordi, 3.5 km from Camp Nou and 3.6 km from Plaça Catalunya. Casa Batllo is 3.7 km from the apartment and Boqueria Market is 3.9 km away.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property offers quiet street views.

Passeig de Gracia is 4.3 km from the apartment, while Montjuïc is 5.4 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km away.

Name: Hotel Astoria
Description:
Astoria is just off Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue, a 5-minute walk from Diagonal Metro Station and Paseo de Gracia Avenue. It features a rooftop pool with views, and a gym.

The Astoria Hotel combines original Art Nouveau features with modern facilities. Air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV, a safe and minibar. They feature wooden floors and free Wi-Fi, and the modern bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

The restaurant at the Astoria offers traditional Catalan cuisine, and room service is available. There is also a terrace and a bar.

There is a 24-hour front desk

Name: Hotel Casa Teva Barcelona
Description:
Located in the lively Raval district and 250 metres from Las Ramblas, Hotel Casa Teva Barcelona has easy access to Barcelona’s Old Town. It features 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with a TV.

Gaudi‘s Palau Güell is only 100 metres from the hotel, whilst La Boqueria Market is just a 5-minute walk away.

There are several restaurants, bars and cafés in the surrounding area. Barcelona’s Old Port and Maremagnum Shopping Centre are a 20-minute walk from the hotel.

Drassanes Metro Station is approximately 500 metres from the hotel.  Guests can reach sights such as the Sagrada Familia and Parc Güell in around 20 minutes, by Metro.

Name: Grupotel Gravina
Description:
Housed in an attractive 19th-century building, Grupotel Gravina is located just off Plaza Catalunya, Barcelona’s main square, 5 minutes' walk from Las Ramblas. It offers 24-hour reception and modern rooms with free WiFi and satellite TV.

The Hotel Gravina is just 5 minutes’ walk from the MACBA Modern Art Gallery and 15 minutes from Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló. Catalunya Metro Station, located 100 metres from the hotel, connects you with the rest of the city.

The air-conditioned rooms at Grupotel Gravina feature modern furniture and some have parquet floors. They are equipped with a work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel has a smart bar where you can get a snack or a drink. There are numerous restaurants in the surrounding streets.

Name: Petit Palace Boqueria Garden
Description:
The Petit Palace Boqueria Garden is set in a historic 19th-century building by La Boqueria Market, 10 meters from Las Ramblas, and offers free high-speed WiFi and free bicycle use (subject to availability).

Each room at the Petit Palace Boqueria Garden includes a flat-screen TV and laptop safe, and a private bathroom. The hotel also offers an electric scooter hire service, subject to availability.

The hotel's bar is set by a private courtyard and garden with hundred-year-old trees, a listed site of architectural heritage in Barcelona.

Petit Palace Boqueria Garden is located in Barcelona's Gothic Quarter, just a 1-minute walk from Liceu Metro Station, offering convenient transport around the city. Plaça Catalunya Square is 800 meters away, and you can walk to Barcelona Port in 8 minutes.

Name: Catalonia Castellnou
Description:
Catalonia Castellnou offers free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and bright, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. It is located 250 metres from Tres Torres Underground Station, in a quiet residential area.

There are many cafés, bars and restaurants within a 10-minute walk, in the centre of Sarrià.

Hotel Catalonia Castellnou is close to some of Barcelona’s most important medical centres, including Clínica IVI, Clínica Corachan and Fertilab.

The Castellnou offers easy access to the C32 Ring Road and Vallvidrera Tunnel. It is within a 15-minute train journey of central Barcelona, and less than 2 km from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.Diagonal Avenue, with El Corte Ingles Department Store and two shopping centres, is a 10-minute walk away. Real Club de Tenis Barcelona is 15-minute walk away.

Name: VIU BARCELONA BERTRAN
Description:
In the Sarrià-St. Gervasi district of Barcelona, close to Park Güell, VIU BARCELONA BERTRAN features free WiFi and a washing machine. The property has quiet street views and is 3.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and 3.4 km from La Pedrera. The accommodation provides a lift and a tour desk for guests.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. Some units include a terrace and/or a balcony with mountain or garden views. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Casa Batllo is 3.6 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 4.1 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Yurbban Ramblas Boutique Hotel
Description:
Situated conveniently in the centre of Barcelona, Yurbban Ramblas Boutique Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. Popular points of interest nearby include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.5 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room has a safety deposit box, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also have city views.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Yurbban Ramblas Boutique Hotel.

Speaking English, Spanish and French, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Boqueria Market, Plaça Catalunya and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Hotel Barcelona Catedral
Description:
There is a gym and a rooftop chill-out terrace with a swimming pool and wonderful city views. It is located 100 metres from Barcelona Cathedral, in the historic Gothic Quarter.

Each elegant room at the Barcelona Catedral Hotel features wooden flooring and air conditioning. Rooms have free WiFi, a laptop safe and flat-screen TV with international channels. Smoking is not allowed in any of the rooms, but there are common areas where smoking is allowed.

Creative Mediterranean cuisine is served in the hotel’s 4 Capellans restaurant, which offers a menu for celiacs. There is a wide range of restaurants and tapas bars within a 5-minute walk, including many in the popular El Born district.

Hotel Barcelona Catedral is 450 metres from Plaza Catalunya Square, while Las Ramblas are a 5-minute walk away.

Name: Hotel Rec Barcelona - Adults Only
Description:
Conveniently set in the centre of Barcelona, Hotel Rec Barcelona - Adults Only provides air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a shared lounge. 2 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2 km from Barceloneta Beach, the property offers a terrace and a bar. Private parking is available on site.

All units are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Each room includes a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while selected rooms have a balcony and others also offer city views. Guest rooms include a safety deposit box.

Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and American options.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff are always on hand to help at the reception.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Passeig de Gracia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Catalonia Park Putxet
Description:
Featuring a sunroof terrace with a pool and views over Barcelona, Catalonia Park Putxet offers tranquil rooms and a modern fitness centre onsite. There is free WiFi available throughout.

The Park Putxet has simple, bright décor. Each air-conditioned room comes with a mini fridge with complimentary water, a satellite TV and a fully equipped bathroom with a hairdryer.

You can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast with Show Cooking. Light meals are prepared at the hotel snack bar; and room service, including sushi room service, is available.

The hotel is located in a residential area. There is a wide selection of cafés, bars and restaurants in the neighbouring district of Gràcia, which is just 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Gaudi's famous Park Guell is just 600 metres away. The closest metro station is Lesseps, 600 metres away.

Name: H10 Urquinaona Plaza
Description:
A 5-minute walk from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas, H10 Urquinaona Plaza features a roof terrace with a small seasonal pool. It is set next to Urquinaona Metro Station.

H10 Urquinaona Plaza is set in a restored 19th-century building and features smart, contemporary décor. The chic rooms have minimalist design, free Wi-Fi, a Nespresso coffee maker, air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

This H10 also features a restaurant, a bar and a lounge with a library. You can enjoy great city views from the roof terrace.

The Palau de la Música Catalana is a short walk away and the charming Born district is within 1 km of the hotel. The airport bus stop and Catalunya Metro and Railway Station are less than 5 minutes’ walk away.

Name: MH Apartments Gracia
Description:
Offering free Wi-Fi, MH Apartments Gracia offers  bright, soundproofed apartments located in Barcelona’s Gracia District, 10 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia.

Featuring wooden floors, each soundproofed apartment has a living room with a sofa and satellite flat-screen TV. A dishwasher, oven and washing machine are included in the kitchen. Some apartments come with 2 bathrooms.

Private parking and an airport shuttle service are available at an extra cost and there is luggage storage.

A large variety of bars and restaurants can be found in the area, There is a 24-hour supermarket 500 meters from the apartments.

Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia and La Pedrera can be visited within a 20-minute walk. Fontana Metro Station, with connection to Plaça Catalunya and Barcelona’s historic centre, is 400 metres away.

Name: Ilunion Almirante
Description:
Located between the Gothic Quarter and the fashionable Born district, this stylish hotel has a fitness centre and free WiFi in all areas.

Barcelona Cathedral is just 200 metres from the Ilunion Almirante, and guests can walk to the famous Las Ramblas in less than 10 minutes. Jaume I Metro Station is 300 metres from the hotel.

Rooms feature wooden furniture and an en suite bathroom with marble finishes. They all include a large flat-screen TV with satellite channels, safe and minibar.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment.

The Ilunion Almirante features a stylish breakfast room where an à-la-carte breakfast is served daily. Room service is available during limited hours.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

Name: Hostal Hera
Description:
Situated within 1.3 km of Barceloneta Beach and 1.4 km of Sant Miquel Beach, Hostal Hera features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. This 1-star guest house offers luggage storage space and a housekeeping service. The property is 1.2 km from Somorrostro Beach, and within 1.1 km of the city centre.

All units in the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower, units at the guest house also feature free WiFi, while selected rooms also feature a balcony. At the guest house, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity of the property.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Plaça Reial. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Brummell
Description:
Hotel Brummell is a 20-room boutique hotel located a few steps from the Miró Foundation and The Grec theatre. Guests will benefit from free and unlimited yoga classes. A running club, for both guests and locals, is organized regularly.

The hotel features an outdoor pool, a garden and a sauna. T-training and boxing session are hosted at the well-being center The Loft.

All rooms boast modern furniture and artwork by young European designers. Each one is equipped with a safe, coffee and tea facilities and a yoga mat. The private bathroom has a rain shower, a high-powered hairdryer and free toiletries by MMLL. Suites have a private, furnished terrace with an outdoor bath.

FUNKY, Hotel Brummell’s new restaurant, offers a delightful eatery concept. An in-house bakery prepares a daily breakfast with a selection of oven-baked croissant and breads, local cheeses, olives, charcuteries, mató and honeycomb, Funky’s granola, whipped butter and house jam, seasonal fresh fruits and veggies, accompanied by a soft boiled egg. Pair your treats with their Nomad Filter Coffee, and experience the perfect harmony of flavors in a cozy, inviting atmosphere.

Hotel Brummell is just a 15-minute walk from La Rambla and the closest metro station is Parallel Metro Station, 250 m away.

For guests who wish to explore the sights of Barcelona, Montjuïc is known for its parks and gardens and is within 10 minutes' walk. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Name: BYPILLOW Mothern
Description:
Situated just outside Barcelona’s central Plaza Catalunya Square, BYPILLLOW  Mothern  offers bright, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. Buses to Barcelona Airport stop 100 metres away.

BYPILLLOW Mothern is situated next to Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, 600 metres from Gaudi’s famous Casa Batlló and a 5-minute walk from the Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter. Metro and regional train services stop at Catalunya Station, just 50 metres away.

 Set in a restored 19th century building, BYPILLLOW Mothern features simple and modern décor throughout. It has a 24-hour reception with a tour desk and ticket service.

You can work from the comfortable coworking space or terrace, or having a buffet breakfast in the dining room. You can also find a wide range of cafés, tapas bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets.

Name: Serennia Apartamentos Ramblas - Plaça Catalunya
Description:
These stylish, air-conditioned apartments offer a well-equipped kitchen, free Wi-Fi, a covered balcony and a spacious lounge-dining room with flat-screen satellite TV. They are a 2-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya Square and Barcelona University.

Apartamentos Ramblas – Plaça Catalunya are set in a typical 19th-century building with large windows and elegant wooden floors. Kitchens include an oven and ceramic hob, a dishwasher and a washer-dryer.

The Ramblas – Plaça Catalunya Apartments are just 350 metres from the famous Las Ramblas. The Gothic Quarter and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló are both within a 10-minute walk of the apartments.

You can find a wide range of shops, bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets. Plaça Catalunya Station is 200 metres away, while airport buses and tour buses stop 400 metres away.

Name: Hotel Market
Description:
Hotel Market is located next to Barcelona’s San Antonio Market, 10 minutes' walk from MACBA Gallery. Its chic rooms have rain showers and free Wi-Fi, and there is a popular restaurant.

The Market Hotel’s modern rooms have dark wood beams, white walls and large windows. Each one has a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony or terrace.

The hotel is 15 minutes’ walk from both Plaza Espanya and Plaza Catalunya. Sant Antoni Metro Station is about 200 metres away, and an airport shuttle bus stop can be found 2 minutes’ away.

The Market Hotel’s elegant restaurant offers a range of modern Catalan dishes, and specializes in rice.

Name: NH Collection Barcelona Constanza
Description:
Offering a rooftop pool and terrace,  NH Collection Barcelona Constanza has modern rooms with satellite TV. It is located next to L’Illa Shopping Centre on Diagonal Avenue, 15 minutes' walk from Sants Train Station.

The elegant, modern rooms at the Constanza feature a Nespresso machine, flat-screen TV, and pillow menu, while the bathroom includes a rain shower and a professional hairdryer. Free WiFi is included.

Guests can use the spa for an extra cost: please, note that the spa is included for stays in Premium rooms, Junior suites and Suite. The gym is available free of charge. Room service is available 24 hours.

The hotel's Antiox healthy buffet breakfast features antioxidant dishes made with ecological produce.

The hotel is 15 minutes’ walk from Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium. María Cristina Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk away, connecting you with the Fira Exhibition Centre in under 10 minutes.

Name: Bonanova Suite
Description:
These apartments are located in the residential neighbourhood of Sarrià-Sant Gervasi, only 10 minutes from Plaça Catalunya.

The aparthotel boasts attractive and spacious studios that make your stay a more comfortable and pleasant one. It also has excellent public transport connections with the centre of Barcelona.

Bonanova Suite offers 24-hour reception, a tour desk and shuttle service at an extra cost.

El Putxet Train Station is 4 minutes' walk away and Gaudi's Park Güell is a 30-minute walk away.

Name: Aspasios Gracia Apartments
Description:
Located in Barcelona within less than 1 km of La Pedrera and a 4-minute walk of Passeig de Gracia, Aspasios Gracia Apartments provides accommodation with free WiFi, seating area and a kitchen. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Sant Antoni Market
Description:
The stylish apartments at San Antoni Market are less than 5 minutes’ walk from Sant Antoni Metro station in central Barcelona. They offer smart accommodation with free Wi-Fi, just 200 metres from the market.

The spacious apartments at Sant Antoni Market combine modern décor with original features such as beamed ceilings or French doors. The living room has a sofa and a flat-screen TV, while the kitchen comes with a microwave, fridge, oven, a toaster and a coffee maker.

There is a range of shops, bakeries, bars and cafés in the streets surrounding the apartments. The famous Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya are within 20 minutes’ walk.

The MACBA Museum is less than 1 km from the apartments. Sant Antoni Metro Station is just 5 stops from the Sagrada Família. The airport bus stops on Comte d’Urgell and at Plaza Universitat, both within 15 minutes’ walk.

Name: Cozy Apartment in Sants
Description:
Located within 1.4 km of Magic Fountain of Montjuic and less than 1 km of Sants Railway Station, Cozy Apartment in Sants provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. The property is around 3.2 km from Camp Nou, 3.5 km from Casa Batllo and 3.5 km from Palau Sant Jordi. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a well-fitted kitchen with a dining area, and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.6 km from Cozy Apartment in Sants, while Plaça Catalunya is 3.9 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: ibis Styles Barcelona Centre
Description:
Ideally set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, ibis Styles Barcelona Centre is situated 500 metres from La Pedrera, less than 1 km from Casa Batllo and a 13-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. With a bar, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 1.3 km from the city centre and 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia.

At the hotel, the rooms come with a desk. All rooms at ibis Styles Barcelona Centre are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

With staff speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, advice is available at the reception.

Popular points of interest near ibis Styles Barcelona Centre include Tivoli Theatre, Sagrada Familia and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Alojamiento Calabria
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Alojamiento Calabria has free WiFi and a washing machine. The property is around 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia, 1.8 km from Tivoli Theatre and 1.7 km from Plaça Catalunya. The accommodation features a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

All units are fitted with air conditioning, a microwave, a fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. There is also a stovetop, kitchenware and a kettle. The units have a shared bathroom, free toiletries and bed linen.

Dining options are available close to the bed and breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Alojamiento Calabria include Sants Railway Station, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Weflating Suites Sant Antoni Market
Description:
Weflating Suites Sant Antoni Market is located in Barcelona, right next to Sant Antoni Market and 12 minutes' walk from the Ramblas. It offers modern, air-conditioned apartments with free WiFi.

The apartment will provide you with a balcony and a seating area. There is a full a kitchenette with a dishwasher and a microwave. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. You can enjoy city view from the apartments.

There are many great bars and restaurants in the streets around the apartments, such as Carrer Parlament or Carrer Blai. Apolo Nightclub is also 8 minutes' walk away.

Name: Catalonia Mikado
Description:
This elegant hotel is situated in the exclusive Sarrià area and has a garden terrace with an outdoor pool and hot tub. It offers functional, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV, a mini fridge with complimentary water and free Wi-Fi.

The Catalonia Mikado's restaurant serves breakfast and evening meals, specializing in international dishes. There is also a bar. Only 500 metres away, the charming centre of Sarrià is famous for its cake shops.

The Catalonia Mikado is within a 10-minute walk of Ramon Llull University and the International University of Catalonia. It is also well located for some of Barcelona's most important medical centres, including the Teknon Centre and IMO and the Institut Catalá de la Retina.

Sarrià Train Station is just 10 minutes’ walk away. From here you can get to central Barcelona in 5 minutes.

Name: Sunny Apt Barcelona 22@
Description:
Set in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Sunny Apt Barcelona 22@ has a balcony and city views. The property is around 2.4 km from Passeig de Gracia, 2.5 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and 2.6 km from Tivoli Theatre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 1.4 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Bogatell Beach, Mar Bella Beach and Sagrada Familia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Barcelona Center
Description:
Barcelona Center is 400 metres from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia Avenue, and a 15-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. Guests have free access to the small gym and rooftop hydromassage tub.

The modern rooms at the Barcelona Center Hotel have satellite TV and free WiFi. There is a minibar and safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

The Center Hotel has a traditional Spanish restaurant. There is also a bar and a rooftop bar.

There is a 24-hour front desk. Parking is available nearby (first to arrive first to take) for an additional charge of 30€ per night and car.

Name: Fisa Rentals Gran Via Apartments
Description:
Fisa Rentals Gran Via Apartments are stylish apartments set 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. They have free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV.

Each spacious Fisa Rentals apartment offers contemporary décor and chic wooden floors. All apartments are air conditioned, but there is one bedroom that doesn't have air conditioning. All the apartments have a spacious seating area with satellite TV. The well-equipped kitchens also have a washing machine.

The apartments have easy access to the centre of Barcelona and are within 10 minutes’ walk of a selection of shops, bars and restaurants.

Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard is 300 metres away and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera can be reached in 15 minutes, by foot. Passeig de Gràcia and Urquinaona Metro Stations are around 200 metres away.

Name: Ola Living Hostal Diagonal
Description:
Featuring free WiFi, Ola Living Hostal Diagonal is located in Barcelona. Set 800 metres from Passeig de Gracia, famous for its luxury shops, this hotel offers modern rooms with air conditioning.

Each heated room at this hotel has modern décor and includes 1 double or 2 single beds, a flat-screen TV and wardrobe. The private bathroom comes with a shower and hairdryer. Some rooms have a spa bath. All are on the ground floor.

The hotel offers a lounge area.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and grocery shops within a 5-minute walk of Ola Living Hostal Diagonal Exclusive rooms. Diagonal Metro Station is 850 metres from the property, and Plaza Catalunya is 2 stops away.

Our reception is located at 228 Aribau Street. The opening hours are from 09:00 to 20:00, Monday to Sunday.

Check in time is 3:00 PM. If you arrive earlier we can store your luggage at reception until your apartment is ready. Also after your check out (11.00 AM).  You can leave your luggage at the reception.

The apartment has opening through a smartphone. If you need a face-to-face check-in later than 9:00 PM.  There is a surcharge of €30.

Name: Boutique Apartments 23 Barcelona
Description:
Ideally situated in the Gràcia district of Barcelona, Boutique Apartments 23 Barcelona is located less than 1 km from La Pedrera, a 16-minute walk from Casa Batllo and 1.3 km from Sagrada Familia. It is situated 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia and provides a lift. The aparthotel features quiet street views, a sun terrace, and free WiFi is available.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning and features a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. There is also a fridge, kitchenware and a kettle. At the aparthotel, units include bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop and lounge.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity of the property.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.6 km from the aparthotel, while Tivoli Theatre is 1.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Leevin Student Barcelona
Description:
Leevin Student Barcelona in Barcelona provides adults-only accommodation with a garden, a shared lounge and a terrace. The property is around 2.8 km from Camp Nou, 3.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and 3.3 km from La Pedrera. The accommodation features a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hostel, rooms are equipped with a desk. At Leevin Student Barcelona the rooms have air conditioning and a private bathroom.

Sants Railway Station is 3.4 km from the accommodation, while Casa Batllo is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Leevin Student Barcelona.

Name: Fira Apartments by Gaiarooms
Description:
Located next to the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre, these bright modern apartments offer free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Plaza Espanya Square is just 50 metres away.

Each stylish Ding Dong Fira Apartment is decorated in light colours, with smart wooden floors. Apartments have a lounge with a sofa bed, and air conditioning and heating is available in the lounge only.

There is a well-equipped open-plan kitchenette with a washing machine, microwave, toaster, Nespresso coffee machine and utensils. Towels and bed linen are provided and there is a hairdryer.

A range of bars, restaurants and shops can be found within a 5-minute walk of the Fira Apartments by Gaiarooms. The famous Magic Fountain and Las Arenas Shopping Centre are both within 100 metres.

Espanya Metro Station, 250 metres away, offers direct metro services within 10 minutes to Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Sants International Train Station is within a 500 metre walk of the apartments or can be reached by direct metro line. Buses to and from the airport, as well as city tour buses, stop 3 minutes' walk from the apartments.

Name: Silken Ramblas
Description:
This stylish hotel has an excellent central location, 50 metres from Barcelona’s Las Ramblas and just 100 metres from Plaza Catalunya. It offers a rooftop pool, sauna and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at the Silken Ramblas are stylish, and are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. There is central heating and air conditioning according to the season. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer.

The Silken has a restaurant and bar. Room service is available. There is a also a pleasant terrace.

The Silken has a tour desk and the sightseeing bus stops nearby in Plaza Catalunya.

Name: Napoles · Modernist flat close to Sagrada Familia
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 2.8 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.8 km from Nova Icaria Beach, Napoles · Modernist flat close to Sagrada Familia features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is located 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.5 km from Tivoli Theatre. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, La Pedrera and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Ilunion Auditori
Description:
Situated 10 minutes' walk from the Arc de Triomf Metro and Train Station, the Ilunion Auditori features a rooftop swimming pool 3 m wide by 5 m long and gym. Free WiFi is available throughout.

All modern rooms at the Auditori have wooden floors, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a safe. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment.

The Ilunion Auditori serves a daily breakfast. There is also a special menu for celiac and food intolerant guests. A range of restaurants and bars can be found in the nearby areas of the Eixample, Born and Gothic Quarter.

Guests can enjoy a work out at the gym, which is equipped with cardiovascular equipment. The seasonal rooftop pool, which is surrounded by sun loungers, offers the ideal place for relaxation with stunning views over the city.

The famous Barcelona Auditorium is a 5-minute walk away, while the the Sagrada Familia and the Ciutadella Park are 1.5 km away. Underground private parking is available on site for an additional charge.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

Name: ApartEasy - Family Apartment Sant Antoni
Description:
ApartEasy - Family Apartment Sant Antoni features a balcony and is set in Barcelona, within just 1.3 km of Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.6 km of Plaça Catalunya. It is located 1.6 km from Portal de l'Angel and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 4 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Sightseeing tours are available close to the property. A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near ApartEasy - Family Apartment Sant Antoni include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: GuestReady - Central Barcelona Getaway
Description:
In the centre of Barcelona, located within a short distance of Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia, GuestReady - Central Barcelona Getaway offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. This apartment provides accommodation with a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is set 300 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana and La Pedrera. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Catalonia Barcelona Plaza
Description:
Located in Barcelona's Plaza de España, Hotel Catalonia Barcelona Plaza offers a seasonal rooftop pool and a terrace with panoramic city views. It also has a fitness room, beauty salon and free Wi-Fi.

The property is located next to Espanya Metro Station. In the square there are numerous bus stops that connect with other parts of the city, with the Fira Barcelona fairground and with Barcelona airport.

All spacious rooms are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV, a safe and a private marble bathroom with hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout, and Smart TVs with Chromecast apps are available. Choose one of the two clock suites and you will have incredible views of Montjuïc from the floor-to-ceiling windows. If you prefer, the hotel also has rooms and suites with private terrace.

The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza serves a daily buffet breakfast in the Simultáneo space, Barcelona's new meeting point that fuses cultural and leisure activities with the best gastronomic offer. Come to Simultáneo to telework with free wifi, to have an informal meeting, to enjoy a concert or to have an afterwork cocktail.

Do you already know the  Simultáneo Gastrobar? An avant-garde space that offers unique haute cuisine dishes. If you book half board, you can enjoy the Gastrobar menu during lunch or dinner.

The Filigrana restaurant specialises in modern Catalan cuisine made with local ingredients. You can also visit the Japanese restaurant Kurai or have a drink on The Clock terrace, overlooking Montjuïc.

The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza has a spacious business centre with 3 large conference rooms and 8 meeting rooms, all equipped with the latest technology.

This is our guests' favourite part of Barcelona, according to independent reviews.

Name: Hotel 54 Barceloneta
Description:
Located in Barcelona’s beachfront area of Barceloneta, this design hotel has a stylish terrace overlooking the port. It offers a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi and air-conditioned rooms with a smart TV.

The rooms at the Hotel 54 Barceloneta feature modern décor and innovative lighting. Each one has a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

There is a variety of good seafood restaurants within 5 minutes’ walk of Hotel 54.

The 54 Barceloneta is just 3 minutes’ walk from Barceloneta Beach. You can walk to the attractive Born district in 10 minutes, and Barceloneta Metro Station is a 7-minute walk away.

Name: Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Diagonal
Description:
Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Diagonal is situated 350 metres from Glòries Shopping Centre, in the modern 22@ district of Barcelona. It offers an elegant restaurant and soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi and TV.

Rooms at the Four Points Barcelona Diagonal are bright and spacious, with wooden flooring. Each room has a stylish bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Rooms on higher floors offer great views, some of the Sagrada Familia.

La Avenida Restaurant serves traditional Spanish cuisine. A varied buffet breakfast is offered daily, and free coffee is available from 05:00 until 07:00. Taste local crafted beers, snacks and enjoy the best sports projections at 4Taps Bar.

The Four Points Diagonal is 600 metres from the colourful Agbar Tower, designed by Jean Nouvel. There are many bars and restaurants on nearby Rambla del Poblenou, and Bogatell Beach is within a 15-minute walk. Poblenou Metro Station is only 500 metres away.

Name: Apartments Barcelona Sagrada
Description:
Situated within 2.9 km of Bogatell Beach and 600 metres of Sagrada Familia, Apartments Barcelona Sagrada features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. It is located 2.1 km from La Pedrera and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km away.

The apartment provides guests with a balcony, city views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Casa Batllo is 2.3 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.5 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: ApartEasy - Eixample Center
Description:
Located in the centre of Barcelona, ApartEasy - Eixample Center is close to sights such as Passeig de Gracia, La Pedrera and Casa Batllo. It is set 1.6 km from Plaça Catalunya and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from ApartEasy - Eixample Center.

Name: Hostal Balmes Centro
Description:
Hostal Balmes Centro offers 24-hour reception with tourist information service, free WiFi and free luggage storage. It is located 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Paseo de Gracia Boulevard and from one of Gaudi's masterpieces, la Pedrera.

All rooms at Hostal Balmes Centro have a flat-screen TV, a wardrobe and a fridge. Rooms come with double or twin beds, and a private or shared bathroom with bath or shower. Free toiletries and a hairdryer are provided.

 You can find numerous restaurants and bars with traditional tapas in the surrounding area.

Car hire, bicycle rental and tours can be organized at Hostal Balmes Centro’s tour desk. Plaza Catalunya Square and Ramblas can be reached in 10 minutes’ walk and Casa Batlló House and Museum is 500 metres away.

Barcelona El Prat Airport is 17 minutes’ drive away. Regular airport trains leave from a train station located just 550 metres away.

Name: Hostal Argo
Description:
Hostal Argo is a modern guest house located Barcelona, 4 minutes' walk from Diagonal Avenue and 450 metres away from Passeig de Gràcia. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

Air-conditioned rooms at Argo feature stylish Minimalist décor in neutral tones. They feature parquet floors, a TV and a private bathroom with shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Bed linen and towels are included.

At Hostal Argo you will find a 24-hour front desk where luggage storage can be provided for free. An exclusive roof-top terrace with limited access is featured during summer season.

Modernist buildings like La Pedrera or Casa Batlló are 8 minutes on foot. Sagrada Familia Temple is 1 km away. The nearest metro station is Girona, 400 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 20 minutes by car.

Name: Praktik Vinoteca
Description:
Located in the heart of Barcelona, just 700 metres from Plaza Catalunya, Praktik Vinoteca hotel offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi in public areas. Universitat Metro Station is 7 minutes’ walk away.

The bright and soundproofed rooms at Praktik Vinoteca feature wooden floors, a flat-screen satellite TV, telephone and a wardrobe. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The property has a terrace where you can enjoy a glass of wine served by the on-site wine expert, who can tell you about local wines and their history.

You will find bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets. Paseo de Gracia, with its shops and impressive architecture, is just 600 metres away.

Barcelona Airport is a 45-minute bus ride away from Plaza Catalunya and Barceloneta Beach is 3 km from Praktik Vinoteca.

Name: Ola Living Born
Description:
Ola Living Born offers accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. It is set 1.4 km from Somorrostro Beach and features a lift. The property is close to popular attractions like Picasso Museum, Plaça Reial and Passeig de Gracia.

The units in the apartment complex are equipped with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, all units at the apartment complex have a TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also feature a terrace. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Barceloneta Beach, Sant Miquel Beach and Santa Maria del Mar. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Apartments Sata Olimpic Village Area
Description:
Offering contemporary apartments with balconies and private parking, Apartments Sata Olimpic Village Area is a 10-minute walk from Vila Olimpica Beach. This stylish property is a 5-minute walk from Marina Metro Station.

Each air-conditioned apartment is decorated in simple, grey tones with modern finishes. All apartments have a well-equipped kitchenette with a microwave, fridge and hob.

ApartmentsSata Olimpic Village Area is a 15 minutes’ walk from the Olympic Marina and Barcelona’s seafront promenade. The centre of Barcelona can be reached in just 10 minutes, by Metro. An airport shuttle service is available for a surcharge.

Nord Bus Station is located within a 15-minute walk of the apartments and regular airport trains leave from Passeig de Gràcia Station, which is 5 stops from Bogatell Metro.

Name: Ibis Barcelona Meridiana
Description:
Located next to Fabra i Puig Station, Ibis Barcelona Meridiana is a 10-minute Metro journey from Plaza Catalunya. It offers a 24-hour bar and air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV.

Barcelona Meridiana’s bar serves a wide range of snacks and drinks.

Hotel Ibis Barcelona Meridiana is set next to the Heron City Shopping Centre, where you can find restaurants, cinemas and a gym. Indoor public parking is available at an extra cost.

Name: Hotel Omnium
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.1 km from Somorrostro Beach, Hotel Omnium offers accommodation with a shared lounge, private parking and a terrace. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property.

The units at the hotel feature air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Omnium every room has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Tivoli Theatre, Cathedral of Barcelona and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from Hotel Omnium.

Name: Hotel Ramblas Internacional
Description:
Hotel Ramblas Internacional is set right on the famous Las Ramblas, 50 metres from Liceu Metro Station and close to La Boquería Market.
Each of the soundproofed rooms is individually decorated and has plenty of natural light. Most rooms offer views of central Barcelona and some look onto Las Ramblas.

Hotel Ramblas Internacional serves a daily breakfast.

Located just 150 metres from Liceu Theatre, the hotel has easy access to Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the city’s cathedral is less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

Name: RIUS - Modern Apartment in Montjuic
Description:
Situated within 400 metres of Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.9 km of Sants Railway Station, RIUS - Modern Apartment in Montjuic features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. The property is around 2.5 km from Plaça Catalunya, 2.5 km from Portal de l'Angel and 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia. Cathedral of Barcelona is 3.3 km away and Plaça Reial is 5 km from the apartment.

With a private bathroom fitted with a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also feature free WiFi, while selected rooms also feature a balcony. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau Sant Jordi, Boqueria Market and Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Hostal Live Barcelona
Description:
Hostal Live Barcelona is located on central Barcelona's Gran Vía Avenue, 10 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas, Plaza Catalunya Square and Plaza España Square. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Rooms are modern and spacious, featuring 32-inch LED TVs. Some rooms have a private terrace overlooking a courtyard, or a balcony with views of Gran Vía Avenue. Use of a microwave, fridge and ironing facilities can be requested at the reception.

Guests can find a wide selection of bars and restaurants in the area, including a restaurant located 20 metres away, where guests receive discounts on breakfast, lunch and dinner.

In 15 minutes you can walk to Plaza Espanya, where the Fira Exhibition Centre and Las Arenas Shopping Centre are. It is also 2 stops away on the metro.

The nearest metro station is Urgell, just 100 metres away. Airport buses leave from a stop located 350 metres away.

Name: Hostal LK Barcelona
Description:
Just 500 metres from Barcelona’s AVE Train Station, Sants Estació, Hostal LK Barcelona offers 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. Espanya, Hostafrancs and Tarragona Metro Stations are within 5 minutes’ walk.

Chic, modern rooms feature wooden floors and air conditioning. They are also heated and have flat-screen  TV and a work desk. The private bathroom comes with toiletries.

The property has a fridge, microwaves and kettle which guests can use.

Luggage storage is offered at the LK Barcelona. Just 3 minutes’ walk away is Plaza Espanya, with Las Arenas Shopping Centre, the Magic Fountain and Airport Bus stop.

Name: BCN Urbaness Hotels Bonavista
Description:
BCN Urbaness Hotels Bonavista is set in Barcelona, 400 metres from La Pedrera and less than 1 km from Casa Batllo. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The guest house has family rooms.

All rooms have a private bathroom, while some rooms also offer a balcony ( subject to availability) and others also have a city view.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Passeig de Gracia, Sagrada Familia and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from BCN Urbaness Hotels Bonavista.

Name: Sunotel Club Central
Description:
Featuring an outdoor swimming pool and hot tub on its terrace, Sunotel Club Central is set in Barcelona’s elegant Eixample neighbourhood.

Each modern air-conditioned room has free, high-speed WiFi, a TV and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a bath, shower and hairdryer.

Sunotel Club Central features a cosy bar, serving snacks and drinks. There is also room service available. The hotel has a 24-hour reception, and free bicycles are available upon request and subject to availability.

Passeig de Gracia, with its Gaudi monuments and designer shops, is a 10-minute walk from Sunotel Club Central. The famous Las Ramblas Boulevard and Plaza Catalunya are a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Barcelona Airport is 15 km away, and you can catch an airport bus in Plaza Catalunya.

Name: Apartments Gaudi Barcelona
Description:
Featuring stylish accommodation, Apartments Gaudi Barcelona are set in the charming Gràcia district, just a 10-minute walk to Gaudi´s Sagrada Familia.

Each studio and apartment at the Gaudi Barcelona has charming décor. There is either a kitchen or a kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Seating areas come with a flat-screen TV.

There is a selection of shops in the streets around Apartments Gaudi Barcelona. Gràcia has a range of cafés, bars and restaurants.

Passeig de Gràcia is a 10-minute walk away, while Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are both within 1.5 km of the apartments. Las Ramblas can be reached in 10 minutes by Metro.


Please note that this property offers apartments in different locations around Barcelona, near the Gracia district. Check-in takes place directly at your apartment. Please see the individual apartment descriptions for the address and more details.

Name: May Ramblas Hotel
Description:
Set in Barcelona in the Catalonia Region, 200 metres from Plaza Reial, May Ramblas Hotel boasts a sun terrace and views of the city. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. All rooms have a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 400 metres from May Ramblas Hotel, while Portal de l'Angel is 500 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Fisa Rentals Ramblas Apartments
Description:
Fisa Rentals Ramblas Apartments is located in central Barcelona, just 250 metres from Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas. It offers stylish, air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The Fisa Rentals apartments feature parquet floors and modern décor. Each one comes with a DVD player, and the kitchen includes a hob, microwave, washing machine and dishwasher.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are about 15 minutes’ walk from the apartments. La Boquería Market and the spectacular Palau de la Música Catalana are within a 10-minute walk. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya.

Name: ApartEasy - Central Barcelona Studio Apartment
Description:
ApartEasy - Central Barcelona Studio Apartment features a patio and is set in Barcelona, within just 700 metres of Sagrada Familia and 1.9 km of Casa Batllo. It is situated 2.5 km from Somorrostro Beach and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.3 km from Nova Icaria Beach.

With free WiFi, this apartment provides a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and toaster. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation offers an air conditioning, a heating and a private bathroom.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, La Pedrera and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from ApartEasy - Central Barcelona Studio Apartment.

Name: The Corner Hotel
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Casa Batllo, The Corner Hotel provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a bar and a terrace. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

All units at the hotel include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels,and a private bathroom with a bath or shower, bathrobes and slippers. At The Corner Hotel every room comes with bed linen and towels.

A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation.

Popular points of interest near The Corner Hotel include Passeig de Gracia, Plaça Catalunya and La Pedrera. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

Name: Aspasios Sagrada Familia Apartments
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, Aspasios Sagrada Familia Apartments has well-equipped accommodation boasting free WiFi, 500 metres from Sagrada Familia.

Each unit offers a fully equipped kitchen, a flat-screen TV, a living room with a sofa, and a private bathroom. A dishwasher and oven are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. There is a washing machine and bed linen and towels are provided.

La Pedrera is a 19-minute walk from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 1.8 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Ferienwohnung für 3 Personen ca 40 qm in Barcelona-Gràcia, Costa Brava Costa del Maresme
Description:
Ferienwohnung für 3 Personen ca 40 qm in Barcelona-Gràcia, Costa Brava Costa del Maresme has a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 200 metres of Passeig de Gracia and 400 metres of La Pedrera. The property is close to Palau de la Musica Catalana, Plaça Catalunya and Sagrada Familia. Portal de l'Angel is 1.8 km from the apartment and Park Güell is 3.6 km away.

With free WiFi, this apartment features a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven and microwave.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Pol & Grace Hotel
Description:
Immerse yourself in the world of art at Pol & Grace Hotel by enjoying a unique room, where the walls capture the essence of the artists and designers who have participated in artistic residencies in our facilities, creating an atmosphere full of inspiration and originality".

Pol & Grace Hotel is located just 100 metres from Barcelona's Plaça Molina and Sant Gervasi train stations. It offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV, free Wi-Fi and a working area with unlimited coffee and tea from 10:30 am.

All rooms at Pol & Grace Hotel include a minibar, a free safe and the bathrooms are fully equipped with toiletries.

The property serves a buffet breakfast with fresh, seasonal regional produce. Vegetarian and gluten-free options are available daily.
There is also a 24-hour reception with taxi service, tourist information and private parking.

Fontana Metro Station is 600 metres away and offers direct connections to Plaza Catalunya Square, Las Ramblas and Park Güell. The property is a 2-minute walk from the famous Gracia district, where guests can find numerous shops, restaurants and bars.

To reach the hotel from the airport by public transport you can take the AEROBUS to Plaça Catalunya Square and then L6 or L7 to Sant Gervasi/Plaza Molina. From there is a 1 min walk to the hotel.

Name: Suite Miro Eixample Barcelona
Description:
Set in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Suite Miro Eixample Barcelona has a balcony. The property is located 1.4 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, 2 km from Casa Batllo and 2.2 km from Passeig de Gracia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is less than 1 km away.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Plaça Catalunya is 2.5 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Suite Miro Eixample Barcelona.

Name: Acta CITY47
Description:
Acta CITY47 is 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants Train Station and 15 minutes from the Fira Exhibition Centre. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi.

The rooms at Acta CITY47 feature simple, modern décor and a private bathroom. Each one comes with a TV, free safe, and a work desk. Guests have free access to an ironing room open 24 hours.
