The hotel’s modern Nass City restaurant serves international food and a gluten-free breakfast is available on prior request. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink.

The Acta CITY47 is 20 minutes’ walk from Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium. Sants Metro Station connects you with the centre of Barcelona in 15 minutes.

Name: Hostemplo Sagrada Familia
Description:
This design guest house has an excellent location just 200 metres from Gaudí’s world-famous Sagrada Familia. There is free Wi-Fi throughout.

Rooms and apartments at Hostemplo Sagrada Familia are bright and have modern design. They have a flat-screen TV with DVD player and air conditioning. All rooms have a private bathroom.

Hostemplo Sagrada Familia rooms occupy all three floors of a historic modernist building, that preserves its original front. The interior is fully renovated. The suites are located in a new outbuilding.

A buffet breakfast with homemade pastries, local produce and freshly squeezed natural orange juice is served daily at Hotel Hostemplo, located 150 metres from the property.

The Tourist Bus passes the guest house and stops only 100 metres away. Tickets are conveniently available at reception. There is a metro station just 150 metres from the property.

There is 24-hour access to the building, as well as 24-hour reception.

Name: Nordic Apartment II Sagrada Familia
Description:
Offering inner courtyard views, Nordic Apartment II Sagrada Familia is an accommodation situated in Barcelona, 1 km from Sagrada Familia and 2.5 km from La Pedrera. Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The accommodation features a lift, and organising tours for guests.

The 2-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.7 km from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Nordic Apartment II Sagrada Familia.

Name: Hostal Girona
Description:
Hostal Girona is located in the historic heart of Barcelona, a 10-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia and Plaça Catalunya. It offers free Wi-Fi.

Hostal Girona is a small and modern guest house with a lift. All rooms are air conditioned and have a TV. Some rooms are en suite and others have a shared bathroom.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are within walking distance. Private parking is possible nearby, at a daily cost.

The guest house occupies a historic, 19th-century building. The building was part of the Quadrat d’Or. This block was designed by the father of the Eixample neighbourhood, Ildefons Cerdà.

Name: Standbyme Ramblas
Description:
Situated on Barcelona’s Las Ramblas, this guest house is less than 200 metres from Liceu Metro Station. It offers simple, comfortable rooms and has free Wi-Fi access available throughout.

The Hostal Boquería’s functional rooms feature air conditioning and cable TV, as well as heating and a safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Rooms with views of the Ramblas are subject to availability.

The Boquería has a 24-hour reception. Guests can also make use of its luggage storage.

The central location makes visiting Barcelona’s sights easy. The Boquería Market is just across the Ramblas. Barcelona Cathedral and the surrounding Gothic Quarter are within 5 minutes’ walk of Standbyme Ramblas.

Name: The Hoxton, Poblenou
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.7 km from Bogatell, The Hoxton, Poblenou provides accommodation with a restaurant, private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.

Guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. The units will provide guests with a desk and a kettle.

Guests at The Hoxton, Poblenou can enjoy a à la carte breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Nova Icaria, Mar Bella and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from The Hoxton, Poblenou.

Name: Hostal Baler
Description:
Hostal Baler offers good-value accommodation in a convenient location, with excellent access to the historic heart of Barcelona. This guest house is set 400 metres from Sants Train Station.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Baler have free WiFi and satellite TV. They all have an en suite bathroom. The guest house has a 24-hour reception, offering a tour desk and luggage storage.

Hostal Baler is a short walk from Plaza España and Montjuïc. This hill is home to the MNAC Gallery, the Pueblo Español and the Magic Fountain. There is also a park and castle, with views of the city and sea.

Name: Hotel Nouvel
Description:
Offering air-conditioned rooms, free WiFi and an on-site restaurant, Hotel Nouvel is located on a pedestrianised street just 100 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya Square and the Ramblas.

The hotel features ornate ceilings, cast bronze and crystal lamps, and marble floors, in the style of its 19th-century building.

All rooms come with a flat-screen TV, double-glazed windows and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. A safe is available to rent.

The hotel’s La Lluna Restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. Vending machines with snacks, ice, and drinks, are also available.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can help you arrange car hire, a laundry service and tickets for shows. You will also find luggage storage and a reading room with two computers.

Portal de Angel shopping street is just 2 minutes’ walk away, while Barcelona Cathedral and the Gothic Quarter are a 10-minute walk from Hotel Nouvel.

Name: Wilson Boutique Hotel
Description:
Wilson Boutique Hotel is situated on Barcelona’s Avinguda Diagonal, 12 minutes’ walk from La Pedrera in Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers free Wi-Fi, stylish décor and a rooftop terrace with impressive city views.

The Wilson Boutique Hotel has soundproofed rooms with chic, contemporary design. All rooms are bright with large windows. Each has a flat-screen TV and air conditioning.

The hotel is within walking distance of Plaza de Catalunya which features a range of shops and restaurants.

The Wilson Boutique has excellent transport links. Many buses, including the sightseeing bus, stop opposite the hotel.

The hotel offers free use of the PC and printer in the lobby. There is also a tour desk, where guests can receive information on Barcelona’s tourist attractions, including Gaudí’s Casa Batlló which is around 20 minutes’ walk from the Wilson. Diagonal Metro Station is 750 metres away.

Name: Hostal Martinval
Description:
Set 5 minutes’ walk from the avenues of Diagonal and Passeig de Gracia, this guest house is located in the central Eixample neighbourhood of Barcelona. Verdaguer metro station is 350 metres away.

Hostal Martinval offers both apartments or modern rooms, most of which have a private bathroom. All rooms have a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi, while some of them have a balcony.

The Martinval also features a luggage storage. There is a wide offer of restaurants and bars in the surrounding area.

This accommodation is well connected to public transport and within walking distance from Barcelona’s most important buildings. La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are 10 minutes’ walk, and Sagrada Familia Temple is about the same distance.

Name: Aparteasy - Deluxe Family Apartments with Pool
Description:
Aparteasy - Deluxe Family Apartments with Pool offers accommodation in Barcelona. Plaça Catalunya is located just 10 minutes walking from the property.

All units are air-conditioned and have a seating area. There is also a dining area and a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher and oven. A microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Aparteasy - Deluxe Family Apartments with Pool also includes an outdoor pool, and free WiFi is available.

Portal de l'Angel is 1.2 km from Aparteasy - Deluxe Family Apartments with Pool, while La Pedrera is 1.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 12 km from Aparteasy - Deluxe Family Apartments with Pool.

Name: MH Apartments Sant Pau
Description:
MH Apartments Sant Pau are located just 7 minutes’ walk from Gaudi’s famous Sagrada Família, in Barcelona. These modern, air-conditioned apartments feature free WiFi and a flat-screen TV.

MH Apartments Sant Pau have parquet floors. There is also a washing machine and dishwasher. Bed linen and towels are provided.

There are various restaurants, bars and supermarkets located in the streets around the apartments. The charming Bohemian district of Gràcia is just 5 minutes' walk away.

The amazing Hospital de Sant Pau, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is just 8 minutes’ walk from the apartments. Located a 7-minute walk away, Joanic Metro Station connects you with Barcelona City Centre and the Gothic Quarter in under 10 minutes.

Private parking is available 300 metres from the property, for an extra cost.

Name: Apart-Suites Hostemplo
Description:
Apart-Suites Hostemplo offers stylish apartments and suites set in 2 beautiful Modernist buildings, 250 metres from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia. This soundproofed accommodation features free Wi-Fi and a DVD player.

The property offers contemporary décor with wooden floors. The apartments come with air conditioning and heating, as well as a private balcony. Most have views of Sagrada Família. Most of the apartments have a washing machine.

A buffet breakfast with homemade pastries, local produce and freshly squeezed natural orange juice is served daily at Hotel Hostemplo, located 150 meters from the property.

The junior suite features a fridge, microwave and kettle, and it has a TV. Located on the 5th floor, it offers views of Sagrada Família.

In 5 minutes you can walk to Sagrada Família Market, as well as Gaudí Avenue, where there are many restaurants, bars and shops. Barcelona's open-top bus tour route also stops just 3 minutes' walk from the property.

Apart-Suites Hostemplo is situated just metres from Avinguda Diagonal and just 3 minutes' walk from Sagrada Família Metro Station. Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are a 10-minute walk away on Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, in the city centre.

Name: Pierre & Vacances Barcelona Sants
Description:
Pierre & Vacances Barcelona Sants offers stylish air-conditioned accommodation, just a 5-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium. Free high-speed WiFi is available.

Each bright apartment and studio has a well-equipped kitchenette and flat-screen satellite TV.

All the Pierre & Vacances apartments and studios have functional modern décor and street views. Kitchen facilities include a fridge, microwave and dishwasher. A safe is available at an extra cost.

Pierre & Vacances Barcelona Sants is situated in the lively Sants neighbourhood, home to a wide range of shops, bars and cafés.

Just 200 metres away, Badal Metro Station connects with Sants Train Station in under 10 minutes. Collblanc metro station with direct trains to Barcelona Airport and Europa Fira is 500 metres away.

Name: Ola Living Calabria
Description:
Conveniently located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Ola Living Calabria is situated 1.7 km from Plaça Catalunya, 1.8 km from Portal de l'Angel and 2 km from Tivoli Theatre. It is set 1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and offers a lift. Cathedral of Barcelona is 1.8 km away and Montjuïc is 1.9 km from the apartment.

Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a well-fitted kitchen including a dishwasher, oven, microwave and a toaster. The units have a coffee machine, a TV, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while some rooms also offer a terrace. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Boqueria Market and Palau Sant Jordi. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: 23PAR1007 Comfortable apartment in Paralel
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 700 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya, 23PAR1007 Comfortable apartment in Paralel features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 2.6 km from Portal de l'Angel and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Sants Railway Station and Palau Sant Jordi. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Catalonia Catedral
Description:
The Catalonia Catedral is set in a traditional Modernist building, just 100 metres from Barcelona Cathedral. It offers free use of Smartphones, Wi-Fi access, a rooftop seasonal pool and a Japanese-style terrace and garden.

The Catedral has stylish rooms, which have contemporary décor. Each has a flat-screen smart TV equipped with Chromecast app, air conditioning, a minibar, a Nespresso machine. A smartphone is available for guests during their stay free of charge.

The hotel’s Ascent Restaurant by Eboca serves Mediterrean cuisine and offers views of the nearby Palacio Pignatelli Art Gallery. There is also a bar in the hotel lobby where guests can use the computers with internet access and printers for free.

The Catalonia Catedral is around 10 minutes’ walk from landmarks such as Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya Square. Barcelona’s Old Port and Marina are less than one kilometre away. Jaume I Metro Station is 5 minutes' walk away.

Name: Sharing flats in gotico
Description:
Situated conveniently in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Sharing flats in gotico is set 2.2 km from Somorrostro Beach, 2.2 km from Barceloneta Beach and 600 metres from Plaça Catalunya. The property is close to Passeig de Gracia, Cathedral of Barcelona and Boqueria Market. The property is 2 km from Sant Miquel Beach, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Portal de l'Angel, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: NH Barcelona Eixample
Description:
This modern hotel offers free WiFi and spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. NH Barcelona Eixample is 400 metres from Hospital Clínic Metro Station, in the Eixample district.

The NH Barcelona Eixample is a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Plaza Catalunya Square. Barcelona Sants Train Station is within 2 Metro stops, and Gaudí’s Sagrada Família Church is 3 stops away.

Rooms at the NH Barcelona Eixample feature simple, functional décor and wooden floors. They all include a minibar and a selection of pillows. The marble bathrooms come with a hairdryer and a range of toiletries.

The hotel’s breakfast buffet includes typical pastries, fresh fruit and Spanish cured ham.

Name: Ilunion Barcelona
Description:
Located 10 minutes away from Bogatell Beach in the 22 district, the modern Ilunion Barcelona features a rooftop swimming pool, sun terrace, and a gym. The CCIB Conference Centre is 2 km away. Free WiFi is available.

Rooms at Ilunion Barcelona feature air conditioning, a desk and a TV. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. A safe and minibar are provided. Superior rooms also feature a furnished terrace with sea or city views.

This hotel is officially adapted for disabled guests. It has rooms adapted for people with reduced mobility or hearing/visual impairment, available upon request.

Ilunion Barcelona's restaurant serves breakfast and also offers an à la carte menu. The hotel has a bar and provides room service. A menu for guests with specific dietary requirements is also available.

Just a few minutes walk from the hotel is Rambla de Poblenou and Bogatell Beach, which are home to a wide variety of shops, bars and restaurants. The shopping centre is a 4-minute drive away and the Diagonal Mar shopping centre is an 8-minute drive away.

Ilunion Barcelona has pleasant, renovated common areas and free internet access. Private underground parking is available for an extra cost.

Llacuna and Poble Nou Metro Station is located less than 300 metres from the hotel. The bus stop of the line number 6 is located 50 metres from the hotel.

Gran Via is 15 minutes away by bus. There is a tourist bus stop near the hotel. Barcelona-El Prat airport is located 20 km away, with quick access to the Ronda Litoral.

Name: Hostal Aslyp 114
Description:
Situated in the L'Eixample neighbourhood of Barcelona, Hostal Aslyp 114 offers free WiFi and features a shared lounge with flat-screen TV and satellite channels. Plaza Catalunya is 2.8 km away.

Fitted with tile flooring, the guest house has air-conditioning and heating. The rooms feature simple décor, wardrobe and city view. The private bathroom has a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The property offers a continental breakfast and vending machines are available.

Restaurants, shops and bars are within 250 metres away. Gaudí's famous Sagrada Familia Cathedral is 3.5 km from Hostal Aslyp 114. Sants Metro and Train Station is a 15-minute walk away.

Barcelona Airport is 20 minute-drive away. Hostal Aslyp 114 offers shuttle service for a surcharge.

Name: Apartamentos Barcelona - Iberia
Description:
Located within 1.1 km of Sants Railway Station and 1.6 km of Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Apartamentos Barcelona - Iberia provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. With city views, this accommodation offers a balcony. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Camp Nou is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 3.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from Apartamentos Barcelona - Iberia.

Name: Gran Hotel Havana 4Sup by Escampa Hotels
Description:
This elegant, design hotel is set in Barcelona’s city centre, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya. It features a sauna and a seasonal rooftop pool with a terrace.

The Gran Hotel Havana is located in Casa Fradera, a historic building dating from 1882. Rooms are decorated in a classic style and feature a marble bathroom. They come with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.

The Grand Place restaurant serves traditional cuisine, and in summer guests can enjoy light meals on the hotel’s rooftop bar-terrace.

Please note that the rooftop bar-terrace may be closed to the public at certain times due to private events.

Girona Metro Station is 200 metres away while the stylish Paseo de Gracia is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, with many shops, bars and restaurants.

Name: Forget Me Not Barcelona
Description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Forget Me Not Barcelona offers accommodation in Barcelona, 400 metres from La Pedrera. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar.

All rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV. You will find a kettle in the room. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer.

There is a shared lounge at the property.

Plaça Catalunya is 1.3 km from Forget Me Not Barcelona, while Portal de l'Angel is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 13 km from Forget Me Not Barcelona.

Name: Limonaia
Description:
Boasting a garden and free WiFi, Limonaia is set in Barcelona, 100 metres from La Pedrera and 600 metres from Casa Batllo. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

All rooms have a contemporary décor and come with air conditioning, free WiFi, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. At the hotel all rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with free toiletries.

Popular points of interest near Limonaia include Passeig de Gracia, Tivoli Theatre and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

Name: Barcelona Apartment Villarroel
Description:
Located in Eixample District, close to Hospital Clínic metro station and only 15 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s historic town, these modern décor apartments offer free Wi-Fi throughout.

Barcelona Apartment Villaroel features deluxe and executive 2-bedroom apartments. Each of them has a comfortable living-dining area with sofa and flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and well-equipped kitchen.

Numerous bars and restaurants as well as supermarkets can be found nearby. Barcelona main shopping district is just 10 minutes’ walk away.

You can reach Barcelona Sants AVE Train Station in less than 15 minutes' walk away or a short metro ride from Hospital Clínic metro station.

When booking more than 2 apartments, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

Name: Cosmopolitan Boutique Rambla
Description:
Located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, Cosmopolitan Boutique Rambla is only 200 metres from Gaudi’s famous La Pedrera. This guest house offers rooms with free WiFi.

Rooms at the Cosmopolitan Boutique Rambla have typical tiled floors and high ceilings. All rooms have heating, TV, and private bathroom. Some have a balcony with city views.

Cosmopolitan Boutique Rambla is set on Rambla Catalunya, a tree-lined avenue full of shops, cafés and tapas bars.

Passeig de Gracia is 100 metres away, and Diagonal Metro Station is within 50 metres. Las Ramblas, Sagrada Familia and Camp Nou Stadium are all just a few stops away by Metro.

Name: Catalonia La Maquinista
Description:
Catalonia La Maquinista is ideally located next to the La Maquinista Shopping Centre in Barcelona’s Sant Andreu District. Plaza de Catalunya is just a 15-minute Metro journey away.

The Maquinista’s bright rooms have air conditioning and flat-screen smart TV equipped with Chromecast app. All rooms have a work desk and safe. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

The hotel restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and Mediterranean cuisine for lunch and dinner. The neighbouring Maquinista Shopping Centre has a selection of cinemas, a bowling alley, as well as cafés and bars.

Catalonia La Maquinista is 500 metres from Barcelona’s ring road, the B10 Ronda del Litoral, connecting guests to the beach in 10 minutes.

Sant Andreu Metro and Railway Station is just a 10-minute walk from Catalonia La Maquinista and has direct trains to Passeig de Gràcia and to El Prat Airport. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 8 Metro stops away.

As with reservations of more than 4 rooms, special conditions and supplements will apply to those of more than 8 nights.

Name: HOTEL FORNOS - Barcelona
Description:
Free Wi-Fi and functional, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV are offered at HOTEL FORNOS - Barcelona. It is situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, next to Plaça Reial Square.

The Fornos Hotel is located on the edge of the Gothic District, 500 metres from Barcelona Cathedral. Liceu Metro Station and the colourful Boquería Food Market are a 3-minute walk away.

The hotel’s bright rooms have simple, modern décor and tiled floors. Each room has a private bathroom and a safe. Many rooms also have a small balcony with views of the Ramblas or Plaza Real. Single rooms are interior, only 2 exterior single rooms if available.

A light continental breakfast is offered at the hotel. Drinks and snacks are also available from the vending machines. The 24-hour reception offers information about Barcelona. Public parking is available nearby for an extra charge.

Name: Acevi Villarroel
Description:
Acevi Villarroel offers free high-speed Wi-Fi, a spa and a rooftop pool, open in summer. Located 400 metres from Urgell Metro Station, it is a 15-minute walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya.

Rooms at the Acevi have elegant décor and hardwood floors. All have a satellite TV.

Hotel Acevi Villarroel’s spa is available free of charge. It includes a steam bath, sauna, Hammam and gym. Massages are available on request. You can also relax on a lounger on the sun terrace.

Acevi Villarroel is within a 10-minute walk of Barcelona University and the lively Raval district. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 600 metres away, and offers direct access to the Sagrada Familia and FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.

Name: Alojamiento Diputacion
Description:
Situated less than 1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Alojamiento Diputacion offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 1.3 km from Sants Railway Station and features a shared kitchen. Guests can enjoy city views.

At the homestay, units include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a shared bathroom, bed linen and towels. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a kettle. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.2 km from the homestay, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Catalonia Gran Via BCN
Description:
Catalonia Gran Via BCN is set on Gran Vía and within 5 minutes’ walk of Urgell and Universitat Metro Stations, and beside the airport bus stop. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym and free Wi-Fi.

Each of the modern rooms at Catalonia Gran Via BCN is themed around a different city and air travel. All rooms have flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and an iPod docking station.

You can enjoy breakfast in Catalonia Gran Via BCN, while à la carte options are offered in the Gourmet Corner.

You can walk to both Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas in 10 minutes. Plaza de España, the Magic Fountains and the FIRA are just 2 stops from Urgell Station.

Name: Casa Lirio
Description:
Attractively situated in Barcelona, Casa Lirio features a buffet breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 2-star hotel offers luggage storage space. Some rooms at the property have a balcony with a city view.

At the hotel, rooms include a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at Casa Lirio have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms have a terrace. All units feature a safety deposit box.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sant Miquel Beach, Sant Sebastian Beach and Barceloneta Beach. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Occidental Diagonal 414
Description:
Attractively set in the centre of Barcelona, Occidental Diagonal 414 features air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness centre. Boasting room service, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace. Private parking is available on site.

The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Rooms come with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while certain rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also boast city views. All guest rooms have a safety deposit box.

Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.

Popular points of interest near Occidental Diagonal 414 include La Pedrera, Passeig de Gracia and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Brummell Apartments Eixample Derecha/Ballroom
Description:
Ideally located, Brummell Apartments Eixample offers modern décor apartments in the Eixample District, within walking distance of Plaza Catalunya. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Apartments at Brummell boasts original elements including high ceilings and traditional mosaic flooring. All have a fully equipped kitchen completed with a washing machine and a living-dining room with a flat-screen TV. The bathroom comes with a walk-in shower and hairdryer, and bed linen and towels are provided.

Numerous bars and restaurants serving local and international cuisine can be found nearby.

The apartments are also well connected by bus and metro to all main tourist attractions in Barcelona.

Please note that this property offers apartments in different locations around Barcelona, near the Eixample District. Please see the individual apartment descriptions for the address and more details.

Name: Consell Cent apartment I 3 dormitorios Eixample
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.3 km from Tivoli Theatre, Consell Cent apartment I 3 dormitorios Eixample offers air conditioning. Popular points of interest nearby include Passeig de Gracia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Cathedral of Barcelona. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1 km away.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 3 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a microwave, a washing machine, a toaster and a fridge. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Consell Cent apartment I 3 dormitorios Eixample include Portal de l'Angel, Boqueria Market and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Apartment Sagrada Familia Grassot - Industria by Interhome
Description:
Located in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia and a 16-minute walk from La Pedrera, Apartment Sagrada Familia Grassot - Industria by Interhome provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This 3-star apartment offers a lift. Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.4 km away and Tivoli Theatre is 2.5 km from the apartment.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Casa Batllo and Park Güell. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Hostal Drassanes
Description:
Located 300 metres from Las Ramblas, Hostal Drassanes offers free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and bright, air-conditioned rooms with TVs and modern bathrooms. Port Vell Harbour is just 100 metres away.

Each simple room has tiled floors and a safe. Some rooms have views of La Mercè Church and the charming La Mercè Square.

Hostal Drassanes is surrounded by the narrow streets and lively bars of the Gothic Quarter. Drassanes Metro Station is 400 metres away, while Maremàgnum Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away.

Name: ApartEasy - Central Gracia Apartments
Description:
Located within 200 metres of Passeig de Gracia and 500 metres of La Pedrera, ApartEasy - Central Gracia Apartments provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. It is situated less than 1 km from Casa Batllo and features luggage storage space. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

All units include a seating area, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom, while some feature a terrace or a balcony. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near ApartEasy - Central Gracia Apartments include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Petit Palace Museum
Description:
This stylish design hotel is situated in the centre of Barcelona, less than 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya. The chic rooms include free WiFi.

Rooms at the Petit Palace Museum feature a contemporary bathroom with a hydromassage shower and hairdryer.

Bicycles can be hired for free at the Petit Palace, subject to availability. Bus tours can be organised for guests. The exclusive Paseo de Gracia Boulevard is 200 metres away with its many shops, restaurants and bars.

A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel’s restaurant. There is also a bar where guests can enjoy cocktails.

Name: Hotel America Barcelona
Description:
Situated in the charming Enric Granados Boulevard, 500 metres from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia, this stylish hotel offers a gym, sauna and rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool and city views.

America Barcelona’s rooms are bright and airy, decorated with soft colours and wooden flooring. Each one has a flat-screen TV and a Nespresso Coffee Machine, and some courtesy capsules are provided on arrival. The private bathroom comes with a rain shower, bathrobes and slippers.

Hotel America Barcelona serves a daily buffet breakfast including fresh pastries and fruit and offers a relaxed café-bar in the lobby. A range of drinks and cocktails can be enjoyed on the seasonal terrace, overlooking the city.

Guests are welcome to enjoy free 24-hour access to the modern gym equipped with sauna as well as a free welcome drink including cava, sparkling water or natural juice.

Plaça Catalunya and the Gothic Quarter are just a 15-minute walk from the America Barcelona. Diagonal Metro station is only 400 metres away.

Name: Apartment Eixample Dret Valencia - Cartagena by Interhome
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 2.8 km from Bogatell Beach and 700 metres from Sagrada Familia, Apartment Eixample Dret Valencia - Cartagena by Interhome offers air conditioning. This 3-star apartment offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.6 km away.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Casa Batllo is 2.5 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 2.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Montaber Apartments - Sagrada Familia
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 2.5 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 2.8 km from Bogatell Beach, Montaber Apartments - Sagrada Familia offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is located 2.2 km from Casa Batllo and features a lift. The property offers soundproof units and is set 500 metres from Sagrada Familia.

All units comprise a seating area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen with various cooking facilities, including a dishwasher, an oven, a microwave and a toaster. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

La Pedrera is 2.5 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Montaber Apartments - Sagrada Familia.

Name: Axel Hotel Barcelona - Adults Only
Description:
The area around the Hotel Axel Barcelona is known as the Gay-xample because of its lively gay scene. The staff has knowledge of the local gay scene, and the hotel is hetero-friendly too.

Offering free Wi-Fi throughout, this design hotel is close to Passeig de Gràcia's exclusive boutiques. The Axel Hotel’s 500m² Spa Centre includes a hydromassage pool and saunas, and the modern rooms have flat-screen satellite TVs.

The Axel’s Sky Bar features a large swimming pool, a terrace with a hot tub and a cocktail bar. Here you will find parties, art exhibitions and shows.

The Axel Hotel Barcelona & Urban Spa offers easy access to the Ramblas, the Picasso Museum and Gothic Quarter. The hotel occupies an attractive 19th-century building.

Name: Sercotel Hotel Rosellon
Description:
Located 300 metres from Sagrada Familia, Sercotel Hotel Rosellon offers 4-star accommodation in Barcelona and features a bar. With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms (calefaction works in winter and the cold air conditioner in summer) with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Sercotel Hotel Rosellon each room comes with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help.

La Pedrera is 1.6 km from Sercotel Hotel Rosellon, while Casa Batllo is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

Name: Loft Miro Apart Barcelona
Description:
Set in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Sants Railway Station and a 13-minute walk from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Loft Miro Apart Barcelona offers air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. The property is located 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia, 2.8 km from Plaça Catalunya and 2.8 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.4 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bath. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

La Pedrera is 3 km from the apartment, while Boqueria Market is 3.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Loft Miro Apart Barcelona.

Name: HG City Suites Barcelona
Description:
HG City Suites Barcelona is situated on the edge of Barcelona’s popular Gràcia district, 300 metres from Fontana Metro Station. Its spacious, modern rooms feature climate control, minibar and flat-screen satellite TV.

All accommodation at HG City Suites Barcelona includes a safe and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi in all rooms and public areas.

Gràcia FGC Train Station is just 200 metres from the HG City Suites Barcelona and the number 24 bus also stops nearby. Both connect guests to Plaza de Catalunya in less than 20 minutes. Passeig de Gràcia is within a 15-minute walk of the HG City Suites Barcelona.

Public parking is available near the hotel, with special discounts available for guests.

Name: The Orbit Apartments
Description:
A recently renovated property, The Orbit Apartments is set in Barcelona near Park Güell, Passeig de Gracia and La Pedrera. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units include bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach. The apartment has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Casa Batllo is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.1 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: AApartments in city center
Description:
Boasting city views, AApartments in city center features accommodation with a balcony, around 2.8 km from Sant Miquel Beach. The property is around 2.8 km from Somorrostro Beach, 2.8 km from Barceloneta Beach and 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia. The property is 2.8 km from Sant Sebastian Beach, and within 300 metres of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 1 separate bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom. A TV is available. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Catalunya, Boqueria Market and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: 1881 Barcelona Gran Rosellon Hotel
Description:
Featuring free WiFi, a restaurant and a seasonal outdoor pool, 1881 Barcelona Gran Rosellon Hotel offers accommodation in Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Diagonal Metro Station.

The hotel has a sun terrace and a fitness centre, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. There is also a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV and a telephone. Some have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Every room includes a private bathroom with free toiletries.

La Pedrera is 600 metres from Bcn Urban Gran Rosellon, while the trendy Passeig de Gràcia Street is 8 minutes' walk away. Plaça Catalunya is 1.7 km from the property and Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away. Private parking is available on site.

Name: Nuevo apartamento zona Paseo de Gracia
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 200 metres from Passeig de Gracia and 600 metres from La Pedrera, Nuevo apartamento zona Paseo de Gracia offers free WiFi and air conditioning. The property is around 2.5 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 1.7 km from Sagrada Familia and 2 km from Portal de l'Angel. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.1 km from Casa Batllo.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a living room with a TV, an equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Plaça Catalunya. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Ilunion Les Corts Spa
Description:
Ilunion Les Corts Spa features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Ilunion Les Corts Spa every room comes with bed linen and towels.

A gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the accommodation.

Camp Nou is less than 1 km from Ilunion Les Corts Spa, while Sants Railway Station is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Plaza España, from where the shuttles leave to the Montjuic field.

Name: Ola Living Portaferrissa
Description:
Centrally located, Ola Living Portaferrissa offers air-conditioned apartments and studios with free Wi-Fi and free safe. Accommodations are 100 metres from Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya is 5 minutes’ walk away.

Featuring modern and functional furniture each accommodation comes with a flat-screen cable TV and a fully equipped kitchenette including a coffee machine, microwave and oven. A washing machine, clothes dryer and iron facilities are also provided.

Ola Living Portaferrissa is surrounded by a wide range of bars, restaurant and traditional Spanish Granjas for a snack or a light meal. You can find fresh produce in La Boquería Market, 200 metres away.

You can walk to the Cathedral in 5 minutes from Ola Living Portaferrissa. Lively Plaza Reial is 400 metres away and Barcelona Museum of Contemporary Art is 7 minutes’ walk from accommodations. The closest metro station is Liceu, just 300 metres away.

Name: Des Artistes
Description:
Des Artistes is located on Barcelona’s Gran Vía Avenue, next to Tetuán Square. It offers a reading room and a shared terrace.

Rooms come with heating and a fan is available in summer. All have a shared bathroom and some have a balcony.

All rooms have air conditioning.

Des Artistes is just 5 minutes’ walk from Estació del Nord Bus Station and Arc de Triomf. You can also walk to Ciutadella Park and Gaudí’s famous Sagrada Família in under 15 minutes.

Located 250 metres away, Tetuán Metro Station is just 1 stop away from the central Passeig de Gràcia Station. Trains to Barcelona Airport leave from Passeig de Gràcia Train Station.

Name: Aspasios City Oasis Apartments
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 500 metres from Passeig de Gracia and 1.3 km from the centre, Aspasios City Oasis Apartments provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and an outdoor swimming pool. The property has pool and garden views, and is less than 1 km from Casa Batllo. The apartment features family rooms.

Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a well-fitted kitchen with a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Centric Sagrada Familia Apartments
Description:
Centric Sagrada Familia Apartments is located in Barcelona, just 140 metres from Gaudí's spectacular Sagrada Família Basilica. This modern, air-conditioned apartment features a private balcony and free WiFi.

The apartment features white décor. It has a single room, a double room and a twin room.

The lounge comes with a flat-screen TV and a dining table. In the kitchen you will find a hob, oven and coffee maker, as well as a washing machine.

Sagrada Família Metro Station is located just 100 metres from the apartments, taking you to Passeig de Gràcia in just 3 stops.

Name: Hotel Roger de Llúria
Description:
This boutique hotel offers comfortable rooms with 42-inch (101 cm) flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. The Roger de Lluria is set in an elegant area, 2 streets from Plaça Catalunya.

The Roger de Llúria is a 10-minute walk from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, on Passeig de Gràcia and around 700 metres from Las Ramblas.

Rooms at the Roger de Lluria are spacious and well-equipped. Each room has a marble bathroom with a bath, bathrobe and hairdryer. There is a daily turn-down service.

The Roger de Lluria offers a transfer service from the airport, at an additional cost. There is also a ticket service and business centre.

A large buffet breakfast is served every morning.  There is also a lounge bar.

Name: Barcelona Apartment Republica
Description:
Located 150 metres from Llacuna Metro Station, Derby Republica offers modern loft-style apartments featuring exposed brick walls. Guests have access to a rooftop pool and sun terrace with views over Barcelona.

The air-conditioned apartments at Derby include a kitchen equipped with a microwave, hob, fridge and dishwasher. There is also a washing machine, and bedding and towels are provided.

The Republica has a concierge service that can help organise activities such as tours and water sports. Guests can also enjoy free entry to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum.

Glories Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away from Derby Republica. The beach and Poble Nou Park are also just 15 minutes’ walk away.

Name: AinB Sagrada Familia Apartments
Description:
Just a 15-minute walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Família Basilica, the stylish, air-conditioned AinB Sagrada Familia apartments offer free Wi-Fi and well-equipped kitchens. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 250 metres away.

The bright apartments offer city views and elegant minimalist décor. Each apartment has a spacious living-dining room with flat-screen satellite TV. Kitchenettes include a hob, oven and coffee maker.

The charming Born district and Ciutadella Park are within a 10-minute walk of AinB Sagrada Familia. Las Ramblas and Barceloneta Beach can be reached within a 20-minute walk.

Estació del Nord Bus Station is just 200 metres from the apartments and offers national and international bus services, including direct buses to Girona Airport.

Name: U232 Hotel
Description:
Located in Barcelona's attractive Eixample district, U232 Hotel offers stylish, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is just 150 metres from the hotel.

All of the rooms in Hotel U232 have modern marble bathrooms with powerful showers. Some also have city views and private terraces.

Guests can enjoy drinks, jazz music and city views on the hotel's top-floor terrace. There is also a modern gym on the same floor.

The U232 has a free business centre with an internet terminal. There is an Art Deco-inspired lounge and cocktail bar, decorated with art photography and leather armchairs.

The hotel offers an extensive breakfast buffet. Room service includes daily specials and a pizza delivery service.

The shops and department stores of Diagonal Avenue are just 7 minutes’ walk away. Passeig de Gràcia and Sants Railway Station are both about 20 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Private rooms
Description:
Private rooms is located in the Nou Barris district of Barcelona, 8.7 km from Park Güell, 9.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and 9.4 km from La Pedrera. The property is around 10 km from Casa Batllo, 10 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 10 km from Tivoli Theatre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 7.5 km away.

Some units are air conditioned and include a dressing room. At the guest house, some units are allergy-free.

Plaça Catalunya is 10 km from the guest house, while Tibidabo Amusement Park is 11 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 21 km from the property.

Name: Habitat Apartments Ribes
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 2.1 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 2.3 km from Barceloneta Beach, Habitat Apartments Ribes offers air conditioning. It is situated 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Somorrostro Beach is 2 km away.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 2 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from Habitat Apartments Ribes, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Hotel Barcelona Universal
Description:
Barcelona Universal offers free Wi-Fi, a gym and a rooftop pool with city ciews. Situated next to next to Parallel Metro Station, the hotel is just 600 metres from Las Ramblas.

The spacious, functional rooms at the Barcelona Universal Hotel feature wooden floors and air conditioning. Bathrooms include toiletries and heated towel rails.

The Barcelona Universal’s Medea serves a hot and cold buffet breakfast, including plenty of healthy options.

The hotel is situated a 20-minute walk from the Magic Fountain and MNAC Art Museum, in Montjuïc. Plaça Catalunya is just 3 Metro stops away, and the lively bars of the Raval district are just 500 metres away.

Name: Barrio Gotico Apartments Ferran
Description:
Barrio Gotico Apartments Ferran offers accommodation within 700 metres of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a microwave, a toaster, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. At the apartment complex, the units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Reial, Plaça Catalunya and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Everest
Description:
The Hotel Everest is located 10 minutes’ walk from the impressive Sagrada Familia Cathedral and features a roof terrace and free Wi-Fi.

All spacious rooms at the Hotel Everest have air conditioning and come with satellite TV. They feature a modern bathroom and some rooms include a balcony.

A transport service to and from the airport, as well as other areas of the city, can be arranged for a surcharge. The hotel includes a drinks vending machine serving coffee and soft drinks.

The hotel can be found next to the Hospital de Sant Pau, an impressive Modernist building. The city center is less than 15 minutes away by Metro. Sant Pau Metro Station is 200 meters away. A private parking is available nearby at an extra cost; staff at reception will provide more information.

Name: Gaudí Ramblas
Description:
Centrally located, just a 5-minute walk from Las Ramblas and Columbus Monument, Gaudí Ramblas offers a self-catering studio. It features modern, industrial décor and air conditioning.

The studio includes a lounge area, dining table, and kitchenette with stove, microwave and refrigerator. The kitchenette is also equipped with a washing machine.

The bathroom comes with a shower. Towels and linen are provided, and ironing facilities are also available in this studio.

Gaudí Ramblas is also conveniently situated only a 3-minute walk from La Boqueria Market and Liceu Metro Station. Plaça Catalunya Square is 10 minutes away by foot.

Name: BYPILLOW Wander
Description:
Set just 100 metres from La Rambla in central Barcelona, BYPILLOW Wander offers modern rooms with air conditioning and free WiFi. Drassanes Metro Station is just 50 metres away.

Located on the 4th floor, all rooms have a private bathroom with a hairdryer and shower. They are heated, air-conditioned and include a flat-screen TV.

You will find a wide range of shops, restaurants and bars in the area. Barcelona’s Port Vell is just 350 metres from BYPILLOW Wander and the Maritime Museum is 150 metres away.

Barcelona Beach can be reached in a 15-minute bus ride. Plaza Catalunya is a 15-minute walk from the property and buses to the airport leave from there.

Name: Europark
Description:
Set 600 metres from Barcelona’s central Passeig de Gracia, Hotel Europark offers a rooftop terrace with outdoor pool. The stylish rooms include a 32-inch LCD TV and free Wi-Fi access.

Each air-conditioned room at the Europark has elegant black and white décor. There is a laptop safe and minibar, as well as a modern bathroom with hairdryer.

Hotel Europark has a café-bar and a breakfast room, where a varied buffet breakfast is served. A free early-morning coffee service is also available.

The hotel is a 15-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Girona Metro Station is just 200 metres away and provides direct access to Barceloneta Beach and the Gothic Quarter.

Name: Abba Garden
Description:
This modern hotel is situated on the northern edge of the city of Barcelona, near Avinguda Diagonal and Barcelona FC's famous stadium, Camp Nou. Guests have free access to the seasonal outdoor pool and the gym . Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

The exterior facing rooms feature a flat-screen TV, minibar, and a safe. The bathroom comes with free toiletries, bath, and hairdryer.

Stroll around the gardens of the Abba Garden Hotel. There is also a paddle court, so you can play a quick game.

Grab a bite to eat in the snack bar in the evening - complete with terrace.

Zona Universitaria Metro Station that takes you to the Barcelona city centre is a 10-minute walk away. Metro Line 9 is a 13-minute walk away and it takes you to the airport within 15 minutes and to La Fira within 30 minutes.

Name: Palau de la música 2
Description:
In the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, close to Somorrostro Beach, Palau de la música 2 has free WiFi and a washing machine. The property is around 2 km from Sant Miquel Beach, less than 1 km from Tivoli Theatre and a 8-minute walk from Santa Maria del Mar. The property is 600 metres from the city centre and 1.9 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The apartment is composed of 2 separate bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is available. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Cathedral of Barcelona, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Passeig de Gracia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Montserrat Apartments by Gaiarooms
Description:
Featuring quiet street views, Montserrat Apartments by Gaiarooms provides accommodation with balcony, around 200 metres from Sagrada Familia. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment features family rooms.

At the apartment complex, every unit includes air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine. At the apartment complex, all units come with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the surroundings.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: ApartEasy - Sant Antoni Market
Description:
Located in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, ApartEasy - Sant Antoni Market features a balcony and quiet street views. It is situated 1.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and provides private check-in and check-out. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Sightseeing tours are available in the surroundings. A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near ApartEasy - Sant Antoni Market include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 11 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: ClassBedroom Gaudí Apartments
Description:
ClassBedroom Gaudí Apartments offers stylish and modern self-catering apartments in Barcelona. Apartments are spread around the San Marti district.

With air conditioning, each apartment is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a kitchen with microwave and coffee machine. The private bathroom comes with a shower and hairdryer.

La Sagrera, Bac de Roda and San Marti Metro Stations are all within a 15-minute walk from Apartments VI ClassBedroom. San Marti Park is 1.5 km away.

Name: Piso nuevo al lado de la Sagrada Familia.
Description:
Piso nuevo al lado de la Sagrada Familia. Is situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 300 metres from Sagrada Familia, 1.8 km from Casa Batllo and 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia. It is located 2.9 km from Somorrostro Beach and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.7 km from Nova Icaria Beach.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

La Pedrera is 1.7 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.9 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Radisson Blu 1882 Hotel, Barcelona Sagrada Familia
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 400 metres from Sagrada Familia, Radisson Blu 1882 Hotel, Barcelona Sagrada Familia has an outdoor pool and a fitness centre. The 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi.

At the hotel, each room comes with a desk. The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms include a city view. All rooms feature a wardrobe.

A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property.

Radisson Blu 1882 Hotel, Barcelona Sagrada Familia offers a terrace with views of Sagrada Familia.

Staff are ready to help around the clock.

La Pedrera is a 14-minute walk from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Radisson Blu 1882 Hotel, Barcelona Sagrada Familia.

Name: Hotel Casa Gardenia
Description:
Attractively situated in the centre of Barcelona, Hotel Casa Gardenia features air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a terrace. This 2-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.8 km from Sant Sebastian Beach.

The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available each morning at Hotel Casa Gardenia.

Speaking English, Spanish, French and Italian, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: ApartsNouBcn Equador Les Corts
Description:
ApartsNouBcn Equador Les Corts it is a building and long stay apartment blockna, 800 metres from Sants Train and Bus Station. The house has free Wi-Fi and a spacious terrace with a chill-out area and outdoor dining facilities.

The apartments includes 1 double bedrooms, 1 individual room with two beds and a lounge with a flat-screen TV. There are 2 bathrooms, one of them en suite.The kitchen includes an oven, hob, microwave and coffee maker. Bed linen and towels are provided.

You can walk to FC Barcelona's Camp Nou Stadium in around 15 minutes from ApartsNouBcn Equador Les Corts. L'Illa Shopping Centre is 7 minutes' walk away and Plaza España Square is 1.4 km away.

Entença Metro Station is only 550 metres from the accommodation, and a 15-minute metro ride takes you to the city centre. One of Barcelona's main train stations, Sants Estación, is a 10-minute walk from the property.

Name: Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona
Description:
This design hotel is right next to Plaza Catalunya in the centre of Barcelona. It has a rooftop garden terrace and offers free high-speed WiFi.

Set in a 19th-Century building, the hotel features modern, elegant décor. Its rooms include free tea and coffee, air conditioning, heating, and flat-screen satellite TV. The private bathrooms include luxury cosmetics. Some rooms have a private balcony.

A varied buffet breakfast with zero-kilometre and homemade products is served. Gluten-free breakfasts can be requested.

Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona has a gastronomic restaurant with a terrace, lobby bar and library. Around 100 live music sessions take place on the terrace throughout the year.

The 24-hour reception offers services such as bike and scooter rental, massages and personal training or yoga sessions.

The Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona has a Biosphere Responsible Tourism certificate.

Name: Hotel Casa Sagnier
Description:
Attractively located in Barcelona, Hotel Casa Sagnier features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a sauna. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.

At the hotel, rooms include a desk. The rooms include a private bathroom with free toiletries, while some rooms have a balcony and others also feature city views. All rooms at Hotel Casa Sagnier are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Passeig de Gracia, La Pedrera and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Hostal Sans
Description:
Set on Plaza de Sants, Hostal Sans is a 5-minute walk from Sants Railway Station and just over 1 km from Plaza de Espanya. It offers rooms with TVs, and a 24-hour reception.

Each simply decorated room at Hostal Sans has air conditioning and heating.

Free WiFi is available in public areas, where there are vending machines. Restaurants, bars and cafés can be found in the surrounding Sants district.

Las Ramblas and Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter can be reached in just 10 minutes by Metro. The nearest beaches are a 30-minute bus journey away.

Name: Brummell Apartments Gracia
Description:
Brummell Apartments Gracia features a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just less than 1 km of Passeig de Gracia and a 14-minute walk of La Pedrera. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The spacious apartment has 1 bedroom, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Sagrada Familia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Aspasios Catedral Apartments
Description:
Aspasios Catedral Apartments is centrally located, 2 minutes' walk from Barcelona Cathedral and 4 minutes from Plaza Catalunya. It offers free Wi-Fi and a small rooftop pool with a sun terrace and views of the cathedral.

The spacious, modern apartments feature wooden floors and have a living room with a sofa and Smart TV, with which you can use the internet and Skype. The well-equipped kitchenette includes a washing machine and dishwasher.
Set on the corner of Portal de l'Àngel, a popular shopping street, Catedral Bas Apartments's location means that many museums, shops and restaurants can be reached by foot. Las Ramblas and Passeig de Gràcia are a 5-minute walk away.

You can walk to the port in 10 minutes and the beach in 15 minutes. There is also a children's playground opposite.

Airport buses stop at nearby Plaça de Catalunya, where there are several Metro, railway and bus connections.

Name: Gran Via Terrace Barcelona
Description:
In the heart of Barcelona, set within a short distance of Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Plaça Catalunya, Gran Via Terrace Barcelona offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. This apartment offers accommodation with a terrace. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.2 km from Tivoli Theatre.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bath. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Boqueria Market and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Gran Via Terrace Barcelona.

Name: Luxury Born
Description:
Set in Barcelona, just 1.4 km from Somorrostro Beach, Luxury Born offers beachfront accommodation with free WiFi. The property is close to Plaça Reial, Passeig de Gracia and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The property is 1 km from the city centre and 1.3 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is offered. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sant Miquel Beach, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: NH Collection Barcelona Podium
Description:
NH Collection Barcelona Pódium offers stylish, modern accommodation in a quiet area of central Barcelona. It has free WiFi, a sauna, gym and roof terrace with swimming pool and city views.

Bedrooms at the hotel are spacious and air conditioned. They all have a choice of pillows, a minibar and satellite TV. Each room comes with a Barcelona city guidebook.

NH Collection Barcelona Pódium combines a 19th-Century façade with modern interior design. It is surrounded by other Modernist buildings in Barcelona’s Eixample district.

The hotel is set 800 metres from Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas, near the city’s Gothic Quarter. Ciutadella Park and the Olympic Port are also within walking distance.

The NH Collection Podium Hotel has good access to all parts of the city by public transport. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is just 200 metres from the hotel.

NH Collection Barcelona Pódium's restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine and there is also a lounge bar. A healthy breakfast is available in the mornings. The restaurant is closed during summer months.

Name: AC Hotel Sants by Marriott
Description:
AC Hotel Sants is located just 50 metres from Barcelona Sants Train Station. It offers 24-hour reception and modern, air-conditioned rooms with a satellite TV and free safe.

Each room features special reading lamps, 4 pillows and elegant furnishings. They come equipped with a desk and a minibar. Some rooms offer city views.

Free WiFi is available in the lobby and bar. The restaurant inside the property serves a breakfast buffet every morning.

AC Hotel Sants is around 500 metres from Plaça Espanya and Montjuic. Sants Station offers direct metro access to Plaça Catalunya and Las Ramblas, as well as direct access to El Prat Airport.

Name: Brummell Apartments Eixample Izquierda/Valeris
Description:
Located within less than 1 km of Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and a 12-minute walk of Plaça Catalunya, Brummell Apartments Eixample Izquierda/Valeris provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

Each unit is equipped with a balcony, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Portal de l'Angel and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Acta Splendid
Description:
Acta Splendid is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. It offers 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Staff at the Hotel Splendid’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. There is also a computer in the lobby that guests can use for free.

There is a public car park 450 metres from the hotel, around a 7-minute walk. You can walk to the Palau de la Música Catalana, a Modernist auditorium and UNESCO World Heritage Site, in 15 minutes.

Gluten-free breakfasts are available upon request.

Name: Bcn - Poble Nou
Description:
Bcn - Poble Nou is set in the Sant Martí district of Barcelona, 800 metres from Bogatell Beach, 1 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach and 2.5 km from Port Olimpic. The property is situated 3.4 km from Sagrada Familia, 3.7 km from Santa Maria del Mar and 3.9 km from Passeig de Gracia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Mar Bella Beach is 700 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 2 separate bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom. A TV is offered. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Picasso Museum is 3.9 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 4 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: BYPILLOW Twenty
Description:
This design hotel has an excellent location in a quiet side street only 20 metres from the famous Las Ramblas. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. The breakfast combo includes one orange juice, one coffee, one sandwich and one croissant (per person).

The BYPILLOW Twenty is set in the historic centre of Barcelona. It is a short walk from the Boquería Market, the Liceu theatre and the Cathedral.

All rooms at the BYPILLOW Twenty are fully soundproofed and air conditioned. They have flat-screen TV and a free safe.

The hotel rooms and public areas are totally smoke-free. The establishment has a ticket sales service and excursions.

We provide useful information about car or bicycle rental and tour desk.

Name: Housalia Sagrada Familia
Description:
Featuring free Wi-Fi and roof fans, there is NO AIR CONDITIONING.
It is on the first floor and there is NO LIFT.

Housalia Sagrada Familia is located within 5 minutes’ walk of Sagrada Familia and Plaza Gaudí Park. Set in Barcelona’s centre, these modern apartments offer a ticket service and tour desk.

Offering stylish and colourful décor, the apartments include a living-dining room with a flat-screen TV. The kitchenette is equipped with a washing machine and oven, and the bathroom comes with a bathtub. Towels as well as bed linen are provided.

Please check the excluded costs for cleaning fee and tourist tax: they are separate from the total rent amount, but clearly displayed before confirming the final payment. Housalia Sagrada Familia is centrally located and there is a wide range of shops, bars and Catalan restaurants within a 10-minute walk. Sagrada Familia and Sant Pau metro stations are within the same distance.

Arc de Triomf Train Station is 3 km from the property, as well as Port Olimpic and the Mediterranean beaches. Barcelona Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Grupotel Gran Via 678
Description:
The stylish Gran Via 678 is situated 700 metres from Plaza Catalunya in central Barcelona and features an outdoor pool with a sun terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

Modern rooms at this design hotel include satellite TV and a minibar. The private bathroom is complete with a hairdryer.

Grupotel Gran Via 678 offers a restaurant which serves Mediterranean and international cuisine. Guests can enjoy meals on the terrace.

Urquinaona Metro Station is 400 metres away while the Arc de Triomf monument is less than 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

Name: 21PER1020 - Cozy apartment in Vila de Gracia
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia and a 15-minute walk from La Pedrera, 21PER1020 - Cozy apartment in Vila de Gracia features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is set 2.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.8 km from Casa Batllo.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Tivoli Theatre is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.7 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Click&Flat Sugranyes
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.6 km from Sants Railway Station and 3.6 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Click&Flat Sugranyes offers air conditioning. It is situated 3.9 km from Palau Sant Jordi and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Camp Nou is 1.8 km away.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia is 4.7 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 4.8 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from Click&Flat Sugranyes.

Name: Hesperia Barcelona Presidente
Description:
Set on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue, the spacious rooms offer Chromecast, flat-screen TVs, Free Wi-Fi and air-conditioned. Tea&coffee facilities,  free water throughout the stay and sports kit on request. There is a gym and a terrace offering beautiful city views.

This hotel has views of the city.

The Hesperia Barcelona Presidente is close to a shopping area, and the main sightseeing bus stops just 50 metres from the hotel. The popular Illa shopping centre is 15 minutes’ walk away.

Diagonal Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk away, and offers a direct link to Plaza Catalunya. Gaudi’s La Pedrera and fashionable Passeig de Gracia can be reached in about 15 minutes on foot.

Name: 31PAR1008 - Mediterranean style apartment
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 700 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya, 31PAR1008 - Mediterranean style apartment features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is set 2.6 km from Portal de l'Angel and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The apartment has 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Sants Railway Station and Palau Sant Jordi. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Boutique Mirlo Barcelona
Description:
Hotel Boutique Mirlo Barcelona features a garden, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Barcelona. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. A spa and wellness centre comprising a sauna, an outdoor swimming pool, a hot tub, as well as a terrace can be used by all guests.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. All rooms are fitted with a kettle, while selected rooms will provide you with a patio and others also have city views. The units feature a wardrobe.

Hotel Boutique Mirlo Barcelona offers a buffet or à la carte breakfast.

Spa and wellness facilities are at guests' disposal during their stay at the accommodation, including a hammam and on-request massage treatments.

Park Güell is 2 km from Hotel Boutique Mirlo Barcelona, while Passeig de Gracia is 4 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km from the property.

Name: Blue Barcelona
Description:
