Featuring free WiFi, Blue Barcelona is located in the Gracia district of Barcelona. Set next to Gracia FGC Station, this bed and breakfast offers a shared lounge and tour desk.

Each air-conditioned room at the property has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, desk, and hardwood floors. Some rooms have a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries, and others have access to shared bathroom facilities.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and shops within a 5-minute walk of Blue Barcelona. There are vending machines available.

Fontana Metro Station is 300 metres from the property, Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas Boulevard are 2 metro stops away, and Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia is 2.3 km from the property.

Name: Hostal Muntaner
Description:
A 5-minute walk from Hospital Clinic Metro Station and Avinguda Diagonal, Hostal Muntaner features a 24-hour front desk and free Wi-Fi. You can reach central Barcelona, including Las Ramblas, in just 15 minutes by public transport.

Each bright room at Hostal Muntaner has simple décor. All rooms have heating, a flat-screen TV, and access to a shared or private bathroom. There is a fridge on each floor of the guest house.

Cafés and bars can be found in the streets surrounding the Muntaner. There are restaurants around Plaça Francesc Macià Square, 10 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Fuster Apartments by Aspasios
Description:
Fuster Apartments are just 150 metres from Diagonal Avenue and 15 minutes’ walk from Plaza de Catalunya. These stylish apartments are set in a Modernist building dating from 1905.

Fuster Apartments boast high ceilings and mosaic floors. Lounges include a plasma TV, DVD and CD player and sofa, while kitchens have a washing machine, dishwasher, oven and microwave. Some apartments also have balconies. Free Wi-Fi and air conditioning are included, and towels, bed linen and a hairdryer are provided.

There are several bars and restaurants within 5 minutes’ walk. Passeig de Gràcia, with its Gaudí buildings and exclusive shops, is 650 metres away.

The Sagrada Familia is 10 minutes’ walk from the Fuster Apartments. You can reach Ciutadella Park and Las Ramblas by foot in 20 minutes.

The properties are set 5 minutes’ walk from both Girona and Verdaguer Metro Stations. Nord Bus Station is 1.4 km away

Name: Alba Hotel
Description:
This hotel is set in the heart of the cosmopolitan city of Barcelona, just a short distance from Las Ramblas and within walking distance of attractions such as the Liceu opera house and Plaça Catalunya.

The Hotel Alba is located in Barcelona’s old town, and its beautiful façade is listed for its artistic interest. Inside, relax in a spacious en suite bedroom with balcony and air conditioning.

Stroll down the colourful Ramblas to the seafront, or enjoy cava and tapas in the famous Boqueria food market. Just a short walk away, the narrow streets of the Gothic Quarter are full of shops, bars and restaurants.

The Alba boasts convenient public transport links, with Liceu metro station only 300 metres away. From here you can travel quickly and conveniently to attractions including the Fira de Barcelona and Gaudi’s incredible Parc Güell.

Name: Casa Gracia
Description:
Casa Gràcia is a modern hostel at the top of Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia, 300 metres from Gaudí’s La Pedrera. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free Wi-Fi in all areas.

Shared and private rooms are available, as well as apartments. Facilities at Casa Gràcia include a communal terrace, lounge, kitchen, dining area and a 24-hour front desk.

The hostel arranges daily walking tours of the city.

Casa Gràcia is situated just metres from Avinguda Diagonal and within 300 metres of Diagonal Metro Station, which offers access to the Sagrada Familia.

Passeig de Gràcia is full of exclusive shops, restaurants and bars. Gaudí’s Casa Batlló is within a 10-minute walk,  as well as the popular Gràcia neighbourhood. There are a number of beautiful Modernist buildings in the area.

Name: Aspasios Urquinaona Apartments
Description:
Aspasios Urquinaona Apartments is in a quiet area of Barcelona’s Eixample district, only 5 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya and Arc de Triomf. Each bright apartment has free Wi-Fi.

The Urquinaona Design Apartments have elegant, modern design. They are air-conditioned and bright, with an open-plan living area with flat-screen TV and kitchen.

The kitchen includes an oven, a Nespresso coffee maker and a juicer. There is also a dishwasher, a washing machine and a tumble dryer.

All apartments have access to the furnished roof terrace.

The apartments are just a short walk from the historic city centre. Ciutadella Park, the Cathedral and the Picasso Museum are all nearby. Urquinaona Metro Station is only 300 metres away.

Name: El balcón de Sagrada Familia
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.7 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 3 km from Somorrostro Beach, El balcón de Sagrada Familia offers air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is located 300 metres from Sagrada Familia.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia and La Pedrera. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from El balcón de Sagrada Familia.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Calabria
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 2 km from Casa Batllo and 2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Stay U-nique Apartments Calabria offers air conditioning. It is located 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is 1.1 km away.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Plaça Catalunya is 2.6 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Calabria, while La Pedrera is 1.7 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Senator Barcelona Apartments
Description:
The Senator Barcelona Apartments is situated on Via Augusta, in a pleasant residential area, a 2-minute walk from Muntaner Train Station. It includes air conditioning, heating, and free Wi-Fi in hotel rooms.

All apartments have a TV, telephone, and a private bathroom with a bathtub or a shower. The apartments also include an equipped with kitchenette.

A 6-minute train ride will take you to Plaza Cataluña and Barcelona city centre. Sagrada Familia Cathedral is 3.3 km away.

Name: Alguera Hola Apartments
Description:
Situated 1.7 km from Camp Nou and 1.4 km from Sants Railway Station, Alguera Hola Apartments in Barcelona features air-conditioned accommodation with views of the quiet street and free WiFi. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms.

Each unit features a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 2.7 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Alguera Hola Apartments.

Name: Aspasios Poble Nou Apartments
Description:
Located in the Sant Martí district of Barcelona, Aspasios Poble Nou Apartments provides accommodation with a rooftop pool, free WiFi, a lift and a tour desk. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.4 km from Bogatell Beach. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Nova Icaria Beach is 1.5 km from the apartment, while Mar Bella Beach is 1.5 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km from the property.

Name: Ola Living Music
Description:
Next to the modernistic Palau de la Música Catalana, Ola Living Music offers air-conditioned apartments with free safe and free Wi-Fi. Apartments are 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas.

Featuring vaulted ceiling and traditional Catalan tiles, these apartments come with modern and functional furniture. They all have a fully equipped kitchenette including a microwave, and a washing machine, clothes dryer and iron facilities are also provided.

You can find some of the trendiest bars around beautiful Sant Pere Square and have fresh produce at Santa Caterina Market, just 350 metres away. There is also a plenty of shops and supermarkets open till late in the surrounding area.

Located in the Borne District of Barcelona, Ola Living Music is 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Cathedral. The closest metro station is Urquinaona, just 300 metres away.

Name: RAMBLA BEACH Barcelonastuff Apartments
Description:
Featuring free Wi-Fi, RAMBLA BEACH Barcelonastuff Apartments are located in different locations around Barcelona’s Poblenou district, within a 5-minute walk of the beach. The spacious apartments offer stylish décor and some apartments have the air-conditioning coming from the living room

Each bright apartment features a living room with a flat-screen TV and DVD player. The well-equipped kitchen includes an oven and washing machine. Each apartment has 2 bathrooms and most apartments also offer a private balcony.

You can find a wide range of restaurants and tapas bars in the neighbouring streets, including on the popular Rambla de Poblenou Avenue.

RAMBLA BEACH Barcelonastuff Apartments offers an airport shuttle service on request and for an extra cost. Staff can also arrange bicycle rental and babysitting services, as well as tickets to FC Barcelona games.

Poblenou Metro Station is 450 metres from the apartments, connecting you with Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas in under 15 minutes.

Name: P2VIL1042 Modern & Cozy Apartment Poble Sec
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.7 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 2.8 km from Barceloneta Beach, P2VIL1042 Modern & Cozy Apartment Poble Sec offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 1.9 km from Picasso Museum and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.7 km from Santa Maria del Mar.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Absolute Sagrada Familia
Description:
Offering a full-on front view of the Sagrada Familia's nativity façade, Absolute Sagrada Familia is located in Barcelona. The property offers air-conditioned and heated apartments with free WiFi and access to a large panoramic shared terrace.

Featuring wooden floors, each 2-bedroom apartment has a living room with 2 sofas and a wide flat-screen TV. A washing machine, oven and microwave are included in the kitchen. The bathroom comes with a hairdryer and a shower or bathtub.

The shared terrace is furnished with tables, chairs, deck chairs and parasols. Absolute Sagrada Familia offers daily front desk assistance from 09:00 to 20:00.

A wide variety of supermarkets and shops can be found in the area. The apartments' bar restaurant, El Tastet de l´Artur, offers breakfast and Spanish cuisine. Sagrada Familia Metro Station, 100 metres from the apartments, offers fast connection to the historic centre, beaches and FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.

Name: Apartamentos Tarradellas Sants Estació
Description:
Apartamentos Tarradellas Sants Estació offers air-conditioned apartments and studios in a same building in the Sants District. The accommodation is 280 metres from Entença Metro Station, and free Wi-Fi is provided.

Both apartments and studios have a living-dining room with a flat-screen TV; and a kitchenette with a microwave, a fridge, and kitchenware. There is a washing machine, and bed linen and towels are provided.

Numerous bars, restaurants as well as supermarkets and the Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre can be found within 13 minutes’ walk.

Apartamentos Tarradellas Sants Estació is well connected to Barcelona City Centre by public transports. You can reach Plaza Catalunya in 15 minutes by metro; while Plaza d’Espanya is 1 km away.

Name: Apartment Eixample Dret Sagrada Familia by Interhome
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 500 metres from Sagrada Familia and 2.3 km from Casa Batllo, Apartment Eixample Dret Sagrada Familia by Interhome offers air conditioning. This 3-star apartment offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km away.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

La Pedrera is 2 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.8 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Gracia Apartment
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 100 metres from Passeig de Gracia and 600 metres from La Pedrera, Gracia Apartment offers free WiFi and air conditioning. The property is around 2.1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 1.8 km from Plaça Catalunya and 2 km from Portal de l'Angel. Sagrada Familia is 2 km away and Park Güell is 3.1 km from the apartment.

This apartment features 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with an a bath or shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Sightseeing tours are available around the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 15 km from Gracia Apartment, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Nobu Hotel Barcelona
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 400 metres from Sants Railway Station, Nobu Hotel Barcelona features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers a concierge service, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests.

The rooms at the hotel have air conditioning and a safety deposit box.

Nobu Hotel Barcelona offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.4 km from the accommodation, while Casa Batllo is 2.7 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: DestinationBCN Universitat Apartments
Description:
These apartments are located 5 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya. DestinationBCN Apartment Suites in Barcelona offers air-conditioned apartments featuring designer furniture and fully-equipped kitchens.

Each apartment has its own individual identity and striking original feature in combination with a stylish décor. Some have bay windows and private furnished terraces. All of the apartments feature free Wi-Fi and Swiss-made mattress.

Their kitchens include an oven and dishwasher, and are stocked with herbs, spices and coffee. In the lounge there are sofas, flat-screen satellite TV  Some of the bathrooms feature rain showers or bath tubs.

Their location in the centre of Barcelona makes reaching all corners of the city very easy. The nearby Gothic and Raval districts are full of shops, restaurants and bars of all types.

Name: Casp 74 Apartments
Description:
Located in the elegant Eixample district, these modern and stylish apartments are just 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. They feature a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi.

Casp 74 Apartments all include a kitchen with a dishwasher, fridge and microwave. They also feature a seating area and air conditioning.

The tour desk at Casp 74 can provide useful information on Barcelona and help to organise excursions. Bike and car rental can be arranged for guests.

Paseo de Gracia Boulevard is 10 minutes’ walk from the apartments, and has many chic restaurants and shops. Tetuan Metro Station is 200 metres away.

Name: B-Garden BCN
Description:
BGarden BCN is a small and cozy guest-house which offers a personalized service.
Housed in a Art Nouveau building and placed in one of the best locations in Barcelona for travelers, our goal is to make guests feel at home.

It is 10 min by foot to Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, Plaça Catalunya, Las Ramblas and Arc de Triumf. You can find all kind of shops, restaurants and bars nearby.
As you were in a typical Spanish 1900’s house with authentical vitreaux and high ceilings, B-Garden BCN offers rooms with private balcony and most of them have private and renovated bathrooms.
All the rooms at B-Garden BCN feature tiled floors and stylish dècor, with a mix of antique and modern mobiliary. We offer flat-screen Smart T.V, free Wi-Fi connection and a varied buffet breakfast.
Barcelona’s charming Born district is just 7 minutes’ walk from B-Garden BCN. Here you can find the Palau de la Música Catalana and a Modernist Auditorium.
Tetuán metro station is only 100 metres away and it connects you with the rest of the city, as well as all the buses options in Gran Via de les corts catalanes avenue, just round the corner.

Name: SANT ANTONI HOSTAL, Sustainable Tourism
Description:
Situated conveniently in Barcelona, SANT ANTONI HOSTAL, Sustainable Tourism offers a continental breakfast and free WiFi. This 1-star guest house offers a lift and a shared kitchen. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The units come with air conditioning, a microwave, a fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. At the guest house, the units are fitted with a private bathroom and bed linen.

A bicycle rental service is available at the guest house.

Popular points of interest near SANT ANTONI HOSTAL, Sustainable Tourism include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Aparthotel Atenea Barcelona
Description:
This modern aparthotel is located just off Diagonal Avenue, 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium. It offers large rooms with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a kitchen.

The elegant rooms at Aparthotel Atenea Barcelona are equipped with carpeted floors and air conditioning. Each one has a seating area with a sofa, as well as a kitchen with a fridge and 2 electric hobs.

The hotel’s restaurant offers a breakfast-to-go box for a surcharge, and serves healthy food for lunch and dinner. There is also a lounge bar, where guests can relax while having a glass of cava or a soft drink.

Les Corts Metro Station is just a 3 minutes’ walk away. Sants Train Station is only 2 Metro stops from Atenea. Barcelona’s main tourist attractions can be reached within 15 minutes by Metro.

Name: Duquesa de Cardona Hotel 4 Sup by Grup Duquessa
Description:
The 19th-century Duquesa de Cardona Hotel 4 Sup by Grup Duquessa, opposite Barcelona’s marina in the Gothic Quarter, is 600 metres from the Ramblas and has free Wi-Fi. Its rooftop terrace offers panoramic city views and includes 2 plunge pools and a bar. Property also features a Gym.

Duquesa de Cardona has spacious, air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen satellite TV, a safety deposit box and a minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bathrobe and slippers.

The hotel’s restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine. During summer, the snack bar serves creative tapas, BBQ dishes and cocktails.

The famous Sagrada Familia is 2.5 km away, and Barceloneta Metro Station is only 300 metres away. The Maremagnum Shopping Centre and Barcelona Aquarium are 500 metres from Duquesa de Cardona Hotel 4 Sup by Grup Duquessa.

Name: Factory Suites Barcelona
Description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Factory Suites Barcelona offers pet-friendly accommodation in Barcelona. Sagrada Familia is 700 metres from the property.

Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer.

You will find a shared lounge at the property. The property offers vegetarian breakfast.

Casa Batllo is 600 metres from Factory Suites Barcelona, while La Pedrera is 600 metres from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Hotel Best 4 Barcelona
Description:
This stylish hotel offers a gym and free Wi-Fi. It is set on a quiet street just 6 minutes’ walk from Bogatell Beach and 300 metres from Llacuna Metro Station.

The bright, air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel 4 Barcelona hotel are modern and elegant, with wooden floors. All have flat-screen satellite TV, and some have views of the sea or city.

The Hotel 4 Barcelona’s restaurant offers Mediterranean dishes, and there is also a stylish bar. The surrounding area has several popular restaurants and bars.

The hotel offers a sauna and steam baths, available for an extra cost. The gym is available for an extra cost, and massage can be arranged. It also has a 24-hour reception with bicycle rental

Hotel 4 is set in the 22@ Technological District, 1 km from Ciutadella Park and 600 metres from the Olympic Port.

Name: Citytrip Poble Nou Beach
Description:
Charming apartment for two people in the lively Poble Nou neighborhood of Barcelona, ​​near the Olympic Village. It is located approximately 10 minutes walk from one of the best beaches in the city.

Poble Nou is a typical and quiet neighborhood, with picturesque streets full of cozy places to eat, drink and immerse yourself in Barcelona life.

The apartment is located in a building inhabited by both locals and tourists. It is modern, with an open kitchen and a living room. The kitchen is fully equipped. It has a bedroom with a double bed and a bathroom with a shower. The living room has a sofa bed, air conditioning and TV.

In addition, the apartment offers Wi-Fi connection and a balcony with beautiful views of the city. In short, it is fully equipped to enjoy a wonderful vacation.

It is important to note that the apartment is on the third floor and the building does not have an elevator.

Name: Gran Hotel Barcino
Description:
Surrounded by the fascinating streets of the Gothic Quarter, this elegant hotel is located right at Barcelona’s historic heart – just a short walk from the cathedral and Las Ramblas.

The Gran Hotel Barcino is set in a street which runs off the magnificent square of Sant Jaume, home to both the Catalonian government and the city council. The narrow streets which surround the hotel are full of fashionable shops, historic sites and museums, such as the Picasso Museum.

See the city’s many sights then return for a good night’s sleep in your traditional-style room. The rooms feature marble floors and air conditioning.

Name: Free Hostels Barcelona
Description:
Offering free WiFi access, Free Hostels Barcelona is located in central Barcelona, 700 metres from Hospital Clinic Metro. Gaudi's La Pedrera Building is a 23-minute walk away.

Rooms here will provide you with memory foam mattresses, air conditioning, sockets, reading lights, lockers, and a safe. A shared bathroom with free toiletries is located inside the dormitory. Bed linen is included, and towels can be hired for a surcharge.

At Free Hostels Barcelona you will find a 24-hour front desk, a shared TV lounge and a shared kitchen. The property can provide a ticket service and a tour desk.

Camp Nou Stadium is a 30-minute walk from the property and La Rambla is a 25-minute metro ride away. Barceloneta Beach can be reached in 45 minutes on public transport.

Name: Ola Living Gaudi
Description:
In the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, close to Passeig de Gracia, Ola Living Gaudi features free WiFi and a washing machine. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Cathedral of Barcelona, Plaça Catalunya, and Santa Maria del Mar. The property is 500 metres from the city centre and 2.1 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Jardinets De Gràcia by The 5ve Soul
Description:
Featuring quiet street views, Jardinets De Gràcia by The 5ve Soul is located in the Gràcia district of Barcelona, less than 1 km from La Pedrera and a 15-minute walk from Casa Batllo. It is situated 400 metres from Passeig de Gracia and features a lift. Rooms are equipped with a terrace with city views and free WiFi.

All units in the apartment complex are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, slippers and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

For guests with children, the apartment provides a baby safety gate.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.6 km from Jardinets De Gràcia by The 5ve Soul, while Tivoli Theatre is 1.9 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Ikonik Anglí
Description:
Situated in the charming residential district of Sarrià, this elegant design hotel offers an outdoor pool and garden area, overlooking Tibidabo Mountain. Free Wi-Fi is available.

The Ikonik Anglí’s spacious rooms have a minimalist design and large windows, which provide plenty of natural light. Each air-conditioned room includes a flat-screen TV and a modern bathroom with a range of amenities.

Guests can enjoy a daily breakfast in the Angli’s stylish breakfast room. The Sarrià district is known for its wonderful cake shops, and there are also many popular bars within a 5-minute walk. The hotel also offers meeting rooms for events.

Sarrià FGC Train Station is 600 metres from the Ikonik Anglí, and offers direct services to Barcelona city centre. Plaza Catalunya Square is just a 10-minute train ride away. The nearest airport is Barcelona Airport, 15 minutes drive away from the hotel.

Name: Garbi Millenni
Description:
Hotel Millenni is a boutique hotel set 50 metres from Paral.lel Metro Station. It features a small roof terrace with a hot tub and impressive city views. All rooms are stylish and offer free Wi-Fi.

Accommodation at the Millenni is brightly decorated. The climate-controlled rooms feature satellite TV and a fully equipped bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served daily and there are several traditional bars and restaurants in the surrounding Raval district.

Guests can have access to the gym, the hot tub and the sauna. There are 2 computers which have internet access, as well as a small library with daily newspapers. There is also a lounge area where guests can watch the TV.

The famous Las Ramblas are just 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. The funicular train to Montjuïc Castle leaves from the nearby Metro station.

Name: Ferienwohnung für 3 Personen ca 40 qm in Barcelona-Gràcia, Costa Brava Costa del Maresme - b62772
Description:
Ferienwohnung für 3 Personen ca 40 qm in Barcelona-Gràcia, Costa Brava Costa del Maresme - b62772 features a balcony and is set in Barcelona, within just 200 metres of Passeig de Gracia and 400 metres of La Pedrera. The property is close to Palau de la Musica Catalana, Plaça Catalunya and Sagrada Familia. Portal de l'Angel is 1.8 km from the apartment and Park Güell is 3.6 km away.

With free WiFi, this apartment offers a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven and microwave.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Sants Estación acogedor apartamento en Exiample
Description:
A recently renovated property, Sants Estación acogedor apartamento en Exiample is situated in Barcelona near Sants Railway Station, Casa Batllo and Magic Fountain of Montjuic. Featuring mountain and pool views, this apartment also includes free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property offers city views.

Barbecue facilities are provided.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Sants Estación acogedor apartamento en Exiample.

Name: Tendency Apartments 6
Description:
Situated in central Barcelona, a 2-minute walk from Girona Metro Station, Tendency Apartments 6 offers accommodation with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and heating. Sagrada Familia Cathedral is a 17-minute walk away.

All apartments have a living area with a flat-screen TV, DVD player, and dining table. The private kitchen is equipped with a hob, microwave, and fridge. Kitchenware is provided in all apartments and some of them have a washing machine and dishwasher.

The apartments include modern furnishings and many of them have a small balcony with views of the city. Each apartment has a private bathroom with a bathtub or a shower, and towels and bed linen are provided. A cot is available upon request.

There are bars and restaurant within a 10-minute walk of the apartments, and a 24-hour grocery shop is just around the corner. Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, famous for its high-end boutiques and Gaudì’s buildings, can be reached in 7 minutes on foot.

Name: Hotel SERHS Rivoli Rambla
Description:
Situated on the famous Ramblas, Hotel SERHS Rivoli Rambla has a beautiful interior courtyard and a terrace from where you can enjoy views over the Gothic Quarter while you sip an espresso.

 Return here for lunch and enjoy views over the urban gardens which date back to the Romantic era.

The Hotel SERHS Rivoli Rambla is a celebration of the Art Deco style which has become a signature of this Catalan city. Enjoy theatrical interiors which combine classic style with avant garde features such as clever lighting and contemporary furniture. Sit in the interior patio of the Rivoli Ramblas where you can enjoy the cool surroundings and murals painted on the walls.

The 128 Rambla Restaurant serves a wide selection of Mediterranean and international cuisine. The varied and appealing buffet breakfast is a great way to help prepare you for the day ahead.

Name: LetsGo Paseo de Gracia
Description:
Apartament Paseo de Gracia offers self-catering accommodation with free Wi-Fi in the heart of Barcelona, just 40 metres from Plaza Catalunya. Barcelona’s La Rambla is 5 minutes’ walk away.

These modern apartments feature stylish dècor and come with 1 or 2 bedrooms and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Their living areas include flat-screen satellite TV and sofas. Their kitchenettes are equipped with a microwave, washing machine and dishwasher.  Some come with a terrace.

Centrally located, you will find many bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets.

Direct buses to Barcelona Airport depart from Plaza Catalunya and Sagrada Familia is 2.5 km from Apartament Paseo de Gracia. A 25-minute walk will take you to Barceloneta Beach.

Name: Hostal Rio De Castro
Description:
Hostal Rio De Castro offers free WiFi and is centrally located on Barcelona’s Parallel Avenue, next to Poble Sec Metro Station. It is 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Espanya’s Magic Fountain.

All air-conditioned rooms feature flat-screen TV and tiled floors. Each has a work desk and some have a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities.

There is a communal area with a TV lounge, microwave and coffee maker. Many shops, bars and restaurants can be found in the immediate area.

Luggage storage is offered at the Rio de Castro. You can walk to the Rambla in 15 minutes through the Raval district.

Name: Bonavista Apartments - Passeig de Gracia
Description:
Located near the exclusive shopping avenue of Passeig de Gracia, these stylish apartments feature modern design, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi.

The Bonavista Apartments - Passeig de Gracia feature attractive wooden floors, plenty of natural light and contemporary furniture and artwork. Bed linen and towels are provided.

The well-equipped apartments feature spacious dining rooms and kitchens equipped with an oven, dishwasher and washing machine.

Nearby, in the Gracia District, there are many trendy bars and pleasant squares. Gaudí's La Pedrera and Casa Batlló can be visited on Passeig de Gracia.

Name: Casa Valeta
Description:
Set 5 minutes’ walk from Diagonal Metro Station, Casa Valeta is located in the heart of Barcelona. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi, a 10-minute walk from Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia.

The stylish apartments feature a flat-screen TV with international channels, and modernist décor, each one with a different style. All apartmets have a kitchen or kitchenette with a dishwasher and oven. There is a furnished balcony or patio.

Casa Valeta is 10 minutes’ walk from a wide variety of shops, lively bars and Catalan restaurants. La Barceloneta Beach is 5 stops by metro. Plaza Catalunya and the old town are within a 20-minute walk. Barcelona Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Flateli Pelayo 3
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Plaça Catalunya, Flateli Pelayo 3 has free WiFi and a washing machine. With city views, this accommodation offers a balcony. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 2.9 km from Sant Sebastian Beach.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Boqueria Market and Passeig de Gracia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Liceu Apartments by Gaiarooms
Description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, 2.4 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Liceu Apartments by Gaiarooms offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is located 200 metres from Boqueria Market and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.5 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. The unit at the property features a shower and a dressing room. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and is protected by full-day security.

Sightseeing tours are available close to the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Sant Antoni 4 · Downtown Barcelona. Modern
Description:
Situated in the centre of Barcelona, 1.3 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.3 km from Portal de l'Angel, Sant Antoni 4 · Downtown Barcelona. Modern offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is set 1.6 km from Tivoli Theatre and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station.

The 1-bedroom apartment features a living room with a TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

There is a supermarket within the vicinity of the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Sant Antoni 4 · Downtown Barcelona. Modern include Passeig de Gracia, Boqueria Market and Magic Fountain of Montjuic. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Espais Blaus Apartments
Description:
Just 400 metres from Joanic Metro Station, these stylish apartments offer free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a kitchenette with a washer-dryer, oven and dishwasher. The building features a rooftop sun terrace.

Each bright, air-conditioned apartment has a spacious living-dining area with a sofa bed. All of them have a modern bathroom with a hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided.

There is a small supermarket directly below the apartments, and L’Abaceria Central food market is just 250 metres away. You can find many shops, bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk.

Espais Blaus Apartments are situated in a quiet area of the popular Gràcia district. Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Gaudi’s La Pedrera are just a 15-minute walk away.

Name: 31ENT1027 - Mediterranean decorated apartment
Description:
Set in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Sants Railway Station and a 17-minute walk from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, 31ENT1027 - Mediterranean decorated apartment offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 2.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.1 km from Casa Batllo.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.5 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.6 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: The One Barcelona GL
Description:
The One Barcelona GL has a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The property is 1.2 km from the city centre and 200 metres from La Pedrera.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms are fitted with a kettle, while some rooms also boast a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and a microwave. At The One Barcelona GL all rooms come with bed linen and towels.

A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

At the accommodation guests will find facilities including a sauna and a spa and wellness centre.

Speaking Arabic, Catalan, Czech and German at the reception, staff are always on hand to help.

Popular points of interest near The One Barcelona GL include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Hotel Àmbit Barcelona
Description:
Located 400 metres from Barcelona’s Plaça Catalunya, Hotel Àmbit Barcelona offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Urquinaona Metro Station is a 3-minute walk away.

Every room is fitted with a flat-screen TV, minibar and private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a terrace or balcony.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property, where staff can help with bike hire, car hire and tourist information. Free coffee is available 24 hours on the first floor.

The shopping street, Portal de l'Angel, is 500 metres from Hotel Àmbit Barcelona, while Barcelona Cathedral is 800 metres away. There are many restaurants in the area.

Name: Inside Barcelona Apartments Mercat
Description:
Situated next to Ciutadella Park, Inside Barcelona Apartments Mercat are a 15-minute walk from Las Ramblas and a 15-minute stroll from the city’s beaches. Barceloneta and Jaume I Metro Stations are both 650 metres away.

Each Inside Barcelona Apartments Mercat apartment has wooden flooring and elegant, functional design. They all include a kitchen with an oven, dishwasher, washer-dryer and n´espresso machine.

The streets around the Apartments Mercat are full of shops and bars, while the popular seafood restaurants of Barceloneta are just a 10-minute walk away.

Inside Barcelona Apartments Mercat are a 15-minute walk from Las Ramblas and a 15-minute stroll from the city’s beaches. Barceloneta and Jaume I Metro Stations are both 650 metres away.

Staff at reception can help organice your trip to Barcelona.

Name: Ako Suites Hotel
Description:
Ako Suites Hotel offers stylish apartments with free Wi-Fi and modern kitchenettes. It is located a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya Square.

The Ako Suites have a sleek minimalist design and are decorated in light colours. A flat-screen TV and a double sofa bed can be found in each air-conditioned apartment.

Kitchenettes include a ceramic hob and a microwave. The elegant bathrooms have a bath or shower. Towels and amenities are also provided.

Ako Suites Hotel is located just 300 metres from Universitat Metro Station and a 5-minute walk from an airport bus stop. Staff at the 24-hour reception is happy to provide information about the city.

Name: Hotel Balmoral
Description:
Hotel Balmoral is within 5 minutes' walk of Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station and Passeig de Gràcia boulevard. This boutique hotel offers free access to its wellness area and free Wi-Fi.

Each modern, air-conditioned room at the Balmoral Hotel Barcelona features elegant, functional design. All rooms come with a flat-screen TV and a minibar.

The hotel has a small wellness area with a sauna, experience shower and fitness machines. It also includes massage cabins and a sun terrace.

Guests receive a free welcome drink between 12:00 and 18:00. You can enjoy a drink in the hotel’s bar, or try bars and restaurants in the popular Gràcia district, a 5-minute walk away. In the morning, a breakfast buffet is served in the hotel.

Hotel Balmoral Barcelona has a TV lounge where you can enjoy sports events on the big screen. There are also 2 computers with internet access.

Gaudí's famous La Pedrera is just a 5-minute walk from the hotel, and the iconic Sagrada Família is 2 km away. Nearby bus and metro connections offer direct access to Plaça Catalunya, the historic city centre and to FC Barcelona's Camp Nou Stadium. Private parking is available in the hotel at an extra cost.

Name: 51PAR1011 Nice apartment in Parallel
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 700 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya, 51PAR1011 Nice apartment in Parallel offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 2.6 km from Portal de l'Angel and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The apartment features 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Sants Railway Station and Palau Sant Jordi. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Bcn Paseo De Gracia Rocamora Apartment
Description:
Bcn Paseo De Gracia Rocamora Apartment has three different addresses: In Paseo de Gracia 51 there are several apartments with two and three bedrooms; Pau Claris street 97 is a 3-bedroom penthouse with a terrace and Caspe street 30 is a 2-bedroom penthouse with a terrace.

The three buildings are very close together and offer modern apartments with free Wi-Fi and a private balcony or terrace.

Air-conditioned and heated, the apartments include a living area with a flat-screen TV and DVD player. Each has a modern kitchen, equipped with an oven, dishwasher, and washing machine.

Bcn Paseo De Gracia Rocamora Apartment also includes a private bathroom with a bath or a shower. Hairdryer, towels and bed linen are provided.

Centrally located, the apartments are within a 10-minute of Las Ramblas, and La Pedrera in around 10 minutes away on foot. Regular airport train leaves from Passeig de Gracia Train Station, located within 200 metres of the apartments.

Name: Best House Best Place
Description:
Situated in central Barcelona, a 3-minute walk from Jaume I Metro Station, Best House Best Place offers apartments with air conditioning, heating, and free WiFi.

These modern apartments include a living area with a flat-screen TV. The adjoining kitchen is equipped with an oven, dishwasher, and washing machine. Some apartments have a small balcony.

Each apartment has a private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are provided.

The property is situated in the lively Borne area, famous for its restaurants, bars, and artisan shops. La Rambla is 900 metres away and a 15-minute walk takes you to Barceloneta Beach.

Name: Aparthotel Napols - Abapart
Description:
Aparthotel Napols is centrally located, 350 metres from Barcelona’s Arc de Triomf Metro Station. Air-conditioned rooms feature a well-equipped kitchen, and a living room with sofa and TV.

Estació de Nord Bus Station is 5 minutes’ walk away, and has direct connections to Girona Airport. You can walk to Plaza Catalunya and the Rambla in 15 minutes. There is free WiFi in the apartments.

Soundproofed rooms at the Napols have a safe and minibar. The private bathroom comes with amenities.

The modern kitchen has a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. There is a dishwasher and dining area.

The complex has a 24-hour reception and a shared terrace. You can hire a car, and Napols offers a laundry service and luggage storage.

Name: SUN RAMBLA CATALUNYA GAUDI Limpieza Desinfección
Description:
Offering free WiFi and garden views, SUN RAMBLA CATALUNYA GAUDI Limpieza Desinfección is an accommodation located in the centre of Barcelona, just 200 metres from Passeig de Gracia and 500 metres from Casa Batllo. It is situated less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 300 metres from La Pedrera.

This air-conditioned apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a living room. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Plaça Catalunya and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Bonavista Apartments - Virreina
Description:
These elegant, fully-equipped apartments are located in a new building just 4 minutes’ walk from Fontana metro station. They have a roof terrace with views over the Gracia neighbourhood and free Wi-fi.

Bonavista’s air-conditioned apartments have floor-to-ceiling windows and a modern décor with stone flooring and a neutral colour scheme. The kitchen features a vitroceramic hob, oven, dishwasher and toaster. The bathroom has a shower and includes a heated towel rail and hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided.

There are 2 food markets within less than 10 minutes’ walk of Bonavista Apartments. Visitors will also find many shops, bars, cafés and restaurants in Gracia.

Gaudí’s famous creations, such as Parc Güell, Sagrada Família, and La Pedrera are all within less than 20 minutes’ walk of the apartments. The number 39 bus to Barceloneta beach stops on Gran de Gracia, about 5 minutes’ walk away. Private parking is available upon request and at an additional cost.

Name: Lumine Luxury Suites by Gaiarooms
Description:
Situated in the centre of Barcelona, less than 1 km from Casa Batllo and a 16-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya, Lumine Luxury Suites by Gaiarooms offers free WiFi and air conditioning. The property has inner courtyard views and is 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 400 metres from Passeig de Gracia. The accommodation features a lift, a housekeeping service and organising tours for guests.

The guest house offers a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, free toiletries and shower. At the guest house, all units are allergy-free and soundproof. At the guest house, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Tivoli Theatre, La Pedrera and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Room Mate Anna
Description:
Featuring a seasonal rooftop plunge pool with views and a solarium, Room Mate Anna is set in Barcelona City Centre. The hotel features cutting-edge and modern design as well as personalized service. The hotel serves a daily hot and cold buffet breakfast until midday.

Each stylish, air-conditioned room comes with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day as well as a balcony with views over Casa Batlló. Extras include a wide variety of free toiletries, a hairdryer and safe box.

Other facilities include a portable WiFi and meeting and conference rooms.

On the eigth floor of the hotel the bar Terraza de Anna by Vida Mona offers views over the city, cocktails and mediterranean tapas.
 The restaurant Vibra Speakeasy, inspired by the style of 1920, offers live music, food and cocktails from that time.

The Room Mate Anna is set in the heart of L'Eixample, just 100 metres from Casa Batlló. You will find a wide range of shops, restaurants, and cultural spots. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Mayerling Bisbe Urquinaona
Description:
Mayerling Bisbe Urquinaona offers free WiFi and minimalist decor, set in the heart of Barcelona. Plaça Catalunya is 5 minutes' walk away.

Accessed by a flight of stairs, apartments come with air conditioning, heating and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. They all include kitchens equipped with a dishwasher, kettle, microwave and coffee machine.

You will find many restaurants, supermarkets and shops in the surrounding streets.

Barcelona La Rambla is a 5-minute walk from Mayerling Bisbe Urquinaona and the popular Passeig de Gracia with its shops is 500 metres away. Barcelona Airport is 30 minutes' bus drive away from Plaça Catalunya.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Radas
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Radas features a balcony and is set in Barcelona, within just 1.7 km of Boqueria Market and 1.4 km of Palau Sant Jordi. It is located 2.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Portal de l'Angel is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.7 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Casa Pince
Description:
Boasting a terrace, a restaurant as well as a bar, Casa Pince is situated in the centre of Barcelona, 2 km from Sant Miquel Beach. This 3-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms come with a kettle, while selected rooms also feature a balcony and others also feature city views. All rooms have a wardrobe.

An à la carte, continental or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Popular points of interest near Casa Pince include Plaça Reial, Plaça Catalunya and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Alojamiento Gran Vi
Description:
Alojamiento Gran Vi is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, less than 1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, a 17-minute walk from Sants Railway Station and 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is around 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya, 2.6 km from Casa Batllo and 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia. The accommodation provides a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

The units are equipped with air conditioning, a microwave, a toaster, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. Each unit is equipped with a kettle and a shared bathroom, while certain rooms include a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Portal de l'Angel is 2.6 km from the bed and breakfast, while Boqueria Market is 2.8 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Alcam Flassaders
Description:
In the centre of Barcelona, located within a short distance of Somorrostro Beach and Barceloneta Beach, Alcam Flassaders offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. The property is set 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia, less than 1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and a 15-minute walk from Tivoli Theatre. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

This apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Picasso Museum, Santa Maria del Mar and Plaça Reial. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Room Mate Pau
Description:
Room Mate Pau is set 50 metres from the emblematic Plaza Catalunya. It offers a stylish décor and a terrace and bright, contemporary rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at Room Mate Pau feature chic decor and air conditioning. All include a plasma TV with USB port for laptop connection, a minibar, safe and a modern private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served daily, which you can enjoy at the property's shared terrace. Events can be catered for and various bars, restaurants and shops are within 2 minutes’ walk.

Other facilities include meeting and conference rooms.

Room Mate Pau is 2 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas and Passeig de Gracia, with its exclusive shops and Gaudí monuments. Urquinaona Metro station is 150 metres away, 2 stops from Barceloneta and its beach.

The hotel can help book tickets and activities and is 250 metres from Catalunya Metro and FGC Train Station.

Name: Modernist apartment in the best location
Description:
Right in the centre of Barcelona, set within a short distance of Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Casa Batllo, Modernist apartment in the best location offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. It is located 1.2 km from La Pedrera and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property offers inner courtyard views.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach of the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Cathedral of Barcelona. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Rambla Catalunya
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Rambla Catalunya offers air-conditioned apartments in Barcelona with 1 or 2 bedrooms. They are all around 400 metres from Passeig de Gracia Station and 500 metres from La Pedrera. Free WiFi access is available.

Each apartment has a living room with a flat-screen satellite TV. There is a full kitchen with a washing machine, fridge, microwave and coffee maker. The private bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are provided. Some apartments have a balcony.

Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas are a 5-minute walk from the apartments. An airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge.

Name: Chi
Description:
Located in Barcelona’s Eixample District, beside Rocafort Metro Station and 15 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya,  Chi Hotel offers rooms with air-conditioning and heating (depending on the season) and free WiFi.

The modern rooms include a flat-screen TV, minibar, safe and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Staff can help with tourist information and car hire.

You will find many shops, restaurants and bars in the surrounding area.

Name: Cosmopolitan
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.8 km from Plaça Catalunya, Cosmopolitan provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is around 1.6 km from Cathedral of Barcelona, 1.5 km from Montjuïc and 1.1 km from Plaça Reial. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.9 km from Santa Maria del Mar.

This apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, a kitchenette with a microwave and a toaster, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Apartment Gracia Torrijos by Interhome
Description:
Apartment Gracia Torrijos by Interhome is situated in the Gràcia district of Barcelona, 1.6 km from Casa Batllo, 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 2.2 km from Tivoli Theatre. The 3-star apartment is 1.1 km from La Pedrera. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 700 metres away.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Catalunya
Description:
Hotel Catalunya offers free Wi-Fi and is centrally located in Barcelona’s Gothic centre, just off La Rambla, 50 metres from Plaça Catalunya. It offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV.

All rooms at the Catalunya come with a fridge and a safe. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer. Breakfast is served in a café 25 metres from the hotel.

Barcelona Cathedral is just a 5-minute walk from Catalunya Hotel. The famous Gaudi buildings of Passeig de Gracia are only 500 metres away.

The hotel is near Plaça Catalunya Train and Metro Station. The airport and sightseeing buses also stop in this central square.

Hotel Catalunya’s tour desk can provide recommendations and book tickets. Car hire is available, and the 24-hour reception offers express check-out and luggage storage.

Name: Apartamentos Navas 2
Description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout, Apartamentos Navas 2 is located in Barcelona. This property offers bright, air-conditioned apartments with a private balcony, set 250 metres from Navas Metro Station.

Accommodation at this property has 2 or 3 bedrooms and a bathroom with a bath or shower and hairdryer. There is a living space with a sofa or sofa bed, flat-screen TV, and dining table, while the kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, oven, electric kettle, microwave, and fridge.

Bed linen and towels are provided, and a washing machine is available. Heating is available in all apartments.

You can find a restaurant, bar, and grocery shop within a 5-minute walk of Apartamentos Navas 2. Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia is 1.7 km from the property, and Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas Boulevard are 6 metro stops away.

Name: Pensión Villanueva
Description:
Featuring 2-star accommodation, Pensión Villanueva is set in Barcelona, 2.2 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 2.2 km from Somorrostro Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 800 metres from the city centre and 2.2 km from Sant Sebastian Beach.

At the guest house, all units are fitted with a wardrobe. At the guest house, some units are soundproof. At the guest house, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the neighbourhood.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Ola Living Consell De Cent
Description:
Ideally located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Ola Living Consell De Cent is situated less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia, a 15-minute walk from Casa Batllo and 1.5 km from La Pedrera. It is set 2.8 km from Nova Icaria Beach and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Somorrostro Beach is 2.7 km away.

Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a well-fitted kitchen including an oven, microwave, toaster and a fridge. Kitchenware is also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: BBarcelona Urban Apartments
Description:
Located in the centre of Barcelona, 1.4 km from Casa Batllo and less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia, BBarcelona Urban Apartments offers free WiFi and air conditioning. This recently renovated apartment is located 1 km from La Pedrera and 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya. Staff on-site can arrange a shuttle service.

Each unit is equipped with a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. All units are equipped with a coffee machine, while selected rooms are fitted with a terrace and others also offer city views. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.7 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 1.9 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites by Marriott
Description:
Beautiful and stylish suites located in the heart of Pedralbes, one of the top residential areas of Barcelona and close to one of the city's main business districts.

AC Hotel Victoria Suites is ideal for business travellers due its location, for weekend breaks due its tranquil environment and excellent gastronomy offer as well for families due the spaciousness of the rooms.

It features a large terrace-bar, a high quality restaurant, friendly staff and many other details.

Name: Caledonian
Description:
The Caledonian has an ideal setting on Barcelona's Gran Vía, just 5 minutes' walk from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Its rooms include free Wi-Fi internet access.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Caledonian feature simple, attractive décor with wooden floors. Each has a minibar and some rooms offer views of Gran Vía.

The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast in its dining room. There is a good selection of restaurants within 10 minutes’ walk of the Caledonian.

Universitat Metro Station is just 100 metres from the hotel and connects guests to sights such as Gaudí’s La Perdrera and the Sagrada Familia within 15 minutes.

Guests can make use of services such as the 24-hour front desk and express check-in and check-out. The hotel also has luggage storage.

Name: Hotel Granvia
Description:
Granvia is set in an impressive 19th-century building, 100 metres from the shops and restaurants of Passeig de Gràcia. This luxurious hotel has free WiFi and a terrace.

Each stylish room has high ceilings, satellite TV and air conditioning. The private bathrooms include a bath tub or shower and hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily and guests can enjoy a drink on the attractive terrace at the back of the hotel.

Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are less than 500 metres from the hotel. Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are a 10-minute walk away.

Name: Cosmo Apartments Passeig de Gràcia
Description:
Cosmo Apartments Passeig de Gràcia is located in central Barcelona, 50 metres from the well-know Passeig de Gràcia Avenue. Casa Batlló and La Pedrera Modernist buildings are 5 minutes’ walk away.

The stylish and bright apartments at Cosmo Apartments Passeig de Gràcia can have 1 to 3 bedrooms, and duplex apartments with terrace are also available.

Featuring modern décor, all air-conditioned apartments are equipped with an open-plan kitchen with ceramic hob, microwave, dishwasher and kitchenware. There is also a living room with a 32-inch flat-screen TV and sofa bed.

Cosmo Apartments Passeig de Gràcia is well communicated to the city’s main tourist places, having the metro station 300 metres away.  Passeig de Gràcia is known for being the most important shopping street in Barcelona. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located just 10 minutes' walk away.

Name: ClassBedroom Gothic Ramblas Apartments
Description:
Situated within 1.8 km of Sant Sebastian Beach and 1.8 km of Sant Miquel Beach in the centre of Barcelona, ClassBedroom Gothic Ramblas Apartments features accommodation with free WiFi, seating area and a kitchen. The property is located 800 metres from Picasso Museum, 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and less than 1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana. Tivoli Theatre is 1.3 km away and Plaça Catalunya is 1.1 km from the apartment.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a microwave, a toaster, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. A fridge and kitchenware are also available, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Barceloneta Beach, Plaça Reial and Santa Maria del Mar. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Hostal Sol y K
Description:
Hostal Sol y K is set in Barcelona, 200 metres from Plaza Reial and 400 metres from La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona. Hostal Sol y K features free WiFi .

Rooms come with a private or shared bathroom.

You will find a tour desk at the property.

Picasso Museum is 500 metres from Hostal Sol y K, while Portal de l'Angel is 700 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: BBarcelona Clot Apartments
Description:
Located in Barcelona, BBarcelona Clot Apartments is a recently renovated accommodation, 3 km from Mar Bella Beach and 1.3 km from Sagrada Familia. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.8 km from La Pedrera. The apartment features family rooms.

With a private bathroom, units at the apartment complex also offer free WiFi, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony.

Casa Batllo is 3.1 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 16 km from BBarcelona Clot Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: SmartRoom Barcelona
Description:
SmartRoom Barcelona is an economy hotel located in central Barcelona, 1 km from Sants Train Station. Decorated in a modern style, each room here will provide guests with a flat-screen Smart TV with satellite channels. The air-conditioned rooms have free WiFi access. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with free toiletries. Extras include a desk and bed linen.
A buffet breakfast is available daily. Other facilities offered at the property include a vending machine with drinks and snacks. At SmartRoom Barcelona, guests will find a 24-hour front desk.
Plaza de Sants is 450 metres from SmartRoom Barcelona and Sants Train Station is 15 minutes' walk away. The hotel is 1.5 km from Camp Nou and Magic Fountain of Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 20 minutes' drive away.

Name: La Casa de Antonio Boutique Rooms
Description:
Featuring free WiFi, La Casa de Antonio Boutique Rooms is located in Barcelona. This guest house is set a 7-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and 94 metres from Universitat Metro Station.

This guest house has a Modernist décor and offers air-conditioned rooms in the centre of Barcelona. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tiled floors, and the private bathroom includes a bath or shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries.

There is a tour desk available to all guests, and the property can arrange a shuttle to the airport for an extra charge.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and a grocery shop within a 5-minute walk of La Casa de Antonio Boutique Rooms. Plaza Espanya and the famous Montjuic Fountain are 2 metro stops from the property, and Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia is 2.7 km away.

Name: Putxet by Gaiarooms
Description:
Putxet by Gaiarooms is just 600 metres from Gaudí’s Park Güell, in a quiet residential area. It offers good-value accommodation, with free Wi-Fi internet and easy access to Barcelona city centre.

The guesthouse is set in the elegant Sant Gervasi area. The bars and restaurants of Gràcia are within minutes.

Hostal Putxet is a short walk from Lesseps Metro Station and Padua Station. Plaça Catalunya is just 4 stops away.

Please note there is no lift in the building.

Rooms at the guesthouse are simple and comfortable. They all have an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer. Rooms have central air conditioning and flat-screen satellite TV.

Name: Habitat Apartments Alaia
Description:
Situated within 800 metres of Casa Batllo and 1.3 km of Plaça Catalunya in the centre of Barcelona, Habitat Apartments Alaia features accommodation with free WiFi and a kitchen. It is located 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and provides a lift. The apartment has family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. A microwave and fridge are also available, as well as a kettle.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and La Pedrera. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Guitart Grand Passage
Description:
This modern hotel offers spacious, air-conditioned suites with a separate seating area, private balcony, free WiFi and 2 TVs. The hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard.

There are several restaurants within a 5-minute walk from Guitard Grand Passage. Also, the hotel is only 500 metres from Hospital Clinic Metro Station.

There are good transport connections to Barcelona El Prat Airport from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station, located around 15 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Anais Apartments by Gaiarooms
Description:
Located in Barcelona centre, 3 km from Somorrostro Beach and 3 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Anais Apartments by Gaiarooms provides accommodation with free WiFi and a balcony. It is set 300 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and offers a lift. Featuring a private entrance, the apartment allows guests to maintain their privacy.

At the apartment complex, every unit has air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available nearby.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: H10 Casa Mimosa 4* Sup
Description:
Housed in a 19th- century modernist building, just behind La Pedrera, H10 Casa Mimosa offers an impressive chill-out terrace with a plunge pool and a sun lounger area with privileged views of Casa Milà’s terrace.

All rooms are outward-facing, with both views over Pau Claris Street or over the courtyard garden which has Gaudí’s chimneys in the background. All have smart temperature control and high-quality amenities including a Nespresso Coffee Machine and a digital safe box. Some rooms also have spacious terraces.

The on-site El Til•ler Restaurant serves a delicious breakfast with a buffet consisting of natural products and a selection of à la carte dishes. The Lobby Bar also offers light meals and is also an excellent meeting point for a drink.

The beautiful garden retains some former cabins which are located in a courtyard that is typical of the Eixample district; and has a large variety of Mediterranean greenery such as a century-old palm tree, an impressive lime tree and mimosas, which give the hotel’s name. In the garden there is also an elevated swimming pool and a sun lounger area.

From here, there is access to the Las Cocheras meeting room, a former garage with high-ceilings and a capacity up to 100 people.

Ideally located, H10 Casa Mimosa is 10 minutes’ walk from Casa Battló; Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas can be reached within 15 minutes’ walk. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.

Name: You Stylish Beach Apartments
Description:
Some of these stylish apartments have  Mediterranean Sea views and free WiFi.

Decorated in light colours, the bright air-conditioned You Stylish Beach apartments feature private bathrooms, fully equipped kitchens and dining areas with a balcony. A flat-screen TV and a DVD player can be found in the living room.

Some apartments have access to a shared outdoor swimming pool and terrace.

Avinguda Diagonal Avenue and Selva de Mar Metro Station are both less than 600 metres from the apartments. Barcelona’s historic Gothic Quarter is just 6 metro stops away.

Name: Casa Lit Barcelona
Description:
Situated 400 metres from Las Ramblas, Casa Lit Barcelona offers a rooftop terrace with city and sea views. The rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The hotel has a courtyard, where you can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Each open-plan room has air conditioning.

Casa Lit Barcelona have a 24-hour reception, where staff can arrange restaurant bookings, tickets for shows or guided tours of Barcelona. Free city maps are also available.

The hotel is located at the bottom of the lively Raval district, just 700 metres from Barcelona Port. Drassanes and Paral•lel Metro Stations are both within 300 metres.

Name: LeMar by Aspasios
Description:
Located in Barcelona’s chic Eixample district, just 600 metres from Gaudi's La Pedrera, LeMar by Aspasios offers comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi, 5 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia Boulevard.

LeMar by Aspasios bright rooms feature stylish, modern décor. Each has a 22-inch plasma TV and a safe, while bathrooms feature hairdryer, shower and free toiletries.

The property is 300 metres from Diagonal Avenue and Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are around 600 metres away. Tourist information and a ticket reservation service are offered at Forget Me Not.

Provença FGC train Station is 150 metres away and buses around the city pass 30 metres away. You can catch a direct bus to Barcelona El Prat Airport from Plaza Catalunya Square, 10 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Barcelona Apartment Milà
Description:
Barcelona Apartment Milà is centrally located, 7 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Joanic Metro Station. Each apartment is air conditioned and features free WiFi and a flat-screen TV.

Apartments have one or two bedrooms and some have a sofa bed in the living room. All have a private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The well-equipped kitchen includes a dishwasher and washing machine.

The Sagrada Familia is a 20-minute walk from the apartments. You can reach Plaza Catalunya in 20 minutes by Metro.

Name: Alojamiento Aragon
Description:
Alojamiento Aragon is situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, less than 1 km from Tivoli Theatre, a 13-minute walk from Portal de l'Angel and 300 metres from Casa Batllo. It is set 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and offers a lift. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and a 9-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya.

The units come with air conditioning, a microwave, a toaster, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a kettle. At the bed and breakfast, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Passeig de Gracia, Boqueria Market and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Fabulous One bedroom Apartament in Poble nou
Description:
Fabulous One bedroom Apartament in Poble nou is set in the Sant Martí district of Barcelona, less than 1 km from Nova Icaria Beach, a 14-minute walk from Mar Bella Beach and 1.5 km from Port Olimpic. The property is located 2.8 km from Sagrada Familia, 3.1 km from Santa Maria del Mar and 3.2 km from Passeig de Gracia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Bogatell Beach is 800 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is offered. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Picasso Museum is 3.3 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3.3 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Aspasios Plaza Real Apartments
Description:
Just off the famous Las Ramblas, Aspasios Plaza Real Apartments offers air-conditioned studios with balconies overlooking the street. La Boqueria Market and Liceu Opera House are a 2-minute walk away.

Each studio has smart wooden floors and functional décor. Studios are divided into a sleeping area and a living-dining area with a TV and DVD player. Free WiFi and International channels are available in all apartments.

You can prepare meals in the well-equipped kitchenette, which features an oven, hob, kettle and microwave. There is also a dishwasher and a washer.

Aspasios Plaza Real Apartments is ideally located in the Gothic Quarter, next to lively Plaça Reial Square. Barcelona Cathedral and the town hall are a 5-minute walk away. Liceu Metro Station is 150 metres away.

Name: Yurbban Trafalgar Hotel
Description:
Yurbban Trafalgar Hotel features a rooftop terrace with a pool providing 360 degree panoramic views of Barcelona. The hotel is located just 300 metres from Urquinaona Metro Station.

All rooms are soundproof and air-conditioned, equipped with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. A safety deposit box is also available. Bathrooms has a shower and a hairdryer.
