Yurbban Trafalgar Hotel also offers a gym, a bar and a restaurant. A tour desk and laundry facilities are available.

Shops, bars and restaurants can be found within metres from the hotel. Plaza Catalunya is a 10-minute walk away and Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Centric Apartments Paseo de Gracia
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 2.9 km from Somorrostro Beach and less than 1 km from the centre, Centric Apartments Paseo de Gracia provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a bar. The property features city and inner courtyard views, and is 2.9 km from Barceloneta Beach. In good weather, guests are welcome to sit outside.

Each unit has a balcony, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area and a seating area with a flat-screen TV, while the private bathroom includes a shower and free toiletries. A fridge and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

There is a snack bar on-site.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Hotel Midmost by Majestic Hotel Group
Description:
Located in the heart of Barcelona, Hotel Midmost by Majestic Hotel Group is a few steps from the famous Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter. This stylish hotel features a roof terrace with a pool (not climatized) and views over the city.

The Hotel Midmost by Majestic Hotel Group has elegant interiors with all modern comforts. Relax in a sunny en suite bedroom, decorated in soothing soft colours and with air conditioning, free WiFi, satellite TV and a Nespresso coffee machine.

Treat yourself to a delicious meal in the hotel’s restaurant, or step outside to sample the huge range of regional and international foods in one of Barcelona’s many restaurants.

Take a stroll up the impressive Passeig de Gracia to visit the famous Modernista creations of Gaudi, or visit the colourful Ramblas and the mouthwatering food stalls of the Boqueria market.

Name: Private room By El Born
Description:
Attractively located in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Private room By El Born is situated 1.3 km from Barceloneta Beach, 1.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 300 metres from Santa Maria del Mar. The property is set less than 1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, a 17-minute walk from Tivoli Theatre and less than 1 km from Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and 1.3 km from Somorrostro Beach.

All rooms have a shared bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Picasso Museum, Plaça Reial and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Private room By El Born.

Name: Fisa Rentals Aribau
Description:
Located in the centre of Barcelona, 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia and less than 1 km from Casa Batllo, Fisa Rentals Aribau offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is set 1.4 km from Plaça Catalunya and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 700 metres from La Pedrera.

This apartment includes 2 bedrooms, a living room and a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dining area, and 1 bathroom with an a bath or shower and a washing machine. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property offers city views.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Condes de Barcelona
Description:
Hotel Condes Barcelona occupies a 19th-century building on Passeig de Gracia with a seasonal rooftop pool and terrace. It features a gym and a sauna.

The soundproofed rooms at Condes de Barcelona Hotel are air conditioned, LCD satellite TV and laptop safe. They have views of Passeig de Gracia or a pretty Eixample courtyard, and some rooms include a small balcony.

The hotel has an elegant rooftop bar, Alaire Terrace Bar with wonderful views.

The Condes is just 100 metres from Gaudi’s La Pedrera, and a 10-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya and La Rambla. Passeig de Gracia Train Station, 200 metres away, offers direct links to Barcelona Airport.

Name: Hotel Casa Fuster G.L Monumento
Description:
This iconic, Modernist building is located at the head of Barcelona’s chic Passeig de Gracia Avenue. It has a sauna and gym, and a roof terrace with a pool and excellent views.

The luxurious Casa Fuster is a monument in itself, built in 1908 by the Modernist architect, Lluis Domènech i Montaner, and has the status of Speciality Monument. His work, including the hotel, is a designated UNESCO World Heritage Site.

The elegant air-conditioned rooms at Casa Fuster G.L Monumento feature satellite TV and a minibar. There is a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. Some rooms have a hydro-massage bath.

The Casa Fuster Hotel has a stylish restaurant, which serves Mediterranean cuisine. Room service is available, and there is a jazz bar and rooftop chill-out bar.

There is a concierge service and 24-hour front desk. You can hire a car from the tour desk, and parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

Name: DreamKeys Barcelona City
Description:
Featuring air conditioning, DreamKeys Barcelona City offers accommodation in Barcelona. Passeig de Gracia Boulevard and Gaudís La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are a 10-minute walk away.

The property offers apartments and rooms. There is a seating and/or dining area in some units. There is also a kitchen in some of the units, equipped with a dishwasher and oven. Towels and bed linen are featured.

The property offers grocery delivery and packed lunches. You will also find many restaurants, bars and shops in the surrounding area.

Plaça Catalunya is 2 km from DreamKeys Barcelona City. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 12 km from DreamKeys - Barcelona City.

Name: Cosmo Apartments Consell de Cent - Plaza Universitat
Description:
Located 700 metres from central Barcelona’s Universitat Square, this property offers stylish, well-equipped apartments. It is 300 metres from Urgell Metro Station, just 2 stops from Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya.

Each air-conditioned apartment has chic, contemporary décor with chrome finishes and trendy furnishings. The living room has a sofa, a flat-screen TV and an iPod docking station.

The kitchen includes an electric hob, an oven, microwave, dishwasher and a kettle. There is also a dining area.

Shops, bars and cafés can be found in the streets surrounding the apartments and on Universitat Square, 10 minutes’ walk away.

The apartments are within 1.5 km of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, the Raval District and the CCCB Art Gallery. Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and the famous Gaudí houses can be reached in just 10 minutes by Metro.

The airport bus stops 150 metres away, while Sants Railway Station and the AVE High-Speed Train are easily accessed by Metro from the nearby Catalunya Station.

Name: Hotel Royal Passeig de Gracia
Description:
Within 50 metres of La Pedrera and Diagonal Metro Station, Hotel Royal Passeig de Gracia features a terrace bar with panoramic views of Barcelona. This 4-star hotel also has an interior garden.

Hotel Royal Passeig de Gracia is set in a restored building with contemporary architecture. The smart bedrooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and a bathroom with a rain-effect shower.

Casa Batlló is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, while Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 2 stops from Diagonal Station.

The Gràcia district is within a 5-minute walk, and charming street cafés can be found along the tree-lined Rambla de Catalunya, 200 metres away.

Name: Apartamentos Express by Gaiarooms
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 300 metres from Passeig de Gracia and 1.2 km from Casa Batllo, Apartamentos Express by Gaiarooms offers air conditioning. The property is around 2.8 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 2.9 km from Park Güell and 3.2 km from Sagrada Familia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 800 metres away.

This apartment is fitted with 3 bedrooms, a kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 2 bathrooms. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Plaça Catalunya. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Central Rooms Cathedral
Description:
Situated in the centre of Barcelona, 2 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Central Rooms Cathedral features air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 700 metres from Picasso Museum, 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia and 400 metres from Palau de la Musica Catalana. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.1 km from Somorrostro Beach.

At the hostel, rooms have a wardrobe. The rooms have bed linen.

Popular points of interest near Central Rooms Cathedral include Cathedral of Barcelona, Santa Maria del Mar and Plaça Reial. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

Name: Sensation Authentic Gràcia
Description:
Sensation Authentic Gracia is a self-catering accommodation located in Barcelona. Free WiFi access is available in all apartments. The property is a 10-minute walk from Gaudi's La Sagrada Familia.

Accommodation will provide you with a TV and air conditioning. There is a full kitchenette with a dishwasher and a microwave. Featuring a bath, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. All properties include a private balcony with chairs and tables. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Joanic Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away, and you can reach Plaça Catalunya and the centre in 15 minutes by metro. You can reach Gaudi's La Pedrera in 20 minutes by metro, and Barcelona-El Prat Airport is located 16 km away.

Name: Flat San Antoni Villaroel/Apartment
Description:
Flat San Antoni Villaroel/Apartment features a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.1 km of Plaça Catalunya and 1.2 km of Portal de l'Angel. Popular points of interest nearby include Casa Batllo, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: ApartEasy - Modernist flat in Eixample center
Description:
In the heart of Barcelona, set within a short distance of La Pedrera and Casa Batllo, ApartEasy - Modernist flat in Eixample center offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as an oven and coffee machine. It is located 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Sagrada Familia and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Loft en Gracia
Description:
Located in Barcelona, less than 1 km from La Pedrera and a 17-minute walk from Casa Batllo, Loft en Gracia offers air conditioning. The property is set 2.5 km from Tivoli Theatre, 2.7 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and 3.1 km from Plaça Catalunya. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 700 metres away.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sagrada Familia and Park Güell. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Loft en Gracia.

Name: 45 Times Barcelona Hotel
Description:
45 Times Barcelona Hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and restaurant in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 2.7 km from Sant Miquel Beach, and within 200 metres of the city centre.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe.

A buffet, continental or American breakfast is available every morning at the property.

Popular points of interest near 45 Times Barcelona Hotel include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Passeig de Gracia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: BBarcelona Calabria Flat
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, BBarcelona Calabria Flat features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This recently renovated apartment is located 1.8 km from Tivoli Theatre and 1.6 km from Plaça Catalunya. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.8 km from Sants Railway Station.

The spacious apartment has 4 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Casa Batllo and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from BBarcelona Calabria Flat.

Name: Apartment Sardenya - Casp by Interhome
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 2.2 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.5 km from Barceloneta Beach, Apartment Sardenya - Casp by Interhome offers air conditioning. This 3-star apartment offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.1 km away.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Alojamiento TetuGran
Description:
Located within 2.7 km of Somorrostro Beach and 2.8 km of Nova Icaria Beach, Alojamiento TetuGran provides rooms with air conditioning and a shared bathroom in Barcelona. Guests staying at this bed and breakfast have access to a balcony. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and 2.7 km from Barceloneta Beach.

At the bed and breakfast, every unit has a desk, a TV, a shared bathroom, bed linen and towels. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Passeig de Gracia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Eco Boutique Hostal Grau
Description:
This family-run hotel is within 200 metres of Las Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya. All rooms are made of natural, organic materials and painted with PVC-free paint.
All rooms at Hostal Grau have a private bathroom with free toiletries made from natural sources such as lavender. Some rooms have a balcony; while others face a vertical garden.
The whole building features energy efficient lighting and a water recycling system, as well as using renewable or clean energy.
Free natural teas and infusions, are available from the on-site lounge.
The MACBA Modern Art Museum is just 350 metres from the guest house, and Port Vell Harbour is a 15-minute walk away. Direct buses to Barcelona Airport stop in nearby Plaza Universitat.

Name: Plaza España Central Apartment
Description:
Featuring inner courtyard views, Plaza España Central Apartment provides accommodation with balcony, around 1.2 km from Sants Railway Station. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from Plaza España Central Apartment.

Name: Full apartment city center
Description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, 1.3 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.2 km from Portal de l'Angel, Full apartment city center offers free WiFi and air conditioning. The property is around less than 1 km from Boqueria Market, a 17-minute walk from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.5 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana. Cathedral of Barcelona is 1.2 km away and Plaça Reial is 1.1 km from the apartment.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Gallery Hotel 4 Sup
Description:
Located just off Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia, Gallery Hotel 4 Sup offers a free sauna and gym, and a seasonal rooftop terrace with a pool and city views. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and free water on arrival.

This elegant hotel offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. The modern bathrooms include amenities, a hairdryer and a bathrobe.

The Gallery’s restaurant has an attractive garden terrace where you can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel also has a bar and a café.

Gallery Hotel 4 Sup is situated next to the gardens of Palau Robert, a gallery and tourist information centre. Gaudí’s La Pedrera is a 3-minute walk away, while nearby Diagonal Metro Station provides direct access to the Sagrada Familia. Regular airport trains stop 600 metres away at Passeig de Gracia Station.

Name: Boutique Hostemplo Sagrada Familia
Description:
Offering free WiFi throughout the property, Hotel Boutique Hostemplo is located on a pedestrian street just 100 metres from Barcelona's Sagrada Familia. The hotel has a friendly and very peaceful atmosphere.

Each room comes with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. You will find a kettle in the room. Every room comes with a private bathroom equipped with a shower. For your comfort, you will find a hairdryer and toiletries.

The surroundings are full of bars, restaurants and shops, like the F.C. Barcelona Museum. Las Glorias Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away. Gaudí’s Pedrera and Casa Batlló are 10 minutes' walk away. Sagrada Familia Metro Station, located 2 minutes' walk away, connects you with the city centre in 7 minutes, offering easy access to Plaza Catalunya, the Ramblas and the beach.

You can buy discounted tickets for the tourist bus, which stops 100 metres from the hotel.

The buffet breakfast with homemade pastries, local products and freshly squeezed natural orange juice is served daily in our café from 08:00 to 10:30.

Name: Rambla 102
Description:
Located just off Las Ramblas and La Boqueria Market, Rambla 102 offers soundproofed accommodation with free Wi-Fi. Central Plaza Catalunya, and Barcelona Cathedral are both 500 metres away.

Modern and bright apartments and lofts with air conditioning and balcony, some with views of the Ramblas. They have a living-dining area with a sofa bed and a flat-screen satellite TV; and come with an open-plan kitchen equipped with a dishwasher, ceramic hobs and kitchenware. There is a washing machine, a dryer, and bed linen and towels are provided.

There are plenty of bars and tapas restaurants within a 2-minute walk of Rambla 102.

Centrally located, you can walk to the main Barcelona tourist attractions within 15 minutes. A 20-minute metro ride will take you to Sagrada Familia.

Name: AinB Picasso-Corders Apartments
Description:
These studio apartments are located next to the Picasso Museum, Santa Caterina Market and in the heart of the bohemian Born and Gothic Quarter. They offer free Wi-Fi.

Apartments in Barcelona Corders are housed in a refurbished building, with a private lift to each apartment. Each stylish studio is decorated in light colours, using traditional materials such as stone and wood. Each studio has a small kitchen corner with a fridge and a hob or microwave.

The local district of the Born has a wealth of bars, restaurants and nightlife from which to choose. From the Corders apartments you can also walk to Las Ramblas, Barcelona Port and Barcelona Beach.

Name: 31TILB1041 Magnific Apartment in Villa Olímpica
Description:
31TILB1041 Magnific Apartment in Villa Olímpica is set in the Sant Martí district of Barcelona, 1 km from Mar Bella Beach, 1.1 km from Port Olimpic and 2.5 km from Santa Maria del Mar. It is located 400 metres from Bogatell Beach and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 400 metres away.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bath. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Picasso Museum is 2.7 km from the apartment, while Plaça Reial is 3.3 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Tendency Apartments 7
Description:
Situated in Barcelona’s Eixample District, 600 metres from Diagonal Metro Station, Tendency Apartments 7 offers accommodation with air conditioning, heating, and free WiFi.

The apartments include a living area with a flat-screen TV and sofa. Each has a kitchen, complete with an oven, dishwasher, and washing machine.

Some apartments feature a private balcony or a furnished terrace. Each apartment has a private bathroom with a bath or a shower, and towels and bed linen are provided.

Given its central location, the property is within walking distance of a number of shops and restaurants, as well as many of Barcelona’s sights. You can reach both Sagrada Familia and Plaza Cataluña Square within 20 minutes on foot. Paseo de Gracia Boulevard, with Gaudi’s building and designer boutiques, is 500 metres away.

Name: Quartprimera Apartments
Description:
Quartprimera Apartments  is located just 80 metres from the emblematic Passeig de Gracia. It offers bright, air-conditioned apartments with flat-screen TV and free WiFi and private bathroom.

Set in a reformed, century-old building, apartments at Quartprimera feature elegant modern décor and have terraces, balconies or views to Gaudi´s La Pedrera, 2 minutes' walk away.

Bohemian Gracia is 5 minutes’ walk away and the Sagrada Familia and Plaza Catalunya are both 15 minutes’ walk away. Quartprimera is located 2 minutes’ walk from Diagonal Metro station.

Name: Molino Fresh
Description:
Molino Fresh is a self-catering accommodation located in the heart of Barcelona. Cafeterias and tapas bars are 70 metres away. La Rambla, Barceloneta and its port are 1 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment includes a seating area with sofa and flat-screen TV and heating. The kitchen is equipped with a stove, oven and microwave. There are 2 bathrooms with a  shower.

Plaça Catalunya is 2 km away. Molino Fresh is 15 km from Barcelona El Prat Airport.

Name: Sofitel Barcelona Skipper
Description:
The Sofitel Barcelona Skipper offers 5-star luxury next to Barcelona’s Olympic Port. It is just 100 metres from the beach, with free Wi-Fi and 2 outdoor pools.

This modern hotel has spacious bedrooms, with 55' Smart TVs and DVD players. They have an elegant bathroom with rain shower.

The Sofitel Barcelona Skipper has a rooftop pool, with impressive views of the city and sea; and a large seasonal terrace with sun loungers.

The hotel has 2 seasonal cocktail bars; while the Tendiez Bar, a modern bar with an outdoor terrace, is open all year round.

The hotel is 5 minutes’ walk from Ciutadella Vila Olimpica Metro Station, just 2 stops from the historic city centre. Barcelona Zoo and the pretty Ciutadella Park are also nearby.

Name: BCN Apartments 41
Description:
Elegant, air-conditioned apartments at BCN Apartments 41 come with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. They are located 500 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia.

The bright, spacious apartments each include a lounge area with sofas. Their kitchenettes are equipped with an oven, microwave and dishwasher.

Many bars, restaurants and shops can be found in the surrounding streets of the Eixample District. The fashionable Born area is just 10 minutes’ walk away.

Staff can provide tourist information, and the Arc de Triomf, Ciutadella Park and Barcelona Cathedral can all be reached in a 10-minute walk. Port Vell is 20 minutes away by foot.

Urquinaona Metro Station is 350 metres from the apartments and connects with the beach. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya. Private parking in the same building is available for an extra cost.

Name: Alojamiento Nuevo Valenci
Description:
Alojamiento Nuevo Valenci is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, less than 1 km from Sants Railway Station, a 15-minute walk from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 2.2 km from Casa Batllo. The property is situated 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya, 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia. The accommodation provides a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

The units are equipped with a microwave, toaster, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. All units are fitted with a kettle and a shared bathroom, while selected rooms include a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, units include bed linen and towels.

La Pedrera is 2.8 km from the bed and breakfast, while Boqueria Market is 3.1 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Sensation Sagrada Familia
Description:
Within 2 minutes’ walk of Gaudí’s Sagrada Família, these bright modern apartments feature a shared rooftop sun terrace and a small outdoor swimming pool with views of the city’s famous Basilica.

Sensation Sagrada Familia apartments feature a balcony and a living room with parquet floors and floor-to-ceiling windows. The modern kitchen is equipped with a hob, oven, coffee maker and dishwasher.

All Sensation Sagrada Familia apartments have free Wi-Fi. There is also a gym and sauna in the same building which can be used free of charge.

There are several cafés, bars and restaurants on the tree-lined Avinguda Gaudí Avenue, just 250 metres away. There are plenty of shops and supermarkets within walking distance, including Mercat Sagrada Família food market, 5 minutes’ walk away.

Sagrada Família metro station, with lines 2 and 5, is just 1 minute walk from the apartments. Line 2 will take visitors to the city centre in 15 minutes. The number 92 bus goes to Gaudí’s Parc Güell, and Barcelona's El Prat Airport is a 30-minute drive away.

Name: Aspasios Paseo de Gracia Apartments
Description:
Aspasios Paseo de Gracia Apartments is centrally located, just an 8-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. It features air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi and smart TV with internet connection.

Fitted with wooden flooring, each apartment boasts a modern and functional décor. Apartments have a pleasant lounge area with a sofa and floor-to-ceiling windows. Kitchens include a dishwasher, microwave and coffee machine. There is also a Smart TV with keyboard and internet access.

Paseo de Gracia Bas Apartments are surrounded by a wide range of bars, traditional Spanish restaurants, as well as shops and supermarkets. Las Ramblas, Plaza Catalunya Square, and the Gothic Quarter are all approximately a 10-minute walk away.

The apartments are just 3 minutes’ walk from the fashionable Paseo de Gracia Avenue. Gaudí's masterpiece Casa Batlló is 450 metres away. You can go to the beach by car or by public transport in less than 10 minutes from the apartments.

Regular airport buses to Barcelona El Prat Airport leave from a bus stop located in Plaza Catalunya. You can also catch a train to the airport from nearby Passeig de Gràcia Train Station.

Name: E2mai1047- Fantastic apartment next to Sagrada Familia
Description:
E2mai1047- Fantastic apartment next to Sagrada Familia is situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.5 km from La Pedrera, 1.6 km from Casa Batllo and 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia. It is located 400 metres from Sagrada Familia and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.9 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.6 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Tendency Apartments 3
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Llevant, Tendency Apartments 3 features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. It is located 1.5 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach and provides a lift. The apartment has family rooms.

Each unit has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bath and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

Mar Bella Beach is 1.5 km from the apartment, while Sagrada Familia is 3.1 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 17 km away.

Name: Aparthotel Allada 3*
Description:
Situated in a pedestrianised street in the neighbourhood of Borne, Aparthotel Allada 3* offers a tranquil atmosphere due to the scarcity of street noise and the sound-proofing of the building.

Aparthotel Allada 3* is situated in a picturesque, historical area that has maintained the façades and arches of the 17th century, whilst incorporating the modern architecture of the 21st century. The apartments and studios have been designed to offer the greatest comfort and functionality during your stay. All also benefit from ample natural light throughout the day.

The Borne district is full of winding streets that form a labyrinth, allowing you to find some of the most intriguing areas in the old city. Close to the apartments, you will find the church of Saint Mary, the city gardens, the Picasso museum, the chocolate museum, the Cathedral, the market of Saint Catherine as well as many other sites of interest. In addition, you enjoy free access to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum.

Name: ApartEasy - Private terrace, 3 bedrooms, Eixample
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 700 metres from Sants Railway Station and 1.8 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, ApartEasy - Private terrace, 3 bedrooms, Eixample features air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. This apartment provides accommodation with a patio. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment features 2 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

La Pedrera is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 2.9 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Venecuela
Description:
In the Sant Martí district of Barcelona, close to Llevant, Stay U-nique Apartments Venecuela has an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a washing machine. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.4 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Mar Bella Beach is 1.5 km from the apartment, while Sagrada Familia is 3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Venecuela.

Name: Laramond Barcelona Rooms
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 3.7 km from Sagrada Familia, Laramond Barcelona Rooms provides air-conditioned rooms. Located around 4.2 km from Park Güell, the guest house with free WiFi is also 5 km away from La Pedrera. The guest house features family rooms.

At the guest house, rooms are fitted with a wardrobe. At Laramond Barcelona Rooms every room has a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Passeig de Gracia is 5 km from the accommodation, while Casa Batllo is 6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 20 km from Laramond Barcelona Rooms.

Name: Hostal River
Description:
Hostal River is set on a pedestrian street, just 150 metres from Barcelona’s famous La Rambla and Liceu Metro Station. It offers 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi.

All rooms are heated and some come with a desk and street views. Some have a private bathroom and some have shared bathroom facilities. Free toiletries are provided in all. A hairdryer can be requested at reception.

The guest house boasts a living shared room with a balcony offering views of Carrer Sant Pau Street.

Luggage storage is offered and the Hostal River has a tour desk. La Boqueria Market is 4 minutes’ walk away and there are many shops, bars and restaurants in the immediated area.

Name: Aspasios Charming Flats
Description:
Aspasios Charming Flats offers accommodation in Barcelona. Montjuïc is 900 metres from the property. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

All units are air conditioned and have a seating and dining area. Some units feature a terrace and/or balcony. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher and oven. A microwave is also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer in every unit. Towels and bed linen are available.

Plaza Reial is 1.4 km from Aspasios Charming Flats, while Plaça Catalunya is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Aspasios Charming Flats.

Name: Aspasios Las Ramblas Apartments
Description:
Aspasios Las Ramblas Apartments is located in central Barcelona, next to Palau Güell and 100 metres from the Rambla. It offers stylish, air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi, and some have a private terrace.

The modern apartments feature a spacious, open-plan lounge-diner with a sofa and TV. The kitchenette includes a hob, microwave and Nespresso machine, as well as a dishwasher and washing machine. There is free Wi-Fi, and bed linen and towels are provided.

The apartments are 7 minutes’ walk from the seafront and the Boqueria Market. Located 250 metres away, Drassanes Metro Station connects you with the rest of the city with ease. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located 10 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Opening Doors Aribau
Description:
Right in the heart of Barcelona, situated within a short distance of Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia, Opening Doors Aribau offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as an oven and coffee machine. The property has city views and is 700 metres from La Pedrera and 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya. Boqueria Market is 1.9 km away and Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.4 km from the apartment.

The spacious apartment features 1 separate bedroom, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from Opening Doors Aribau, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Hotel Monegal
Description:
Situated right on the corner of Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas, Hotel Monegal boasts a fantastic central location. It offers good-value rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV.

Staff at Hotel Monegal’s  can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.
From the Monegal you can walk to Barcelona’s Gothic Cathedral and the modernist Palau de la Musica Auditorium in around 7 minutes. Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are both within 20 minutes’ walk.

Buses to and from the airport leave from the other side of Plaza Catalunya, 200 metres away from the hotel.

Name: La Casa Gran B&B
Description:
La Casa Gran is a traditional bed and breakfast set 10 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gràcia and Gaudi's La Pedrera. It offers suites with free Wi-Fi.

Set in a historic building declared Heritage of Barcelona, La Casa Gran Bed & Breakfast features rooms with private bathroom, private balcony with street views and plenty of natural light. They also have a ceiling fan.

There is a communal living-dining area with tea and coffee facilities. Breakfast is served in the dining room. The owners live on site and can provide assistance for guests 24 hours a day.

You will also find numerous bars, shops and restaurants nearby. The tourist bus stops within 50 metres of the property, and there is a bus with direct connections with the airport. Diagonal and Hospital Clinic Metro stations are less than 10 minutes’ walk from the property.

Name: Mr. Serrano Apartments
Description:
Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Mr. Serrano Apartments is set in Barcelona. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is soundproof and is situated a few steps from Passeig de Gracia.

The 2-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with slippers. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Sightseeing tours are available close to the property. A water park is also available for guests at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Mr. Serrano Apartments include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Sansi Pedralbes
Description:
Peaceful gardens and stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi and TV are offered at Sansi Pedralbes.

It is just 250 metres from Pedralbes Monastery and 700 metres from UPC University.
IESE University is just 5 minutes walking and ESADE University 200 meters from the hotel.

Decorated in soft blues and browns, this design hotel’s air-conditioned rooms come with a minibar, safe and iron. Bathrooms include toiletries.

Buses to central Barcelona stop within 20 metres of the hotel, and city tour buses stop at Pedralbes Monastery.
Reina Elisenda Station is 800 metres away and Barcelona Airport is a 15-minute drive away.

There are various popular bars and cafés in Sarrià, a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

You can also enjoy a varied breakfast and Catalan cuisine in the Sansi’s elegant restaurant.

A heated indoor pool, saunas and aromatherapy showers are offered in the hotel’s spa, available at an extra cost. Massages can be arranged on request.

Name: Hotel Derby
Description:
Situated 300 metres from L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre, the Derby is a 20-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou stadium. Each air-conditioned room offers flat-screen satellite TV and free internet access.

The stylish Derby Hotel has an impressive collection of Catalan art, including pieces by Miró and Tàpies. Rooms have functional design and parquet flooring. They all include a safe and a minibar.

Hotel Derby features Italian pizzeria Santa Napoli and cocktail bar with Peruvian nuances Lima Bruja.

Located just 10 metres away, the Gran Derby Hotel allows guests access to its gym and swimming pool. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 800 metres away, while the Feria Trade Fair in Plaza Espanya can be reached in a 20-minute walk.

Name: Hotel Casa Bonay
Description:
Located in central Barcelona, 200 metres from Tetuan Metro Station, Hotel Casa Bonay is a boutique hotel offering a shared terrace and free WiFi throughout. Plaça Catalunya is 10 minutes’ walk away.

Set in a 19th-century Neoclassical residential building, all rooms at Hotel Casa Bonay hotel are soundproofed and combine traditional features such as mosaic floors and modern textiles, lighting and furniture. They come with a minibar filled with local refreshments and snacks, complimentary WiFi, premium TV, selected magazines, air conditioning and ceiling fans in most rooms. . The bathroom comes with natural amenities from Mailin+Goetz

Casa Bonay hotel also offers a dynamic and unique culinary experience. Guests will find a rooftop restaurant; Chiringuito TosTao café, Libertine Cocktail Bar and Bodega Bonay's cuisine on site.

Hop on complimentary bikes to take you to the beach club where you will find complimentary boats and paddle boards or join rooftop weekend yoga classes. Sustainability focused.

The popular Passeig de Gracia Street, with shops and restaurants, is 700 metres away.  A 20-minute walk will take you to Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia. Barceloneta Beach is 4 metro stops away from Hotel Casa Bonay.

Name: Hostal Laia by Gaiarooms
Description:
Situated within 1.4 km of Casa Batllo and 1.5 km of Passeig de Gracia, Hostal Laia by Gaiarooms features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. It is set 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and offers a lift. Featuring a private entrance, the guest house allows guests to maintain their privacy.

All units in the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, units at the guest house also boast free WiFi. At the guest house, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sants Railway Station and Magic Fountain of Montjuic. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Stay Barcelona Gran Via
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.1 km from Plaça Catalunya, Stay Barcelona Gran Via provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is around 1.5 km from Casa Batllo, 1.6 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.7 km from Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from Portal de l'Angel.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Stay Barcelona Gran Via.

Name: Estudio con balcon Plaza España
Description:
The recently renovated Estudio con balcon Plaza España is located in Barcelona, near Magic Fountain of Montjuic and Sants Railway Station. Among the facilities at this property are luggage storage space and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. A tour desk can provide information on the area.

The apartment comes with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with inner courtyard views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Casa Batllo is 2.9 km from the apartment, while Palau Sant Jordi is 3.2 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km from the property.

Name: Top Barcelona Apartments
Description:
Just 5 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya, Barcelona Center Tallers offers well-equipped studios and apartments with free Wi-Fi. Apartments are within walking distance of a range of shops, bars and restaurants.

Each modern, air-conditioned apartment and studio at Barcelona Center Tallers has a seating area with a TV. There is either a kitchen or a kitchenette with a fridge, microwave, coffee maker and electric hob.

The Boquería Market is just 5 minutes’ walk from the main Center Tallers building. The famous Gaudí houses on Passeig de Gràcia are just 2 Metro stops from Plaza de Catalunya.

The airport bus stop is a 10-minute walk from the Tallers. Plaza Catalunya Metro and Railway Stations are within 5 minute's walk of the property.

Name: Hotel Sant Pau
Description:
The Hotel Sant Pau has an ideal setting overlooking the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Hotel Sant Pau Hospital. This hotel offers comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi access.

The Amrey's rooms are spacious and well-equipped. Each air-conditioned room has satellite TV and a hairdryer in the bathroom. Some rooms offer views of Hotel Sant Pau.

A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel’s dining room. Guests can enjoy a drink or snack in the café-bar.

The Amrey is just 10 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia church. The nearest Metro station, just 300 metres away, connects guests to the centre of Barcelona and Las Ramblas in 15 minutes.

Name: Aspasios Rambla Catalunya Apartments
Description:
These chic apartments are set on Barcelona’s stylish Rambla de Catalunya, 150 metres from Passeig de Gracia Boulevard. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Apartments at Aspasios Rambla Catalunya Apartments feature contemporary decor, a sofa bed, and plasma TV while kitchens have a dishwasher, washing machine, tumble drier and Nespresso coffee maker.

There are several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk and Plaza Catalunya is 400 metres away.

Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter are 10 minutes’ walk away and Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batllo are within 5 minutes’ walk.

The Aspasios Rambla Catalunya apartments are 3 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia Metro and Train Station, with direct trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different apartments located in the Eixample area. Please select a date and click on the apartments to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

Name: ApartEasy - Atic Sants
Description:
ApartEasy - Atic Sants has a terrace and is set in Barcelona, within just 1.6 km of Sants Railway Station and 1.9 km of Magic Fountain of Montjuic. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Camp Nou is 3.1 km from the apartment, while Palau Sant Jordi is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 9 km from ApartEasy - Atic Sants.

Name: Barcelona Apartment Aramunt
Description:
Aramunt Apartments offers modern, stylish studios 10 minutes' walk from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station. It features free Wi-Fi, and a terrace with sun loungers and a small swimming pool of 5,5 metres by 1.

Aramunt offers bright, well-equipped studios for 2 to 4 people, They have air conditioning, a kitchenette with a washer dryer and a dishwasher, a dining area, and a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a double sofa bed. The bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries.

The property is just a few minutes' walk from numerous tourist attractions. On the nearby Passeig de Gràcia you will find world-famous examples of Modernist architecture, such as Casa Batlló and La Pedrera.

The cultural heart of the Catalan capital, around Plaça Catalunya and Las Ramblas, is just a 10-minute stroll away.

As a guest of the Aramunt Apartments you enjoy free access to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum. Pay public parking can be found next to the property and buses to Barceloneta's beaches stop outside.

Name: Casp Green House
Description:
Situated in the centre of Barcelona, Casp Green House features air-conditioning. Plaza Catalunya is a 10-minute walk from the house.

The bedrooms have a safe and a private bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided. Some rooms come with city view.

Passeig de Gracia shopping street is 650 meters from the property. Arco del Triunfo is an 8-minute walk away. Urquinaona metro station is within 4 minutes’ walk.

RECEPTION and KEY COLLECTION are in situated at street Via Laietana 71, 2º, which is just 7 min walk.

Name: Ola Living Gracia
Description:
Set in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Ola Living Gracia has a balcony. It is located less than 1 km from La Pedrera and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 500 metres away.

Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a well-fitted kitchen including a dishwasher, oven, toaster and a fridge. Kitchenware is also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Barcelona Apartment Gran de Gràcia
Description:
Situated in the charming Gràcia district, these elegant design apartments offer a balcony and a stylish kitchen with a ceramic hob, dishwasher and washing machine. Fontana Metro Station is just 200 metres away.

The air-conditioned Gran de Gracia apartments feature sleek contemporary décor. Each one has a lounge with a flat-screen TV and 2 sofa beds. The modern bathrooms include a shower.

A variety of supermarkets, cafés and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk of the Gran de Gracia apartments. The surrounding streets are full of quirky boutiques and lively bars.

Gaudí’s Casa Vicenç is just 150 metres from the apartments, while Parc Güell is a 20-minute walk away. You can walk to Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in around 15 minutes.

Name: Be Barcelona Eixample Urquinaona II
Description:
Offering free Wi-Fi, Be Barcelona Eixample Urquinaona II is located in Barcelona’s Eixample District, 600 metres from Plaça Catalunya. The property offers air-conditioned apartments with modern décor and private balcony.

Each 2-bedroom apartment has a living room with a sofa, flat-screen TV and DVD player. A ceramic hob, oven and washing machine are included in the kitchen. The bathroom comes with a bathtub and bidet.

A wide variety of bars, restaurants and supermarkets can be found in the area. The Mercat de Born food market is 10 minutes’ walk away.

The Ciutadella Park and the Gothic District can be reached within a 10-minute walk. Urquinaona Metro Station, 300 metres from the apartments, offers connection to La Barceloneta Beach and Barcelona Forum.

Name: Ilunion Bel-Art
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1 km from Sagrada Familia, Ilunion Bel-Art features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers a tour desk, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath. The rooms have a wardrobe.

A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are always on hand to help.

La Pedrera is 2.7 km from Ilunion Bel-Art, while Park Güell is 1.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away.

Name: 13PAR1004 - Fabulous apartment in the heart of Barcelona
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 700 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya, 13PAR1004 - Fabulous apartment in the heart of Barcelona offers air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Sants Railway Station and Palau Sant Jordi. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Penthouse Pza España - 4th Floor
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 800 metres from Sants Railway Station, Penthouse Pza España - 4th Floor offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This recently renovated apartment is located 2.9 km from Casa Batllo and 3.2 km from Palau Sant Jordi. Camp Nou is 3.3 km from the apartment and Plaça Catalunya is 3.3 km away.

The apartment with a terrace and mountain views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.4 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.4 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km from the property.

Name: Apartamentos Laforja
Description:
Offering free Wi-Fi, these modern décor apartments are located in Sant Gervasi District, less than 15 minutes’ walk from the famous Passeig the Gracia Avenue and the Modernist buildings.

Apartamentos Laforja features air-conditioned 1-bedroom apartments. They all include 1 double room, a seating area with sofa bed, a modern and well equipped kitchenette and a private bathroom.

Numerous bars and restaurants as well as supermarkets can be found nearby. You can also visit the charming Gracia District, less than 15 minutes’ walk from the apartments.

Muntaner Train Station is 5 minutes’ walk of the apartments while Diagonal Metro Station is 15 minutes’ walk away.

Apartments are well connected to the city centre, only 10 minutes away by public transport.

Name: Welcomy Poblenou II
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 1.6 km from Mar Bella Beach, Welcomy Poblenou II offers air conditioning. The property is around 2.3 km from Port Olimpic, 2.8 km from Sagrada Familia and 3.2 km from Passeig de Gracia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Bogatell Beach is 1.4 km away.

The spacious apartment is composed of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and 2 bathrooms. A flat-screen TV is featured. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3.3 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 3.4 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Boutique Lepant
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 300 metres from Sagrada Familia and 2 km from Casa Batllo, Boutique Lepant offers air conditioning. It is located 2.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km away.

The recently renovated apartment features 2 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and microwave, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

La Pedrera is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.4 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Gaudi Views Apartment
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.7 km from La Pedrera, Gaudi Views Apartment offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. With mountain views, this accommodation features a patio. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.3 km from Casa Batllo.

The apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with sea views. The unit at the property features a shower and a dressing room. The property offers city views.

Sightseeing tours are available close to the property.

Sagrada Familia is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Park Güell is 1.3 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Sweett - Avenida Roma
Description:
Situated within 1.5 km of Plaça Catalunya and 1.5 km of Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sweett - Avenida Roma features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Casa Batllo is 1.2 km away.

Each unit features a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bidet and free toiletries. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sants Railway Station, Tivoli Theatre and La Pedrera. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Amister Apartments
Description:
Located in the heart of Barcelona, 300 metres from Plaça Catalunya, Amister Apartments offers 1-bedroom apartments with free WiFi.

Each apartment at Amister has a fully-equipped kitchen, completed with an oven and a dishwasher, opening onto a living-dining room with a sofa and a flat-screen TV. There is a washing machine and cleaning products are provided.

Shops, bars and dining options are in the surrounding streets.

Regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located just 250 metres away.

Name: Vincci Bit
Description:
Vincci Bit is located just 10 minutes walk from Mar Bella beach. Situated a 7-minute walk from El Maresme Forum Metro Station, it features a sauna, a gym and a rooftop swimming pool with city views.

The restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and à la carte meals, including gluten-free products. There is also a lounge, bar and room service available.

The air-conditioned rooms at Vincci Bit are bright and comfortable and feature a flat-screen TV, a pillow menu and a minibar. The private bathrooms include a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Free Wi-Fi is also available.

There are a number of bars, restaurants and shops within a few minutes walk from the hotel. Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre is just 300 metres away.

The International Convention Centre (CCIB) is a 9-minute walk from Vincci Bit. The historic centre of Barcelona can be reached in just 15-minutes by metro or tram.

Name: Apartments Barcelona & Home Deco Centro
Description:
In a central area of Barcelona, located within a short distance of Passeig de Gracia and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Apartments Barcelona & Home Deco Centro offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. It is set 2.8 km from Somorrostro Beach and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.8 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views features 3 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with an a bath or shower. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Plaça Catalunya and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: You Stylish City Center Apartments
Description:
Located next to Plaza Catalunya Station, You Stylish City Center Apartments offers modern apartments with air conditioning and free WiFi. These luxury apartments are, and just a 1-minute walk from Las Ramblas.

Each apartment is spacious and bright, with heating and elegant contemporary décor. The modern kitchens include a ceramic hob, dishwasher and kitchenware.

Guests have access to a 24-hour concierge service.

There are numerous restaurants and shops within a 2-minute walk, including El Corte Inglés supermarket. The You Stylish tour desk provides visitor information, and there is a Tourist Office just 150 metres away. There is a swimming pool and gym nearby available for guests at an extra cost.

Direct buses to Barcelona Airport stop only 50 metres from the apartments. Plaza Catalunya Station offers direct Metro links to all areas of Barcelona, as well as trains to the Pyrenees and the Costa Brava.

Name: Hotel Oasis
Description:
Hotel Oasis is located just 250 metres from França Railway Station and 100 metres from Barcelona’s Born district. The modern, air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV and private bathrooms with hairdryer.

The hotel features a seasonal terrace with a seasonal outdoor pool. The hotel's Oasis café-bar offers a range of hot drinks and cocktails throughout the day.

The beach and bars of Barceloneta are just 200 metres away, while Santa Maria del Mar Church is 4 minutes’ walk away. Oasis is 50 metres from Barceloneta Metro Station, and 300 metres from Ciutadella Park.

Please be aware that the type of bed is always subject to availability.

Name: Apart céntrico con terraza en Gracia
Description:
Apart céntrico con terraza en Gracia features a terrace and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.1 km of La Pedrera and 1.7 km of Casa Batllo. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is less than 1 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sagrada Familia and Park Güell. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Apart céntrico con terraza en Gracia.

Name: Hotel Rialto
Description:
Situated just off famous La Rambla Boulevard in central Barcelona, Hotel Rialto occupies a historic building where the artist Joan Miró was born. It offers air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV.

Each room at the Rialto Hotel Barcelona has wooden floors and a simple, functional design. The modern bathrooms include basic toiletries. Safes are available to rent.

Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast and delicious Mediterranean meals at the Rialto’s Miró restaurant. There are also many restaurants and lively bars in the surrounding streets. 

Hotel Rialto’s 24-hour reception offers information about the city. The Boquería Market and Barcelona Cathedral are both within 400 metres. Liceu Metro Station is only 300 metres away, and Plaza Catalunya is a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

Name: Hostal Oliva
Description:
Situated in the centre of Barcelona, Hostal Oliva features accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. It is set a few steps from Passeig de Gracia and offers a lift. The guest house has family rooms.

At the guest house, every unit is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units at the guest house have air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Sightseeing tours are available around the property.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Casa Batllo and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Miiro Borneta
Description:
Located on Passeig Picasso, Miiro Borneta is set opposite Ciutadella Park. This boutique hotel features a rooftop swimming pool, a restaurant, a comfortable lounge area and a bar with outdoor seating, and stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Each modern, air-conditioned room at Miiro Borneta has contemporary décor. There is flat screen HDTV, tea and coffee-making facilities.

Guests can enjoy a breakfast in the Volta Restaurant. Mediterranean cuisine are served for lunch and dinner. There is also Volta Bar with outdoor seating under the arches – the perfect spot for cocktails, natural wines and bar plates, the Gallery – a comfortable lounge area to hang out during the day, a library featuring books on the local neighbourhood and a private dining room..

The hotel is set in the stylish El Born district and is a 5-minute walk from the Picasso Museum. Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter are within 1 km of the Miiro Borneta.

Barceloneta and Jaume I Metro Stations can be reached in 10 minutes by foot. Regular buses to La Barceloneta’s beaches stop nearby.

Name: Cosy apartment near Sagrada Familia
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 3 km from Bogatell Beach and less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia, Cosy apartment near Sagrada Familia offers air conditioning. The property is around 3 km from Casa Batllo, 3.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and 3.5 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.8 km from La Pedrera.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Tivoli Theatre is 3.6 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3.8 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km from the property.

Name: Happy People Gaudi Sant Pau Apartments
Description:
Happy People Sagrada Familia Apartments offers air-conditioned apartments and studios with free WiFi. Accommodation is 5 minutes’ walk from Camp de l’Arpa Metro Station.

Both studios and apartments feature a living-dining room with air conditioning, a sofa, and a flat-screen TV, and a kitchenette including a microwave, dishwasher and fridge. Some rooms have ceiling fans. The modern bathroom has a hairdryer, and towels and bed linen are provided.

Several bars, restaurants and supermarkets can be found within 5 minutes’ walk. The property offers tours around the city, and airport shuttle service, available on request and for a surcharge.

Located in a residential area of the Eixample District, the property is 15 minutes’ walk from Sagrada Familia. You can reach Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas in 30 minutes by public transport. Sant Pau Hospital, a spectacular example of modernist architecture, can be reached in 5 minutes on foot.

Name: 12CRC1038 - Big & Cozy 2bed Apartment in the city
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and less than 1 km from Sants Railway Station, 12CRC1038 - Big & Cozy 2bed Apartment in the city features air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. This apartment offers accommodation with a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is set 3 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Palau Sant Jordi is 3 km from the apartment, while Camp Nou is 3 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km away.

Name: C211 Barcelona Apartments
Description:
Stylish, modern apartments include free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and views of Barcelona. Located just off Diagonal Avenue, C211 Barcelona is 15 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia.

Each apartment includes a lounge with sofas, a flat-screen TV, DVD player and an iPad docking station. Their kitchens are equipped with an oven, microwave and washing machine; bed linen and towels are provided. Some also feature a balcony or terrace.

Many shops, restaurants and bars can be found in the surrounding streets. The local Galvany Market is a 5-minute walk from the apartments.

Both Hospital Clinic and Diagonal metro stations are under 15 minutes’ walk away and connect with Sants Train Station and the rest of the city.

Name: Gracia Apartment
Description:
Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Gracia Apartment is set in Barcelona. It is situated less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia and offers a lift. Offering free WiFi throughout the property, the allergy-free apartment has a sauna.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Gracia Apartment.

Name: Niu Barcelona Hotel
Description:
Located 600 metres from Plaza Reial in Barcelona, Niu Barcelona Hotel features an outdoor pool on the rooftop. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property

Every room at this hotel comes with a flat-screen TV; while the private bathrooms come with shower and hairdryer. Rooms are air-conditioned in summer and heated in winter.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guests benefit from a complimentary bottle of water upon arrival.

Portal de l'Angel is 800 metres from Niu Barcelona Hotel, while Plaça Catalunya is 900 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Niu Barcelona Hotel.

Name: Grand Hyatt Barcelona
Description:
A five star iconic hotel located on the renowned Avenida Diagonal, in the heart of Barcelona's most exclusive residential, financial and shopping district: the Alta Barcelona.

Experience the ultimate luxury, and live where the best of Barcelona lives, where Grand Hyatt chooses to be: a captivating destination within another destination. Combining design with sophistication, it is the most exclusive gastronomical and vibrant destination, for an unparalleled experience.

With 465 rooms including 49 suites and a penthouse, 5 gastronomy spaces, a Wellness & Spa area and an outdoor area with terrace and pool, Grand Hyatt Barcelona is the perfect choice for a lavish and unforgettable getaway.

Designer rooms at Grand Hyatt Barcelona offer home automation technology, a 49-inch Smart TV, a safe, air conditioning and free WiFi. Their private bathroom includes Natura Bissé amenities, bathrobes and slippers. Guests have free access to a bright, modern 24-hour gym with a variety of equipment.

Oasis Spa by Natura Bissé houses more than 1000 m² space for well-being, including water circuits, saunas and steam baths. You can relax with one of the range of treatments available onsite and coordinated by expert therapists. Kindly be informed that the minimum age for entering the Spa is 18.

Grand Hyatt Barcelona is 5-minute walking from Football Club Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium, 400 metres from Maria Cristina Metro Station and the central Plaza España Square is 3 metro stops away. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is 15 minutes on foot.

Name: Bed&BCN Diagonal 6
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Casa Batllo, Bed&BCN Diagonal 6 has free WiFi and a washing machine. With city views, this accommodation features a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.9 km from Somorrostro Beach.

This air-conditioned apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a living room. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, La Pedrera and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from Bed&BCN Diagonal 6, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Enjoy Apartments Urban Retreat Valencia 4
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 3 km from Somorrostro Beach and 3 km from Bogatell Beach, Enjoy Apartments Urban Retreat Valencia 4 offers air conditioning. It is situated 400 metres from Sagrada Familia and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km away.

The spacious apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

La Pedrera is 1.9 km from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Enjoy Apartments Urban Retreat Valencia 4.

Name: Alcam Books
Description:
Alcam Books is situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1.7 km from Tivoli Theatre and 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia. It is located 1.5 km from Portal de l'Angel and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Plaça Catalunya is 1.5 km away.

Some units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, washing machine and a coffee machine, as well as a fully equipped kitchen. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with a private bathroom.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Magic Fountain of Montjuic and Cathedral of Barcelona. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: InterContinental Barcelona, an IHG Hotel
Description:
Situated 200 metres from Barcelona’s Magic Fountain, the elegant InterContinental Barcelona, an IHG Hotel offers spacious rooms with a flat-screen TV and hydromassage shower.

Offering fantastic views over Barcelona, the hotel’s 173 Rooftop Terrace features an outdoor pool, sun loungers, and a dining area where guests can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine and a selection of drinks and cocktails.

Arrel Restaurant pays homage to the land and the produce it provides throughout all seasons of the year. The restaurant features an open kitchen serving small portions to share, buffet breakfasts and lunch and dinner service.

Quirat Restaurant is an exclusive space that will offer an interpretation of the land and its products through a menu of dishes that responds to the different seasons, designed exclusively for the restaurant by a Chef with 1 Michelin Star. Enjoy an unforgettable dinner in the most exclusive of our restaurants.

Gebre Cocktails and More and, in addition to the cocktail classics, it will offer a menu of artisan signature cocktails that will try to convey a very specific sensory experience connected to the world of the land that surrounds us.

There is free WiFi available in public areas and in rooms and the lobby area at InterContinental Barcelona, an IHG Hotel features a free internet point.

The spa has a water circuit, a dry sauna, a hammam, hot tub, gym, and 6 treatment cabins.

From the hotel, Barcelona’s historic centre can be easily reached by bus or metro. Poble Sec and Espanya Metro Stations are both 500 metres away. Poble Espanyol and the Joan Miró Foundation are 200 metres away.

Name: KeyFamily Sweet Home
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.8 km from La Pedrera and 2.2 km from Casa Batllo, KeyFamily Sweet Home offers air conditioning. The property features quiet street views and is 2 km from Passeig de Gracia and 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 300 metres away.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views has 3 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

For guests with children, the apartment offers a baby safety gate. A bicycle rental service is available at KeyFamily Sweet Home.

Tivoli Theatre is 2.8 km from the accommodation, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.9 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Lindo apartamento Vila de Gracia
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 600 metres from La Pedrera and 1.1 km from Casa Batllo, Lindo apartamento Vila de Gracia offers air conditioning. It is set 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 200 metres away.

The 1-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Plaça Catalunya and Sagrada Familia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Hola Hostal Eixample
Description:
Located a 15-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya, Hola Hostal Eixample offers a sun terrace, a private bar, a 24-hour reception and stylish air-conditioned dormitories with free Wi-Fi. Barcelona Nord Bus Station is 500 metres away.

Each spacious dormitory at the Hola Eixample hostel features bright modern décor and individual storage lockers. Sheets and blankets are included, while towels are available to rent. Some rooms have a private bathroom.

Hola Hostal Eixample is just a 10-minute walk from the Born district, where you can find charming shops, bars and restaurants. Sagrada Familia Church and Ciutadella Park are within a 15-minute walk.

Tetuan and Girona Metro Stations are both a 5-minute walk from the hostel, and offer direct connections to the city centre and beach. Nearby Barcelona Nord Bus Station offers airport buses and international services.

Name: limehome Barcelona Carrer de Besalú 82
Description:
3.5 km from La Pedrera, limehome Barcelona Carrer de Besalú 82 is set in Barcelona and provides free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. The property is around 3.6 km from Casa Batllo, 4 km from Passeig de Gracia and 4.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.8 km from Sagrada Familia.

All units in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at limehome Barcelona Carrer de Besalú 82 have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms include a balcony.

Tivoli Theatre is 4.2 km from the accommodation, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 4.4 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km from the property.

Name: Suites Center Barcelona
Description:
These stylish apartments are on Barcelona’s famous Passeig de Gràcia, in the heart of the Eixample. Each comes with free Wi-Fi, plasma-screen satellite TVs and a modern kitchen.

Suites Center Barcelona offers apartments with DVD and CD player, washing machine and a kettle. They feature full heating and air conditioning, soundproofing and a bathroom with shower.

Private parking is available at Suites Center Barcelona. There is also 24-hour reception.
