The Suites are only 20 metres from the Modernist Casa Fuster, a short walk from the popular Gràcia neighbourhood. Diagonal Metro Station is 200 metres away and offers direct access to Plaça Catalunya and the Rambla.

Name: BBarcelona Gràcia Nova Flat
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Sagrada Familia and 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia, BBarcelona Gràcia Nova Flat offers air conditioning. It is situated 2.4 km from Casa Batllo and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.8 km from La Pedrera.

With free WiFi, this 2-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Park Güell is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from BBarcelona Gràcia Nova Flat.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Gaudi I
Description:
Located within 1.8 km of La Pedrera and 1.9 km of Passeig de Gracia, Stay U-nique Apartments Gaudi I provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. It is set 2.7 km from Casa Batllo and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 400 metres away.

Each unit is equipped with a balcony, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.2 km from the apartment, while Park Güell is 3.2 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Gaudi I.

Name: Arrivo Apartments
Description:
Arrivo Apartments is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 3 km from Palau Sant Jordi, 3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 3.3 km from Plaça Catalunya. It is set 700 metres from Sants Railway Station and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.1 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Casa Batllo is 3.4 km from the apartment, while Boqueria Market is 3.6 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Hilton Diagonal Mar Barcelona
Description:
This hotel is next to Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre and just 400 metres from Nova Mar Bella Beach. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool, a fitness centre and air-conditioned rooms with a LED TV.

Hilton Diagonal Mar Barcelona's terrace, Purobeach Barcelona, has an outdoor pool and paddling pool available from April to October. All services on the Purobeach terrace, including Balinese beds, sunbeds and massages are available for an extra charge.

Purobeach Restaurant offers a diverse menu, as well as a variety of classic cocktails and international spirits. Aürt Restaurant serves Catalan food cooked in front of you. Guests can also enjoy tapas, snacks or drinks at Ma'i.

The hotel has 22 meeting rooms. Barcelona’s CCIB Convention Centre is located next door to the hotel. El Maresme-Forum Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk away, and from here you can get to central Barcelona in around 15 minutes. Barcelona's El Prat Airport is 25 minutes' drive away.

Name: Hotel Constanza
Description:
Located 7 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya, Hotel Constanza has a fantastic rooftop terrace (open from May to October) with views over Barcelona. It offers a 24-hour reception and rooms with smart décor and satellite TV.

Staff at the Constanza Hotel’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. You can also hire a bicycle or car from reception.

The Constanza is 7 minutes’ walk from the Gothic Quarter, where you can find the Palau de la Música Catalana, a spectacular Modernist auditorium. Casa Batllo & la Pedrera are at 10-12 minutes walking distance form the Hotel. Urquinaona Metro Station & Plaza Catalunya Metro station are under 5 minutes’ walk away, connecting you with the rest of the city.

Name: Home to Home Barcelona
Description:
Set just 500 metres from Plaza Espanya, Home to Home Barcelona offers modern, air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi. There is a shared terrace with a chill out zone and views of Montjuic.

Decorated in a minimalistic style, each apartment includes a living-dining area with a sofa bed and flat-screen satellite TV. Their kitchens are equipped with a microwave, electric hob, dishwasher and washer-dryer.

A wide range of shops, restaurants and bars can be found in the area. Arenas Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk from the apartments and offers great views of the city from its rooftop.

Fira de Barcelona Convention Centre can also be reached in 10 minutes’ walk. Espanya Metro Station is 500 metres away and connects with Plaza Catalunya. Airport buses also stop in Plaza Espanya.

Name: Seventy Barcelona
Description:
Seventy Barcelona has a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Barcelona. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The wellness area includes an indoor pool, fitness centre and sauna, while an outdoor swimming pool is also available.

At the hotel the rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms include a coffee machine, while some rooms also boast a patio and others also feature city views. At Seventy Barcelona each room includes bed linen and towels.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options.

The accommodation offers a hammam.

Popular points of interest near Seventy Barcelona include Passeig de Gracia, La Pedrera and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: BBarcelona Gaudí Avenue Flat
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 400 metres from Sagrada Familia and 2 km from Passeig de Gracia, BBarcelona Gaudí Avenue Flat offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Staff on-site can arrange a shuttle service.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with an a bath or shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Casa Batllo is 2.4 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 1.9 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Las Ramblas, comfort in BCN for 8 persons
Description:
Attractively situated in the centre of Barcelona, Las Ramblas, comfort in BCN for 8 persons offers a balcony, air conditioning, free WiFi and flat-screen TV. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel, and Tivoli Theatre. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.3 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The spacious apartment features 4 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, and 3 bathrooms. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Plaça Reial. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: El Born Guest House by Casa Consell
Description:
Set next to Francia Train Station, El Born Guest House by Casa Consell is a guest house located in Barcelona. The property offers free Wi-Fi access and is 15 minutes’ walk from Barceloneta Beach.

The rooms are soundproofed and feature a TV and air conditioning, some rooms can offer a balcony with city views. Every room has a private bathroom, a safe and luggage storage.

The Born Food Market is only 2 minutes’ walk from the guest house. Guests can also find a large variety of bars and restaurants in the area.

La Ciutadella Park and Barcelona Zoo are only 200 metres from the property. Guests can reach Barcelona Port and La Rambla within 15 minutes on foot. Barceloneta Metro Station is 400 metres away.

Name: Barcelona Apartment Val
Description:
These modern décor apartments are located in Barcelona city centre, next to Passeig de Gracia Avenue and within walking distance of Gaudi’s most famous Modernist buildings.

Barcelona Apartment Val features air-conditioned 1, 2 or 3 bedroom apartments. Each one offers plenty of natural light and views of the city.

Apartments also include a comfortable seating area with sofa and flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom.

Guests have free access to an outdoor pool located in Paseo de Gracia Boulevard, 300 metres away.

Set in Barcelona’s main shopping district, the apartments are well connected by public transport to all main tourist attractions in Barcelona. Apartments are situated 10 minutes’ walk from both the Plaza Catalunya Square and the Ramblas.

Name: Hotel Sagrada Familia Apartments
Description:
Set in Barcelona, Hotel Sagrada Familia Apartments offers self-catering apartments set 50 metres from Gaudi's Sagrada Familia. Sagrada Familia Metro Station is 3 minutes' walk away.

The apartments are soundproofed, air-conditioned and have free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. All apartments feature a kitchenette fitted with a dishwasher and microwave, as well as a living-dining area.

Bed linen and towels are provided, but only basic, initial cleaning supplies and toiletries are available.

Gaudi's Casa Batllo and La Pedrera are 20 minutes' walk from Hotel Sagrada Familia Apartments. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: MH Apartments Tetuan
Description:
Housed in a reformed modernist building located in the centre of Barcelona, these apartments are ideal for enjoying a highly independent and relaxing break in the city.

MH Apartments Tetuan has a variety of apartments, all of which are spacious and charming in design. Relax in the tranquillity of this accommodation at the end of a long day of sightseeing or business in the city. The apartments boast free WiFi internet access and a TV with international channels.

The central location of these apartments means you can easily get around the city using the excellent public transport or on foot.

Name: Happy People Ramblas Harbour Apartments
Description:
Happy People Ramblas Harbour Apartments is just 5 minutes’ walk from Parallel Metro Station. It offers stylish air-conditioned apartments in the Poble Sec neighbourhood, close to cafés, bars and restaurants.

Each bright, spacious, open-plan apartment at Happy People Ramblas Harbour has high ceilings with exposed wooden beams, tiled floors and stylish décor. The living area has a sofa and a kitchen area with microwave and fridge. Free Wi-Fi is included.

On the last floor of the buiding there is a rooftop with the views to the city and where you can also enjoy  the swimming pool.

You can walk to Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter in just 15 minutes.

Barcelona’s port and cruise terminal are within 15 minutes’ walk of the apartments. Buses to Barceloneta’s beaches stop nearby.

Name: Southern Cross
Description:
Featuring sea views and free WiFi, Southern Cross features accommodation ideally situated in the centre of Barcelona, within a short distance of Sant Sebastian Beach, Barceloneta Beach and Santa Maria del Mar. Boasting private check-in and check-out, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. The accommodation provides full-day security, luggage storage space and organising tours for guests.

The units at the boat feature private entrance and soundproofing so guests can enjoy a peaceful stay. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a bath and bathrobes, all units at the boat have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also boast a seating area. At the boat, units include bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including warm dishes, fresh pastries and fruits is available for the continental breakfast. There is a coffee shop, bar and lounge.

For guests with children, the boat offers a baby safety gate. An indoor play area is also available at Southern Cross, while guests can also relax on the sun terrace.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Picasso Museum, Plaça Reial and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: The Corner Apartments by Aspasios
Description:
These stylish, spacious apartments are set in the Eixample district, 400 metres from Passeig de Gracia with its famous Gaudí monuments. They feature free Wi-Fi and fantastic city views.

Air-conditioned Aragó 312 Apartments feature modern decor. Lounges have a sofa and plasma TV, while kitchens include a dishwasher, microwave and hob. Some of the apartments have balconies with views of the Sagrada Familia and Tibidabo Mountain.

You can walk to Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia and Monumental Bullring in 15 minutes, while Plaza Catalunya is just 10 minutes’ walk away. Girona Metro Station is 3 minutes’ walk away, 4 stops from Barceloneta and its beach.

The Aragó 312 Apartments are 15 minutes’ walk from nord Bus Station and 5 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia Train and Metro Station, connecting you with Barcelona El Prat Airport and Girona.

Private parking is available nearby and guests receive discounts on tariffs of 3 days.

Name: Vincci Maritimo
Description:
Vincci Marítimo is located 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre and the CCIB Convention Centre. It offers bright, stylish rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi throughout.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Marítimo feature modern décor, with parquet floors and relaxing images of the sea. They come with a pillow menu and the private bathrooms contain a hairdryer. Rooms offer views of the charming Japanese Zen garden or Diagonal Mar Park.

The hotel’s Jardí de Mar Restaurant serves Mediterranean food using fresh ingredients. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs. The Ikebana Lounge Bar offers snacks, tapas and cocktails which can be enjoyed on the terrace.

The hotel’s reception is open 24 hours a day, allowing you greater flexibility during your stay. Laundry and car rental services are also available from the front desk.

The Vincci Marítimo is just 500 metres from Mar Bella Beach. Selva de Mar Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel, connecting you with the city centre in 15 minutes.

Name: Tendency Apartments 5
Description:
Located opposite the famous Casa Batlló, Tendency Apartments 5 offers modern apartments with air conditioning, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Most of the apartments overlook the famous Paseo de Gracia Boulevard.

Bright apartments feature a spacious living-dining room with a sofa bed; and a kitchen equipped with a dishwasher, hobs, and kitchenware. All have a washing machine, and cleaning products are also provided.

There are plenty of places to eat out nearby, and a 24-hour supermarket is a 10-minute walk away.

Ideally located, apartments are 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and popular Las Ramblas. Regular airport trains leave from Passeig de Gracia Train Station located just 300 metres away.

Name: Negresco Princess 4* Sup
Description:
Negresco Princess is situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia Region. The hotel has an outdoor pool and sun terrace, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.  For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. Negresco Princess features free WiFi throughout the property.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Plaça Catalunya is 400 metres from Negresco Princess, while Portal de l'Angel is 500 metres away. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 13 km from Negresco Princess.

Name: Hostal Barcelona Travel
Description:
Barcelona Travel is located in a Modernist building from the XIX century in the centre of Barcelona, a little over 5 minutes' walk from Gran Vía Avenue and Plaça Universitat Square. Free WiFi access is available.

Each modern, air-conditioned room features parquet floors and a 40-inch flat-screen TV. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Tourist information can be provided at the reception, and bikes and car rental are also available. Transportation to Barcelona El Prat Airport, located 20 minutes away by car, can be arranged.

The guest house is 850 metres from Passeig de Gracia Station, and Plaça Catalunya is 10 minutes away on foot.

Name: Brummell Apartments Montjuic
Description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a private pool, Brummell Apartments Montjuic is set in Barcelona. Boasting a lift, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. Offering free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking apartment features a sauna.

The apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. The unit has soundproofing and an a bath or shower.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Brummell Apartments Montjuic include Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Portal de l'Angel and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Nordic apartment Sagrada Familia
Description:
Nordic apartment Sagrada Familia is set in the Sant Martí district of Barcelona, 2.5 km from La Pedrera, 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia and 3 km from Casa Batllo. It is situated 1 km from Sagrada Familia and features a lift. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The apartment with a patio and inner courtyard views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Sightseeing tours are available within a reachable distance of the property.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.5 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Nordic apartment Sagrada Familia.

Name: Ikonik Ramblas
Description:
This ultra-modern hotel is located right on central Barcelona’s Ramblas, just 300 metres from the seafront promenade. It offers stylish, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The rooms at the Ikonik Ramblas feature parquet floors and chic décor. Each one comes with a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what Barcelona has to offer. They can also help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events.

Many famous sites are within easy walking distance. The Liceu Theatre is 400 metres away, while Plaza Real is a 3-minute walk away. Barcelona Cathedral is less 800 metres away.

You can walk to Barcelona’s famous Boquería Market in 7 minutes from the hotel. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located 15 minutes’ walk away.

Name: La Maison de Barcelone
Description:
Located in the centre of Barcelona, 600 metres from Casa Batllo and less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, La Maison de Barcelone offers free WiFi and air conditioning. The property features city views and is 1.2 km from Tivoli Theatre and 300 metres from La Pedrera. Staff on-site can arrange a shuttle service.

At the guest house, every unit has a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units are equipped with a safety deposit box, while certain rooms include a balcony and others also offer garden views. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Passeig de Gracia, Plaça Catalunya and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: La Fira - Paralelo 1
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 700 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 2.7 km from Sants Railway Station, La Fira - Paralelo 1 offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.7 km from Plaça Catalunya.

The 2-bedroom apartment features a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau Sant Jordi, Boqueria Market and Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Ferran Pedralbes Penthouse
Description:
Offering city views, Ferran Pedralbes Penthouse is an accommodation located in Barcelona, 2.9 km from Sants Railway Station and 3.7 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is soundproof and is set 1.7 km from Camp Nou.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with mountain views. The air-conditioned unit at the property features a shower and a dressing room. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach.

Passeig de Gracia is 3.8 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 12 km from Ferran Pedralbes Penthouse, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Monument Hotel
Description:
Located on the fashionable Paseo de Gracia, within 5 minutes’ walk from both Gaudi’s masterpieces Casa Battló and La Pedrera, Monument Hotel offers luxury services including a gourmet restaurant and a spa.

Elegantly decorated, all soundproofed rooms have a flat-screen TV with pay-per-view channels, Bluetooth sound system, and a safe deposit box with plug for charging laptop devices. Most of the room types have a private bathroom with a free-standing bath, velour bathrobe and luxury toiletries. Most of the rooms have a balcony with city views.

The 3 Michelin-starred restaurant, Lasarte, offers a range of options designed by the chef Martin Berasategui; while the on-site bistro-style restaurant, Oria, serves fresh cuisine following the Mediterranean gastronomy.

Monument Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas; regular trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport leave from Paseo de Gracia Train Station, located 300 metres away. Free high-speed WiFi is provided.

The hotel is housed on Enric Batllo’s house, an architectural jewel of 19th century that constitutes one of the characteristic works of the Eixample Quadrat d'Or and which gives it the Specialty Monument status.

Name: Barcelona Family Beach
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 700 metres from Llevant and less than 1 km from Mar Bella Beach, Barcelona Family Beach offers free WiFi and air conditioning. Housed in a building dating from 1960, this apartment is 3.8 km from Port Olimpic and 3.9 km from Sagrada Familia. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with inner courtyard views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Passeig de Gracia is 4.7 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 4.9 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 17 km away.

Name: Grand Hotel Central, Small Luxury Hotels
Description:
Grand Central Hotel Barcelona is a design hotel offering fantastic views of the Gothic Quarter and Barcelona Cathedral from its rooftop infinity pool. It has stylish rooms and free high-speed WiFi.

The elegantly refurbished hotel is housed in an early 20th-century building and it is a clear example of the Catalan Noucentisme.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Grand Hotel Barcelona have a modern design. They are equipped with a 4K high-definition TV´s with Chromecast . Each one has a bathroom with a large, rain-effect shower and luxury toiletries.

The restaurant offers an authentic Spanish-style dining experience with small "platillos" to be shared, as well as a selection of over 150 local and national wines. An excellent culinary proposal that will make you feel like a local. La Terraza del Central, in the rooftop, is the perfect place to enjoy a dinner, a cocktail or both overlooking the city lights of Barcelona.

The hotel has a fitness centre and massage services are also offered. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona, and you can also hire a car or a bicycle.

The Born district, full of stylish shops and restaurants, is just 3 minutes’ walk from the Grand Central Hotel.

Name: Mercer Hotel Barcelona
Description:
Featuring a rooftop swimming pool, Mercer Hotel Barcelona is set in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, within 10 minutes’ walk of Las Ramblas. This boutique hotel is set in one of the city’s ancient buildings, next to the Roman walls.

The stylish rooms at Mercer Hotel Barcelona have chic décor with original beamed ceilings and exposed brick walls. There is free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and flat-screen satellite TV. The bathroom has a rain-effect shower.

The hotel features an interior courtyard with orange trees. There is also a poolside bar and a terrace with loungers.

Several cafés, bars and restaurants can be found in the charming, winding streets and pretty squares surrounding the hotel.

Jaume I Metro Station is just 5 minutes’ walk from the Mercer. The trendy Born district is approximately 300 metres away, while Barcelona Cathedral can be reached in 5 minutes by foot.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Pellaires
Description:
Located within 700 metres of Llevant and 800 metres of Mar Bella Beach, Stay U-nique Apartments Pellaires provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment features family rooms.

Each unit is equipped with a terrace, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Nova Mar Bella Beach is less than 1 km from the apartment, while Somorrostro Beach is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Pellaires.

Name: Apartments BCN Central-Drassanes
Description:
Apartments BCN Central-Drassanes has a patio and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.5 km of Santa Maria del Mar and 1.7 km of Picasso Museum. Boasting a lift, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Barceloneta Beach is 2.4 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Passeig de Gracia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Central Apartment
Description:
Set in the Ciutat Vella district in Barcelona, this apartment is 600 metres from Plaza Reial. The apartment is a 6-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya and from Las Ramblas. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property.

There is a seating area and a fully equipped kitchen fitted with an oven, a washing machine, a dishwasher, and a coffee machine. Air conditioning is available in all rooms. Towels and bed linen are featured in this apartment.

La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 900 metres from Central Apartment, while Portal de l'Angel is 900 metres away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the property.

Name: Ideal 2 bedroom apartment close to Plaza ESpaña
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 800 metres from Sants Railway Station and 2.9 km from Camp Nou, Ideal 2 bedroom apartment close to Plaza ESpaña offers air conditioning. It is situated 3.4 km from Casa Batllo and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.6 km away.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a washing machine and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Palau Sant Jordi is 3.5 km from Ideal 2 bedroom apartment close to Plaza ESpaña, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.5 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km away.

Name: Casa Vaganto
Description:
In a prime location in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, Casa Vaganto is located 1.6 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, 1.6 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.8 km from Santa Maria del Mar. This 3-star hotel offers a concierge service, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is allergy-free and is set 2.9 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near Casa Vaganto include Portal de l'Angel, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Casa Balmes
Description:
Casa Balmes is a bed and breakfast located in the very centre of Barcelona, 400 metres from the well-known Passeig de Gràcia Avenue and monuments like Casa Batlló. Free WiFi access is available.

Each air-conditioned room at Casa Balmes is soundproof and has elegant décor, as well as a full HD flat-screen TV and a minibar. There is also a free safe and a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries. Bed linen and towels are included. Some rooms have street views.

At Casa Balmes you will find a terrace and a shared lounge with vending machines. A daily breakfast consisting of fruit juices, coffee, tea, toast, jams, cereals and a selection of pastries is included.

Other services offered at the property include tourist information, luggage storage and laundry. Guests can find a sports centre with gym and spa just 80 metres away from the b&b.

Casa Balmes is 8 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya. Barcelona El Prat Airport is less than 20 minutes by car.

Name: Vincci Mae
Description:
Set beside Barcelona's Francesc Macià Square, Vincci Mae features a terrace with a plunge pool and fantastic views of Diagonal Avenue and Tibidabo Mountain.

Vincci Mae boasts an on-site restaurant and bar, it also has a 24-hour front desk and offers free WiFi throughout the property.  An assorted buffet breakfast is offered everyday.

Stylish rooms feature a simple and bright décor, air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, kettle, and minibar. The fancy private bathroom includes a shower, free toiletries ,and a hairdryer.

Casa Batlló is 1.6 km from Vincci Mae, while La Pedrera is 1.3 km away. You can reach Plaza Catalunya in 20 minutes in public transport.

Name: You Stylish Sagrada Familia Apartments
Description:
Located within 2.8 km of Nova Icaria Beach and 500 metres of Sagrada Familia in Barcelona, You Stylish Sagrada Familia Apartments features accommodation with seating area. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides a shuttle service, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. There is also a dining area and a fully equipped kitchen equipped with a microwave, a toaster, and a fridge. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the area.

Casa Batllo is 2.4 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 2.4 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Hostal Barcelona Centro
Description:
Within 5 minutes’ walk of Passeig de Gràcia and Catalunya Metro and railway stations, Hostal Barcelona Centro offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Each air-conditioned room at Hostal Barcelona Centro has a flat-screen TV, heating and private bathroom.

Restaurants, bars and cafés can be found on Passeig de Gràcia and around Las Ramblas, 10 minutes' walking from Hostal Barcelona Centro.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera can be reached in 5 minutes by foot. Plaza de Catalunya and the Gothic Quarter are within 600 metres of the guest house.

Name: Apartment Fluvia Duplex
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.6 km from Llevant and 1.8 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach, Apartment Fluvia Duplex offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are private check-in and check-out and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Staff on-site can arrange a shuttle service.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Mar Bella Beach is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Sagrada Familia is 3 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 17 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Palau de la música 7
Description:
Palau de la música 7 in Barcelona provides accommodation with free WiFi, 1.9 km from Somorrostro Beach, 2 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 500 metres from Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is located 700 metres from Santa Maria del Mar, 1.1 km from Plaça Reial and 400 metres from Picasso Museum. The property is 600 metres from the city centre and 1.9 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The 2-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen and 1 bathroom. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Passeig de Gracia and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Bird House
Description:
Offering modern rooms with free WiFi, Bird House is just 30 metres from Urgell Metro Station and within 15 minutes’ walk of Plaza de Catalunya, Las Ramblas and Plaza Espanya.

Featuring high ceilings, each air-conditioned room at Bird House has bright, minimalist décor. There is heating and access to shared bathroom facilities. The bedrooms also include free WiFi, a wardrobe and a desk. Bed linen and towels are provided.

It offers use of a shared kitchen and serves breakfast.

Restaurants, bars and cafés can be found around Sant Antoni District, 5 minutes' walk away. Passeig de Gràcia is a 15-minute walk away.

The Airport Bus stops 30 metres away from Bird House, at Gran Via-Urgell bus stop. The MACBA Modern Art Museum is less than 1 km from the Bird House, while Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló houses can be reached in 20 minutes by foot.

Name: Habitat Apartments Alissia
Description:
Habitat Apartments Alissia features accommodation within 800 metres of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. It is situated 1.7 km from Somorrostro Beach and provides a lift. The apartment has family rooms.

Fitted with a balcony, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Kitchenware is also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available around the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Barceloneta Beach, Sant Miquel Beach and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Habitat Apartments Alissia.

Name: Apartment Centro- Passeig de Gracia - Casa Batllo by Interhome
Description:
In a central area of Barcelona, set within a short distance of Passeig de Gracia and Casa Batllo, Apartment Centro- Passeig de Gracia - Casa Batllo by Interhome offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. It is situated 400 metres from La Pedrera and offers a lift. Cathedral of Barcelona is 1.4 km from the apartment and Plaça Catalunya is less than 1 km away.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Aspasios Verdi Apartments
Description:
Set in Barcelona’s trendy Gracia district, a 5-minute walk from Joanic Metro Station, Cool Gracia Apartments offer free WiFi and air conditioning. There is a communal roof terrace and chill out area.

These modern air-conditioned apartments offer a living room with a flat-screen TV and sofa bed, dining area and a balcony. A fridge, microwave, coffee maker and kettle can be found in the kitchen. The bathroom comes with a shower and hairdryer.

There is a supermarket within 200 metres, as well as many shops, bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk.

Plaza Catalunya is 10 minutes away by Metro and Passeig de Gracia with its famous Gaudi monuments and designer shops is a 15-minute walk.

Name: Fira Plaza España Apartment 3th floor balcony
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 800 metres from Sants Railway Station, Fira Plaza España Apartment 3th floor balcony offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This recently renovated apartment is located 2.9 km from Casa Batllo and 3.2 km from Palau Sant Jordi. The accommodation provides luggage storage space, private check-in and check-out and organising tours for guests.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and city views has 3 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Camp Nou is 3.3 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 3.3 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km away.

Name: Hostal Alogar
Description:
Hostal Alogar is located in the elegant Sant Gervasi neighborhood, near Diagonal Avenue. Our rooms have air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. It offers comfortable, good-value rooms and a car rental service.

Guests at the Alogar can make use of the communal kitchen with a hob, microwave and TV. Each room is allocated a different cupboard. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas and rooms.

Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

Muntaner Metro Station is 5 minutes’ walk away and from here you can get to Plaza Catalunya in 10 minutes. There are also several bus stops within a 5-minute walk.

Name: Hotel Barcelona Condal Mar Affiliated by Meliá
Description:
The contemporary Hotel Barcelona Condal Mar, managed by Meliá is set in a circular building, 10 minutes’ walk from Mar Bella Beach. It offers a 24-hour gym, and the rooftop pool offers impressive views of Barcelona.

The bright soundproofed rooms at the Hotel Barcelona Condal Mar are spacious and feature air conditioning, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. Each stylish room has a private bathroom and minibar. There are 2 phone lines.

The Barcelona Condal Mar lobby bar offers a range of cocktails. The bright snack lounge features modern armchairs. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the poolside bar. A buffet breakfast is served in the restaurant.

A special late check-out service, locker and transfer is available during the summer months for an extra cost.

The Barcelona Condal Mar is an 8-minute walk from Maresme Forum Metro Station and  a 2-minute walk from the nearest bus stop. The centre of Barcelona can be reached in around 15 minutes by Metro, Bus or Tram.

Name: Habitat Apartments Pedrera
Description:
Habitat Apartments Pedrera offers accommodation within 1.2 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. The property features city views and is 200 metres from Passeig de Gracia and 600 metres from Casa Batllo. The apartment has family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a toaster, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. There is also a stovetop, kitchenware and a kettle.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: BBarcelona Central Boutique Apartments
Description:
Situated within 1.2 km of Casa Batllo and 1.3 km of Passeig de Gracia, BBarcelona Central Boutique Apartments features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. It is located 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and provides a lift. Guests can access the apartment via private entrance.

Each unit has a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bath and a hair dryer. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while selected rooms also boast a terrace. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sants Railway Station and Magic Fountain of Montjuic. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Rambla Catalunya III
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Rambla Catalunya III features accommodation within 700 metres of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. It is situated 200 metres from Casa Batllo and offers a lift. The apartment has family rooms.

At the apartment complex, units are fitted with a wardrobe, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units are air conditioned and include a seating and/or dining area. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Rambla Catalunya III.

Name: NH Collection Barcelona Gran Hotel Calderon
Description:
The elegant NH Collection Barcelona Gran Hotel Calderón has an excellent location just off Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in central Barcelona. It has fitness centre and a year-round free rooftop pool with spectacular city views.

The air-conditioned rooms at the NH Collection Barcelona Gran Hotel Calderón feature free WiFi, a Nespresso machine and a private bathroom with a rain-effect shower and professional hairdryer.

Room service is also available 24 hours and the Eleven Bar serves cocktails and light snacks.

The breakfast buffet has a variety of high antioxidant dishes and a fresh juice corner. Breakfast can also be requested in your room, and a light early breakfast is available.

Staff in the Guest Relations department can help you throughout your stay and advise you on what to see and do in Barcelona.

The hotel is just one block away from Gaudí’s famous Casa Batlló. You can walk to the city’s Gothic Quarter in about 10 minutes.

Name: BBarcelona Marina Flat
Description:
Offering inner courtyard views, BBarcelona Marina Flat is an accommodation located in Barcelona, 2 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.2 km from Bogatell Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.8 km from Nova Icaria Beach.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views has 3 bedrooms, a living room, a TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet. The air-conditioned unit at the property features a bath and a dressing room. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sagrada Familia, Passeig de Gracia and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Apartaments Aragó565
Description:
These brand new apartments are located in the classy Eixample district of central Barcelona, surrounded by shops, restaurants and bars.

Ideal for families and groups of friends visiting this cultural mecca, the Suites Aragó 565 are connected to all of the city’s main sights by the convenient metro network. The awe-inspiring Sagrada Familia Gothic cathedral stands just 1.5 km from the property.

Each exterior apartment is air conditioned and soundproofed. Some also come with terraces.

Name: InBarcelonaSuites
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 500 metres from La Pedrera and 1.1 km from Casa Batllo, InBarcelonaSuites offers air conditioning. It is set 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 100 metres away.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and quiet street views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Plaça Catalunya and Sagrada Familia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: YOUTH HOSTEL - Central and Basic Drassanes
Description:
A 5-minute walk from Las Ramblas and Drassanes Metro Station, Pensión Solárium is set in Barcelona’s Ciutat Vella district. It has a lounge and a small terrace, where free Wi-Fi is available.

Pensión Solárium has simple, modern décor. Its rooms have either private or shared bathroom facilities.

The Pensión is within 10 minutes’ walk of a range of cafes and bars. The Raval and nearby Gothic Quarter offer a selection of popular restaurants.

Barcelona’s old Port is 500 metres away, while the beaches around Barceloneta are a 20-minute bus journey from the Solárium. Airport buses leave from Plaza de Catalunya, 2 Metro stops from Drassanes Station.

Name: Apartamento para 2 céntrico
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 2.5 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 2.8 km from Bogatell Beach, Apartamento para 2 céntrico offers air conditioning. It is set 600 metres from Sagrada Familia and features a lift. This pet-friendly apartment also has free WiFi.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a fridge, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. The accommodation is non-smoking.

La Pedrera is 2.3 km from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 2.5 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: BBarcelona Sagrada Familia Terrace Flat
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 2.9 km from Bogatell Beach and 600 metres from Sagrada Familia, BBarcelona Sagrada Familia Terrace Flat offers air conditioning. The property is set 2.1 km from La Pedrera, 2.4 km from Casa Batllo and 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.6 km away.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and city views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.9 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 3 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Lets Holidays Centric Apartment in Barcelona
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.3 km from La Pedrera and 1.7 km from Casa Batllo, Lets Holidays Centric Apartment in Barcelona offers air conditioning. It is set 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 800 metres away.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views features 3 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Plaça Catalunya is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from Lets Holidays Centric Apartment in Barcelona, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Abba Rambla Hotel
Description:
Abba Rambla Hotel is set in the Raval District, 500 metres from Las Ramblas and Liceu Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi and a sun terrace.

The modern, air-conditioned rooms at Abba Rambla feature satellite TV, a safe and minibar. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. Some rooms have a balcony with views.

There is a café-bar, where guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Room service and a pizza delivery option are available.

There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a bicycle or car from the tour desk. Parking can be reserved near the hotel for an additional charge.  Attractions including La Boqueria Market and the MACBA Museum are 5 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Aspasios Market Balconies Apartments
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Aspasios Market Balconies Apartments provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. It is situated 1.4 km from Plaça Catalunya and features a lift. The apartment features family rooms.

Each unit is equipped with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Mercer House Bòria BCN
Description:
This chic boutique hotel blends a carefully preserved, 18th-century setting with the most modern and impressive interior design. It lies in the fashionable La Ribera district of central Barcelona.

The Mercer House Bòria BCN is set in amongst the narrow, atmospheric streets just to the north of the famous El Born district. Its original 18th-century façade has been well-preserved and adds to the hotel’s unique charm. Inside, each suite and room has a clean, contemporary style complemented by works of modern art by young local artists.

To get an idea of the Boria’s great location, head to its own rooftop sun terrace, where you can look out over the city’s Gothic cathedral, the beautiful nearby church of Santa María del Mar and the Old Port beyond.

Name: Hotel Condal
Description:
Set 50 metres from Las Ramblas and Liceu Metro Station, Hotel Condal offers rooms with free WiFi and private bathrooms. Opened in 1850, this hotel in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter offers air conditioned or heated accommodation, depending on the season.

The Condal’s rooms have simple décor with tiled floors. Each room has a flat-screen TV.

A continental breakfast is served in Hotel Condal’s café-bar. There is a varied selection of restaurants in the streets surrounding the hotel.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona’s many attractions, including the MACBA Museum and Barcelona Cathedral, which can be reached in 10 minutes by foot. The Condal is less than 1 km from Port Vell Marina.

Name: Habitat Apartments Paseo de Gracia
Description:
Located within a few steps of Passeig de Gracia and 70 metres of Casa Batllo in the centre of Barcelona, Habitat Apartments Paseo de Gracia provides accommodation with free WiFi and seating area. It is set 300 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and offers a lift. The apartment features family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. There is also a fully equipped kitchen in some of the units equipped with kitchenware. At the apartment complex, all units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, La Pedrera and Plaça Catalunya. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Hostal Mont Thabor
Description:
This comfortable guest house is set on Las Ramblas, 50 metres from the Boqueria Market. It offers free Wi-Fi and, 24-hour reception and cosy rooms with a TV, 1 minutes’ walk from Liceu Metro Station.

Hostal Mont Thabor’s bright rooms feature modern décor and some include a balcony, in some cases, overlooking Las Ramblas. Bathrooms are shared or private.

The property offers free passes to nightclubs and has a comfortable TV lounge and computer. There is a gift shop on the ground floor and several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk.

The property is within 5 minutes’ walk of Barcelona Cathedral and Plaza Real. The MACBA Contemporary Art Museum is 600 metres away and chic Passeig de Gracia is 10 minutes’ walk away.

The Mont Thabor is 10 minutes’ walk from the port. You can catch a direct bus to Barcelona El Prat Airport from plaza Catalunya, 500 metres away.

Name: 41COB1019- Charming rustic apartment
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.6 km from Portal de l'Angel, 41COB1019- Charming rustic apartment offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is situated 1.7 km from Tivoli Theatre and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Boqueria Market and Magic Fountain of Montjuic. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Gothic - Ramblas Apartments
Description:
Located in the centre of Barcelona, 1.9 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and 1.9 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Gothic - Ramblas Apartments offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is set 2 km from Barceloneta Beach and provides a lift. The apartment features family rooms.

Each unit comes with a balcony, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Reial, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Passeig de Gracia II
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Passeig de Gracia, Stay U-nique Apartments Passeig de Gracia II features free WiFi and a washing machine. It is located 400 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and provides a lift. The property is 100 metres from Casa Batllo, and within 800 metres of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, La Pedrera and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Passeig de Gracia II.

Name: Alguera Apartments Industria
Description:
Offering free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV and a modern kitchen, these stylish apartments are a 10-minute walk from the Sagrada Familia. Sant Pau Hospital, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is just 1 block away.

Every air-conditioned Alguera Industria apartment has 2 bedrooms, each with a private bathroom. All have a living-dining room with double sofa bed, and some have a balcony overlooking the street.

You can prepare meals in your kitchen, which includes a kettle, microwave, dishwasher and washing machine. Various supermarkets, cafés and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk of Alguera Apartments Industria.

Only 100 metres away, Sant Pau / Dos De Maig Metro Station offers easy access to the city centre. Direct trains connect the station to the Sagrada Familia and Camp Nou Football Stadium.

Name: Alexandra Barcelona Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton
Description:
Located between the stylish Paseo de Gràcia and Rambla de Catalunya, Alexandra Barcelona Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton offers a private terrace with an outdoor pool. Plaza Catalunya is 7 minutes' walk away.

Rooms combine modern and vintage furniture and some feature traditional details like mosaic-tiled floors. They have flat-screen TVs, a minibar, hairdryer and free safe. The TVs have over 50, some international channels and free WiFi.

Solomillo Restaurant is a brasserie, offering guests the option of having meat by weight. The modern Charcuteria serves cheese plates, cold cuts and market products, as well as a variety of cocktails. You can also visit the Patio, Terrace & Pool.

There is a fitness room and guests can make use of the chromatic sauna for free. Massages are available on request for an extra cost.

Alexandra Barcelona Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton is just 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s impressive Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. Passeig de Gràcia Train Station is 5 minutes’ walk away, with a direct route to the Barcelona Airport.

Name: Vincci Gala
Description:
Located in the heart of Barcelona, Vincci Gala hotel offers luxurious rooms in a protected 19th-century palace. Free Wi-Fi is available.

The orginal façade, floor and central staircase of this unique hotel have all been preserved, creating a balance of traditional arquitecture and modern design.

The air-conditioned rooms include a private bathroom with hairdryer, free toiletries, and bath or shower. The rooms also come with a free laptop safe, extra large beds, satellite TV with pay-per-view channels, and a minibar.

A restaurant and snack bar are available on-site, and the hotel offers a breakfast buffet. Laundry and car rental services are available at a surcharge, and the property can provide tourist information.

Vincci Gala hotel is located opposite Urquinaona Metro Station, 2 minutes' walk from Plaça Catalunya Square.  There are many bars, restaurants and shops in the surroundings, and you can reach Gaudi's La Sagrada Familia in 15 minutes by metro.

Name: New 2 bedroom apartment in Plaza España
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Sants Railway Station and 1.8 km from Palau Sant Jordi, New 2 bedroom apartment in Plaza España offers air conditioning. It is located 3.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

The spacious apartment features 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is available. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Camp Nou is 3.5 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 3.7 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km away.

Name: Casa Consell Bailen, Guest House
Description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, Casa Consell Bailen, Guest House is a recently renovated accommodation, which offers soundproof rooms. It is situated 2.8 km from Barceloneta Beach and features a shared kitchen. The guest house has family rooms.

All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Units come with a private bathroom, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while some rooms also feature a terrace and some have city views. At the guest house, the units include bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach of the property.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Casa Consell Bailen, Guest House.

Name: Hotel El Call
Description:
Hotel Call Barcelona is located right in the centre of Barcelona’s historic Barri Gótic, 10 minutes' walk from Las Ramblas. It is close to Plaça Sant Jaume and not far from the Cathedral.

The rooms in the Hotel Call are spacious and practical. It offers air conditioned or heated accommodation, depending on the season. There is free Wi-Fi and a safe. The bathrooms have a shower.

The nearest Metro stops are Jaume I and Liceu, both about 10 minutes’ away. The famous Ramblas are also about 10 minutes’ walk away.

Hotel Call is also close to central Barcelona’s main shopping areas such as Portaferrisa and Portal de L'Àngel. The trendy Born area is also close by – here you will find plenty of restaurants and bars.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Beltrán i Rózpide
Description:
Set in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Stay U-nique Apartments Beltrán i Rózpide features a balcony. It is situated 1.4 km from Camp Nou and offers a lift. Offering free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking apartment has a fitness room.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Sants Railway Station is 3.1 km from the apartment, while Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 3.9 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Brummell Apartments Poble Sec
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.8 km from Plaça Catalunya, Brummell Apartments Poble Sec offers a rooftop pool and air conditioning. It is located 1.8 km from Portal de l'Angel and features a lift. Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking apartment features a sauna.

The apartment with a terrace and city views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Brummell Apartments Poble Sec include Palau Sant Jordi, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Villa Modernista
Description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a private pool, garden view and a patio, Villa Modernista is located in Barcelona. 2.9 km from Sagrada Familia and 3.7 km from Park Güell, the property provides a garden and barbecue facilities. Providing free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking villa features a solarium.

The villa is equipped with 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with pool views. Guests can take in the ambience of the surroundings from an outdoor dining area. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Passeig de Gracia is 4.1 km from the villa, while La Pedrera is 4.2 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 17 km from the property.

Name: Hesperia Barcelona Barri Gòtic
Description:
Conveniently set in Barcelona, Hesperia Barcelona Barri Gòtic provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. The property is close to Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Passeig de Gracia. The property is allergy-free and is located 1.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

All units are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Every room is equipped with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while selected rooms have a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. The units include a safety deposit box.

A continental breakfast is available at the hotel.

A business centre and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at Hesperia Barcelona Barri Gòtic. Languages spoken at the reception include Catalan, English and Spanish, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sant Sebastian Beach, Barceloneta Beach and Plaça Reial. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Alcam Studio Alio3
Description:
Alcam Studio Alio3 features a terrace and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.1 km of Passeig de Gracia and less than 1 km of Sagrada Familia. The property is situated 1.6 km from Casa Batllo, 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 2.3 km from Tivoli Theatre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 1.2 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.5 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Alma Barcelona GL
Description:
Alma Barcelona is set in an attractive building just off Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia. It offers a spa, a stylish restaurant with a terrace, and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Alma Barcelona rooms feature smart, modern décor and leather armchairs. They are equipped with a flat-screen Loewe TV, Punkt phone, and the private bathrooms come with a bathrobe and slippers.

The Alma’s spa features an indoor pool, a Hammam and a sauna. There is a gym, and massage is also available.

Staff at the Alma’s 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona’s many attractions. On request, the hotel offers an airport shuttle service to Barcelona El Prat Airport, a 25-minute drive away.

The hotel is just one block from Gaudí’s La Pedrera and a 5-minute walk from Casa Batlló. You can walk to Diagonal Metro Station in 5 minutes, while Plaza de Catalunya is just over 1 km away.

Name: Aticco Living Gràcia - Apartments Rooftop
Description:
Set within less than 1 km of Passeig de Gracia and a 15-minute walk of La Pedrera, Aticco Living Gràcia - Apartments Rooftop features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. This recently renovated apartment is located 1.8 km from Casa Batllo and 1.6 km from Park Güell. The accommodation offers a fitness room, free WiFi throughout the property and family rooms.

The apartment provides guests with a terrace, city views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A fridge and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 2.7 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Close to Passeig de Gracia
Description:
Set in a renovated modernist building, Close to Passeig de Gracia B&B is located in Barcelona. This bed and breakfast is located 150 metres from Girona Metro Station and offers free WiFi.

Fitted with tiled flooring and featuring high ceilings and large windows, this accommodation offers air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a dining table.

Each room has 1 double bed and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hairdryer, and shower.

Passeig de Gracia, famous for its luxury shops, is just 500 metres from Close to Passeig de Gracia B&B, and there are several shops and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the property.

Gaudi's famous La Pedrera is 1 km from the property. Plaza Catalunya is 10 minutes away on foot.

Name: Fantastic 3 bedroom apartment in Sants
Description:
Fantastic 3 bedroom apartment in Sants is situated in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, 1.5 km from Sants Railway Station, 3 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 3.8 km from Palau Sant Jordi. The property is located 4.9 km from Passeig de Gracia, 5 km from La Pedrera and 5.1 km from Casa Batllo. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Camp Nou is 2 km away.

The apartment consists of 3 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom and a living room. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Montjuïc is 5.2 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 5.5 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km away.

Name: Barcelona Chic Apartments- Free PARKING - 10 min from BCN city centre by metro
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 2.6 km from Sagrada Familia and 4.2 km from La Pedrera, Barcelona Chic Apartments- Free PARKING - 10 min from BCN city centre by metro offers air conditioning. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 4.3 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the quiet street views.

Passeig de Gracia is 4.5 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 4.8 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from Barcelona Chic Apartments- Free PARKING - 10 min from BCN city centre by metro.

Name: B&B Boutique Ca La Maria
Description:
Set next to Rambla Catalunya Street, Ca La Maria Barcelona is centrally located in Barcelona. The bed & breakfast offers rooms in a stylish apartment with free Wi-Fi and air conditioning.

Featuring high ceilings and modern décor, each room has a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a shower and some of them also include a bathtub.

Guests have access to a large wooden sun terrace, including a garden and a covered area with a dining table. There is also a spacious shared lounge. A breakfast buffet is available, as well as a bar where guests can get drinks and snacks.

Gaudi’s Pedrera Building is only 5 minutes’ walk from the bed & breakfast. There is a large variety of bars and restaurants in the area. Guests can find Diagonal Metro Station 300 metres from the property and Plaça Catalunya is 2 metro stops away.

Name: ApartEasy - MONUMENT, large, cosy apartment
Description:
ApartEasy - MONUMENT, large, cosy apartment is situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 2.6 km from Somorrostro Beach, 2.9 km from Barceloneta Beach and less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.3 km from Tivoli Theatre. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.5 km from Nova Icaria Beach.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, La Pedrera and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Housalia Corsega - Apartment 3 bedrooms next to Sagrada Familia
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 500 metres from Sagrada Familia and 2 km from La Pedrera, Housalia Corsega - Apartment 3 bedrooms next to Sagrada Familia offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.1 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Casa Batllo is 2.5 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Sarriá - Sant Gervasi
Description:
Situated within the Sarrià-St. Gervasi district in Barcelona, Sarriá - Sant Gervasi has air conditioning, a terrace, and city views. With quiet street views, this accommodation provides a balcony. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a lift and free WiFi.

Boasting a DVD player, the spacious apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 3 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower and a hot tub. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, La Pedrera and Sants Railway Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Creu Fira Hostafrancs
Description:
Creu Fira Hostafrancs is situated in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, less than 1 km from Sants Railway Station, 3 km from Casa Batllo and 3 km from Palau Sant Jordi. The property is located 3 km from Camp Nou, 3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 3.4 km from Plaça Catalunya. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.1 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 1 separate bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is available. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia is 3.5 km from the apartment, while Boqueria Market is 3.7 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km away.

Name: RIUS33 - Apartamento al lado de las Fuentes de Montjuic
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Palau Sant Jordi and 2.4 km from Passeig de Gracia, RIUS33 - Apartamento al lado de las Fuentes de Montjuic offers air conditioning. The property is set 1.9 km from Sants Railway Station, 2.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and 2.6 km from Portal de l'Angel. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 300 metres away.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with a hair dryer. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.6 km from RIUS33 - Apartamento al lado de las Fuentes de Montjuic, while Boqueria Market is 2.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Quiet apartment! Sagrada Familia!
Description:
Quiet apartment! Sagrada Familia! is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 400 metres from Sagrada Familia, 1.5 km from La Pedrera and 1.6 km from Casa Batllo. The property is around 2.6 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 3.2 km from Plaça Catalunya and 3.3 km from Picasso Museum. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.9 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a kettle, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Quiet apartment! Sagrada Familia! include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Central Suites Barcelona
Description:
These modern, air-conditioned apartments are located on the tree-lined Rambla de Catalunya, just one block from Barcelona’s famous Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. Casa Batlló is 300 metres away.

Set in an attractive Modernist building, apartments have tiled floors and high ceilings. Each one has a modern kitchen with an oven, washing machine and dishwasher. There is a Nespresso Coffee Machine, and free capsules are provided. All have free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen and DVD player. Bed linen and towels are provided.

There are plenty of bars and restaurants within a 2-minute walk of the apartments.

Central Suites Barcelona is just 400 metres from Plaza Catalunya where you can find regular buses to Airport; and a 5-minute walk from Ramblas. The closest metro station is Passeig de Gracia, 2 minutes’ walk from the apartment.

Name: Habitat Apartments ADN
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 120 metres from Hostafrancs Metro Station, Habitat Apartments ADN offers air conditioning, heating, and free WiFi.

The apartments feature modern décor and include a living room with a sofa bed and flat-screen TV. Each also has a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher, washing machine, and hob.

The apartments have 1 or 2 bedrooms, as well as a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. Toiletries, towels, and bed linen are provided.

Arenas Shopping Centre is 600 metres from the property and it includes a big supermarket and a number of rooftop restaurants with panoramic views of the city. Sants Train Station, where you can catch a train to the airport, is a 10-minute walk away.

Name: Umma Barcelona B&B Boutique
Description:
Umma Barcelona B&B Boutique offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom. The property is 10 minutes’ walk from both La Pedrera and fashionable Passeig the Gracia.

Featuring an elegant décor, rooms at Umma Barcelona B&B Boutique have a flat-screen TV, free safe and a wardrobe. The private bathroom comes with shower, free toiletries and hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony with street views.

A breakfast is served every morning at Umma Barcelona B&B Boutique. Several restaurant, traditional tapas bars and shops can be found in the surrounding area. Some of the trendiest bars are in Gracia District, 500 metres away.
