Umma Barcelona B&B Boutique is in the Eixample District of Barcelona. You can walk to Gaudi’s Casa Batlló in 15 minutes. The closest metro station is Diagonal Metro Station, just 400 metres away. Trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport leave from a train station located 1 km away.

Name: Casa Lolita
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 2.9 km from Somorrostro Beach and 800 metres from the centre, Casa Lolita features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a terrace. The property is set 2.9 km from Barceloneta Beach, 700 metres from Tivoli Theatre and 1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana. The accommodation offers a lift, a shared kitchen and luggage storage for guests.

At the guest house, every unit is fitted with a wardrobe. Some units have a balcony and/or a patio with city or inner courtyard views. All units in the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV with streaming services and with satellite channels.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: 12PAR1003 - Luminoso piso en Paralelo
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 700 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya, 12PAR1003 - Luminoso piso en Paralelo features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 2.6 km from Portal de l'Angel and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Sants Railway Station and Palau Sant Jordi. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Tendency Apartments 9
Description:
Centrally located, just 3 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia Metro and Train Station, these modern air-conditioned apartments offer 4 or 5 bedrooms. Each apartment features free WiFi and a balcony with garden views.

The spacious living rooms come with a flat-screen TV and DVD player. Private bathrooms have a shower. Each apartment offers a well-equipped kitchen, which includes a dishwasher and washing machine. Towels and bed linen are provided.

Thanks to its central location, you will find lots of shops, bars and restaurants in the immediate area. The famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló buildings on Passeig de Gracia are a 5-minute walk away.

Name: Apartments Sata Sagrada Familia Area
Description:
These apartments are located in a quiet area of Barcelona’s Gràcia district, just 10 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s impressive Sagrada Família Basilica. They feature free Wi-Fi and a washing machine.

The air-conditioned apartments at Apartaments Sata Sagrada Familia Area feature tiled floors and modern décor. The lounge has a TV and a sofa, and the kitchen includes a microwave, hob and toaster.

Apartamentos Sata Sagrada Familia Area are within 15 minutes walk of Parc Güell and the amazing Hospital Sant Pau. Located 5 minutes’ walk away, Joanic Metro Station connects you with Passeig de Gràcia in just 3 minutes.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different apartments located in the same building. Please select a date and click on the apartments to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

Name: Estudio en Gracia 2
Description:
Estudio en Gracia 2 is located in the Gràcia district of Barcelona, 600 metres from La Pedrera, 1.1 km from Casa Batllo and 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is situated 2.8 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 3 km from Park Güell and 3.4 km from Portal de l'Angel. The property is non-smoking and is set 300 metres from Passeig de Gracia.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV and a kitchen with an oven and stovetop. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Plaça Catalunya and Sagrada Familia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Cotton House Hotel, Autograph Collection
Description:
Located just 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya, Cotton House Hotel, Autograph Collection, A Marriott Luxury & Lifestyle Hotel, offers elegantly decorated rooms, free WiFi, a seasonal outdoor pool and an on-site restaurant.

Formerly the headquarters of the Association of Cotton House Manufacturers, the building features a beautiful vestibule, a conservatory, several lounges and a library.

On the sixth floor you will find the pool, as well as a gym and a massage room.

Air-conditioned rooms come with flat-screen TVs and a sofa. Their private bathrooms include free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Cotton House Hotel, Autograph Collection, A Marriott Luxury & Lifestyle Hotel has a stylish bar, as well as its own restaurant. Guests can also enjoy some Spanish Tapas on the terrace. You will find a wide range of dining options and shops in the surrounding streets.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is just 400 metres from the Hotel and trains to the airport stop there.

Name: BizFlats Eixample Apartments
Description:
BizFlats Eixample Apartments has a hot tub and air-conditioned guest accommodation in the centre of Barcelona, 500 metres from La Pedrera, 400 metres from Casa Batllo and 800 metres from Passeig de Gracia. The accommodation features a spa bath and a hot tub. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk and a lift for guests.

Featuring a well-fitted kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. Units have a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while some rooms also boast a terrace and some have quiet street views. At the apartment complex, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Housalia Gracia 2
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia and less than 1 km from La Pedrera, Housalia Gracia 2 offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is set 1.4 km from Sagrada Familia and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.5 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment has 3 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a TV. The property offers inner courtyard views.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Park Güell. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartment Arago II
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Passeig de Gracia, Stay U-nique Apartment Arago II has free WiFi and a washing machine. This apartment features accommodation with a balcony. The property is 600 metres from Casa Batllo, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Stay U-nique Apartment Arago II include Plaça Catalunya, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: 64 Apartment in a typical Barcelona's old building
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 3.1 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.9 km from Portal de l'Angel, 64 Apartment in a typical Barcelona's old building offers air conditioning. The property is around 3.3 km from Passeig de Gracia, 3.6 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and 1.8 km from Cathedral of Barcelona. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.3 km away.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau Sant Jordi, Boqueria Market and Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: TSA La Mare
Description:
Set within a 10-minute walk of La Pedrera in Barcelona, No 23 - The Streets Apartments Barcelona offers apartments in a same building with free WiFi.

Every unit has a well-equipped kitchen or kitchenette completed with an oven; while the bathroom has a shower. There is a washing machine, and bed linen and towels are provided.

Fresh produces can be found at the market located 700 metres away; and trendy bars, restaurants and shops are on the many surrounding public squares.

A 10-minute metro ride will take you to Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas.

Name: Weflating Diagonal
Description:
Weflating Diagonal is located in the Les Corts district of Barcelona, 2 km from La Pedrera, 1.7 km from Sants Railway Station and 2.4 km from Casa Batllo. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Sightseeing tours are available within a reachable distance.

Camp Nou is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.9 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Ola Living Paseo de Gracia
Description:
Ola Living Paseo de Gracia features accommodation within 1.2 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. It is situated a few steps from Passeig de Gracia and offers a lift. Tivoli Theatre is 1.1 km from the apartment and Plaça Catalunya is 1.2 km away.

All units are fitted with air conditioning, a TV, washing machine and coffee machine. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a kettle. All units have a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, La Pedrera and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Blau Atic Apartment
Description:
Situated in the centre of Barcelona, 2.2 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.2 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Blau Atic Apartment offers free WiFi and air conditioning. The property is close to Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Plaça Catalunya. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.3 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Cathedral of Barcelona and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Blau Atic Apartment.

Name: La Fira
Description:
Featuring free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, La Fira apartments are located within walking distance of various metro stations.

Each bright apartment offers a private bathroom with a shower, a seating area with sofa and TV, and a kitchen including a hob, coffee machine and toaster. All apartments are air-conditioned and they include a washing machine.

You will find numerous bars, shops and restaurants in the neighbourhood of Poble Sec.

La Fira apartments are located 1.3 km from Plaza España, an 10 minutes by metro from Plaça Catalunya Square and Las Ramblas Boulevard. Montjuic Castle is 2.2 km away.

Name: Housalia Sant Pau Views- Suite with View on Hospital Sant Pau
Description:
Offering city views, Housalia Sant Pau Views- Suite with View on Hospital Sant Pau is an accommodation situated in Barcelona, 2.8 km from La Pedrera and 3.1 km from Passeig de Gracia. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Casa Batllo is 3.3 km from the apartment, while Park Güell is 3.7 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km from the property.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Torrent
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 300 metres from Passeig de Gracia and 600 metres from La Pedrera, Stay U-nique Apartments Torrent provides air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. It is situated 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and offers private check-in and check-out. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.1 km from Casa Batllo.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Torrent.

Name: Hotel Coronado
Description:
Hotel Coronado is conveniently situated 200 metres from Paral•lel Metro Station and 15 minutes’ from Barcelona’s famous Ramblas. It offers free Wi-Fi throughout and reception is open 24 hours a day.

Rooms at Hotel Coronado feature a simple design and come with a private bathroom. They also include air conditioning and heating.

Guests can enjoy drinks and snacks at the bar-cafeteria in the lobby area. There are also many bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the hotel.

The Magic Fountains in the Montjuic area are 15 minutes’ walk from Hotel Coronado while Barcelona’s port is 10 minutes away.

Name: yök Casa Cultura
Description:
Yök Casa Cultura offers accommodation within 600 metres of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. With city views, this accommodation features a balcony. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

All units come with air conditioning, a stovetop, a minibar, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a desk. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. The units feature a private bathroom, free toiletries and bed linen.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach of the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: El Alma de las Ramblas
Description:
Offering city views, El Alma de las Ramblas is an accommodation located in Barcelona, 2.5 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.5 km from Barceloneta Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 200 metres from the city centre and 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a bath and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from El Alma de las Ramblas.

Name: Acacia Suite
Description:
Acacia Suite is located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, just 50 metres from Hospital Clinic Metro Station. It offers air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi and a shared roof terrace.

The modern apartments feature a lounge with carpeted floors, sofas and a TV. The kitchenette includes an electric hob and a microwave. Bed linen and towels are changed daily.

The Acacia serves a daily continental breakfast directly at the apartments. The aparthotel also has a free business centre. Board games are also available for guests’ use.

The Acacia offers discounts on Barcelona’s popular tourist bus. The city’s financial district is 800 metres away, and you can reach Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in 3 minutes by metro.

Please note that cradles are available in all rooms for no additional fee by request in advance.

Name: Bonito apartamento en Eixample
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Casa Batllo and 1.6 km from Plaça Catalunya, Bonito apartamento en Eixample offers air conditioning. The property is situated 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia, 1.9 km from Boqueria Market and 1.6 km from Sants Railway Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment provides a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, La Pedrera and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: INNSiDE by Meliá Barcelona Apolo
Description:
INNSiDE by Meliá Barcelona Apolo is located at the foot of Montjuïc, 7 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Ramblas. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with WiFi.

Refurbished in 2023, the rooms at INNSiDE by Meliá Barcelona Apolo feature smart décor and wooden floors. Each one has a flat-screen TV, minibar, work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel serves a varied buffet breakfast every morning. There is also a snack bar serving light meals in the evenings.

Parallel Metro Station is next to the hotel, connecting you with the Fira Convention Centre in 2 stops.

Name: Homenfun Barcelona Paseo de Gracia Diagonal
Description:
Homenfun Barcelona Paseo de Gracia Diagonal has a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 600 metres of La Pedrera and 1 km of Casa Batllo. Boasting a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, the apartment is close to several noted attractions, around 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1.6 km from Tivoli Theatre and 1.7 km from Plaça Catalunya. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 100 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 1 separate bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and 2 bathrooms. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2 km from the apartment, while Portal de l'Angel is 2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Homenfun Barcelona Paseo de Gracia Diagonal.

Name: MotorYacht 21 avec équipage
Description:
A recently renovated boat set in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, MotorYacht 21 avec équipage offers accommodation with with a terrace, parking on-site and free WiFi. The property has city views and is less than 1 km from Sant Miquel Beach and a 16-minute walk from Barceloneta Beach. The property is non-smoking and is located 700 metres from Sant Sebastian Beach.

The air-conditioned boat consists of 4 separate bedrooms, 4 bathrooms with a hair dryer, a seating area, and a living room. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the sea views. At the boat, there is a dressing room for guests to change in.

Guests at MotorYacht 21 avec équipage will be able to enjoy activities in and around Barcelona, like cycling.

Santa Maria del Mar is 2.5 km from the accommodation, while Picasso Museum is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from MotorYacht 21 avec équipage.

Name: Hostal Santa Ana
Description:
Hostal Santa Ana is located in the very centre of Barcelona, only 240 metres from Plaça Catalunya and 1 minute walk from Portal de l’Angel. It offers free Wi-Fi.

Luggage storage is offered, as well as services and tourist information.

Some rooms have a fan, a sink and heating, featuring a shared or a private bathroom.

There is a wide selection of shops, bars and restaurants in the area, as well as good links with public transport. El Corte Inglés Shopping Centre is 3 minutes’ walk away.

The bus stop with the airport bus line is 300 metres away, as well as the metro station.

Name: Alojamiento Viladomat
Description:
Alojamiento Viladomat is situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.2 km from Sants Railway Station, 1.8 km from Casa Batllo and 2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic. The property is set 2.2 km from Plaça Catalunya, 2.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia. The accommodation features a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

All units are fitted with a microwave, toaster, a coffee machine, a fridge and kettle. With a shared bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also boast free WiFi. At the bed and breakfast, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Tivoli Theatre is 2.4 km from the bed and breakfast, while La Pedrera is 1.5 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Aparthotel Bertrán
Description:
Aparthotel Bertrán is located in a quiet part of Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from Avinguda Tibidabo FGC Station and Vallcarca Metro. It offers spacious accommodation, a gym and an outdoor pool.

Each air-conditioned Bertrán apartment has a living room with satellite TV and a sofa. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer, and there is a kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker.

Some apartments have a private balcony with table and chairs. All apartments have free Wi-Fi.

A continental breakfast is available at the Bertrán, and you can have breakfast in your apartment. There is a supermarket 2 minutes’ walk away.

There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge.

You can reach Barcelona city centre in 15 minutes by train, Metro or bus, and there is a night bus stop nearby. Parc Güell is just over 1 km away.

Name: Rustic Poble Sec Apartment
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 2 km from Plaça Catalunya and 2 km from Portal de l'Angel, Rustic Poble Sec Apartment offers air conditioning. The property is located 3.1 km from Tivoli Theatre, 3.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and 2 km from Cathedral of Barcelona. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.1 km away.

The apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with quiet street views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau Sant Jordi, Boqueria Market and Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Hotel Medinaceli
Description:
The Hotel Medinaceli is a stylish hotel located in the original palace of the Dukes of Hotel Medinaceli which has the status of Specialty Monument. It is situated close to Barcelona Port and around 200 metres from the famous Las Ramblas.

Rooms at the Hotel Medinaceli are spacious and feature bright décor. Facilities include air conditioning and satellite TV.

Wi-Fi access is available in the hotel rooms.

The Hotel Medinaceli is situated close to many restaurants, bars and cafés.  There are several museums and landmarks nearby, including the Arc de Triomf, Plaça de Catalunya and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló.  The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Barcelona’s Estació de França Train Station.

Name: ICON Bcn
Description:
This boutique hotel is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia. It offers a free bicycle use, free WiFi

Each room at the ICON Bcn by Petit Palace features modern décor, a flat-screen TV and a shower.

Guests will find a bar and a restaurant with Mediterranean cuisine and reception is open 24 hours a day. The hotel also offers a scooter hire service, subject to availability.

ICON Bcn by Petit Palace is just 7 minutes’ walk from the Gothic Quarter, where you can find the Palau de la Música Catalana. Urquinaona and Paseo de Gracia Metro are less than 5 minutes’ walk away. Gaudi's La Pedrera is 750 metres away, and you can walk to Ciutadella Park in 15 minutes.

Name: Pensión Teruel
Description:
Located just 70 metres from Las Ramblas, this simple guest house features air-conditioned rooms with a balcony and free Wi-Fi. It has a 24-hour reception and is set just 200 metres from Plaza Catalunya.

Pensión Teruel’s spacious and comfortable rooms are bright and feature vibrant décor. Each includes central heating, a plasma TV and private bathroom with free toiletries. Air conditioning is available for an extra charge.

There are several bars and restaurants within 5 minutes’ walk. Barcelona Cathedral is 10 minutes’ walk away and Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, with its chic shops and Gaudí monuments, is 600 metres away.

Teruel offers luggage storage and is 2 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya Metro and Train Station. The Airport bus stop for Barcelona El Prat Airport is 5 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Apartamento cerca de la playa
Description:
Apartamento cerca de la playa is located in the Sant Martí district of Barcelona, 1.6 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach, 1.7 km from Forum Beach and 4.6 km from Port Olimpic. The property is around 5 km from Sagrada Familia, 5.3 km from Passeig de Gracia and 5.4 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Llevant is 1.3 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 3 separate bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is provided. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Tivoli Theatre is 5.5 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 5.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from Apartamento cerca de la playa.

Name: Habitat Apartments Eixample Balconies.
Description:
Habitat Apartments Eixample Balconies. Offers accommodation within 1.5 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. This apartment features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony. It is possible for guests to sit outside and enjoy the property grounds.

At the apartment complex, units come with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a kettle. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, La Pedrera and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Hostal Europa
Description:
This guest house is 100 metres from Liceu Metro Station and Barcelona’s famous Ramblas. Hostal Europa offers basic rooms in a central location, and has free Wi-Fi in public areas.

Most rooms at the Europa have shared bathroom facilities. Rooms with a private ensuite bathroom are available.

Barcelona’s main tourist attractions are within a short walk. The Boqueria Market is 200 metres from the Europa, and Barcelona Cathedral and Plaza Catalunya are a 5-minute walk away.

The Hostal Europa has a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car or bicycle at the tour desk.

A continental breakfast is served at a neighbouring restaurant.

Name: Eric Vökel Boutique Apartments - Gran Vía Suites
Description:
Eric Vökel Gran Via Suites are boutique apartments set in central Barcelona, 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza de Espanya Square. These chic apartments offer free WiFi access.

Each air-conditioned apartment at Eric Vökel has attractive, contemporary décor. All accommodation has a well-equipped kitchenette and a spacious living area with a flat-screen TV.

There are several bars and cafés within 100 metres of the Suites. Set on Gran Via Avenue, the apartments have easy access to a range of supermarkets and shops.

The Vökel is just 20 minutes’ walk from Montjuïc Mountain and Catalunya’s National Art Museum. The famous Las Ramblas and the surrounding Gothic Quarter can be reached in 10 minutes, by Metro.

Name: Eurostars Grand Marina Hotel GL
Description:
Set within the World Trade Center building, this 5-star design hotel overlooks Barcelona’s port and is a 5-minute walk from La Rambla. It features a seasonal rooftop pool, a gym and a spacious terrace.

The Eurostars Grand Marina Hotel GL offers modern rooms with wooden flooring and warm-coloured fabrics. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a spacious work desk are featured in each room. A pillow menu is also available.

The chic Grand Marina restaurant serves Mediterranean meals prepared with seasonal ingredients, while the lobby bar features exotic cocktails and live music. In the mornings, a rich breakfast is served on the terrace, weather permitting.

The Marina GL's gym offers cardiovascular equipment and free weights. Massage services are available.

Drassanes Metro Station, providing links to the rest of the city, is just 500 metres from the hotel while Barcelona Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Ola Living Santa Anna
Description:
Ola Living Santa Anna provides accommodation within 100 metres of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. Sant Miquel Beach is 2.3 km away and Somorrostro Beach is 2.4 km from the apartment.

All units in the apartment complex are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, the units at the apartment complex have a TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms include a terrace. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: MUNTANYA - Apartment with balcony Sagrada Familia
Description:
Located within 1.4 km of Sagrada Familia and 3.2 km of La Pedrera, MUNTANYA - Apartment with balcony Sagrada Familia provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.9 km away and Tivoli Theatre is 4 km from the apartment.

With a private bathroom equipped with a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also offer free WiFi, while selected rooms are fitted with a terrace. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Casa Batllo is 3.4 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.8 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km from the property.

Name: BBarcelona Diputació Flat
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 2.6 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.7 km from Nova Icaria Beach, BBarcelona Diputació Flat provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is set 1.3 km from Casa Batllo and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.9 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bath.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Sagrada Familia and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from BBarcelona Diputació Flat, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Habitacion privada en PISO COMPARTIDO Lepanto
Description:
Attractively located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Habitacion privada en PISO COMPARTIDO Lepanto is located 2.3 km from Casa Batllo, 1.8 km from La Pedrera and 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia. The property is around 2.8 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 2.9 km from Tivoli Theatre and 3.1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana. The property is non-smoking and is situated 300 metres from Sagrada Familia.

At the hostel, each room is equipped with a desk. Featuring a shared bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Habitacion privada en PISO COMPARTIDO Lepanto also feature free WiFi, while some rooms have a city view. At the accommodation the rooms include bed linen and towels.

Plaça Catalunya is 3.4 km from Habitacion privada en PISO COMPARTIDO Lepanto, while Portal de l'Angel is 3.7 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: ApartEasy - Lightly, central and quiet apartment
Description:
ApartEasy - Lightly, central and quiet apartment is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia and 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya. It is set 2 km from Casa Batllo and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is 1.1 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

La Pedrera is 1.7 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from ApartEasy - Lightly, central and quiet apartment.

Name: Sant Jordi Hostels Sagrada Familia
Description:
Registration number AJ000517

Sant Jordi Hostels Sagrada Familia is located just moments away from Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia Church. It offers shared dorms and private rooms. Free WiFi access is available in most areas.

Featuring skateboard-themed décor and an indoor mini-ramp, the hostel offers a shared guest kitchen and lounge, as well as a stylish lobby with computer facilities.

All dormitory rooms (shared and private) have heating, air-conditioning and individual lockers and shelves with a reading light and plug.

Sant Jordi Hostel is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Sant Pau Metro Station, giving easy access to all parts of the city.

When booking more than 10 beds, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

We are currently experiencing some issues processing payments with cards issued outside of the EEA. In this eventuality, SJH may require additional information about the payment method in order to guarantee the security of transactions and to be able to confirm your reservation.

Name: Central and Basic Universitat for YOUNG HOSTEL
Description:
Set in the lively Ciutat Vella District, next to the MACBA Museum, it is 5 minutes’ walk from Plaça Universitat Square.

Decorated with bright colours, all the rooms come with single beds which can be joined together and some have a private bathroom with shower. Free toiletries are also provided.

Central & Basic Universitat is surrounded by a wide range of shops and supermarkets. You can find some of the trendiest restaurants and bars of the city in a 5-minute walk.

The Ramblas and Boquería Market are 800 metres away and you can walk to Plaça Catalunya Square in about 10 minutes’ walk. El Prat Barcelona Airport is 30 minutes by public transport. Regular buses leave from a bus stop located just 800 metres away.

Name: Tibidabo Apartments
Description:
These apartments with free Wi-Fi are located in Vall d’Hebron, in the hills above Barcelona. Penitents and Vall d'Hebron Metro Stations are both less than 10 minutes' walk away. By direct metro you can reach La Rambla in 15 minutes.

The Tibidabo Apartments are set within an old villa with a spacious garden and terrace.

The location is convenient for access by car, with the Ronda de Dalt (B20 Ring Road) 200 metres away. Barcelona Airport is 15 minutes' drive away and there is free street parking around the apartments. The CosmoCaixa Science Museum and the Vall d’Hebron Hospital are a short drive away.

The Tibidabo Apartments are at the bottom of Mount Tibidabo, in the Sierra de Collserola. Tibidabo is famous for the beautiful Sagrat Cor Church, amusement park and spectacular views over Barcelona.

Name: AB Paral·lel Spacious Apartments
Description:
Featuring air conditioning, AB Paral·lel Spacious Apartments offers pet-friendly accommodation in Barcelona. Plaza Reial is 900 metres from the property.

Featuring a balcony, the accommodation comes with a dining area and seating area with a TV. All units include a kitchen equipped with a dishwasher and microwave. A toaster is also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. There is a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer in each unit. Towels and bed linen are featured.

AB Paral·lel Spacious Apartments also some of the apartments include a terrace

Montjuïc is 1.1 km from AB Paral·lel Spacious Apartments. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km.

Name: H10 Universitat
Description:
Ideally located just 100 metres off Barcelona’s central Plaça Catalunya and the exciting Las Ramblas, this new hotel blends a 19th-century façade with 21st-century decor and facilities.

The H10 Universitat lies in the cultural heart of this cosmopolitan city, allowing you to easily walk to many of the city’s unique sights. It is full of stylish, contemporary design and modern art. State-of-the-art amenities include free Wi-Fi available throughout the building.

Name: Olivia Plaza Hotel
Description:
Situated on Plaza Catalunya in the centre of Barcelona, the Hotel Olivia Plaza offers free Wi-Fi and a terrace bar with views of Santa Ana Church. Stylish rooms include a flat-screen TV.

This design hotel serves a buffet breakfast and guests can also order breakfast to the room. The modern Nineteen restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine.

The chic rooms at the Olivia Hotel Barcelona include a free safe and views over the square. They are also equipped with a sofa or armchair and a breakfast table.

Guests at Olivia Plaza Hotel have free access to Holmes Place Urquinaona gym, located 500 metres from the hotel. Guests can make free use of the pool area and fitness room there.

The Olivia Plaza Barcelona is just 100 metres from the famous Ramblas with its many restaurants and street performers. Catalunya Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel and the Gothic Quarter is less than 10 minutes away.

Name: Chic Apartments Barcelona
Description:
Located in Barcelona within 2.9 km of Somorrostro Beach and 2.9 km of Nova Icaria Beach, Chic Apartments Barcelona provides accommodation with free WiFi, seating area and a kitchen. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a desk, a coffee machine, an oven, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia and La Pedrera. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Chic Apartments Barcelona.

Name: Hotel Indigo Barcelona - Plaza Catalunya 4Sup, an IHG Hotel
Description:
Featuring an outdoor swimming pool with a poolside terrace, Hotel Indigo Barcelona - Plaza Catalunya is just 200 metres from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. Plaça Catalunya is about 4 minutes’ walk away.

The stylish, air-conditioned rooms in the Hotel Indigo have a flat-screen satellite TV and free WiFi.  Some bathrooms have a spa bath, while all rooms include amenities such as a minibar, coffee maker, scale and daily newspaper delivery. A pillow menu is also offered. Some rooms have a balcony or terrace.

The restaurant, Gastro Bar Catalunya, offers Spanish dishes for breakfast, lunch and dinner.  The 24-hour reception can arrange hire of bicycles and cars, and book tickets for exhibitions and musicals.

The train station offering a connection with Barcelona Airport is about 6 minutes’ walk away. Gaudi’s famous La Pedrera is just 10 minutes’ walk away.

A great range of bars and restaurants can be found in the area surrounding the Indigo Hotel.

Name: Hotel Regina Barcelona
Description:
Hotel Regina Barcelona is set in a historic 19th-century building, just 50 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas. The hotel offers free high-speed WiFi and modern rooms.

The century-old hotel was founded in 1917 and features beautiful architecture, including its impressive art nouveau entrance.

The Hotel Regina Barcelona’s spacious rooms come with air conditioning, central heating and satellite TV. There is free tea and coffee, a safe, work desk and minibar. The private bathroom includes ecological cosmetics and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony.

A varied buffet breakfast with zero-kilometre and homemade products is served. There is also a bar and room service is offered all day from 07:00 to 00:00.

The Regina has a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera, on Passeig de Gràcia Avenue, are within a 10-minute walk away. Catalunya Metro and Train Station and the airport bus stop are within 5 minutes' walk.

Name: Hilton Barcelona
Description:
Featuring an impressive lobby, the stylish Hilton Barcelona offers free WiFi, access to its 24-hour gym and rooms with city views and plasma TV. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.

Each stylish, soundproofed room at the Barcelona Hilton features air conditioning, iPod docking stations and tea and coffee-making facilities.

Hotel Hilton Barcelona is just 100 metres from L’Illa Shopping Centre and 300 metres from María Cristina Metro Station. Plaça Catalunya and the historic city centre are 15 minutes away by Metro. You can drive to Sants Station in 5 minutes, and El Prat Airport is a 15-minute drive away.

Hilton Barcelona’s Mosaic restaurant offers Catalan and Mediterranean cuisine prepared using seasonal, local products. The Vibe Bar & Restaurant serves tapas and cocktails. Guests can enjoy live sport on the bar’s large TV.

Name: Port Loft
Description:
Situated right in the heart of Barcelona, 2.2 km from Barceloneta Beach, Port Loft features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. The property is around 2.3 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 1.3 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.2 km from Portal de l'Angel. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.3 km from Sant Sebastian Beach.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Plaça Reial. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: 21par1005 - Beautiful Apartment in Paral-lel
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 700 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya, 21par1005 - Beautiful Apartment in Paral-lel offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 2.6 km from Portal de l'Angel and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Sants Railway Station and Palau Sant Jordi. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Sweett - Villarroel
Description:
Sweett - Villarroel offers accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1.3 km from Tivoli Theatre and 1.1 km from Boqueria Market. The property is close to popular attractions like Casa Batllo, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Cathedral of Barcelona.

The units at the apartment complex come with a seating area and a flat-screen TV. A fridge and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. All units feature a private bathroom, free toiletries and bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Plaça Catalunya and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: H10 Cubik 4* Sup
Description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, H10 Cubik offers accommodation in Barcelona. The hotel has a seasonal outdoor pool and terrace, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar.

Rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Some units include a seating area for your convenience. Every room comes with a private bathroom.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Sitges is 35 km from H10 Cubik, while Calella is 47 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 13 km from the property.

Name: Alojamiento Flor
Description:
Alojamiento Flor is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.1 km from La Pedrera, 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.3 km from Casa Batllo. The property is around 1.9 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 2.4 km from Cathedral of Barcelona and 2.5 km from Plaça Catalunya. The accommodation provides a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

The units are equipped with a microwave, toaster, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. A fridge and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a kettle. All units include a shared bathroom, free toiletries and bed linen.

Dining options are available close to the bed and breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Alojamiento Flor include Sagrada Familia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Torre d'En Damians II
Description:
Ideally located in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, Stay U-nique Apartments Torre d'En Damians II is set less than 1 km from Sants Railway Station, 1.9 km from Palau Sant Jordi and 2.8 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is located 3.1 km from Plaça Catalunya, 3.2 km from Casa Batllo and 3.3 km from Camp Nou. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

Each unit has a terrace, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Boqueria Market is 3.4 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Torre d'En Damians II.

Name: Terrace Duplex at SAGRADA FAMILIA-GRACIA
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Sagrada Familia and 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia, Terrace Duplex at SAGRADA FAMILIA-GRACIA features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is located 2.4 km from Casa Batllo, 1.7 km from Park Güell and 2.9 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.8 km from La Pedrera.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and city views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Tivoli Theatre is 3 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3.2 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Centric apartment Gràcia
Description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Centric apartment Gràcia is located in Barcelona. The property is around 2.2 km from Casa Batllo, 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 2.8 km from Tivoli Theatre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 1.3 km away.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is provided. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Sagrada Familia and Park Güell. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Centric apartment Gràcia.

Name: Roós, design loft near the sea.
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Mar Bella Beach and 1.3 km from Bogatell Beach, Roós, design loft near the sea. Offers a garden and air conditioning. The property is around 1.4 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach, 3.5 km from Port Olimpic and 3.6 km from Sagrada Familia. Tivoli Theatre is 4.5 km from the apartment and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 4.7 km away.

With free WiFi, this 2-bedroom apartment features a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Passeig de Gracia is 4.3 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 4.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Roós, design loft near the sea..

Name: Basic Platja
Description:
In the Sant Martí district of Barcelona, close to Mar Bella Beach, Basic Platja features free WiFi and a washing machine. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is located 1 km from Bogatell Beach.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 2 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Sightseeing tours are available nearby.

Nova Mar Bella Beach is 1.2 km from the apartment, while Port Olimpic is 2.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Bonavista Apartments - Eixample
Description:
Located in a typical Eixample-style building in Barcelona’s Quadrat d’Or, Bonavista Apartments Eixample offers modern accommodation with free Wi-Fi. Plaza Catalunya Square is 1.5 km away.

All 2-bedroom apartments feature a modern décor with parquet flooring and contemporary furnishings. Each includes a 32-inch flat-screen TV, a washing machine and ironing facilities. The fully-equipped kitchenette includes a kettle, microwave and dishwasher.

Bonavista Apartments – Eixample is located on the corner of Enric Granados Street, where guests will find plenty of cafés, bars and restaurants. There is also a supermarket just 1 block away.

Diagonal Metro Stop, servicing lines 3 and 5, is a 5-minute walk away. Barcelona’s FGC urban rail line also stops at Provença, just 250 metres from the apartments and will take you to Plaça Catalunya in about 5 minutes.

Name: Cosmo Apartments Sants
Description:
Located just 50 metres from Barcelona Sants Train Station, Cosmo Apartments Sants offers air-conditioned apartments with flat-screen TVs, free Wi-Fi and city views. The building has a 24-hour reception with tour desk.

Each stylish Cosmo Apartments Sants apartment has large windows, and some have a balcony. All apartments have a modern kitchenette with a microwave-grill, ceramic hob and dishwasher. Cooking utensils, bed linen and towels are provided.

There are numerous bars and restaurants in the streets around the Cosmo Apartments Sants building.

The Fira Conference Centre is within a 15-minute walk, while FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium is a 20-minute walk away. Plaça de Sants Metro Station is 200 metres away and offers direct access to the historic city centre.

Name: Eric Vökel Boutique Apartments - Sagrada Familia Suites
Description:
These stylish, functional Nordic design apartments were designed by Danish architect Eric Vökel. The Eric Vökel Boutique Apartments - Sagrada Familia Suites are set in a restored Modernist building, just 200 metres from the Sagrada Familia and 100 metres from Sant Pau Dos de Maig Metro Station.

Other facilities include free WiFi and a flat-screen TV in every apartment. Each apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a washer-dryer and a dishwasher.

The property offers a 24-hour check-in service and luggage storage. Our on site Reception team is at your disposal every day from 9am to 5pm.

The beautiful Modernista Hospital Sant Pau is set 5 minutes’ walk from the apartments. There is a selection of shops, restaurants and cafés in the surrounding Sagrada Família district.

The centre of Barcelona and Las Ramblas can be reached in 20 minutes, by Metro, or by bus.

The elevator reaches intermediate levels. You have to climb a few steps to get to the apartment.

Name: Private rooms Born neighborhood
Description:
Situated within 2 km of Barceloneta Beach and 2 km of Sant Miquel Beach, Private rooms Born neighborhood features rooms with air conditioning and a shared bathroom in Barcelona. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 600 metres from Cathedral of Barcelona and 1 km from Plaça Catalunya. The property is 1.9 km from Somorrostro Beach, and within 600 metres of the city centre.

All rooms in the hostel are equipped with a kettle. With a shared bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at Private rooms Born neighborhood also feature free WiFi. At the accommodation the rooms include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Private rooms Born neighborhood include Passeig de Gracia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the hostel.

Name: Sweett - Carrer Fira
Description:
Located within less than 1 km of Sants Railway Station and a 15-minute walk of Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Sweett - Carrer Fira provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features family rooms.

All units comprise a seating area with a sofa, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen with various cooking facilities, including a dishwasher, an oven, a microwave and a toaster. With a private bathroom equipped with a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also provide guests with free WiFi, while selected rooms include a balcony. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Casa Batllo is 2.2 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.6 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Corcega - Sagrada Familia
Description:
Corcega - Sagrada Familia is set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.9 km from La Pedrera, 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia and 2.3 km from Casa Batllo. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is situated 400 metres from Sagrada Familia.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 2.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Corcega - Sagrada Familia.

Name: Pensión Arosa
Description:
Pensión Arosa guest house is centrally located 300 metres from Barcelona Cathedral and Plaza Catalunya. It offers basic rooms with a sink and a fan, and shared bathroom facilities.

All rooms at the Arosa are heated and have a fridge. Some have a private shower and a private balcony. Triple and quadruple rooms are available.

The Pensión Arosa has a tour desk, and you can easily explore Barcelona city centre on foot. The Rambla is a 5-minute walk away, and you can walk to Barceloneta Beach in 20 minutes.

Name: El Avenida Palace
Description:
El Avenida Palace Hotel is set on Barcelona’s Gran Via, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya, La Rambla and Paseo de Gracia. Its grand interior features an impressive staircase and marble columns.

Many famous guests have stayed at the Hotel Avenida Palace, including the Beatles in 1965.

The elegant air-conditioned rooms feature satellite TV and carpeted or parquet floors. Rooms are soundproofed and have a minibar, work desk and a safe.

The hotel's panoramic rooftop terrace offers views over the city, a sun deck and a swimming pool. There is also a lounge bar, a 24-hour front desk and both free WiFi and room service are available.

Name: Habitación Santa Anna
Description:
Featuring a garden, Habitación Santa Anna is a recently renovated guest house located in a historic building in the centre of Barcelona, close to Sant Miquel Beach. The property was built in 19th century, and features air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. The property is allergy-free and is situated 1.8 km from Somorrostro Beach.

Towels and bed linen are provided in the guest house. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Barceloneta Beach, Santa Maria del Mar and Plaça Reial. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Spacious 3 bed Apt in the heart of Sant Antoni
Description:
Spacious 3 bed Apt in the heart of Sant Antoni features a balcony and is set in Barcelona, within just 1.7 km of Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.8 km of Tivoli Theatre. It is situated 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.3 km away.

The spacious apartment is composed of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sants Railway Station, Plaça Catalunya and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Esquirol
Description:
In the centre of Barcelona, located within a short distance of Somorrostro Beach and Sant Miquel Beach, Esquirol offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a fridge and coffee machine. This apartment provides accommodation with a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.7 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Santa Maria del Mar, Plaça Reial and Picasso Museum. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Decô Apartments Barcelona-Diagonal
Description:
Located 10 minutes’ walk from Diagonal Metro Station, Deco- Diagonal Apartmens are set on Diagonal Avenue. These stylish loft apartments are housed in a striking Art Deco building offering impressive city views.

The Deco- Diagonal Apartmens are just 5 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gràcia, the iconic boulevard which is home to Gaudí's famous Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. Also 5 minutes away is Rambla de Catalunya, where there is a selection of cafés, bars and restaurants. There are also supermarkets within 350 metres of the apartments.

Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas can be reached in 20 minutes on foot.

Name: Housalia Lepant 3 bedroom apartment 300 meters de Sagrada Familia
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 300 metres from Sagrada Familia and 1.8 km from La Pedrera, Housalia Lepant 3 bedroom apartment 300 meters de Sagrada Familia offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.2 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 3 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property offers city views.

Passeig de Gracia is 2 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.7 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Barcelona Century Hotel
Description:
Offering a central location, Barcelona Century Hotel is located in the Eixample district, just a short walk from the Ramblas and Passeig de Gracia. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.

All air-conditioned rooms at this hotel are soundproofed and come with satellite TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom with hairdryer.

The hotel offers buffet breakfast as well as a bar. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide tourist information about the area.

Barcelona’s main shopping district can be reach within walking distance of the hotel. You can visit Barcelona’s Cathedral or the Gothic Quarter.

Urgell, Hospital Clínic or Universitat Metro Stations are less than 7 minutes’ walk of Barcelona Century Hotel.

Name: Rambla de Mar Apartments
Description:
Rambla de Mar Apartments is designed to ensure you have a stay in Barcelona worthy of being remembered with your family or friends.

Newly renovated, well lit and equipped to make you feel at home, in Rambla de Mar you will get an excellent location and the freedom to organize your stay in the Catalan capital as it best suits you.

Let us share more with you: The spacious living room is equipped to spend the day to day with the greatest possible comfort, its kitchen will allow you to prepare from the simplest to the most sophisticated dish thanks to all its equipment, the rooms are designed for maximum relaxation and featuring a total of 2 private bathrooms per apartment.

Each spacious apartment at Rambla de Mar Apartments has free Wi-Fi, and a living room with a sofa bed, a TV and a dining area.

The entire common area is enabled for people with reduced mobility to move around. You will also have a common terrace/solarium for sunbathing.

The building is located next to the Ramblas, the Port Vell, the Palau Güell and the Liceo. The Cathedral and the Barceloneta beach can be reached on foot. The Drassanes stop on metro line 3 is less than a minute away; Plaça Catalunya is 2 metro stops away, Passeig de Gracia and Plaça Espanya are 4 stops away and Sants station is 6 stops away (among others).

Check in is from 16:00h and check out is from 09:00h to 11:30h.

We are a Pet Friendly apartment.

Name: Apartment Pg Gracia - Valencia by Interhome
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Casa Batllo and 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya, Apartment Pg Gracia - Valencia by Interhome offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This 4-star apartment offers a lift. Portal de l'Angel is 1.8 km from the apartment and Passeig de Gracia is 1.1 km away.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and La Pedrera. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: BYPILLOW Ramblas
Description:
BYPILLOW Ramblas is a modern guest house conveniently located in the famous Ramblas in Barcelona, 15 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and the port.

The Wax Museum and the airport bus stop are next to this guest house. The nearest metro station is Drassanes, located only 100 metres away. There is a wide range of monuments, bars and shops within walking distance.

The air-conditioned rooms at BYPILLOW Ramblas come with a TV and private bathroom with shower.

The multilingual staff will be happy to provide tourist information and free local maps. Free WiFi and luggage storage are also offered.

Fully renovated on february 2024

Name: Sweett - Aragon Park Miro
Description:
Located within less than 1 km of Sants Railway Station and 2.5 km of Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sweett - Aragon Park Miro provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.2 km away.

Each unit is equipped with a balcony, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units come with bed linen and towels.

Casa Batllo is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.8 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Ola Living Merce
Description:
In the heart of Barcelona, set within a short distance of Sant Sebastian Beach and Sant Miquel Beach, Ola Living Merce offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a terrace. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.7 km from Somorrostro Beach.

The spacious apartment has 4 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bath. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Barceloneta Beach, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Teatro Miro Apartment
Description:
Teatro Miro Apartment features a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.3 km of Palau Sant Jordi and 1.8 km of Boqueria Market. The property is situated 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya, 2.7 km from Portal de l'Angel and 2.9 km from Passeig de Gracia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

The apartment comes with 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Sants Railway Station is 3 km from Teatro Miro Apartment, while Montjuïc is 1.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

Name: Charming Rooms In Shared Apartment Close To Gracia
Description:
Charming Rooms In Shared Apartment Close To Gracia is situated in the Gràcia district of Barcelona, 1.2 km from Park Güell, 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.8 km from La Pedrera. The property is around 2.5 km from Casa Batllo, 3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 3.1 km from Tivoli Theatre. Portal de l'Angel is 3.5 km away and Tibidabo Amusement Park is 7.8 km from the apartment.

All units comprise a seating area, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen with various cooking facilities, including a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. Featuring a shared bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also boast free WiFi, while certain rooms are equipped with a terrace. At the apartment complex, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Sagrada Familia is 3.2 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 3.3 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Atico con Terraza Plz. España / Fira Barcelona
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Palau Sant Jordi and 1.4 km from Sants Railway Station, Atico con Terraza Plz. España / Fira Barcelona offers air conditioning. It is set 3.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 500 metres away.

The apartment with a terrace and city views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia is 3.6 km from the apartment, while Portal de l'Angel is 3.6 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km from the property.

Name: Urban Flats Vallirana
Description:
Situated within 1.1 km of Passeig de Gracia and 1.6 km of La Pedrera, Urban Flats Vallirana features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. The property is set 2.6 km from Casa Batllo, 1.7 km from Park Güell and 3.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The apartment features family rooms.

The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer, while the kitchen has a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while certain rooms have a terrace. All units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

Plaça Catalunya is 3.2 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 3.2 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Yurbban Passage Hotel & Spa
Description:
Situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia Region, 400 metres from Portal de l'Angel, Yurbban Passage Hotel boasts an outdoor pool and spa centre. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant.

All rooms include a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. Each room includes a private bathroom. Extras include bathrobes and slippers. Yurbban Passage Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property.

Guests can enjoy an authentic Catalan breakfast each morning.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

The hotel also offers bike hire. Plaça Catalunya is 500 metres from Yurbban Passage Hotel, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 500 metres from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: BacHome Terrace B&B
Description:
BacHome Terrace B&B is located in central Barcelona, 500 metres from Plaza Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia. This modern bed and breakfast has a spacious decked terrace with sofas and offers free coffee and tea 24h.

The air-conditioned rooms at BacHome Terrace B&B feature modern décor and free WiFi. Each one comes with a desk, a private bathroom and views of the street or the terrace area. Their bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries.

BacHome Terrace B&B. Located 500 metres away, Portal de l’Àngel Street is full of shops, and there are numerous charming cafes and restaurants in the Gothic Quarter, 5 minutes’ walk away. The beautiful Palau de la Música Auditorium is also 400 metres away.

Located 150 metres away, Urquinaona Metro Station connects you with the rest of the city with ease. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, 7 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Port VIII Apart céntrico en Paralelo cerca Rambla
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.9 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 3 km from Somorrostro Beach, Port VIII Apart céntrico en Paralelo cerca Rambla offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. Popular points of interest nearby include Boqueria Market, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The property is non-smoking and is situated 3 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Santa Maria del Mar and Plaça Catalunya. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: GIRONA - Central apartment with balcony
Description:
Located within 700 metres of Passeig de Gracia and 800 metres of Casa Batllo, GIRONA - Central apartment with balcony provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Popular points of interest nearby include Cathedral of Barcelona, Plaça Catalunya and Sagrada Familia. The property is 1.2 km from the city centre and 800 metres from La Pedrera.

At the apartment complex, every unit is equipped with a balcony. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with a private bathroom with a hair dryer.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Aparthotel Mariano Cubi Barcelona
Description:
Aparthotel Mariano Cubi can be found just 200 metres from Barcelona’s Avinguda Diagonal and 15 minutes' walk from Passeig de Gracia. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and some have a kitchenette.

All spacious rooms have wooden floors, satellite TV, and a desk.

The Aparthotel Mariano Cubi's tour desk can help guests plan their stay in Barcelona. There is also a free business centre with internet access.

The area has a wide range of shops. Fontana Metro station is about 500 metres away and Gràcia FGC Station is only 150 metres away. From there you can get to Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas. Gaudí's La Pedrera is about 20 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Pensión San Ramón
Description:
Pensión San Ramón is located in Barcelona’s Raval district, just 350 metres from the Rambla. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV.

The guest house has vending machines for drinks, and there is a common area with a microwave for guests’ use. There are many restaurants and bars in the surrounding streets.

Staff at reception can provide information about what Barcelona has to offer. Pensión San Ramón is 5 minutes’ walk from the Sala Apolo Nightclub and Paral·lel Metro Station, which connects you with the rest of the city.

Name: Central and Spacious Family Apartment
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.4 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 2.5 km from Somorrostro Beach, Central and Spacious Family Apartment offers air conditioning. It is located 2.8 km from Barceloneta Beach and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

Boasting a DVD player, the spacious apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 3 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms with a bath and a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sagrada Familia, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Central and Spacious Family Apartment.

Name: Sagrada familia Private rooms
Description:
Located within less than 1 km of La Pedrera and a 11-minute walk of Sagrada Familia, Sagrada familia Private rooms provides rooms with air conditioning and a shared bathroom in Barcelona. The property is situated 2 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 2.5 km from Cathedral of Barcelona and 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya. The property is less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia, and within 1.6 km of the city centre.

All units include a shared bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Hotel España Ramblas
Description:
Hotel España is situated in a 19th-century building in central Barcelona, within 100 metres of the Ramblas and Liceu Theatre and 200 metres from Boqueria Market. Its Mediterranean restaurant is run by famous chef Martín Berasategui. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.

The stylish and elegant rooms include a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. They also come with a modern bathroom.

Hotel España offers a variety of drinks and cocktails at AlAire rooftop terrace bar. There is also a small swimming pool.

Liceu Metro Station is 100 metres away and the Gothic Quarter is less than 5 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Clandestino Suites
Description:
Clandestino Suites provides accommodation within 1.1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Every room is fitted with a balcony with views of the city.

At the apartment complex, all units include a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Kitchenware is also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Sightseeing tours are available in the area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, La Pedrera and Passeig de Gracia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: MH Apartments S. Familia
Description:
MH Apartments S. Familia are located around 100 metres from Barcelona’s Sagrada Familia Church. The apartments feature balconies, well-equipped kitchens and free Wi-Fi access.

The spacious MH Apartments have contemporary design and offer kitchens with oven, microwave, kettle and toaster. Each apartment has a living area with satellite TV, bathroom and separate bedrooms.

Facilities at the MH include 24-hour customer service, and guests are provided with bed linen, towels and basic cleaning materials.The apartments can arrange car hire and provide tourist information.

The apartments are a 2-minute walk from Sagrada Familia Metro Station and 20 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. Plaza de Catalunya is a 15-minute Metro journey from the apartments and Sants Train Station is less than 4 km away.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Ramón y Cajal
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Ramón y Cajal has a terrace and is set in Barcelona, within just 1 km of La Pedrera and 1.5 km of Casa Batllo. This apartment offers accommodation with a balcony. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 700 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sagrada Familia and Park Güell. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Ramón y Cajal.

Name: Palau de la música 13
Description:
In the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, close to Somorrostro Beach, Palau de la música 13 has free WiFi and a washing machine. The property is close to Tivoli Theatre, Santa Maria del Mar and Plaça Reial. The property is 600 metres from the city centre and 1.9 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen and 1 bathroom. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Cathedral of Barcelona, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Passeig de Gracia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Rent Top Apartments Rambla Catalunya
Description:
