Featuring free WiFi and air conditioning, Rent Top Apartments Rambla Catalunya 8 is located in Barcelona, 200 metres from Plaça Catalunya. Portal de l'Angel is 500 metres from the property.

The accommodation has a seating area. Some units feature a dining area and/or terrace. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher. An oven, a toaster and refrigerator are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.

Casa Batllo is 500 metres from Rambla Catalunya 8. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the property.

Name: NEW! Amazing 2 bedroom apartment in Rambla del Poblenou
Description:
NEW! Amazing 2 bedroom apartment in Rambla del Poblenou is a beachfront property situated in Barcelona, 1.6 km from Mar Bella Beach and 1.6 km from Bogatell Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.9 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Sagrada Familia is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.9 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away.

Name: Click&Flat Stylish Torrijos
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia and a 14-minute walk from La Pedrera, Click&Flat Stylish Torrijos features spacious air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is around 2.4 km from Tivoli Theatre, 2.6 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and 2.9 km from Plaça Catalunya. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.7 km from Casa Batllo.

This apartment features 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sagrada Familia and Park Güell. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Click&Flat Stylish Torrijos.

Name: Housalia Sagrada Familia Views
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 2.9 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 300 metres from Sagrada Familia, Housalia Sagrada Familia Views offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a minimarket, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.7 km from La Pedrera.

The apartment with a balcony and garden views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property offers city views.

Sightseeing tours are available within a reachable distance.

Casa Batllo is 2.1 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.5 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Lope de Vega
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Bogatell Beach and 1.2 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach, Stay U-nique Apartments Lope de Vega offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 3 km from Sagrada Familia and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.2 km from Mar Bella Beach.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 2 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a TV. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Port Olimpic is 3.4 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 4.3 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km from the property.

Name: Room Mate Carla
Description:
Room Mate Carla is set 200 metres from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, and 5-minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s La Pedrera in Barcelona’s Eixample District. It features free WiFi and colourful, stylish rooms.

Decorated with lively prints, the air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV, minibar, safe and a private bathroom.

Room Mate Carla features a modern bar offering a range of cocktails. You will also find a terrace and meeting rooms on site.

The hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Sagrada Familia Cathedral. Verdaguer and Diagonal Metro Stations are 500 metres away and offer easy access to Las Ramblas and Sants Train Station.

Name: BBarcelona Encants Flat
Description:
BBarcelona Encants Flat offers accommodation in Barcelona.

There is a seating area and a kitchen as well as a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hair dryer. A flat-screen TV is featured.

Sagrada Familia is 400 metres from BBarcelona Encants Flat, while the city centre is 10 minutes away. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 15 km from the property.

Name: Aspasios Diagonal Art Apartments
Description:
Located 10 minutes’ walk from La Pedrera, Aspasios Diagonal Art Apartments offers 1-bedroom apartment with free WiFi. It is in the Gràcia District, within a short walk of Güell Park.

This air-conditioned apartment offers 1 double bed, and a bathroom with shower and free toiletries. The kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, ceramic hobs, and kitchenware; while the living room has a sofa bed and a flat-screen TV. There is a washing machine and cleaning products are provided.

Fresh produces can be found at the market located 700 metres away; and trendy bars, restaurants and shops are on the many surrounding public squares.

Aspasios Diagonal Art Apartments is a-13 minute walk from Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia; and only 800 metres from fashionable Passeig de Gracia. A 10-minute metro ride will take you to Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different apartments located in the Gracia area. Please select a date and click on the apartments to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

Name: Acogedor Apartamento en Barcelona, zona tranquila
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.8 km from La Pedrera, Acogedor Apartamento en Barcelona, zona tranquila features air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is located 2 km from Park Güell.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Casa Batllo is 3 km from Acogedor Apartamento en Barcelona, zona tranquila, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

Name: Hostal Elkano
Description:
This family-run guest house is 500 metres from Barcelona’s Fira Exhibition Centre at Plaza España. It offers heated rooms with free Wi-Fi, 200 metres from Poble Sec Metro Station.

Spacious rooms at Hostal Elkano feature functional décor and a TV. Bathrooms are shared or private.

You will find numerous bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk. Sant Antoni Market is 500 metres away and the Arenas Shopping Centre, a former bullring, is 10 minutes’ walk away.

Elkano’s 24-hour reception offers tourist information. Montjuic Park, with the Olympic Stadium, its museums and outdoor swimming pools, is 10 minutes’ walk away.

The property is 10 minutes’ walk from the ferry port. Las Ramblas is 3 metro stops away and chic Passeig de Gracias, 5 stops away. You can catch a direct bus to Barcelona El Prat Airport from Plaza España.

Name: Casa Jam Barcelona
Description:
Casa Jam Barcelona is located in the lively and bohemian Grácia neighbourhood in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Parc Güell and 20 minutes' walk from Sagrada Familia Temple. Free WiFi access is available.

This eco-friendly, modern accomodation offers a 24-hour reception and a spacious terrace, where you can relax, park your bike for free and take yoga classes. Guests will also find 2 shared lounges, one with a big and comfortable sofa to chill out and tourist information to plan your visits and the other with a spacious shared kitchen, a dining area, board games and children play room. Digital nomads also will find a working area with a large table.

Rooms and dormitories at Casa Jam Barcelona are air conditioned and have personal lockers or place to store clothes, individual bed lights and plugs for each bed. Private bathrooms are equipated with hairdryer, towels and toiletries. The spacious shared bathrooms have showers and a hairdryer. There is a bathroom adapted for guests with reduced mobility. Bed linen is included, while towels can be rented on site

Luggage storage is available for free. There is also a laundry room and free fairtrade coffee and tea throughout the day. Also there are also cots, baby strollers and high chairs available

The nearest metro station is Joanic, located 450 metres away. Plaza Catalunya Square and Barcelona beaches are 17 minutes by metro. 20 minutes walking you will find the main modernist attractions such as the Sagrada Família and Parc Güell

Name: AC Hotel Irla by Marriott
Description:
The AC Hotel Irla is located 200 metres from Diagonal and Francesc Macià Square. The hotel has stylish and comfortable rooms, a fitness centre and 24-hour reception.

Rooms at this hotel are spacious and feature contemporary décor. All rooms have air conditioning, minibar and private bathroom.

Facilities at the Irla include Turkish baths, café-bar and free Wi-Fi access in public areas.

Guests can enjoy breakfast in the Irla’s restaurant. There are also bars, cafes and restaurants in the area surrounding Francesc Macià.

Attractions such as Casa Batlló, Casa Mila and Plaça de Catalunya are within 30 minutes’ walk of the AC Hotel Irla. The hotel is close to bus and tram connections and is a 20-minute walk from the Metro station, Diagonal.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Industria
Description:
Set in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Stay U-nique Apartments Industria has a balcony. It is situated 2.9 km from La Pedrera and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 1.2 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia is 3 km from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 3.4 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away.

Name: Barceló Raval
Description:
Set in Barcelona’s vibrant Raval district, this design hotel offers free Wi-Fi, a gym and a roof terrace with pool and panoramic views. Some rooms include a Nespresso coffee machine.

Each bright, air-conditioned room at the Barceló Raval features a large plasma-screen TV with more than 70 channels. Rooms have a minibar and a modern bathroom.

Hotel Barceló Raval’s B-Lounge serves creative Mediterranean food, tapas and cocktails in stylish surroundings. You can also enjoy a drink on the outdoor terrace.

The Raval Barceló is only a 5-minute walk from the MACBA Modern Art Gallery. Liceu Metro Station, Las Ramblas and the famous Boqueria Market are all just 400 metres away.

Name: Seneca7 near paseo de gracia
Description:
Set within a few steps of Passeig de Gracia and 500 metres of La Pedrera, Seneca7 near paseo de gracia offers rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment has family rooms.

Each unit has a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bath and a hair dryer. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: BBarcelona Modern Eixample Flat
Description:
Featuring free Wi-Fi and bike rental, BBarcelona Modern Eixample Flat Eixample center is a self-catering accommodation in Barcelona. Cafeterias and tapas bars are 50 metres away. La Rambla and Plaça Catalunya are 2 km away.

The apartment includes a seating area with sofa and flat-screen TV. The kitchen is equipped with a stove, oven and microwave. There are 2 bathrooms with bath or shower.

Camp Nou Stadium and Sagrada Familia are 2.5 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Upper Diagonal
Description:
Situated in Barcelona’s Pedralbes neighbourhood, Upper Diagonal offers modern accommodation with free WiFi and a gym just 1 km from the Camp Nou football stadium.

All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. All rooms have ironing facilities.

The hotel has an on-site restaurant serving seasonal food, and you can find more restaurants and shops on Diagonal Avenue, just 600 metres away, and in the L’Illa Diagonal shopping centre.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and the hotel also offers car hire.

La Pedrera is 3.3 km from Upper Diagonal, while Tibidabo is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Upper Diagonal.

Name: Sant Pau Ramblas Apartments Serennia
Description:
Sant Pau Ramblas Apartments Serennia provides accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. It is located 2.4 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and features a lift. The apartment features family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Some units include a terrace and/or a balcony with city views and an outdoor dining area. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Primavera Hostel
Description:
Primavera hostel is set in Barcelona’s Eixample district, 8 minutes’ walk from the Sagrada Familia Basilica. It offers free Wi-Fi and private rooms with a balcony, 200 metres from Verdaguer Metro Station.

Rooms at Primavera hostel are bright and feature smart, functional décor and original features. All include a fan and central heating, while bathrooms are shared.

The property has a communal kitchen where you can prepare meals, snacks and drinks and you can relax in the lounge area with big sofas and a selection of books.

Primavera is 5 minutes’ walk from the bohemian Gracia area and 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia, with its exclusive shops and Gaudi monuments.

Luggage storage is available and you can walk to the Arc de Triomf, Ciutadella Park and Estació del Nord Bus Station in 15 minutes.

Name: Decô Apartments Barcelona-Eixample
Description:
Offering air-conditioned apartments with free high-speed WiFi and city views, Deco - Eixample Apartments is located in the elegant Eixample neighbourhood. It is a 10-minute walk from Gaudi’s famous La Pedrera.

Set inside a historic building, each stylish apartment features modern décor and a private balcony or terrace. The living room includes a sofa, flat-screen TV and a dining table.

There are 1 or 2 bathrooms, including a hairdryer and free toiletries. The open-plan kitchen comes with a dishwasher, microwave and kitchenware.

Luggage storage is available, while the property also offers a reception and waiting area. You can find a wide range of bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of Deco - Eixample Apartments.

Diagonal Metro Station is within a 10-minute walk of the property, and the Sagrada Familia is 2 stops away on the metro. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 20 minutes from the apartments on foot.

Name: Cómodo apartamento para 2
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and 2.6 km from Portal de l'Angel, Cómodo apartamento para 2 offers air conditioning. The property is around 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia, 2.9 km from Sants Railway Station and 3.3 km from Cathedral of Barcelona. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

The apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, a TV with streaming services and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a microwave, a washing machine, a fridge and a stovetop. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Palau Sant Jordi and Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Evenia Rossello
Description:
Evenia Rossello is conveniently situated 5 minutes’ walk from the stylish Paseo de Gracia Boulevard and includes a gym. The modern rooms feature wooden floors and free internet connection.

The contemporary L'Illa del Rosselló restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. Guests can also enjoy tapas on the terrace, set in small gardens called Placeta Joan Brossa.

Evenia Rossello’s tour desk can provide useful information on the city and arrange car rental. A luggage storage service is also available.

Diagonal Metro Station is 400 metres away and offers direct access to Barcelona city centre. Barcelona Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Alcam Aribau
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to La Pedrera, Alcam Aribau features free WiFi and a washing machine. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia, and within 1.6 km of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Numa I Brio
Description:
A 5-minute walk from Diagonal and Fontana Metro stations, Numa I Brio is set in Barcelona’s bohemian Gràcia district. It features modern rooms with rain-effect showers.

Numa I Brio's simply decorated, air-conditioned rooms are soundproofed. Each room has a TV and private bathroom. A safe is available.

Restaurants and bars can be found in the surrounding streets. Popular Plaza del Sol is just 500 metres away.

There is a garden patio and guests can also enjoy a working space with high-speed free WiFi.

Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are within 15 minutes’ walk of the hotel. Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya are just 2 Metro stops from Diagonal station.

Name: Housalia Ondina Suites Sagrada Familia
Description:
Housalia Ondina Suites Sagrada Familia offers accommodation in Barcelona, 100 metres from the Sagrada Familia.

An oven, a microwave and a toaster can be found in the kitchen and there is a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hair dryer. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is available.

The apartment is located on the fourth floor of a building without elevator.

Housalia Ondina Suites Sagrada Familia is 1.2 km from La Pedrera. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 14 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Lugano Barcelona
Description:
Set on Avinguda Parallel, Lugano is 500 metres from Plaza España’s FIRA Exhibition Centre, and the nearby Metro and railway stations. It offers a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi.

Each air-conditioned room at Lugano has simple décor. There is a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with free toiletries.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast in the Lugano’s café-bar. Restaurants can be found in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and along Las Ramblas, 20 minutes’ walk away. Drassanes Metro Station, at the bottom of Las Ramblas, is also just 2 stops from Poble Sec Metro Station.

Rooms located on the main façade and with views over Avenida del Paralelo. It has two beds and an extra bed to accommodate a third person.

Montjuïc Park, the MNAC Museum and Pueblo Español Village are less than 1 km from the hotel. The city’s old port is just 2 km away.

Name: Murmuri Residence Mercader
Description:
Murmuri Residence Mercader is situated in the Eixample district in Barcelona. La Pedrera is 300 metres from the property. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property.

All units include a satellite flat-screen TV and iPod docking station. Some units have a terrace and/or balcony with city views. There is also a kitchen, fitted with a dishwasher. An oven is also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer in each unit. Towels are offered.

If your apartment is not available upon arrival or you need to store your luggage on the day of departure, free individual lockers are available for you next to the elevators on the main floor. The hours of use are from 7 a.m. to 8 p.m.

Casa Batllo is 400 metres from Murmuri Residence Mercader, while Plaça Catalunya is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Nuevo Triunfo
Description:
Located beside Barcelona’s Montjuic Hill, Nuevo Triunfo is a 3-minute walk from Parallel Metro Station and 10 minutes from the Rambla. It offers a free Wi-Fi zone and 24-hour reception.

Featuring tiled floors and flat-screen satellite TV, air-conditioned rooms come with a seating area and work desk. The private bathroom is equipped with amenities.

A continental breakfast is available in the Hotel Nuevo Triunfo. There are vending machines for drinks.

Luggage storage is offered and you can hire a car from the tour desk.

Maremagnum Shopping Centre and the Marina are 15 minutes’ walk away. Barceloneta Beach is 10 minutes away by bus.

Name: H10 Port Vell 4* Sup
Description:
Located in the Barceloneta neighbourhood in Barcelona, H10 Port Vell is just 220 metres from Port Vell Harbour. This 4-star hotel features a rooftop chill-out terrace with plunge pool and fantastic views.

Air-conditioned rooms include a 42-inch flat-screen TV, a minibar. Bathrooms come with hairdryer, magnifying mirror and Rituals toiletries. Two rooms are adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

Other facilities that can be found are Lobby Bar del Port and Hollywood Restaurant open for breakfast. Room service is available.

This stylish hotel has a free business corner with computers and free WiFi throughout. Tourist information and tickets for local attractions can be requested at the 24-hour reception.

Set in a restored historic building, this H10 is 400 metres from Francia Railway Station. Las Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya are 20 minutes’ walk away. Barcelona Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Habitat Apartments Rambla Deluxe
Description:
Located just 350 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya, the elegant, modern apartments at Habitat Apartments Rambla Deluxe offer free Wi-Fi and air conditioning. Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 250 metres away.

Featuring a stylish décor and large windows overlooking the streets, the apartments include a lounge area with a flat-screen TV and DVD player. Their kitchens are equipped with an oven, microwave and washing machine.

Passeig de Gracia and Rambla Catalunya boulevards offer a wide range of designer brands and fashion shops. There is also a wide range of dining options and bars in the area.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, while Airport Trains stop at Passeig de Gracia Train Station. You can reach the beach in a 10-minute metro ride.

Name: Alojamiento Rambla
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Tivoli Theatre, Alojamiento Rambla features free WiFi and a washing machine. It is located less than 1 km from Plaça Catalunya and provides a lift. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and a 7-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station.

The units are equipped with air conditioning, a microwave, a toaster, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. All units include a kettle and a shared bathroom, while some rooms will provide you with a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, every unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Passeig de Gracia, Portal de l'Angel and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Praktik Èssens
Description:
Boasting a terrace, Praktik Èssens is located in Barcelona and is 300 metres from Passeig de Gracia. The property is set 300 metres from Casa Batllo and 350 metres from Tivoli Theatre. The accommodation features free WiFi and an outdoor terrace, tea and coffee with free pastries corner and happy hour every day from 19:00 hours to 20:00 hours (free wines and snacks).

The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom, while certain rooms at Praktik Èssens also feature a seating area. All rooms have a desk.

Speaking English and Spanish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the reception.

Plaça Catalunya is 500 metres from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Praktik Èssens.

Name: Apartament Sagrada Familia
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 2.1 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 2.3 km from Somorrostro Beach, Apartament Sagrada Familia provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This recently renovated apartment is located 2.4 km from Bogatell Beach and less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia. The accommodation offers a lift, a shared kitchen and luggage storage for guests.

The spacious apartment comes with 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Apartament Sagrada Familia include Passeig de Gracia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Homenfun Barcelona Sagrada Familia Marina
Description:
Located in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Homenfun Barcelona Sagrada Familia Marina features a balcony. The property is set 2.9 km from Somorrostro Beach, 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km away.

All of the air-conditioned units feature a private bathroom, flat-screen TV, fully equipped kitchen and terrace.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sagrada Familia, Casa Batllo and La Pedrera. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Homenfun Barcelona Sagrada Familia Marina.

Name: Alojamiento Paris
Description:
Alojamiento Paris is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia, a 13-minute walk from La Pedrera and 1.6 km from Casa Batllo. The property is set 2.1 km from Plaça Catalunya, 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 2.2 km from Tivoli Theatre. The accommodation provides a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

The units are equipped with a microwave, toaster, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. At the bed and breakfast, all units include bed linen and towels.

Portal de l'Angel is 2.4 km from the bed and breakfast, while Boqueria Market is 2.6 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Stylish typical BCN flat
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 2.9 km from Plaça Catalunya, Stylish typical BCN flat features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is around 3.1 km from Passeig de Gracia, 3.4 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and 1.9 km from Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is non-smoking and is set 2 km from Portal de l'Angel.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and a washing machine. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau Sant Jordi, Boqueria Market and Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Twentytu Hostel Barcelona
Description:
This modern, eco-friendly hostel offers a terrace with city views and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. It is set 10 minutes’ walk from Nova Icaría Beach and the Olympic Port.

Rooms at Twentytu Hostel Barcelona are shared or private with a maximum of 4 beds and an en-suite bathroom. All include individual lockers and sheets. Towels can be rented at reception.

There is a communal kitchen, a chill-out lounge and dining areas. Various bars and shops are within 5 minutes’ walk and Razzmatazz nightclub is 200 metres away.

The property organises events, guided tours and activities and bike rental is available. Ciutadella Park is 10 minutes’ walk away and L’Auditori Theatre and Catalan National Theatre are 5 minutes’ walk away.

Twentytu Hostel Barcelona is 5 minutes’ walk from Marina Metro Station, 3 stops from Plaza Catalunya. Nord Bus Station is 10 minutes’ walk away.

For reservations of more than three nights or more than 7 people, special charges will apply, for this the hotel will contact you personally

Name: Sibs Bcn- Balmes- Romantic CityCentre Beautiful
Description:
Right in the centre of Barcelona, set within a short distance of Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sibs Bcn- Balmes- Romantic CityCentre Beautiful offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a dishwasher and coffee machine. It is located less than 1 km from Tivoli Theatre and offers a lift. Boqueria Market is 1.3 km away and Palau de la Musica Catalana is 1.5 km from the apartment.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

A car rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Sibs Bcn- Balmes- Romantic CityCentre Beautiful include Portal de l'Angel, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Balmes, a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts
Description:
Balmes is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from the famous Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers a swimming pool, a gym/fitness center and modern rooms with satellite TV.

The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Balmes feature parquet floors and smart, simple décor. They all come with a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi.

B Bar, like the rest of the hotel, is decorated with works of African art.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. There is a computer in the lobby which guests can use for free.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are both under 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. You can walk to Las Ramblas and Barcelona’s charming Gothic Quarter in around 15 minutes.

Name: Alguera Apartments Napols
Description:
Alguera Apartments offers modern apartments with free Wi-Fi in Barcelona’s elegant Eixample neighbourhood. Arc de Triomf Metro Station with a direct connection to the airport is less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

All air-conditioned apartments at Alguera Apartments Napols feature a stylish décor with parquet floors and contemporary furnishings. Some apartments have a large balcony or terrace and are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a DVD player.

There is a café-bar next to the apartments, and several shops and restaurants can be found in the vicinity. Glòries shopping centre including a Carrefour supermarket is 15 minutes’ walk away.

The city’s famous Sagrada Família Basilica is just 10 minutes’ walk away. Plaza Catalunya can be reached in about 20 minutes on foot, and the apartments are just 10 minutes’ walk from the trendy Born district.

Tetuan Metro Station servicing line 2 is 400 metres away, and Estació del Nord Bus Station is a 5-minute walk away.

Name: Unique Apartment with 360 view by Maison Piñata
Description:
Located in the centre of Barcelona, 300 metres from La Pedrera and 400 metres from Passeig de Gracia, Unique Apartment with 360 view by Maison Piñata offers free WiFi, a terrace and air conditioning. Housed in a building dating from 1910, this apartment is 1.9 km from Cathedral of Barcelona and 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya. The property is non-smoking and is situated 700 metres from Casa Batllo.

The recently renovated apartment is equipped with 2 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and fridge, and a living room with a flat-screen TV.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Sagrada Familia
Description:
Sagrada Familia features a terrace and is located in Barcelona, within just 500 metres of Sagrada Familia and 1.3 km of La Pedrera. The property is situated 1.7 km from Tivoli Theatre, 2 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and 2.9 km from Plaça Catalunya. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.9 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is provided. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Hotel Miramar Barcelona GL
Description:
Miramar Barcelona has a picturesque setting within gardens on Montjuïc Mountain, overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. It offers 2 swimming pools, free Wi-Fi and rooms with spectacular views of Barcelona.

Housed in a former palace with a Neucentisme style, the hotel maintains many of the building’s original features and it is one of the symbols of the city. The interiors have chic, contemporary design.

Guests can make use of the on-site fitness centre, or relax by the seasonal outdoor swimming pool. The hotel's L´Occitane Spa features an indoor pool, hot tub, sauna, steam room, pressure showers and treatment cabins.

The hotel has 24-hour room service and a bar with a terrace. Studio Miramar restaurant serves a selection of Catalan and Mediterranean dishes.

Each of the Miramar’s air-conditioned rooms has floor to ceiling windows, a 47-inch TV with international channels and a minibar with a courtesy bottle of water. Their private bathrooms come with L'Occitane toiletries, hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and either a shower or a designer bath tub.

The Joan Miró Foundation, the Old Port and the National Art Museum of Catalonia are within 20 minutes’ walk of the Miramar. And just 10 minutes walk from the Olympic Stadium and Palau Sant Jordi.

Name: NEW! Apartment in Sarria near Metro
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 3.5 km from Sants Railway Station and 3.7 km from Passeig de Gracia, NEW! Apartment in Sarria near Metro offers air conditioning. The property is around 3.9 km from La Pedrera, 4.1 km from Casa Batllo and 4.3 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Camp Nou is 2.6 km away.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 4.6 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 4.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from NEW! Apartment in Sarria near Metro.

Name: Alcam Rogent
Description:
Located in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Alcam Rogent features a terrace. It is set 3.4 km from La Pedrera and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 1.2 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 3 bathrooms with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Casa Batllo is 3.6 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 16 km from Alcam Rogent, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Aspasios Garden Apartments
Description:
Set just 800 metres from Casa Batllo in Barcelona, Aspasios Garden Apartments offers a getaway with a garden, outdoor pool, free WiFi, and a lift. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is 1.3 km from the city centre and 500 metres from Passeig de Gracia.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Click&Flat Rizal
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 600 metres from La Pedrera and 1.1 km from Casa Batllo, Click&Flat Rizal offers air conditioning. The property is situated 2.1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 2.4 km from Portal de l'Angel and 2.5 km from Sagrada Familia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 200 metres away.

This apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Click&Flat Rizal.

Name: Casa Gracia Apartments
Description:
Set within a few steps of Passeig de Gracia and 300 metres of La Pedrera, Casa Gracia Apartments offers rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Featuring a private entrance, the aparthotel allows guests to maintain their privacy.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom, while some feature a terrace or a balcony. At the aparthotel, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Apartment Eixample Esquerre Gran Via Balmes by Interhome
Description:
Right in the centre of Barcelona, situated within a short distance of Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Apartment Eixample Esquerre Gran Via Balmes by Interhome offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. This 4-star apartment offers a lift. Sant Miquel Beach is 2.9 km away and Casa Batllo is 600 metres from the apartment.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: AB Paral-lel Tapioles
Description:
In the heart of Barcelona, set within a short distance of Magic Fountain of Montjuic and Plaça Catalunya, AB Paral-lel Tapioles offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a toaster and coffee machine. It is situated 3 km from Somorrostro Beach and offers a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.9 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

The apartment with a balcony and city views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchenette with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Hotel Inglés
Description:
Hotel Inglés is located right next to the Ramblas and Boquería market, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaça Catalunya. It offers 24-hour reception and rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV.

Air-conditioned rooms at the Inglés are simple and comfortable. They come with a private bathroom and some rooms have a private balcony.

A breakfast is served every morning in a restaurant located next to the hotel.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. You can also hire a car and store your luggage at the front desk.

The Palau de la Música Catalana, a Modernist auditorium, is 10 minutes’ walk from the Hotel Inglés. The characterful streets of the Gothic Quarter are on the doorstep, and you can walk to the trendy Born area in around 5 minutes.

Name: Ola Living St Antoni
Description:
Ola Living St Antoni is situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.2 km from Portal de l'Angel, 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia. It is set 1.1 km from Plaça Catalunya and offers a lift. Palau de la Musica Catalana is 1.5 km from the apartment and Cathedral of Barcelona is 1.3 km away.

Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a well-fitted kitchen including a dishwasher, oven, microwave and a toaster. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while some rooms also feature a terrace. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Boqueria Market and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Sweet BCN Three Bedroom Apartment
Description:
Sweet BCN Three Bedroom Apartment in Barcelona offers accommodation with free WiFi, a 5-minute walk from La Pedrera and 900 metres from Casa Batllo. The Sagrada Familia is within 1.4 km of the apartment.

The 3-bedroom apartment is equipped with a kitchen with a dishwasher and oven, and a bathroom with a bath or shower and a bidet. A flat-screen TV is offered.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Tivoli Theatre is 1.4 km from Sweet BCN Three Bedroom Apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is a 19-minute walk away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: P1PAR1001 - Wonderfull aparment in Paralel
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 700 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 2.7 km from Plaça Catalunya, P1PAR1001 - Wonderfull aparment in Paralel features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 1.4 km from Palau Sant Jordi and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.8 km from Portal de l'Angel.

The apartment has 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Montjuïc and Plaça Reial. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Moll de la Fusta Rooms
Description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, 1.3 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Moll de la Fusta Rooms offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Picasso Museum, Passeig de Gracia, and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The units feature bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Sant Sebastian Beach, Plaça Reial and Santa Maria del Mar. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Moll de la Fusta Rooms.

Name: The Haus Sagrada Familia
Description:
A recently renovated apartment situated in the Gràcia district of Barcelona, The Haus Sagrada Familia offers accommodation with with a terrace, private parking and free WiFi. This apartment features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Sagrada Familia.

The spacious apartment features 3 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Passeig de Gracia and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 15 km from The Haus Sagrada Familia, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Moderno
Description:
Hotel Moderno has a central location, on a side street just 20 metres from Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas. It offers free Wi-Fi access throughout.

All rooms at the Moderno are heated, air conditioned and soundproofed. There is also cable TV, a fridge and a private bathroom with toiletries.

The hotel is just a short walk from the Boquería Market on La Rambla. Plaza de Catalunya and the city’s cathedral are just a few minutes’ walk away.

The hotel’s City Tour offer is ideal for exploring the city. There is also a ticket service. The 3 computers in the lobby can be used for free.

The Moderno has a 24-hour front desk and offers express check-in and check-out.

Name: Hotel Well and Come Barcelona
Description:
Featuring a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool and city views, Well and Come Hotel is located right beside Verdaguer Metro Station and 10 minutes’ walk from Sagrada Familia.

This boutique hotel offers soundproofed rooms with free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and laptop safe. There is also a Nespresso coffee machine, kettle and minibar with free water in all rooms.

Rooms have individually controlled air conditioning and heating. They also come with a private bathroom which includes a rain shower, free toiletries, hairdryer and vanity mirror.

Some rooms come with a balcony, terrace or city views.

Hotel Well and Come Barcelona features a 24-hour reception, a lounge area with a fireplace, an on-site bar and a fitness area.

The famous Passeig de Gracia Boulevard is 5 minutes’ walk from Well and Come hotel. Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló houses can be reached within a 15-minute walk.

Name: Bright and cozy flat in the heart of the city
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to La Pedrera, Bright and cozy flat in the heart of the city features free WiFi and a washing machine. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia, and within 1.7 km of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Bright and cozy flat in the heart of the city include Casa Batllo, Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Lets Holidays Apartment Sea Views in Barcelona
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 300 metres from Nova Icaria Beach and 700 metres from Bogatell Beach, Lets Holidays Apartment Sea Views in Barcelona offers a terrace and air conditioning. This beachfront property offers access to free WiFi and free private parking. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and sea views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Somorrostro Beach, Mar Bella Beach and Barceloneta Beach. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Rooms Balmes
Description:
Rooms Balmes is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.1 km from Plaça Catalunya, less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and a 7-minute walk from La Pedrera. It is situated less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia and features a lift. The property is 500 metres from Casa Batllo, and within 1 km of the city centre.

All units in the bed and breakfast are fitted with a kettle. Featuring a shared bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also boast free WiFi, while certain rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Boqueria Market, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Mistral
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Mistral is set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 2 km from Plaça Catalunya, 2.3 km from Portal de l'Angel and 2.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. It is situated 1.6 km from Sants Railway Station and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views has 3 bedrooms, a living room, a TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Boqueria Market is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Palau Sant Jordi is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Mistral.

Name: Casas Apartamentos Gracia
Description:
Located within 700 metres of La Pedrera and 1.2 km of Casa Batllo, Casas Apartamentos Gracia provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 600 metres away.

Each unit is equipped with a terrace, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bidet. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Casas Apartamentos Gracia.

Name: Best deal PENTHOUSE!
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.7 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.7 km from Nova Icaria Beach, Best deal PENTHOUSE! offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is close to Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available.

The apartment comes with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views. This apartment also has a patio that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, La Pedrera and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Best deal PENTHOUSE!.

Name: Centric Apartment Molino P3
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.7 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.9 km from Santa Maria del Mar, Centric Apartment Molino P3 offers air conditioning. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Cathedral of Barcelona, Montjuïc, and Plaça Reial. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.6 km away.

The spacious apartment has 2 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, and a flat-screen TV. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Centric Apartment Molino P3.

Name: Lovely Appart & Sky View SAGRADA FAMILIA
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 600 metres from Sagrada Familia and 1.7 km from La Pedrera, Lovely Appart & Sky View SAGRADA FAMILIA provides accommodation with amenities such as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. This apartment offers accommodation with a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.2 km from Casa Batllo.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a kettle, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. Additional in-room amenities include fruits.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.7 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Flor Parks
Description:
Featuring a roof terrace and free Wi-Fi, Flor Parks is set on Barcelona’s Las Ramblas, beside Liceu Metro Station. Located 200 metres from La Boqueria Market, it offers soundproofed rooms.

The Flor Parks' air-conditioned rooms have a balcony, satellite TV and a minibar. Their private bathrooms have hairdryers and some have hydromassage baths.

Set menu and à la carte dishes are served at the Hotel Flor’s restaurant. There is also a snack bar and café.

The hotel’s central location makes it perfect for exploring the city’s Gothic Quarter and Barcelona Cathedral is just 10 minutes’ walk away. The Port and Maremagnum Shopping Centre are less than 1 km from the Flor Parks.

Name: Apartamentos Navas
Description:
Offering free Wi-Fi, these air-conditioned apartments are located in Sant Andreu District, only 2 minutes’ walk from Navas metro station and 10 minutes by public transport from Barcelona's historic town.

Apartamentos Navas features 2 and 3 bedroom apartments. Each has a balcony and offers modern-style furniture, a comfortable lounge with sofa bed and flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom with hairdryer.

Navas and Sant Andreu District are well connected to Barcelona city centre by both metro and bus. Numerous shops, supermarkets as well as bars and restaurants can also be found nearby.

Clot-Aragó Train Station is 5 minutes’ walk from the apartments.

Name: Vincent's House
Description:
Offering inner courtyard views, Vincent's House is an accommodation set in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Sagrada Familia and 1.4 km from Park Güell. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available.

The spacious apartment features 4 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Sightseeing tours are available in the neighbourhood.

Passeig de Gracia is 1.9 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 2.9 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km from the property.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Sagrada Familia II
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.8 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 300 metres from Sagrada Familia, Stay U-nique Apartments Sagrada Familia II offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 2 km from Casa Batllo and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.8 km from La Pedrera.

Featuring a DVD player, the spacious apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a toaster, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 3 bedrooms, and 1 bathroom with a bidet and a bath. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.3 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Sagrada Familia II.

Name: Hostal Goya
Description:
Hostal Goya has an ideal setting, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. It features stylish rooms and apartments with free Wi-Fi access.

The Goya offers comfortable accommodation with contemporary décor and wooden floors. Each room has air conditioning and heating. Some rooms also have a balcony.

Apartments are bright and feature chic design. Each has a kitchen, dining area and a spacious living room with a balcony.

Hostal Goya has a lounge with a computer which has internet access, as well as free tea and coffee making facilities.

The guest house is 200 metres from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, where there are a range of shops, cafés and restaurants. Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are within 15 minutes’ walk of the property.

Name: Via Sants Hotel Barcelona, Tapestry Collection By Hilton
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 500 metres from Sants Railway Station, Via Sants Hotel Barcelona, Tapestry Collection By Hilton provides accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Featuring a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The accommodation offers room service and a concierge service for guests.

All units at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. Guest rooms will provide guests with a minibar.

A buffet breakfast is available at Via Sants Hotel Barcelona, Tapestry Collection By Hilton. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Mediterranean and Spanish cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested.

With staff speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French, guidance is available at the reception.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.5 km from Via Sants Hotel Barcelona, Tapestry Collection By Hilton, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.9 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Apartaments Ciutat Vella
Description:
Set just off Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, the Apartments Ciutat Vella offer modern accommodation on a pedestrian street in the Gothic Quarter. La Boquería Market is just 30 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartments combine authentic features, such as traditional stone walls and wooden beams, with modern design and free Wi-Fi. The lounge area comes with a 32-inch flat-screen TV with international channels, and the contemporary kitchen includes a microwave and Nespresso coffee machine.

The apartments are surrounded by popular shops, boutiques and cafés.

Liceu Metro Station is just 2 minutes’ walk away, and you can reach Barcelona Port and Plaza de Cataluña in 10 minutes’ walk.

Name: Hotel Granados 83, a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts
Description:
Located 250 metres from Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station, Granados 83 offers a small gym and roof terrace with a small pool and cocktail bar. Rooms feature Zen-style design and LCD TV.

This design hotel has an impressive glass and stone façade and it combines neoclassical details with industrial and natural components which has become representative of the entire city and which gives it the Speciality Monument status. It also features beautiful Art Deco interiors.

Decorated with wood, leather and glass, the Granados 83’s stylish air-conditioned rooms include a minibar, bathrobe and slippers.

There are many popular tapas bars within a 5-minute walk, on Rambla de Catalunya.

Passeig de Gràcia is 400 metres away, and is home to Gaudí’s famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló.

There is a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. On-site parking is offered for an extra charge.

Name: MIQUEL ANGEL - Apartments with community terrace
Description:
Conveniently situated in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, MIQUEL ANGEL - Apartments with community terrace is located 1.1 km from Sants Railway Station, 2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.9 km from Camp Nou. The property is around 4 km from Passeig de Gracia, 4.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 4.2 km from La Pedrera. In good weather, guests are welcome to sit outside.

All units are air-conditioned and some of them include a seating area with a flat-screen TV, and a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area. Featuring a private bathroom with a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also offer free WiFi, while some rooms are equipped with a terrace. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Casa Batllo is 4.3 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 4.7 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Barcelona Central Garden Hostal
Description:
Located just a 5-minute walk of Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Plaza Catalunya Square, Barcelona Central Garden Hostal hostel features a terrace with outdoor tables. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.

Each private room and shared dormitory is air conditioned. There is access to a shared bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. Free private lockers are available in all shared dormitories.

The hostel offers a shared kitchen and a common lounge with a TV. Upon request laundry service can be organized. Luggage storage is available for a surcharge.

There are various restaurants and bars within a 3-minute walk of the property. The buses to the airport stop 800 metres away. Plaza Catalunya Square, Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter can be reached in 10 minutes on foot.

Name: Canela Homes BARCELONA FONTANA
Description:
Providing city views, Canela Homes BARCELONA FONTANA is located in the Gràcia district of Barcelona, 1.5 km from Park Güell and 1.9 km from Casa Batllo. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.4 km from La Pedrera. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is less than 1 km away.

Each unit comes with a balcony, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units include bed linen and towels.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 3 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Canela Homes BARCELONA FONTANA.

Name: ELLA Guest House Barcelona
Description:
ella Guest House Barcelona is 300 metres from central Barcelona’s Tetuan Metro Station, and 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and the Rambla. It offers a sun terrace and free WiFi.

Heated rooms at the ella are chic and basic. Some have shared bathroom facilities, and others offer a private bathroom with a shower, and air conditioning.

The guest house serves a simple daily breakfast of pastries and biscuits. Throughout the day you can enjoy free tea and coffee.

The ella Guest House Barcelona offers luggage storage facilities. From its central location you can walk to the vibrant Borne area in 15 minutes. You can also take a bus or metro to the city’s Barceloneta Beach, also 15 minutes away.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Rocafort
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Rocafort features a terrace and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.7 km of Sants Railway Station and 1.7 km of Plaça Catalunya. This apartment provides accommodation with a patio. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.1 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Rocafort.

Name: ArtlifeBCN Urban Oasis Apartment
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Sants Railway Station and 1.8 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, ArtlifeBCN Urban Oasis Apartment features air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. Ideally situated in the Sants-Montjuïc district, this apartment provides a garden. The property is non-smoking and is located 3.2 km from Camp Nou.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with garden views. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Palau Sant Jordi is 3.5 km from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 4.4 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 9 km away.

Name: 42man1018 Centrally located flat in Sant Antoni
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.4 km from Plaça Catalunya, 42man1018 Centrally located flat in Sant Antoni features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.5 km from Portal de l'Angel.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: AC Hotel Diagonal L'Illa by Marriott
Description:
AC Hotel Diagonal L´Illa offers accommodation in Barcelona, 1.8 km from Camp Nou. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurants,  paid parking located at commercial center.

Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

Every room at this hotel has plush bedding, a flat-screen TV and a spacious work desk. Every room includes a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Surrounded by lush gardens, the property is near many upscale boutiques and restaurants.

The Suite Bar is a modern, welcoming space on the hotel’s second floor. Its contemporary décor and lighting make it an ideal spot to enjoy a drink.

The Picasso Museum is 3.8 km from AC Hotel Diagonal L´Illa, while La Pedrera is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 11 km away.

Name: 61PAR1014- Magnifico apartamento recientemente decorado en Poble Sec
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya and 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia, 61PAR1014- Magnifico apartamento recientemente decorado en Poble Sec offers air conditioning. It is situated 2.6 km from Portal de l'Angel and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 700 metres away.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Sants Railway Station and Palau Sant Jordi. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Be Barcelona Eixample Universidad
Description:
Be Barcelona Eixample Universidad is situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.2 km from Casa Batllo, 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Sightseeing tours are available within a reachable distance of the property. A car rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Be Barcelona Eixample Universidad include Tivoli Theatre, La Pedrera and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Vibrant and modern apartment
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 3.1 km from Plaça Catalunya, Vibrant and modern apartment offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.9 km from Portal de l'Angel.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with inner courtyard views.

Sightseeing tours are available close by.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau Sant Jordi, Boqueria Market and Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Barcelona me enamora
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 800 metres from Sagrada Familia and 2.3 km from La Pedrera, Barcelona me enamora offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is set 2.8 km from Casa Batllo and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.5 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The 2-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.3 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Barcelona me enamora.

Name: Easy Sants by Bossh!
Description:
Situated within 600 metres of Sants Railway Station and 1.8 km of Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Easy Sants by Bossh! features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

At the hostel, rooms come with a wardrobe. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms at Easy Sants by Bossh! are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

Camp Nou is 2.5 km from the accommodation, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.6 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Latroupe Poblenou Beach
Description:
Located in Barcelona and with Mar Bella Beach reachable within 700 metres, Latroupe Poblenou Beach provides concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. The property is around 700 metres from Bogatell Beach, less than 1 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach and 2.2 km from Somorrostro Beach. The accommodation features a shared kitchen, a tour desk and luggage storage for guests.

A buffet, continental or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property.

Around the clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak Catalan, Czech, English and Spanish.

Barceloneta Beach is 2.8 km from the hostel, while Port Olimpic is 2.3 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Renaissance Barcelona Hotel
Description:
Renaissance Barcelona Hotel is located in the heart of the city, steps away from Passeig de Gràcia, main shopping boulevard, countless bars and restaurants, landmarks and cultural attractions.

The stylish rooms at the Renaissance Barcelona Hotel have been imaginatively designed to offer a standalone destination, perfect for kicking back and recharging after a day exploring Barcelona.

Guest rooms feature a unique stylish Gaudí-inspired décor, parquet floors, luxury bed linens and marbled bathrooms with exclusive toiletries.

The hotel’s stylish Rumbo Bar & Eatery offers Mediterranean dishes using local products. The bar serves signature cocktails, wines and local craft beer. The rooftop, Goja Rooftop is the go-to place to seize the moment, socialize, enjoy delicious Mediterranean food, inventive cocktails and great conversation.

Staff at reception can help you to book tickets for show and guided tours, as well as providing information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are both within a 10-minute walk of the Renaissance Barcelona Hotel

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Balmes II
Description:
Situated within 1.9 km of La Pedrera and 2.4 km of Casa Batllo, Stay U-nique Apartments Balmes II features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. It is set 1.8 km from Park Güell and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 1.4 km away.

Each unit has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units have bed linen and towels.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.9 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 3 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Penthouse with terrace in Rambla Catalunya -Centre
Description:
In a central area of Barcelona, Penthouse with terrace in Rambla Catalunya -Centre has city views from the terrace. This apartment offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.8 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Habitat Apartments Cool Jazz
Description:
Featuring air conditioning, Habitat Apartments Cool Jazz is set in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Sagrada Familia. Park Güell is 2.1 km away.

The accommodation is fitted with a flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchenette, fitted with an oven and microwave. A toaster and refrigerator are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. There is a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer in each unit. Towels are featured.

La Pedrera is 2.2 km from Habitat Apartments Cool Jazz, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 15 km from the property.

Name: Plaza Espanya Apartment
Description:
Plaza Espanya Apartment features a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.8 km of Sants Railway Station and 1.8 km of Boqueria Market. It is set 2.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 600 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with an a bath or shower. A flat-screen TV and DVD player are provided.

Plaça Catalunya is 2.3 km from the apartment, while Portal de l'Angel is 2.3 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Elegant Eixample Apartment nicely decorated
Description:
Right in the heart of Barcelona, situated within a short distance of Passeig de Gracia and Casa Batllo, Elegant Eixample Apartment nicely decorated offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. It is located less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.1 km from Plaça Catalunya.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, La Pedrera and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Elegant Eixample Apartment nicely decorated.

Name: Catalonia Atenas
Description:
Set 3 metro stops from central Barcelona, the Atenas Catalonia has a rooftop swimming pool, offering views of the nearby Torre Agbar and Sagrada Familia. It also features free WiFi, a gym and a spa with a Turkish bath.

The bright rooms of Hotel Atenas Barcelona have simple décor with wooden flooring. Each has air conditioning, a mini fridge and satellite TV.

The hotel's buffet breakfast features a show kitchen and its Gastrobar offers cocktails and Mediterranean dishes. You will also find a pool on the 11th floor, with spectacular views of the city.

The Sagrada Familia is just over one kilometre from the hotel, while Glòries shopping centre can be reached in 15 minutes by foot.

The Catalonia Atenas has a convenient left luggage service, on-site parking, and is 2 minutes’ walk from Clot Metro Station; and 200 metres from Clot Train Station; here you can take a direct train to Barcelona Airport.

Name: Hotel Gran Derby Suites, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
Description:
This lovely red-brick building is perfectly situated in a quiet area of Barcelona, and boasts an outdoor swimming pool and a fantastic collection of lithographs by Picasso, Dalí, Tàpies and others.

Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Gran Derby Suites features flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a bathrobe, slippers and a hairdryer.

These two separate spaces allow guests to comfortably host visitors, hold meetings or work in their sophisticated rooms.

Sit back and relax around the outdoor swimming pool, where you will enjoy views of the pretty gardens.

The tour desk/ticket service and free wired internet make it easy to plan your days in Barcelona.

Take a short metro journey into the city centre, or enjoy the tourist bus, which stops right next to the Gran Derby.

You can also stroll along to the fashionable Avinguda Diagonal. Here you will find the huge L'Illa shopping centre, and a succession of stylish boutiques.

Hotel Gran Derby shares with Hotel Derby the Italian pizzeria Santa Napoli and the cocktail bar with Peruvian nuances Lima Bruja.

Name: Apartamentos Bejar
Description:
Apartamentos Bejar is located just 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Fira Exhibition Centre and Sants Train Station. It offers air-conditioned apartments with a private balcony and a modern kitchen.

The Bejar apartments feature parquet floors and smart décor. Each one has a TV and the kitchens come with an oven, hob and coffee-maker.
