The apartments are 10 minutes’ walk from Montjüic Hill, where you can find the Joan Miró Museum. You can walk to Plaza Espanya and the Arenas Shopping Centre in 5 minutes.

Located next to the apartments, Tarragona Metro Station connects you with the rest of the city. Airport buses leave from Plaza Espanya.

Name: Dana - Enjoy Apartments Rocafort
Description:
Dana - Enjoy Apartments Rocafort has a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.4 km of Sants Railway Station and 1.9 km of Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. It is set 2 km from Casa Batllo and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.2 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Tivoli Theatre is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.7 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Centric Apartment El Molino Theater p1
Description:
Located in Barcelona, Centric Apartment El Molino Theater 2 offers a furnished terrace, city views and free WiFi just 150 metres from Paralel Metro Station. Montjuic Park is 10 minutes’ walk away.

This modern apartment features wooden floors and it comes with 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom with hairdryer. The living area includes a flat-screen TV, sofa and dining table. The kitchen is equipped with a washing machine, microwave and coffee machine.

Located in Barcelona’s Poble Sec neighbourhood, you will find many theatres, bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets.

Plaza de España, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport, is 20 minutes’ walk away and Barceloneta Beach is 2.5 km from the property. Plaza Catalunya is 8 minutes’ metro ride away.

Name: Weflating City Center
Description:
These stylish apartments and rooms are located in the chic Eixample district of central Barcelona, just 350 metres from the famous Passeig de Gracia Boulevard and Metro Station. They offer a plasma TV and free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned Weflating City Center are spacious, bright and offer two or three bedrooms. The modern kitchen includes a washing machine, oven and a dishwasher.

There are several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes- walk of the apartments, and many of the city’s most popular monuments can be reached easily by foot.

Gaudi’s La Pedrera and La Rambla are both just 10 minutes’ walk away. The Barceloneta area with its beach can be reached by metro in around 10 minutes.

Direct buses to El Prat Airport run from outside El Corte Ingles department store on Plaza Catalunya Square, 600 metres away. Various buses, trains and metros also run from here.

Name: Key Gracia Apartments
Description:
Gracia Apartments offer various apartments, all located in Barcelona's trendy Gràcia district, 750 metres from Gaudí's iconic Sagrada Família Basilica. These modern, air-conditioned apartments feature free WiFi.

Each apartment has stylish décor with parquet floors, while some apartments have a private terrace. The lounge has a sofa and flat-screen TV, and the kitchen includes an oven, hob, microwave and washing machine. There are 2 bathrooms, one with a bath and the other with a shower. A hairdryer, towels and bed linen are provided. The address of each apartment is provided in the descriptions of each one.

Information about what to see and do in the surrounding area is available, and you can walk to Hospital de Sant Pau, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, in 7 minutes.

Located 450 metres away, Joanic and Sagrada Família Metro Stations connect you with the rest of the city with ease.

Name: Izaila Plaza Catalunya
Description:
Izaila Plaza Catalunya features free WiFi, air conditioning and heating. Located in the centre of Barcelona, this hotel is 50 metres from Plaza Catalunya Square.

The bright rooms at Izaila Plaza Catalunya include a flat-screen TV and a wardrobe. The private bathroom comes with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony with city views.

Guests have access to a shared lounge and a library. The hotel offers tourist information and free storage luggage.

The hotel is a 2 minute walk from Plaza Catalunya metro and train stations. The famous Sagrada Familia Cathedral is 2.5 km away. Passeig de Gracia, with its high end shops and Gaudi's La Pedrera and Casa Batlló, is within 5 minutes' walk from Izaila Plaza Catalunya.

Barcelona Airport is 20 minutes away by car. Buses run regularly between the airport and Plaza Catalunya Square.

Name: Cozy Apartment II - Les Corts
Description:
Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Cozy Apartment II - Les Corts is set in Barcelona. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.1 km from Sants Railway Station.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach.

Camp Nou is 2.2 km from the apartment, while Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 2.4 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartment Padilla
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartment Padilla has a balcony and is set in Barcelona, within just 400 metres of Sagrada Familia and 1.9 km of La Pedrera. It is located 2.1 km from Casa Batllo and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a kettle, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Stay U-nique Apartment Padilla.

Name: Sonder Casa Luz
Description:
Set in Barcelona, Sonder Casa Luz offers a terrace, breakfast and complimentary housekeeping. Guests can enjoy the near contemporary art museum MACBA, La Boqueria market and Rambla del Raval.

An on-site restaurant is also available.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Passeig de Gracia, Casa Batllo and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Sonder l Casa Luz.

Name: Sweett - Eixample
Description:
Located within 1.3 km of Passeig de Gracia and 1.5 km of Plaça Catalunya, Sweett - Eixample provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Casa Batllo is 1.2 km away.

Each unit is equipped with a balcony, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sants Railway Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: MH Apartments Ramblas
Description:
MH Apartments Ramblas is located in front of Palau Güell, 120 metres from Las Ramblas of Barcelona. Columbus Monument and Moll de Barcelona Ferry Station are within 10 minutes’ walk away.

Each bright apartment features city views. There is a living room with air condition with a TV, a dining area and a well-equipped kitchen. There is free high-speed WiFi.

The apartments at MH also include a washing machine and basic cleaning products. Tourist information can be provided at the reception.

The nearest metro station is Liceu, which is 350 metres away from MH Apartments Ramblas. Plaça Catalunya Square is 1 km away.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Gaudi II
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Gaudi II has a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.6 km of La Pedrera and 2 km of Casa Batllo. The property is set 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia, 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 2.7 km from Tivoli Theatre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 200 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 3.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Gaudi II.

Name: Barrio Gotico Apartments Escudellers
Description:
Right in the centre of Barcelona, situated within a short distance of Sant Sebastian Beach and Sant Miquel Beach, Barrio Gotico Apartments Escudellers offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as an oven and coffee machine. This apartment features accommodation with a balcony. The accommodation provides a lift, and luggage storage for guests.

The spacious apartment has 2 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Barceloneta Beach, Plaça Reial and Santa Maria del Mar. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Aparthotel Rambla108
Description:
Apartments Ramblas108 offers modern apartments situated right on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, in the heart of the city centre. Each air-conditioned apartment has free WiFi and most have a private balcony overlooking Las Ramblas.

The stylish Apartments Ramblas108 apartments have a living area with an LCD TV and a well-equipped kitchen area with a microwave, coffee maker and some have a washing machine. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Apartments Ramblas108 is set on the edge of the Gothic Quarter, just opposite the vibrant Boqueria Market and Liceu Metro Station. Buses to Barcelona Airport stop in Plaça Catalunya Square, a 3-minute walk away.

Name: Sweett - Sants
Description:
Boasting city views, Sweett - Sants features accommodation with balcony, around 1.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment has family rooms.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, slippers and a hair dryer. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

As an added convenience, the apartment offers packed lunches for guests to bring on excursions and other trips off-property.

Sants Railway Station is less than 1 km from Sweett - Sants, while Camp Nou is 2.9 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Apartamento en Avenida Gaudi
Description:
Set in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Apartamento en Avenida Gaudi has a balcony. The property is around 2.3 km from La Pedrera, 2.4 km from Passeig de Gracia and 2.8 km from Casa Batllo. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 600 metres away.

This apartment has 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with an oven and a stovetop, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with an a bath or shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.3 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 3.4 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away.

Name: Apartments Hotel Sant Pau
Description:
Set 250 metres from Sant Pau Hospital, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, Apartments Hotel Sant Pau offers stylish air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi. Kitchens feature a dishwasher, washing machine and tumble dryer.

The modern apartments are located in a building with a lift and have 1 or 2 bedrooms. The living room offers a 40-inch flat-screen TV, dining table and a sofa bed. An oven and microwave are included in the kitchen area. The bathroom has a bath tub and hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are provided.

You can find a wide variety of bars and restaurants in the fashionable Gracia neighbourhood, a 20-minute walk from the apartments. There is a supermarket within a 5-minute walk.

Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, with its designer stores and Gaudi monuments, is 2 km from Apartments Hotel Sant Pau. Camp de l’Arpa Metro Station is 150 metres from the apartments and the Sagrada Familia is a 15-minute walk away.

Name: Canela Homes BARCELONA MARINA
Description:
Situated 1.7 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 1.9 km from Somorrostro Beach, Canela Homes BARCELONA MARINA in Barcelona features air-conditioned accommodation with views of the city and free WiFi. Popular points of interest nearby include Tivoli Theatre, Port Olimpic and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The apartment has private entrance.

Each unit features a balcony, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sagrada Familia, Passeig de Gracia and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Stay Unique Apartments Cent
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.3 km from Tivoli Theatre, Stay Unique Apartments Cent offers air conditioning. It is located 1.4 km from Portal de l'Angel and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.1 km away.

The spacious apartment features 3 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Stay Unique Apartments Cent.

Name: Pedrera - Gràcia
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 800 metres from Passeig de Gracia and 1.1 km from La Pedrera, Pedrera - Gràcia offers free WiFi and air conditioning. The property is around 2.2 km from Tivoli Theatre, 2.4 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and 2.8 km from Plaça Catalunya. Portal de l'Angel is 3 km from the apartment and Park Güell is 1.7 km away.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom, while some feature a terrace or a balcony. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine. At the apartment complex, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Sagrada Familia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Murmuri Residence Concepció
Description:
Conveniently set in Barcelona, Murmuri Residence Concepció provides a continental breakfast and free WiFi. This 4-star apartment offers full-day security and luggage storage space. The apartment features family rooms.

Some accommodation includes a terrace and a seating area with flat-screen TV, as well as air conditioning and heating. At the apartment complex, all units come with a private bathroom.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, La Pedrera and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Factory Apartments Barcelona
Description:
Factory Apartments Barcelona features accommodation within 700 metres of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. This recently renovated apartment is located 2.7 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.7 km from Barceloneta Beach. The accommodation offers a lift, and luggage storage for guests.

At the apartment complex, each unit has a desk, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. All units at the apartment complex have air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Passeig de Gracia and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: BBarcelona Dúplex Poble Sec
Description:
A recently renovated property, BBarcelona Dúplex Poble Sec is set in Barcelona near Portal de l'Angel, Palau Sant Jordi and Boqueria Market. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.9 km from Plaça Catalunya. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.2 km away.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 3 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and 2 bathrooms. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Montjuïc, Cathedral of Barcelona and Plaça Reial. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Click&Flat Luxury cabanyes
Description:
Click&Flat Luxury cabanyes has a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.9 km of Palau Sant Jordi and 1.9 km of Plaça Catalunya. The property is around 3.5 km from Passeig de Gracia, 1.9 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and 1.6 km from Cathedral of Barcelona. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.4 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Boqueria Market and Montjuïc. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Click&Flat Luxury cabanyes.

Name: Magic Camp Nou
Description:
Situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Magic Camp Nou has a balcony. It is set 1.6 km from Sants Railway Station and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Camp Nou is 1.8 km away.

Each unit features a terrace, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bidet and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 3.6 km from the apartment, while Palau Sant Jordi is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from Magic Camp Nou.

Name: Canela Homes BARCELONA MACBA
Description:
Located just 10 minutes’ walk from the Rambla and Plaza Catalunya in central Barcelona, Canela Homes BARCELONA MACBA offers modern and stylish apartments. Free WiFi is offered.

Decorated in a modern, minimalist style and with designer furniture, the apartments have both air conditioning and heating,

The apartments at Canela Homes BARCELONA MACBA include a spacious living-dining area with flat-screen TV, and a kitchen equipped with a microwave, oven and washing machine.

In the surrounding area you will find many shops, restaurants and bars.

The MACBA Modern Art Museum is less than 5 minutes’ walk away and Universitat Metro Station is 200 metres away. Buses from Barcelona Airport stop in nearby Plaça Universitat Square.

A surcharge applies for arrivals after check-in hours as follows:
From 20:00 to 22:00: 20 EUR
From 22:00 a 00:00: 30 EUR
After 00:00: 50 EUR
All requests for late arrival are subject to confirmation by the property.

Name: Mambo Tango
Description:
Mambo Tango is a backpackers’ hostel located in Barcelona’s Poble Sec district, just 100 metres from Parallel Metro Station. It offers free daily activities and free Wi-Fi access.

Mambo Tango Hostel offers colourful dormitories and private rooms, all with air conditioning, heating and individual lockers.

You can prepare meals in the Mambo Tango’s shared kitchen, or enjoy a film in the TV lounge. The hotel’s free activities include photo exhibitions, music classes and city walks.

Staff can provide information on Barcelona’s many attractions, as well as help with ticket reservations and discounts. The property also organizes daily guided walking tours and night tours to bars and nightclubs. The famous Gaudí houses are within 15 minutes’ walk of the hostel.

Situated at the foot of Montjuïc Hill, the hostel is an ideal base for visiting Montjuïc Castle and the Magic Fountains. The lively Raval district is just a 5-minute walk away.

Name: Tembo Barcelona
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Llevant, Tembo Barcelona features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. 1.4 km from Forum Beach and 1.9 km from Platja del Litoral, the property offers a terrace and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, some units at Tembo Barcelona also feature a city view. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

A buffet breakfast is available at the accommodation. At Tembo Barcelona you will find a restaurant serving international cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

There is an in-house snack bar and guests can also make use of the business area.

Port Olimpic is 4.6 km from the hotel, while Sagrada Familia is 4.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 17 km away.

Name: SWEET BCN Plaza Universidad
Description:
Set in a central area of Barcelona, 700 metres from Casa Batllo, SWEET BCN Plaza Universidad offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. The property is close to La Pedrera, Portal de l'Angel and Boqueria Market. The property is non-smoking and is situated 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment is composed of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Catalunya, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Fontrodona
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Fontrodona features a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.9 km of Plaça Catalunya and 1.8 km of Portal de l'Angel. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.4 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Palau Sant Jordi and Montjuïc. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Fontrodona.

Name: Lets holidays apartment in Sant Martí
Description:
Lets holidays apartment in Sant Martí is located in the Sant Martí district of Barcelona, 2.6 km from Mar Bella Beach, 3.4 km from Sagrada Familia and 4.7 km from Casa Batllo. It is set 2.2 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Llevant is 2.1 km away.

The 3-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

La Pedrera is 5 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 5.2 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 18 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Caminal
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Caminal features a balcony and is set in Barcelona, within just 1.4 km of Mar Bella Beach and 1.4 km of Nova Icaria Beach. The property is located 2.3 km from Port Olimpic, 2.8 km from Sagrada Familia and 3.2 km from Passeig de Gracia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Bogatell Beach is 1.3 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3.3 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Caminal.

Name: Sunny central apartment with a 100m2 city oasis
Description:
In the centre of Barcelona, located within a short distance of Passeig de Gracia and La Pedrera, Sunny central apartment with a 100m2 city oasis offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a toaster and coffee machine. This apartment provides accommodation with a terrace. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.3 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Catalunya, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Travessera II
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Travessera II has a terrace and is situated in Barcelona, within just less than 1 km of La Pedrera and a 18-minute walk of Casa Batllo. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 600 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Travessera II.

Name: Magnifico apartamento camp nou
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.6 km from Camp Nou and 1.4 km from Sants Railway Station, Magnifico apartamento camp nou provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is situated 3.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, 4.3 km from Passeig de Gracia and 4.4 km from La Pedrera. Casa Batllo is 4.5 km from the apartment and Plaça Catalunya is 5 km away.

The spacious apartment comes with 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a bath, bathrobes and a washing machine. A TV is featured.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 5 km from the apartment, while Palau Sant Jordi is 5 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: BYPILLOW House
Description:
BYPILLOW House offers air-conditioned rooms with balcony and free WiFi and private parking. The property is 300 metres from Maragall Metro Station connected to famous Sagrada Familia and o the popular sandy Barceloneta Beach in Barcelona.

Fitted with wooden floor, bright rooms have an en suite bathroom with free toiletries and bath or shower. Suites come with 2 separate areas with 2 double beds.

Buses to the city centre leave from a bus station located 200 metres away. Plaza Catalunya is 30 minutes by public transports and you can reach fashionable Passeig de Gracia in 20 minutes by metro.

Name: Vasanta powered by Sonder
Description:
Sonder l Vasanta is set in a 20th century neo-classical building, 200 metres from Urquinaona Metro Station. It offers chic, soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi and in some cases, a balcony or terrace.

Air-conditioned rooms feature modern design and include a flat-screen TV  and a private bathroom.

The Vasanta is a 4 minute walk from Passeig de Gracia and 400 metres away from Plaza Catalunya.

You can walk to Barcelona Cathedral, Las Ramblas and the Gothic and Born districts within 8 minutes. Hotel Vasanta is 20 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia.

Name: 42MAL813 - Great 2Br near Sagrada Familia
Description:
Well situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 42MAL813 - Great 2Br near Sagrada Familia is located 400 metres from Sagrada Familia, 2 km from La Pedrera and 2.2 km from Casa Batllo. It is set 3 km from Bogatell Beach and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km away.

Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a well-fitted kitchen including a dishwasher, oven, microwave and a toaster. A fridge and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.5 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.7 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Circa 1905
Description:
This small hotel occupies the first floor of a modernist building, just 50 metres from central Barcelona’s famous shopping street, Passeig de Gràcia. It offers elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Air-conditioned rooms at Circa 1905 include a blend of classic and modern features. There is a balcony and private bathroom with amenities and a hairdryer.

The hotel serves a breakfast of local produce. Free tea and coffee are offered 24 hours a day.

Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. Gaudí’s La Pedrera is just 100 metres away, while you can walk to Casa Batlló in under 5 minutes.

Name: Eurostars Barcelona Central
Description:
Ocean Drive Barcelona features air-conditioned rooms with satellite flat-screen TV in the Eixample district of Barcelona. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a seasonal outdoor pool. Guests can enjoy a selection of international cuisine in the in-house restaurant.

At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at Ocean Drive Barcelona also offer free WiFi. All guest rooms include a wardrobe.

Buffet and à la carte breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation.

Guests will have free access to Urquinaona We/On Gym, 800 metres from the hotel. Ocean Drive Barcelona offers a terrace.

Casa Batllo is 300 metres from the hotel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Hotel Margot House Barcelona
Description:
Hotel Margot House Barcelona is located in Barcelona. This hotel is set in front of Casa Batlló, at number 46 in a residential building in the heart of Passeig de Gracia. Passeig de Gracia metro station is in front of the hotel and Sagrada Family is 3 metro stops away.

Each room at this hotel features modern décor and hardwood floors. They include a flat-screen TV, safe, air conditioning, and heating. The private bathroom comes with a bath or shower, hairdryer, slippers, and free toiletries.

The property has a 24-hour front desk and library. Laundry and dry cleaning services are available, and a shuttle to the airport can be arranged for an extra charge.

Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas Boulevard are less than 10 minutes away on foot.

The apartments are equipped with all modern comforts so that you can enjoy a highly private or independent atmosphere, whether you are booking a stay with the family or a group of friends. The building itself has a lift and a magnificent terrace for communal use where you can organise barbeques or simply relax in the middle of the city. You can easily visit the nearby Gothic Quarter that is only a few minutes on foot from the city port and beach front.

At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units are air conditioned and include a seating and/or dining area. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Cathedral of Barcelona and Passeig de Gracia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

The Gothic Quarter and cathedral are 5 minutes’ walk from the guesthouse, while the Picasso Museum is 15 minutes away. Guests can request tourist information on the surrounding area from the tour desk.

Barcelona Airport is 30 minutes away by bus from Plaza Catalunya.

All accommodation at Stay U-nique Apartments GranDeGracia has contemporary décor finished in white and grey tones. There is a living area with a sofa and a flat-screen TV, while kitchen facilities include a microwave, fridge, toaster, coffee maker, oven and an electric hob.

Shops, bars and cafés can be found along Gran de Gràcia and in the district's charming squares  Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just 2 stops from Diagonal Metro Station.
