It is situated 3.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.9 km from Portal de l'Angel.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. There is also a seating area and a fireplace.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Palau Sant Jordi and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from rentBCN City Center Apartment.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Sagrada Familia III
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Sagrada Familia III features a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 300 metres of Sagrada Familia and 1.8 km of Casa Batllo. The property is set 3 km from Somorrostro Beach, 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.7 km from La Pedrera. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Sagrada Familia III.

Name: Rent Top Apartments Beach-Diagonal Mar
Description:
Offering different apartments in Barcelona’s modern district of Diagonal Mar, Rent Top Apartments is within 10 minutes' walk from the beach. It offers stylish apartments with private terraces with city, garden or beach views.

Rent Top Apartments is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre and from the Forum Building. There is a Tourist Bus stop and a taxi rank just in front of the property, which is also accessible by metro.

Each spacious and bright air-conditioned apartment features modern décor in light colours, and has free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour security service. All come with a lounge with flat-screen TV and DVD player, a well-equipped kitchen and private bathrooms. Some apartments have access to a shared seasonal swimming pool.

Featuring city and sea views, apartments at Rent Top include bed linen, towels, heating and a washing machine.

Name: Alcam Paseo San Juan
Description:
Offering city views, Alcam Paseo San Juan is an accommodation situated in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia and a 17-minute walk from Casa Batllo. It is set 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 1.1 km away.

Some units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, washing machine and a coffee machine, as well as a fully equipped kitchen. At the apartment complex, the units come with a private bathroom.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.7 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 1.9 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Hg City Suites Barcelona Apartments
Description:
Set within 800 metres of Passeig de Gracia and 1.3 km of La Pedrera, Hg City Suites Barcelona Apartments offers rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

All self-catered units feature parquet floors and are fitted with a satellite flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box, an equipped kitchen with a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower. At the apartment complex, the units come with bed linen and towels.

A car rental service is available at the apartment.

Casa Batllo is 1.7 km from Hg City Suites Barcelona Apartments, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

Name: Classic Gracia Apartment
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia and a 16-minute walk from La Pedrera, Classic Gracia Apartment features accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. Housed in a building dating from 19th century, this apartment is 1.9 km from Casa Batllo and 2.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Plaça Catalunya is 3.1 km away and Sagrada Familia is 3.1 km from the apartment.

The apartment provides guests with a balcony, inner courtyard views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, and a private bathroom with bath and a hair dryer. The apartment complex offers some units with city views, and the units are fitted with a patio. At the apartment complex, units have bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Tivoli Theatre is 2.5 km from Classic Gracia Apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.7 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Amazing patio views with private terrace
Description:
In a central area of Barcelona, located within a short distance of Passeig de Gracia and Palau de la Musica Catalana, Amazing patio views with private terrace offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a fridge and coffee machine. With inner courtyard views, this accommodation provides a balcony. The property has a lift, a family-friendly restaurant with an outdoor dining area.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and city views features 1 bedroom, 2 living rooms, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Sightseeing tours are available in the area. A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Amazing patio views with private terrace include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Cathedral of Barcelona. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Acogedor apartamento en el Eixample
Description:
Acogedor apartamento en el Eixample is situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.2 km from La Pedrera, 1.6 km from Casa Batllo and 2 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is around 1.9 km from Sants Railway Station, 2.5 km from Tivoli Theatre and 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia.

With 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom with a shower, this apartment is fitted with a flat-screen TV.

Portal de l'Angel is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: APBCN Eixample Center
Description:
Featuring free WiFi, APBCN Eixample Center is located in Barcelona. This property is set 200 metres from Tetuan Metro Station and a 15-minute walk from the famous Sagrada Familia.

All air-conditioned apartments at this property provide you with a flat-screen TV and dining table, while the kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, oven, coffee machine, and microwave. You can enjoy views of the city from the private balcony.

The private bathroom comes with a shower and a hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are provided, and a washer and dryer are available.

You can find a grocery shop, and various restaurants and bars within a 10-minute walk of APBCN Eixample Center. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas Boulevard are 1.3 km from the property, and Passeig de Gracia, famous for its designer shops, can be reached in 15 minutes on foot.

Name: 2 bedroom with balcony in Eixample 1-1
Description:
2 bedroom with balcony in Eixample 1-1 is situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 2 km from Casa Batllo, 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya and 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. It is set 1.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is 1.1 km away.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a microwave, a washing machine, a fridge and a stovetop. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Tivoli Theatre is 2.8 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from 2 bedroom with balcony in Eixample 1-1.

Name: Hotel Arts Barcelona
Description:
Overlooking Barceloneta Beach and Barcelona city centre, this design hotel has 2 outdoor pools and luxury spa with city views. Hotel Arts offers art collection and a restaurant with 2 Michelin stars.

The Arts is situated next to Barcelona’s Olympic Port and surrounded by shops and lively bars. Barceloneta Beach is 250 metres away, while Ciutadella Park is 300 metres away.

The Arts Hotel’s rooms include a flat-screen TV and sound system. The bathrooms have a separate bath and a shower.

The hotel’s Enoteca restaurant, awarded 2 Michelin stars, serves fine Mediterranean cuisine. The property includes a number of other bars and restaurants, including a pool-side bar serving light meals in the summer.

Hotel Arts has a hair salon and various luxury fashion boutiques. The hotel also offers a multilingual concierge team and a fully equipped business centre.

Name: Classic Palau Apartments
Description:
Providing inner courtyard views, Classic Palau Apartments is situated in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, 2.2 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia. It is located 2.1 km from Somorrostro Beach and provides a lift. The property is 500 metres from the city centre and 2.1 km from Barceloneta Beach.

All units are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave. All units come with a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms have a balcony and some have city views. At the apartment complex, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Habitat Apartments Barcelona Balconies
Description:
Habitat Apartments Barcelona Balconies is 10 minutes’ walk from Gaudi’s La Pedrera and from fashionable Passeig de Gracia. Diagonal Metro Station is 450 metres away and free WiFi is provided.

Housed in a modernist traditional Modernist building, the apartment comes with modern furnishing and parquet flooring. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, a dishwasher and kitchenware; while the bright living room comes with sofas and a flat-screen TV, and opens onto a balcony with city views.

There are plenty of bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the apartment.

A 10-minute train ride will take you to central Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas; Provença Train station is just 3 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Verdi 254
Description:
Verdi 254 is located in the Gràcia district of Barcelona, 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia, 2.8 km from La Pedrera and 3 km from Sagrada Familia. The property is set 3 km from Casa Batllo, 3.5 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 3.6 km from Tivoli Theatre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Park Güell is 700 metres away.

A buffet breakfast is available daily at the bed and breakfast.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

Plaça Catalunya is 3.8 km from Verdi 254, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 4.1 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

Name: Melia Barcelona Sarriá
Description:
Meliá Barcelona Sarriá features a spa, a 24-hour gym and a restaurant. Gaudi’s major works, such as La Pedrera and Casa Battló are 2 km away. There is free WiFi available throughout.

The Melia Barcelona Sarriá’s rooms feature chic, contemporary décor with 42-inch TVs and bathrooms with marble finishing and baths or showers.

All Level Lounge Rooms offer superior services including exclusive private areas, a private reception area with personalized attention and 1 free access per stay to the on-site  Serena spa.

A welcoming international buffet breakfast, including gluten-free products and options and special dietary options, is served every morning. The Prezzemolo restaurant, a piece of Italy in the center of Barcelona. With an open kitchen and oven evoking the most authentic trattorias.

The city’s upmarket Avenida Diagonal shopping avenue is just 1 block away; while Barcelona Camp Nou is within 10 minutes by car. Francesc Macià square is just 200 metres from the hotel and you can walk to the elegant Passeig de Gracia Boulevard in about 20 minutes.

Name: LucasLand Apartments Barcelona
Description:
Set 2.7 km from Nova Icaria Beach, LucasLand Apartments Barcelona offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 3 km from Somorrostro Beach and offers a lift. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

The apartment provides guests with a terrace, city views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near LucasLand Apartments Barcelona include Sagrada Familia, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Casa Cosi - Mallorca 3
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Casa Batllo and 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia, Casa Cosi - Mallorca 3 offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.6 km from Plaça Catalunya.

The spacious apartment features 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with inner courtyard views. Guests can take in the ambience of the surroundings from an outdoor dining area. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sants Railway Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Habitat Apartments Blanca
Description:
Habitat Apartments Blanca offers bright, modern apartments situated a 10-minute walk from Parc de la Torrassa in Barcelona. The property features free WiFi and views of the city.

Each apartment here is air-conditioned and includes a full kitchen with an oven, kettle, microwave and dishwasher. They also boast a spacious seating area with a sofa and flat-screen TV.

Restaurants and bars are available within a 5-minute walk of the property. The popular Sants Estacio stadium is just 2 km away.

Bareclona’s “Ciutat Vella” historic centre can be reached in 15 minutes by car, while El Prat-Barcelona Airport is 10 km from Habitat Apartments Blanca.

Name: Alcam Montjuic
Description:
Alcam Montjuic offers self-accommodation 700 metres from both Plaza de España, and Fira de Barcelona. Mercat de Les Flores Theatre is 2 minutes’ walk away, and free Wi-Fi is provided.

Each apartment features a living room with a double sofa bed, and a kitchen or kitchenette equipped with a microwave, fridge, and kitchenware. The bathroom comes with a hairdryer, and bath or shower; and bed linen and towels are provided.

You can find all kind of bars and restaurants in the surrounding area, and Arena de Barcelona Shopping Centre is 750 metres away.

Alcam Montjuic is 40 minutes’ drive from El Prat Airport; regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located 10 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Barcelona City Hotel
Description:
This practical hotel is located 1 streets from Passeig de Gràcia, metres from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló. It offers simple rooms with free Wi-Fi.

The Barcelona City Hotel is situated within easy walking distance of the city’s famous Modernist buildings. These include La Pedrera and the Casa Amatller.

The surrounding streets are full of elegant boutiques and great restaurants. The shopping and touristic centre of La Rambla is a short stroll away.

There are many metro stations and buses near the Barcelona City. The tourist bus also stops on Passeig de Gràcia.

All rooms at the hotel are air conditioned and heated.

Name: Habitat Apartments Bailén
Description:
Habitat Apartments Bailén is a modern apartment located in Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Arc de Triomf and 280 metres from Tetuan Square. Free WiFi access is available.

The stylish, bright apartment features a furnished balcony and a living room with sofa bed, flat-screen TV and DVD player. The fully equipped kitchenette includes a dishwasher, while the bathroom has a hairdryer and a shower.

Bed linen and towels are included. There is a double bedroom and a twin bedroom.

Habitat Apartments Bailén is situated in a private building with lift. Transportation to El Prat Airport, located 18 km away, can be provided for an extra cost.

City sights like Barcelona Zoo or Ciutadella Park are within a 15-minute walk away.

Please note that construction work is going on and some rooms may be affected by noise.

Name: Casa Barcelo Hostel Barcelona
Description:
Set in Barcelona’s stylish Eixample district, Barcelo Hostel offers air-conditioned dormitory rooms with free Wi-Fi. Located 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia, the hostel features a terrace, 24-hour reception and shared kitchens.

Each bright dormitory has bunk beds and lockers. There is access to shared bathrooms with showers and hairdryers. Bicycles are not allowed

Barcelo Hostel offers 2 shared kitchens, including a microwave, fridge and kitchenware. There are also 2 air-conditioned lounge areas with sofas and a TV. You can find a variety of shops, restaurants and bars within a 5-minute walk of the hostel.

Diagonal Metro Station is 500 metres from Barcelo Hostel and Plaza Catalunya is 2 stops away, on Line 3. Staff at the hostel can give you tourist information about the area.

Name: Kimpton Vividora Hotel, an IHG Hotel
Description:
The Kimpton Vividora Hotel, an IHG Hotel is located in the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona, ​​a short walk from the Plaça Catalunya metro station and in the Portal del Angel shopping district and 10 minutes from the Paseo de Gracia shopping area. This elegantly designed property features a Mediterranean restaurant, a cafeteria, a terrace with a bar and a rooftop pool.

All rooms feature contemporary décor. All have a yoga mat, tea and coffee making facilities, smart TV, minibar and exclusive bathrobe.In addition, the hotel offers the Forgot it? We got it! Which makes available to its guests a whole series of amenities and accessories that will further improve their stay.

The gastronomic space of the Kimpton Vividora Hotel, an IHG chain hotel, has a rooftop terrace with magnificent views of the city, pool, sun loungers, cocktails and snacks, Terraza de Vivi. The Fauna restaurant located on the first floor offers Mediterranean cuisine with Catalan roots in a room reminiscent of a typical Eixample apartment. Got Coffee & Cocktails overlooks the street and serves locally sourced coffee, wine and signature cocktails. This gastronomic space is a place where guests feel at home. Every day from 6pm the free Social Wine Hour is offered to all guests with an open bar of local wines.

This pet-friendly hotel is close to attractions such as Barcelona Cathedral, Plaza de Catalunya and the Palau de la Música Catalana. Barcelona-El Prat Airport, located 15 km away, is the closest.

Our clients say that this part of Barcelona is their favorite, according to independent comments.

Name: Centric Molino Theatre 1-1
Description:
Centric Molino Theatre 1-1 is set in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, 1.7 km from Plaça Catalunya, 1.9 km from Santa Maria del Mar and 1.6 km from Portal de l'Angel. The property is close to Montjuïc, Plaça Reial and Palau Sant Jordi. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.6 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 2 separate bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is offered. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Boqueria Market and Cathedral of Barcelona. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Spacious and comfortable Apt in the city center
Description:
Right in the centre of Barcelona, set within a short distance of Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Plaça Catalunya, Spacious and comfortable Apt in the city center offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. The property has city views and is 1.1 km from Tivoli Theatre and 1 km from Passeig de Gracia. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.2 km from Portal de l'Angel.

The spacious apartment has 3 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property offers quiet street views.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Casa Batllo and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Marina
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Marina features a terrace and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.6 km of Somorrostro Beach and 1.8 km of Bogatell Beach. This apartment provides accommodation with a patio. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 1.4 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Barceloneta Beach, Port Olimpic and Santa Maria del Mar. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: BCN Town Apartments Portaferrissa
Description:
Offering free WiFi, BCN Town Apartments Portaferrissa is a self-catering accommodation located in Barcelona, 400 metres from Liceu Metro Station.

These modern, luxury apartments include a seating area with a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. There is a full kitchen with a dishwasher, oven, coffee machine and a microwave, and the private bathrooms also come with a shower and a hairdryer. You can enjoy city view from the rooms.

Located in the Gothic Quarter, guests will find many bars and restaurants within minutes of the apartments. Las Ramblas is a 2-minute walk away.

BCN Town Apartments Portaferrissa are 500 metres from Plaça Catalunya, and a 20-minute metro ride will take you to Gaudi's La Sagrada Familia.

Name: Cozy studio in Sant Andreu
Description:
Cozy studio in Sant Andreu is situated in the Sant Andreu district of Barcelona, 5.6 km from Passeig de Gracia, 5.6 km from La Pedrera and 5.7 km from Casa Batllo. The property is around 6.2 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 6.3 km from Tivoli Theatre and 6.5 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 4.1 km away.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a washing machine and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. A flat-screen TV is available. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Park Güell is 6.6 km from Cozy studio in Sant Andreu, while Port Olimpic is 6.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 18 km away.

Name: Suites Avenue
Description:
Set in a striking, contemporary building on Passeig de Gràcia and facing Gaudí’s La Pedrera, Suites Avenue offers stylish accommodation. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym and sauna.

Each of the Avenue’s apartments has simple, chic décor with parquet floors and leather sofas. All apartments have a large kitchen with an oven, fridge and dishwasher. Free Wi-Fi is available.

The property has a concierge service, which guests can use to arrange excursions, beauty treatments and babysitting.

The apartments are a 5-minute walk from a selection of upmarket shops and close to a range of cafés and restaurants.

Casa Batlló is 5 minutes’ walk from the apartments, while Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just over 1 km away. Diagonal Metro Station is a 2-minute walk from the Suites.

Name: limehome Barcelona Carrer de Fontcoberta - Digital Access
Description:
Set within 2 km of Camp Nou and 3.1 km of Sants Railway Station, limehome Barcelona Carrer de Fontcoberta - Digital Access offers rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Located around 4 km from Passeig de Gracia, the hotel with free WiFi is also 4.1 km away from La Pedrera. The property is non-smoking and is located 3.9 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Casa Batllo is 4.4 km from limehome Barcelona Carrer de Fontcoberta - Digital Access, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 4.9 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Enjoy Apartments Urban Retreat Valencia 3
Description:
Enjoy Apartments Urban Retreat Valencia 3 is situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 3 km from Bogatell Beach, 400 metres from Sagrada Familia and 1.9 km from La Pedrera. It is located 3 km from Somorrostro Beach and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Casa Batllo is 1.9 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.5 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Click&Flat Xoriguer
Description:
Click&Flat Xoriguer is set in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, 2.5 km from Somorrostro Beach, 2.5 km from Barceloneta Beach and 2.7 km from Sant Sebastian Beach. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.5 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Click&Flat Xoriguer.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Lepant
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Lepant has a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 400 metres of Sagrada Familia and 1.8 km of Casa Batllo. It is set 2.9 km from Somorrostro Beach and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.6 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Bogatell Beach is 2.9 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Lepant.

Name: Majestic Hotel & Spa Barcelona GL
Description:
Majestic Hotel & Spa Barcelona GL offers luxurious accommodation in a neoclassical building on Passeig de Gràcia. It features a spa and an outdoor unheated plunge-pool on the rooftop with amazing views of the city.

The Majestic Hotel Barcelona maintains its original façade and its stylish, modern rooms feature attractive, classic décor. Each has air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. The apartments are located at an independent building next to the hotel.

SOLC Restaurant, located on the first floor, is a tribute to catalan and traditional cuisine. There is also a piano bar, Bar del Majestic, with live music in the evenings. During the summer guests can enjoy Dolce Vitae Cocktail Bar, which is located by the pool and overlooks Barcelona

The spa features steam baths, a sauna and offers a range of treatments. There is also a fitness centre.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló is just 100 metres from Majestic Barcelona. Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just 10 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Hostal Granvia 628
Description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, 2.9 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Hostal Granvia 628 offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. The property is close to Casa Batllo, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Plaça Catalunya. The accommodation features room service, a tour desk and luggage storage for guests.

The units in the hostel are equipped with a TV. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.

Speaking Bengali, English, Spanish and Hindi at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock.

Popular points of interest near Hostal Granvia 628 include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

Name: Casa Cosi - El Farro 1
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.7 km from La Pedrera and 2.4 km from Casa Batllo, Casa Cosi - El Farro 1 offers air conditioning. It is situated 1.8 km from Park Güell and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 1.2 km away.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a TV, an equipped kitchen, a washing machine and 1 bathroom with an a bath or shower. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.9 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 3 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: B Hotel
Description:
This design hotel is just 150 metres from Plaça Espanya and opposite Las Arenas Shopping Centre. It has an 8th-floor swimming pool and sun terrace with spectacular views of Montjuic.

The air-conditioned rooms at B Hotel are spacious and soundproofed. All rooms have free WiFi, and are decorated with contemporary art. Each room comes with an electric kettle and a pillow-menu.

The room service menu is also available at the bar and by the swimming pool.

Plaza Espanya Metro Station is within 200 metres of the hotel, while Barcelona Fira Exhibition Centre is just 250 metres away. The Magic Fountains of Montjuic are about 5 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Ant Hostel Barcelona
Description:
Located opposite Parc de la Ciutadella Park in central Barcelona, Ant Hostel Barcelona offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 500 metres away.

Rooms at this hostel feature air conditioning and parquet floors. The private bathrooms come with a bath or shower. Guests can make use of the shared kitchen.

Ant Hostel Barcelona also offers luggage storage as well as lockers for check-in and check-out are chargeable

Barcelona's Born Neighborhood and its many bars and restaurants are in the surrounding streets.

Picasso Museum is a 10-minute walk away and Barceloneta Beach is 2 km from Ant Hostel Barcelona. Plaza Catalunya, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport, is 20 minutes’ walk, while Estación del Nord, with direct buses to Girona-Costa Brava Airport, is just 500 metres' walk.

Name: Apartments Sixtyfour
Description:
Apartments Sixtyfour are situated on Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, opposite the famous Gaudi building, Casa Batlló. These design apartments have air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

Apartments Sixtyfour are a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya Square and Las Ramblas. The apartments are next to Passeig de Gracia Station. This Metro and train station offers direct links to Barcelona Airport. The property offers information on other touristic options in the city.

Each apartment has wooden floors and elegant modern décor. Living areas come with a double sofa bed. The stylish kitchens include an oven, ceramic hob and dishwasher.

A continental breakfast is served in a cafeteria nearby.

Bed linen and towels are included in all apartments. Basic cleaning products and cooking items are also provided. Several supermarkets can be found within 800 metres of the apartments.

Name: Find Calm at this cozy City Sanctuary with terrace
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Passeig de Gracia, Find Calm at this cozy City Sanctuary with terrace has a terrace, free WiFi and a washing machine. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a patio. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and 700 metres from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment includes 2 bedrooms, a living room, and 2 bathrooms with a hair dryer and a walk-in shower. A flat-screen TV is available. The accommodation offers a fireplace.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Find Calm at this cozy City Sanctuary with terrace.

Name: Sweett - Carrer Girona
Description:
Sweett - Carrer Girona offers accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. It is set 700 metres from Casa Batllo and features a lift. The property is close to popular attractions like Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Cathedral of Barcelona.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Some units feature a terrace and/or a balcony. At the apartment complex, the units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, La Pedrera and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Cal Mateu 11 huéspedes Sagrada Família
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.4 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 2.4 km from Somorrostro Beach, Cal Mateu 11 huéspedes Sagrada Família offers spacious air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. The property is close to Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk and a lift for guests.

The apartment features 4 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine and 3 bathrooms with a hair dryer. A TV with cable channels is offered. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near Cal Mateu 11 huéspedes Sagrada Família include Sagrada Familia, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Habitat Apartments Alibei
Description:
Habitat Apartments Arc de Triomf is set just off Passeig de Sant Joan and within 5 minutes’ walk of Arc de Triomf and its Metro station. These apartments come with free Wi-Fi.

Each apartment has contemporary décor. They have a living room with a flat-screen TV, and kitchen facilities including a microwave, fridge, oven, toaster, hob and a coffee maker.

The apartments are within 15 minutes’ walk of Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Passeig de Gràcia and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló are just over 1 km away.

The charming Born district and Ciutadella Park are less than 10 minutes’ walk from the apartments.

Name: Hotel El Palace Barcelona
Description:
Hotel El Palace Barcelona is located in Eixample District, close to the Ramblas, the main shopping area and Barcelona’s main tourist attractions. It offers a Mayan-style luxury spa. A limousine service with a chauffeur is available on request.

Opened in 1919, this hotel features a neo-classical façade and stylish air-conditioned rooms with classic decor. Each room is spacious and comes with satellite TV, desk, minibar and a private bathroom with hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers.

There are 2 restaurants: L'Éclair, located at the hall, and the Winter Garden Restaurant, set at the Roof Terrace; guests can also enjoy a cocktail at the Bluesman Cocktail Bar.

Hotel El Palace Barcelona has a Mayan-style spa with a Temazcal Sauna. Other facilities at this hotel include both fitness and business center and an outdoor pool.

Third person sharing in room is available for Superior room, Junior Suite and Superior Suite.

Staff at Hotel El Palace Barcelona can provide information about the area. Passeig de Gràcia Metro and Railway Station as well as Urquinaona Metro station are less than 5 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are approximately 15 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Centric Apartments Sagrada Famila 3
Description:
Located 100 metres from Sagrada Familia, Centric Apartments Sagrada Famila 3 offers air conditioning, free WiFi and a two balconies in Barcelona. Sagrada Familia Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk away.

This apartment combine the traditional Catalan tiled flooring with modern dècor. The apartment has a living area with a bed sofa, 2 berooms, kitchen a two complete bathrooms.

You will find bars, restaurants and supermarkets within 100 metres from Centric Apartments Sagrada Famila 3.

Plaza Catalunya, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport, is a 20-minute metro ride away. Barceloneta Beach is 4 km from the property.

Name: 63PAR1016- Sunny apartment in Paralel
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 700 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya, 63PAR1016- Sunny apartment in Paralel features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 2.6 km from Portal de l'Angel and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Sants Railway Station and Palau Sant Jordi. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Le Meridien Barcelona
Description:
Located in the vibrant center of Barcelona, Le Méridien Barcelona offers the perfect base for exploring the city’s rich culture and iconic landmarks. With major attractions such as La Rambla, the Gothic Quarter, and the famous Boquería Market just steps away, guests can easily immerse themselves in the city's dynamic energy.

Our 191 luxury guest rooms and 40 suites offer breathtaking city views, with six distinct categories of suites tailored to the needs of every traveler. From family suites to those featuring expansive terraces, corner suites with stunning views of La Rambla, and our exclusive Presidential Suite boasting panoramic vistas of the entire city, each suite provides a luxurious retreat designed to make your stay as comfortable and memorable as possible.

Indulge your palate at CentOnze Restaurant, where creatively reinterpreted local flavors await in a cosmopolitan yet relaxed setting. Enjoy expertly crafted cocktails and coffees at Signature Bar and Longitude Bar.

Le Méridien Barcelona serves a varied, international breakfast. The CentOnze restaurant provides creative Mediterranean cuisine and cocktails, prepared with fresh ingredients from the nearby Boquería Market, as well as music and impressive views of La Rambla.

Rejuvenate at our Explore Spa Studio, a sanctuary of serenity offering beautiful city views from the terrace. Our 24-hour gym is equipped with the latest technology, allowing you to stay fit at any time of the day.

Experience the charm and luxury of Le Méridien Barcelona, where warmth and sophistication await at every turn.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Consell
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Consell features a balcony and is set in Barcelona, within just 1.3 km of Plaça Catalunya and 1.5 km of Tivoli Theatre. It is located 1.6 km from Portal de l'Angel and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.3 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Consell.

Name: BBarcelona Sagrada Familia Flats
Description:
Located 400 metres from Sagrada Familia, BBarcelona Sagrada Familia Flats offers soundproofed apartments with free Wi-Fi. Apartments have a balcony or a furnished terrace with city views.

Set in a same building, all the air-conditioned apartments have a living-dining room with a TV; and an open-plan kitchen or kitchenette equipped with dishwasher. There is a washing machine, a clothes dryer; and bed linen and towels are provided.

Numerous bars, restaurants as well as supermarkets can be found within 5 minutes’ walk.

BBarcelona Sagrada Familia Flats is well connected by public transport; you can easily reach Barcelona City Centre by metro or bus in 15 minutes. The closest metro station is Encants, a 4-minute walk away.

Name: Claris Hotel & Spa GL, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
Description:
Located just off Barcelona’s prestigious Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, this luxury hotel offers city views from its rooftop pool. It also has a unique art collection.

Built in a converted 19th century palace, Claris Hotel & Spa GL combines the classicism of the original place with modern materials and it has over 400 original pieces of art on display, giving it the Specialit Monument status. It offers free entry to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum, located next door.

The smart, soundproofed bedrooms feature stylish décor and hand-made furniture. Each one comes with LCD satellite TV, sofa and pieces of Roman, Egyptian and Hindu artwork.

The hotel’s Terraza del Claris Restaurant serves gourmet Mediterranean food on the roof terrace overlooking the characteristic rooftops of the Eixample quarter. The Os-kuro Sushi & Robata Restaurant offers classic recipes from Japanese gastronomy combined with Mediterranean ingredients and local produce.

All TV in rooms feature ChromeCast offering connectivity to platforms such as Netflix, Amazon Prime, Youtube, etc.

The Claris is just 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. The Ramblas is around 10 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Casa Cosi - Francoli 1
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.7 km from La Pedrera, Casa Cosi - Francoli 1 offers free WiFi, a terrace and air conditioning. It is situated 1.8 km from Park Güell and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.4 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment comes with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with garden views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.9 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 3 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Casa Cosi - Sant Gervasi 1
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.7 km from La Pedrera, Casa Cosi - Sant Gervasi 1 offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is set 1.8 km from Park Güell and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.4 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. The property offers quiet street views.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.9 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 3 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Bonito apartamento en Gracia
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 80 metres from Passeig de Gracia and 600 metres from La Pedrera, Bonito apartamento en Gracia features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is located 2.1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 2 km from Portal de l'Angel and 2 km from Sagrada Familia. The property is non-smoking and is set 1 km from Casa Batllo.

This apartment has 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Plaça Catalunya. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Habitat Apartments Paseo de Gracia Suite
Description:
Right in the heart of Barcelona, situated within a short distance of Passeig de Gracia and Casa Batllo, Habitat Apartments Paseo de Gracia Suite offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a dishwasher and coffee machine. It is located 600 metres from Tivoli Theatre and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 300 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, La Pedrera and Plaça Catalunya. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
